T13TD4312.2E:33b-44: de las gyes pa yin pas lus thams cad khyab cing dangs ma'i rang bzhin du kha zas smin par 'gyur pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:33b-45: de'i snying por gyur ba mdangs zhes bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:33b-46: de bzhin du lus kyi bya ba thams cad de dang 'brel pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-1: rtsa ba spom zhing che la rtse mo ni rab tu phra zhing shin tu phra mor gyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-2: de yang lo ma'i rtsa ba ltar gyes pa yin te //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-3: sor gnyis dang sor gcig dang sor phyed dang nas dang nas kyi phyed tsam du gyes shing lo ma'i 'dab ma gyes pa ltar 'dra bar gnas shing du mar gyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-4: de bas na rtsa phran de rnams ni bdun brgya yod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-5: de la yan lag re re zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-6: brgyad brgyad der ni gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-8: des na yan lag bzhi bzhi brgyad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-9: yan lag re re zhing rtsa brgyad brgyad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-11: de la dbug bar mi bya ba //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-12: rtsa yi dra ba 'dzin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-13: nang na gnas pa'i gsum po yin //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-15: rtsa brgyad po de dag gi nang nas dra ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i dra ba gong du bshad pa de dag 'dzin pa'i rten la gtsags pus gdab par mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:34a-16: de lta bu'i rtsa dang nang na gnas pa'i rtsa gsum ste /
T13TD4312.2E:34a-17: rtsa bzhi po mtshon gyis gdab cing gtsags bus dbug tu mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-18: de bzhin du gnyis pa la brla dang dpung pa'i rtsa gnyis dbug tu mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-19: rked par bcu drug phrag gnyis te //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-20: de las brla'i rtsar gnyis gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-21: rked pa'i gnad rnams gnyis gnyis te //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-22: de brgyad gtsags bus gdab mi bya //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-24: rked pa'i gnas dang rtsa bcu drug phrag gnyis te sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:34a-25: rtsa de dag gi nang nas brla'i rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:34a-26: rked pa gzhon nu rtsa gnyis gnyis te gnad kyi rtsa brgyad po de dag la gtsags bus gdab tu mi rung bas na mtshon gyi las mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-28: rtsib logs gnyis la rtsa bcu drug / de las gyen 'gro zhes bya spang //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-30: rtsib logs gnyis gnyis la rtsa bcu drug yod pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:34a-31: de las gyen du 'gro ba'i rtsib logs kyi mtshams na gnas pa zhes bya ba la gtsags bus gdab tu mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-32: rgyab tu rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-33: sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-34: de las gnyis gnyis gyen 'gro ba //
T13TD4312.2E:34a-35: mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-0: rgyab na gnas pa'i rtsa nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa de las sgal tshigs kyi ngos gnyis na rtsa gnyis gnyis yod @34b pa gyen du 'gro ba'i rtsa bzhi ni gtsags bus gdab tu mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-1: rgyab bzhin lto na gnas rtsa de //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-2: pho mtshan steng na gnas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-3: spu yi phreng ba'i ngos gnyis rtsa //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-4: gnyis gnyis mtshon gyis mi gdab bo //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-6: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs kyi rtsa dang 'dra bar lto la nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-7: rtsa de dag gi nang na pho mtshan gyi steng na gnas pa'i rtsa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-8: spu'i phreng ba'i ngos gnyis na gnas pa'i rtsa gnyis gnyis mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-9: brang la gnas pa bzhi bcu las //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-10: bcu bzhi dbug par mi bya ste //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-11: nu 'jing de yi rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-12: snying ga dag ni so sor gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-13: gnod bral gnad ni gnyis pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-14: mi gsal zhes bya gnyis kyi gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-16: brang la rtsa bzhi bcu gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-17: de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa bcu bzhi gang yod pa de dag tu dbug cing dbral bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-18: de yang gang dag ce na /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-19: nu ma'i rtse mo'i rtsa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-21: gnod bral zhes bya ba'i gnad dang /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-22: mi gsal zhes bya ba'i gnad dang re re la yang gnyis gnyis te de ltar bcu bzhi'o //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-23: mgrin pa ltag pa 'dra ba las //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-24: sngon po mjing pa ltag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-25: 'gal ba dang ni ma mo brgyad //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-26: bcu drug yongs su spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-28: mgrin pa na ltag pa dang 'dra bar nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-29: de las sngon po zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi rtsa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-30: mjing pa'i rtsa gnyis dang ltag pa'i rtsa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-31: 'gal pa zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi rtsa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-32: ma mo zhes bya ba brgyad de ;
T13TD4312.2E:34b-33: de ltar rtsa bcu drug po gtsags bus mi gdab par spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-34: 'gram pa bcu drug de las gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-35: mtshams ni 'brel bar byed pa spang //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-37: 'gram pa gnyis la rtsa bcu drug po yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-38: de las mtshams 'brel bar byed pa'i rtsa gnyis gtsags bus mi gdab par spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-40: 'og gi ro tshor byed gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-41: tshig 'byin byed pa gnyis po spang //
T13TD4312.2E:34b-43: lce la yang 'gram pa dang 'dra bar rtsa bcu drug yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:34b-44: rtsa de rnams kyi nang nas lce'i 'og gi rtsa ro tshor bar byed pa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-0: @35a * // de bzhin du tshig 'byin par byed pa'i rtsa gnyis yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-1: bzhi po de dag gcags bus mi gdab par spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-2: sna yi rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-3: de las dri tshor byad gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-4: rkan du 'gro ba'i rtsa gcig spang //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-6: sna'i rtsa nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-7: de las sna'i gnyis ni dri tshor zhing snom par byed pas rtsa de gnyis dbug par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-8: de bzhin du sna'i rtsa rkan du 'gro ba gcig yod pa de yang gtsags bus mi gdab pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-9: de ltar gsum spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-10: mig gnyis kyi ni lnga bcu drug /'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las byed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-11: gnyis gnyis dang ni mig 'gram gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-12: drug po de dag spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-14: mig gnyis la rtsa lnga bcu rtsa drug yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-15: de rnams las mig 'dzums pa dang 'byed par byed pa'i rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-16: de bzhin du mig 'gram gyi rtsa gnyis te /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-17: de ltar drug po de dag gtsags bus mi gdab ste spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-18: mig dang snar gnas dpral ba la //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-19: brten pa'i rtsa ni drug cu las //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-20: gzhag pa gcig dang gtsug gi gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-21: skra mtshams gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi ste //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-22: bdun po de dag mtshon gdab spang //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-24: mig dang snar gnas shing brten pa'i rtsa dpral bar 'dus pa bcu drug yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-25: rtsa de rnams kyi nang nas gzhag pa zhes bya ba gnad kyi rtsa gcig dang gtsug 'khyil ba'i gnad kyi rtsa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-26: de bzhin du skra mtshams kyi rtsa bzhi ste bdun po de dag la gtsags bus gdab par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-27: rna bar bcu drug de las 'dir //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-28: sgra thos byed pa'i rtsa gnyis spang //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-30: rna ba la rtsa bcu drug yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:35a-31: de dag las sgra thos par byed pa'i rtsa gnyis po la mtshon gyis mi gdab bo //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-32: de nyid las ni mur 'gram gyi //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-33: mtshams su 'gro ba gnyis po spang //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-35: rna ba la brten pa'i rtsa bcu drug po de las mur 'gram gyi mtshams su 'gro ba'i rtsa gnyis po la mtshon gyis mi gdab bo //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-36: spyi bor bcu gnyis de las ni //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-37: gyen 'gro skra mtshams bdag po las //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-38: so so'i re re spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:35a-40: spyi bor gnas pa'i rtsa bcu gnyis yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-0: de dag las kyang gyen du 'gro @35b ba'am 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis kyi rtsa re re dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-1: skra mtshams kyi rtsa lnga po re re dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-2: bdag po zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi rtsa gcig ste /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-3: de ltar mgo bo'i rtsa la gtsags bus gdab tu mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-5: de ltar yan lag re re'i rtsa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-6: dbye ba dbug min shes phyir bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-8: rnam pa de ltar na yan lag re re'i rtsa'i dbye ba dbug tu mi rung ba dang rung ba shes par bya ba'i phyir so so'i dbye ba bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-9: de las lus la dbug mi rung //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-10: ma lus dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-11: dog dang rtsa mdud shin tu phra //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-12: yo dang tshigs la gnas mi dbug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-13: lus kyi yan lag la dbug tu mi rung zhing gtsags bus gdab par mi bya ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-14: ma lus pa mtha' dag bsdu ba la rtsa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-15: de ltar rnam pa de dag gis dbug tu mi rung ba de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rtsa gang dog cing gcig la gcig 'brel ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-16: rtsa mdud chags pa'i gnas dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-17: shin tu phra ba dang chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-19: de bzhin du rus pa'i tshigs la gnas shing brten pa gang yin pa de dag dbug cing gtsags bus gdab par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-20: rtsa ni bdun brgya de rnams las //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-21: bzhi char phrag ni so sor rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-22: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan khrag / nad med khrag ni de ltar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-23: de ni lus la phan 'dogs te //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-24: gzhan du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-26: rtsa bdun brgya yod pa de rnams las rang rang gi bzhi cha ste brgya bdun cu rtsa lngar rlung re res mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi khrag dang nad med pa'i khrag so sor rgyu ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-27: de ltar rlung la sogs pa'i nad gnas shing snyoms par 'jug pa'i ni lus la phan 'dogs shing gnas par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:35b-28: gzhan du ste go rims 'chol zhing 'khrugs par gnas na lus la gnod pa skyed cing nad du 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-29: de la gnag dang dmar dang phra //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-30: skad cig re re gang zhing stongs //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-31: mgul ba rlung gi khrag rtsa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:35b-33: rtsa de dag gi nang nas rtsa'i mdog gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-0: skad cig re re zhing gang @36a * //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-2: rlung ni g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pas na lan 'ga' ni gang zhing rgyas par snang la /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-3: lan 'ga' ni stong zhing khong stong gi tshul du skad cig re rer 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-4: de bzhin du rtsa gang shin tu 'gul zhing 'phar ba gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-5: reg tshe tsha zhing myur du rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-6: mdog sngo ser por 'dug pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-7: mkhris pa'i khrag rtsa'i mtshan ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-9: mkhris pa'i khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa yin pa de ni reg na tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa yin gyi grang bar gnas pa ma yin pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-10: de bzhin du myur du rgyu zhing 'bab pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-11: de bzhin du mdog sngon po'am /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-13: dkar snum brtan grang bad kan rtsa //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-15: bad kan gyi khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa ni 'di ltar gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-18: rgyu ba brtan zhing 'gyur ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-19: reg na grang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-22: ldan pa'i nad dang 'dus pa'i nad kyi rtsa'i mtshan nyid ni 'dren mar rgyu ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-25: mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-26: gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dren mar snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-27: mi mngon mnyam gnas snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-28: mdog dmar khrag rtsa nad med yin //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-30: rtsa mi mngon zhing nang du nub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-31: mnyam zhing snyoms par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-32: rtsub cing snum bag med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-33: khrag gi mdog dmar ba'i rtsa ni nad med pa'i khrag rgyu ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-34: rtsa bo che ni nyi shu bzhi //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-35: lte ba la ni brten pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-36: de rnams kyis bsor lte ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-37: 'khor lo'i lte ba rtsibs bskor mtshungs //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-38: des ni steng 'og thad ka ru //
T13TD4312.2E:36a-41: lus la rtsa bo che nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa gang yin pa de ni lte ba la brten cing gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-42: de yang de rnams kyis lte ba yongs su bskor bar gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:36a-43: ji ltar shing rta'i lte ba gang yin pa de rtsibs kyis kun nas bskor cing gnas pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-0: de lta bu'i rtsa bo che des ni lus kyi steng dang 'og dang thad ka dag tu gyes @36b pas phung po ni rjes su 'dzin cing 'tsho bar byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:36b-1: rtsa bo che de dag kyang kun dga' ra ba'i chu 'dren pa'i wa lta bu'am zhing gi yur ba lta bu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-2: rtsa bo che de dag las bcu ni steng du 'gro ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:36b-4: bzhi ni thad kar 'gro ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-5: bu ga sna dang rna ba gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-6: mig gnyis kha rkub pho mtshan no //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-8: skyes pa la ni bu ga dgu yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:36b-15: bud med nu ma gnyis khrag sgo //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-16: gsum gyis lhag par gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-18: bud med rnams ni snga ma las lhag par gyur pa'i bu ga gsum yod de nu ma gnyis kyi bu ga dang /
T13TD4312.2E:36b-19: zla mtshan rgyu ba'i bu ga'o //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-20: nang gi srog gi gnas gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-21: bu ga bcu gsum yod par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-22: srog dang lus zungs dri mchu //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-25: de bzhin du nang gi bu ga snga ma las gzhan pa srog la sogs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i bu ga bcu gsum yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:36b-26: de la srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni srog gi gnas su rgyu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-27: lus zungs rgyu ba rnams su ni dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rgyu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-28: dri ma rgyu ba'i gnas su bshang ba dang gci ba dang rdul rgyu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-29: chu rgyu ba'i gnas su ni chu 'thungs pa rgyu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-30: zas rgyu ba'i gnas su ni zas zos pa rnams rgyu ste /
T13TD4312.2E:36b-31: de ltar na rnam pa bcu gsum yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-32: zas rgyu mi mthun bstan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-33: de la gnod pas nad skyed la //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-34: skyon med dag pas bde bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-36: bu ga de dag zas dang spyod lam mi mthun zhing phan pa ma yin ba bsten pas de la gnod par gyur cing 'khrugs par byas pa las nad rnams skyed par 'gyur la skyon med cing dag pa'i zas dang spyod lam bsten pas gnod pa med na bde ba nyid du 'gyur zhing nad med pa skyed bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-37: rang gi lus zungs mdog mnyam zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-38: zlum dang sbom dang phra ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-39: bu ga'i dbyibs kyi ring po ste //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-40: lo ma'i rtsa 'phros lta bu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:36b-42: rang gi lus zungs kyi gzhir gyur pa'i bu ga gang ba ste nad pa'i lus zungs de dang mdog mnyam zhing mtshungs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-0: des na dangs ma rgyu ba'i bu ga ni lus zungs kyi dangs ma bu ga dang kha dog mtshungs pa yin pa @37a * //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-2: bu ga de dag thams cad las bu ga la la ni zlum po yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-3: bu ga la la ni sbom pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-4: la la ni phra zhing chung ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-5: bu ga de dag thams cad kyi dbyibs ni ring por gnas shing /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-6: rtsa sbubs de dag kyang lo ma'i rtsa rgyus kyi ri mo dang mthun pa'i ring thung du mar gyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-7: zas dang spyod lam dag gis gang //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-8: nad kyi mthu dang mnyam gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-9: gang yang lus zungs mi mnyam ste //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-10: bu ga'i rgyun la gnod byed yin //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-12: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi zas gang rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi mthu rtsub ba la sogs pa dang mnyam zhing mtshungs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bu ga rnams 'gags shing gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-13: spyod lam ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-14: de yang nad kyi mthu dang cha mnyam par gyur na bu ga rnams la gnod cing 'gags pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-15: de bzhin du lus zungs bdun po zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa de'i mthu dang nus pa mi mnyam zhing yon tan tha dad par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bu ga'i rgyun la gnod cing 'gags pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-17: rtsa ni mdud pa chags pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-18: lam gzhan dag tu 'gro ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-19: bu ga'i rgyu 'khrugs mtshan nyid yin //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-21: bu ga la mang du byung ba ni ji ltar gcin 'bab pa'i bu ga las gcin snyi ba'i nad ltar mang du byung ba na /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-22: 'gags pa ni mi 'byung ba'am cung zad byung ba ste gcin sri ba'i nad lta bu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-23: de bzhin du bshang ba 'byung ba'i bu ga las tshad pa 'khru ba ltar bshang gci lhag par 'khru ba ni mang du 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-24: 'gags pa ni bshang ba cung zad byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-25: yang na rtug 'gags kyi nad ltar thams cad nas thams cad du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ni bu ga'i rgyu 'khrugs shing gnod pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid yin te de bzhin gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37a-26: de bzhin du rtsa la mdud pa chags par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:37a-27: de bzhin du lam gzhan du 'gro ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:37b-0: rang gi rgyu'i 'am ma spangs nas lam gzhan du 'gro ba de yang bu ga la @37b gnod pa yod cing 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-1: padma'i rtsa ba phra mo las //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-2: ring du rgyu bar byed pa ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-3: gang gis dangs ma nyer 'phel ba //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-4: lus kyi sgo ni bu ga yin //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-6: ji ltar padma'i rtsa ba'i sbubs shin tu phra ba'i bu ga las ring du rgyu bar byed cing thams cad la khyab par byed pa de bzhin du bu ga'i sgo gang nas lus 'di la dangs ma nye bar sogs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas gang lus ma lus pa khyab par byed pa de ni bu ga zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-7: bu ga rnams ni brtol gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-8: 'dar myos lto sbos lkugs dang rims //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-9: sla dang gzer dang bshang gci 'gags //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-12: bu ga brtol zhing phyung bar gyur nas 'dar ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:37b-13: yang na 'chi zhing dus byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-14: de la 'dar ba ni lus g-yo zhing 'gul ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-15: myos pa ni sems stor ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-16: lto spos pa ni dbugs kyis khengs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-17: de bas sman pas bu ga brtol //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-18: re thag bcad de gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-19: 'phral du rma byung cho ga yis //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-20: 'bad de zug rngu dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-22: de ltar srog dang bral ba'i nyes pa de bas na sman pa dag gis bu ga brtol ba'i nad pa la re thag bcad cing bzlog ste bya ba 'dis ni nges par 'chi ba yin te zhes smra la /
T13TD4312.2E:37b-23: mtshon gyis zug rngu de phyung nas 'bad de gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-24: de yang ji ltar dbyung zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:37b-25: 'phral du zug rngu dbyung ba'i cho ga sngar bshad pa ltar dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-26: zas 'ju byed pa mkhris pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-27: 'ju byed yin zhes sngar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-29: zas 'ju bar byed pa ni mkhris pa lnga'i khyad par 'ju bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mkhris pa yin no zhes sngar nad kyi bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u las bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-30: nad dang lus zungs dri ma yi //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-31: drod yin zhes ni rgyun shes zer //
T13TD4312.2E:37b-33: drang srong rgyun shes kyi bus ni nad dang lus zungs dang dri ma rnams kyi drod de rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:37b-34: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:37b-35: bshang gci zhes bya ba'i dri ma de rnams kyi drod ni me drod de /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-0: nad dang lus zungs dang dri ma dang 'dus ba las byung ba'i nang gi me drod ji skad du bstan pa'i mes @38a * //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-3: de ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-6: 'ju bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mkhris pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-7: me drod ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-8: zas de nyid 'dzin cing chags par byed pas na 'dzin par byed pa'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:38a-10: de nyid thang la 'bar gzhung gis //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-11: mkhris pa 'dzin pa'i cha ru bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-14: drang srong thang la 'bar gyis gzhung ngam phyogs kyis de mkhris pa 'dzin pa'i cha yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-16: tshe dang nad med brtson gzi mdangs //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-17: lus zungs me drod stobs 'phel byed //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-18: zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor zhugs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-19: zas kyi lam gyi sgo gtan yin //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-21: 'dzin pa de nyid zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgo na 'dug par gyur na tshe 'phel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-22: nad med pa la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-23: de bzhin du zas kyi lam zhu ba'i gnas kyi nang du 'gro ba'i gnas byed pa yin te sgo byed pa'i gags byed pa ni sgo gtan yin pa dang 'dra bar 'dir yang zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor 'dug ste ma zhu ba'i gnas dang zhu ba'i gnas kyi bar du gnas nas des kyang me'i drod nang du skyed pas ma zhu ba'i gnas su 'gro bar bdog pa'i zas stobs kyis bkag nas mkhris pa'i me drod kyis smin cing skem par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-24: de ni stobs ldan zos ba rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-25: zhu nas thur du 'dren par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-26: stobs zhan gyur na kha zas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-27: ma smin nyid du 'byung bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-29: 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba ste stobs dang ldan par gyur na kha zas zos pa rnams ma zhu ba'i gnas su bkag cing stobs kyis bkag nas smin cing zhu bar byas te /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-30: de'i 'og tu zas de dri ma'i rnam par zhu ba'i gnas su 'dren par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-31: de ni stobs dang ldan pa las gyur gyi stobs gzhan las ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-32: gal te 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ste ;
T13TD4312.2E:38a-33: stobs zhan cing nyam chung bar gyur ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-34: nad kyis nyen pa yin na /
T13TD4312.2E:38a-35: kha zas ma zhu zhing ma smin pa nyid du 'byung zhing dor bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-36: 'dzin byed stobs ni me drod de //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-37: de yang 'dzin byed stobs can yin //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-38: de bas me drod nyams gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:38a-39: 'dzin byed nad ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-1: 'dzin byed de'i stobs ni 'ju bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i me drod yin la me drod de'i stobs kyang 'dzin byed yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-2: de ltar na grub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-3: bde ba'i sbyor ba gcig gis de gnyis lus gnas bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-4: rgyu de bas na khong ba'i me drod nyams shing bri bar gyur na 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de nad 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-5: zas gang lus kyi lus zungs mdangs //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-6: stobs dang kha dog sogs rgyas byed //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-7: der rgyu kha zas me drod ni //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-10: gang zas 'di zos shing bsten pas lus dang lus zungs la sogs pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa de'i rgyu ni me drod kho na yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-11: gang gi phyir kha zas ma zhu ba las ni dangs ma dang khrag la sogs par mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-12: de bas na lus dang lus zungs la sogs pa rgyas par byed pa la ni thams cad du me'i drod kyis 'ju ba'i bya ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir me drod kho na rgyu'i gtso bo yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-13: zas ni dus su zos gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-14: lto bar srog gi rlung gis drangs //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-15: skom gyis gong bor rnam par dbye //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-16: snum gyis mnyen par byas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-17: me mnyam gnas kyis bus nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-18: ma zhu'i gnas nas rnam smin byed //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-19: phyi yi snod gnas 'bras chu ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-20: lto ba'i me yis zhu bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-22: zas su za ba'i kha zas dus su bsten //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-23: bshang ba dang ni gci ba bsal //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-24: dag zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa'i tshul du longs spyod par 'gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-25: lto'i gnas su srog ces bya ba'i rlung gis drangs shing bcug nas skom gyi rnam pa gsher ba'i rdzas chu dang 'o ma dang chang la sogs pa gong por gnas pa che zhing bshig par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-26: snum gyi rdzas mar la sogs pas mnyen zhing 'jam pa nyid du byas pa yin pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-27: de bzhin du ma zhu ba'i gnas na 'dug pa na smin cing 'jug par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:38b-28: de yang me dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung gis de mnyam par spar zhing bus nas smin cing 'ju bar byed ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-29: de yang ji ltar phyi'i mes snod kyi nang na gnas pa'i sa dang chu 'tshod cing smin par byed ba dang 'dra bar lto ba'i mes kyang smin cing zhu bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:38b-30: dang bor ro drug zas kyang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-2: lbu ba can gyur bad kan 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-4: kha zas ro drug po de dag kyang dang po'i gnas skabs la bab pa'i tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-5: lto ba'i me drod kyis 'ju bar byed pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-6: kha zas ro drug car zos su zin kyang ro mngar ba nyid du gyur cing mngar ba'i rang bzhin gyis bad kan gyi nad bslangs shing de'i mtshan nyid can du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-7: lbu ba can lbu ba 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-8: zhu ba'i gnas nas 'pho ba na //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-9: rnam par tsha bas skyur nyid 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-12: dang po'i gnas skabs 'das nas gnas skabs bar ma la bab pa'i tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-13: lto ba me'i drod kyis smin par byed cing 'ju bar byed pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-14: rnam par tsha bas skyur ba nyid du gyur pas mkhris par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-16: zas de zhu ba'i gnas nas 'pho ba na mkhris pa bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-18: me drod kyis skams zhu ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-19: kha zhing gong bur gyur rlung skyed ;
T13TD4312.2E:39a-21: zas de ma zhu ba'i gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas su 'phos shing zhu ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-22: khong pa'i me drod kyis skams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-23: ro kha ba dang gong bur bsdus par gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-24: gnas skabs gsum par sra bar gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-25: de'i tshe na rlung skyed par 'gyur ba yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:39a-26: / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-27: nam mkhar bcas pa'i drod lnga pos //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-28: rang rang yon tan zas lnga po //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-29: sa sogs kyis smin de 'og tu //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-30: de dag rang rang ji bzhin rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-31: smin 'byung yon tan tha dad yin //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-32: sa ru gtogs pas sa nyid dang //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-33: lhag mas lus gtogs lhag ma rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i me drod rlung dang bcas par gnas pa'i drod lnga po dag gis zas kyi yon tan lnga po lci ba la sogs ba rang rang gi yon tan la sogs pa rjes su mched cing smin par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-35: de'i 'og tu sa la sogs pa de dag rang rang gi yon tan gang yin pa lus la ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du gnas shing 'phel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:39a-36: de yang so so nas tha dad pa byed pa yin /
T13TD4312.2E:39a-37: de yang sa ru gtogs pa'i 'byung ba chen pos lus la gtogs pa'i sa'i yon tan rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:39b-0: lhag ma sa'i yon tan las gzhan pa me dang chu dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams kyis kyang sa'i yon @39b tan las ma gtogs pa lhag ma rang rang gi yon tan rnams lus la gnas pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-1: zas de zhu ba'i tshigs ma dang //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-2: dangs ma zhes bya gnyis su 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-4: zas de zhu ba'i tshe rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:39b-7: de las zas kyi tshigs ma sla //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-10: de la tshigs ma dang dangs ma de nyid las zas kyi tshigs ma'i dangs mar gyur pa de ni gcin yin par shes par bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:39b-11: tshigs ma'i skabs gong bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bshang ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-12: dangs ma lus zungs rang rang gi //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-13: me drod kyis smin rnam bdun 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-15: zas kyi dangs ma bcud du gyur pa'i dangs pa'i bdag nyid can gang yin pa de lus zungs rang gi me drod kyis yang smin cing tshos par byas ba na rnam pa bdun du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-16: dangs ma las khrag de las sha / sha las tshil te de las rus //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-17: rus rkang de las khu ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-18: khu ba las ni mngal gnas 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-20: lus zungs kyi dang po dangs ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-21: khrag de las ni sha ru 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:39b-22: sha las ni tshil du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-24: / rus pa las ni rkang du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-25: rkang las ni khu chur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-26: khu chu las ni mngal du gnas shing bu chags pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-27: lus zungs tshigs ma rim bzhin du //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-28: bad mkhris bu ga'i dri ma dang //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-29: rdul dang sen mo ba spu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-30: mig lpags bshang snum dangs ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-32: de las lus zungs kyi nang na dangs ma'i tshigs ma ni bad kan no //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-33: khrag gi tshigs ma ni mkhris pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-34: sha'i tshigs ma ni bu ga ste /
T13TD4312.2E:39b-35: rna ba dang mig dang sna dang kha dang ba spu'i bu ga dang /
T13TD4312.2E:39b-36: bshang sgo dang mtshan gyi nang nas gang dag 'byung ba rnams so //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-37: tshil gyi tshigs ma ni gang lus kyi nang nas rdul 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-38: rus pa'i tshigs ma ni sen mo dang ba spu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-39: rkang gi tshigs ma ni mig dang pags pa dang bshang ba'i yul snum pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-40: khu chu'i tshigs ma ni lus zungs thams cad kyi mdangs su gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:39b-41: de ltar na rim pa bzhin du sbyar ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-1: zhes bya ba ni dri ma la bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-2: de ltar lus zungs smin pa las //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-3: dangs ma tshigs ma gnyis su 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i dangs ma sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams ni me drod kyis smin par byas pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-6: dangs ma dang snyigs ma ste /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-7: gnyis su 'gyur zhing rnam pa gnyis kho nar gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-8: lus zungs snum ni gcig la gcig / phan tshun nye bar brten pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-10: lus zungs rnams kyi snum ni dangs ma'i snying po ste /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-11: lus zungs kyi snying po de gcig las gcig tu brgyud cing zas kyi ro bcud kyis tshim zhing brten par byas pa las rgyun mi 'chad cing 'brel te gnas pa gang yin pa de ni phan tshun nye bar brten pa las skyes pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-12: lus zungs 'di dag phan tshun gcig la gcig brten cing 'dab 'byor pa de las lus zungs kyi snum gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-13: zas 'ju dangs ma sogs rim gyis //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-14: khu chur gyur pa la la ni //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-15: nyin zhag gcig 'dod gzhan dag ni //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-16: zhag drug kha cig zla gcig 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-18: zas dang po zhu nas dangs ma la sogs pa'i dngos po yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khu chu nyid du gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-19: sman pa la la nyin zhag gcig gis 'gyur bar 'dod la /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-20: sman pa gzhan dag ni zhag drug gis khu chu dag tu 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-22: yang srog 'tsho ba'i slob dpon kha cig zas zhu nas dangs ma la sogs pa rim gyis zla ba gcig gis khu chur 'gyur bar 'dod do //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-23: lus kyi zungs ni zas kyi rgyun //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-26: lus zungs rnams kyi zas yin pas na lus zungs kyi zas te /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-27: lus zungs rnams ni lus zungs kyi zas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-29: de ltar na lus zungs rnams kyi rten du ni lus zungs rnams gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:40a-30: de rnams kyi rgyu ba'i rgyun ni 'khor lo'i tshul ltar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba yin zhing zas la brten pas brtas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-31: ro tsa la sogs mthu yis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:40a-32: 'phral du khu ba la sogs skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-0: 'o ma dang sha khu la sogs ba ro tsa bar byed pa'i kha zas @40b dang de bzhin du sogs zhes smos pas dug dang sbyar dug rab tu zhi ba la sogs pas 'phral du ste /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-1: de'i mod la de'i khu ba la sogs pa skyed do //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-2: phal cher sman gzhan nyin zhag ni //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-3: gcig gis las rnams byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-5: phal cher zhes bya ba ro tsa ba la sogs pa ma gtogs pa'i sman gzhan phye ma dang bu ram la sogs pa /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-6: smin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa dag ni /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-7: phal cher nyin zhag gcig ni rang gi las byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-8: khyab byed kyis dangs lus zungs rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-9: 'thor bar byed pa'i las kyis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-10: cig car rgyun mi 'chad kun tu //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-11: lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-13: rlung khyab byed kyis dangs ma dang /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-14: lus zungs rnams la 'thor zhing khyab par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-15: 'thor zhing khyab par byed pa'i las de dang 'tsham pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa gang yin pa des cig car rgyun mi 'chad cing bar chad med par lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor zhing khyab par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-16: gtor tshe bu ga'i skyon gyis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-17: dangs ma gong du chags gyur te //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-18: der ni gnod pa skyed byed de //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-19: mkha' la sprin chags char 'bab mtshungs //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-21: dangs ma'i zas rab tu sgrub bor byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-22: khyab byed kyis gtor ba'i tshe bu ga nad kyis 'khrugs pa'i skyon gyis dangs ma'i phyogs gang du chags shing gnas par gyur pa'i lus kyi phyogs der gnod pa byed cing nad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-23: de yang ji ltar nam mkha'i bar snang la sprin chags par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-24: de las char bab par 'gyur ba dang mtshungs so //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-25: nad kyang ma snyoms gyur pa las //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-28: rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyang tshul de bzhin du ma snyoms par gyur pa las phyogs gcig tu 'dus na gnas kyi skyon gyis nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-29: de ltar 'byung ba lus zungs me'i //
T13TD4312.2E:40b-30: las ni yongs su bshad pa yin ;
T13TD4312.2E:40b-32: de ltar bshad pa'i rim pas me'i las bshad cing bstan pa yin /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-33: de yang zas 'ju zhing smin pa'i las dang de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po lnga dang de bzhin du lus zungs kyi me bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:40b-35: zas ni dus su zos gyur ba //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pas @41a * //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-1: lto ba'i me'i las bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-2: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-4: 'byung ba lnga'i las bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-5: dangs ma lus zungs rang rang gis //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-7: lus zungs kyi me'i las bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-8: smin byed kun la zas 'ju ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-9: me ni lhag pa yin par 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-11: smin par byed pa me'i drod thams cad kyi nang nas zas 'ju bar byed pa'i pho ba'i me drod gang yin pa de ni lhag cing mchog tu gyur par 'dod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-13: zad gyur zad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-15: gang gi phyir zas 'ju ba'i me drod de ni rtsa ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-17: me drod gzhan dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-18: zas kyi me drod de zad par gyur na 'byung ba lnga dang lus zungs kyi me drod kyang zas kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-19: de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-20: zas skom rigs shing phan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-21: de 'bad pas bsrung gnas gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-22: tshe dang stobs ni gnas par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-24: de ltar rtsa ba yin pa'i rgyu yin pa de bas na /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-25: zas 'ju bar byed pa'i me drod de rigs shing phan pa'i cho ga bzhin du zas dang skom gyi bud shing rjes su mthun par bsrung zhing bskyang ba la 'bad pa dang ldan bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-27: zas 'ju ba'i pho ba'i me gnas par gyur na tshe gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-28: lus kyi stobs gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-29: mnyam gnas rang gnas 'dug na mnyam //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-30: mnyam las gzhan 'gro drod mi snyoms //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-31: mkhris pa shas cher rno bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-32: bad kan gyis gnod me drod chung //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-34: me dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung rang gi gnas su 'dug la /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-35: me'i drod kyang mnyam zhing snyoms par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-36: lam gzhan du 'gro zhing rang gi gnas na 'dug na me'i drod mi snyoms shing cha mi snyoms par 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.2E:41a-37: / me dang mnyam du gnas pa de bad kan gyi shas kyis mnan cing gnod par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:41a-39: me drod mnyam dang mi mnyam rno //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-40: chung dang de ltar rnam bzhi yin //
T13TD4312.2E:41a-42: me'i drod kyi stobs kyi dbye ba ni cha mnyam pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-0: rno ba dang chung @41b ba ste rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-1: gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-4: da la me shas mnyam pa ni zas kyi tshod la sogs pa legs par brtags te /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-5: zos ba de legs par 'ju bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-6: legs par ma zos myur 'ju ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-7: legs zos ring zhing 'ju mi mnyam //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-9: me drod mi mnyam zhing mi snyoms pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-10: zas kyi cho ga'i tshul bzhin du legs par ma zos kyang myur du 'ju ba'am legs par zos su zin kyang ring zhig na 'ju bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-11: zas ni legs par ma zos kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-12: myur 'ju me drod rnon po yin //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-14: me'i drod rnon po'i mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-15: tshad la sogs pa dang ldan par legs par ma zos su zin kyang myur du 'ju bar byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-17: me drod drags ches par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-18: zas ni legs par zos gyur kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-19: ring nas 'ju zhing kha skam dang //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-20: sbo dang rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-21: lci ba me drod chung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-23: me drod chung ba ni zas kyi cho ga legs par zos su zin kyang kha sgam pa la sogs par byed nas ring zhig na gdod 'ju bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-24: rgyu ma 'khrugs pa ni sgra mi gsal bar krug krug zer ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-25: lci ba ni lus kyi khong lci zhing snyom pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-27: skyon med na ni yun ring 'tsho //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-28: ma snyoms nad ni skye 'gyur bas //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-29: de'i phyir me drod gtso bo yin //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-31: gong du smos pa'i me drod nyams shing med par gyur na ni /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-33: skyon med cing nad kyi nyes pa dang ma 'dres na yun ring du 'tsho zhing tshe gnas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-34: me'i drod che chung ma snyoms par gyur na ni nad rnams skyed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-35: de bas na me'i drod ni lus gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-37: lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-38: dus skyes rigs pa las byug gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-40: lus kyi stobs kyi tshul ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-42: dus kyi dbang gis skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:41b-43: rigs pa'i sbyor ba las skyes pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-44: de la lus sems las byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:41b-45: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-1: nang nas lus dang sems las byung ba'i stobs rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-2: tha mal par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lhan cig skyas pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-3: na tshod dus tshigs las byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-6: na tshod byis pa dang dar la bab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i dbang las byung zhing na tshod ji lta ba'i tshul ma skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-7: dgun la sogs pa'i dus las byung zhing skyed pa'i dus las bskyed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-8: de gnyis ni dus las skyes pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-10: byung ba spyod lam zas gyis bskyed ;
T13TD4312.2E:42a-11: / de bzhin gzi bskyed sbyor las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-13: de la rigs pa las byung ba'i stobs spyod lam zhes pa lus dang ngag dang yid kyis byas pa'i spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-14: de bzhin du zas kyi rnam pa bza' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-17: myang ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma ste /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-18: de gnyis las byung ba ni rigs pa las byung ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-19: de yang rigs pa ni 'di dang 'di ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-20: zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul nges pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-22: de bzhin du gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba de yang rigs pa las byung ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-23: gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba ni phal cher bcud kyis len pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-24: ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-25: de gnyis las skyes pas na gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-26: yul phyogs shing ri chu nyung la //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-27: skams nad nyung skyed byed yin //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-28: rlan can de las bzlog pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-29: cha mnyam thun mong yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-31: skam sa'i yul phyogs shing dang ri dang chu nyung zhing shas chung ba gang yin pa de ni nad nyung ba skyed cing nad med pa'i rgyu yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-32: yul sa rlan can dag ni skams las go bzlog pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-33: shing dang ri dang chu mang ba de nad skyed pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:42a-34: / de gnyi ga'i cha mnyam pa ni thun mong yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:42a-35: gnyi ga'i cha yod pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-36: rkang dang tshil dang zhag dang gcin //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-37: mkhris pa bad kan phyi sa khrag / dangs ma chu rnams lus gnas pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:42a-38: snyim pa re res bskyed par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-0: lus dang rkang nas chu'i bar dag gang @42b yod pa ni snyim pa re res bskyed par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-2: rkang ni snyim pa gcig go //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-3: tshil ni snyim pa gnyis so //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-4: zhag ni snyim pa gsum mo //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-6: mkhris pa ni snyim pa lnga'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-12: mdangs dang klad rgyas khu chu ni //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-13: re re 'ang rang gi khyor gang yin //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-15: dangs ma la sogs pa gsum po ni re re zhing yang rang gi khyor tshad kyi khyor re re yod par slob dpon dag gis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-16: bud med nu zho snyim do dang //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-17: zla mtshan snyim pa bzhi yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-19: bud med rnams la nu zho ni rang gi tshad kyi snyim do yod la /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-20: zla mtshan gyi khrag ni snyim pa bzhi yod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-21: 'di ltar snyim pa dang khyor ba zhes smos pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-22: rang rang gi lag pa'i tshad kyi che chung la bya'i /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-23: srang tshad kyi yi ge las smos pa ltar srang bzhi dang srang gnyis la mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-24: 'dir rang gi zhes smos pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-25: de la snyim pa ni lag pa gnyis sbyar ba las byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-26: khyor ba ni lag pa gcig skyor te bzhag pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-27: lus zungs mnyam nas tshad 'di yin //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-28: de las 'phel dang zad ces bya //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-30: gong du bshad pa'i tshul 'di ni /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-31: skyes bu lus zungs cha mnyam par gnas pa las tshad du bya ba yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-32: tshad de la 'phel ba dang zad par gyur par shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-33: khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-34: spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshigs nas //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-35: gang zhig nyes pa lhag gyur des //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-36: rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du bshad ;
T13TD4312.2E:42b-41: spyod lam mngal gyi gnas dang /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-42: dus tshigs de rnams las gang zhig nad kyis nyen pa'i dbang gis tshad las lhag par gyur pa des /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-43: khu chu la sogs par gnas pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa bdun bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-46: bad kan gyi rang bzhin dang /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-47: rlung dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T13TD4312.2E:42b-48: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rang bzhin te de ltar bdun no //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-49: khyab dang myur bar byed phyir dang //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-50: stobs ldan pa dang gzhan ldang byed //
T13TD4312.2E:42b-51: rang dbang can dang nad mang phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-1: las phal cher rlung stobs can //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-3: rlung nad kyi rang bzhin ni khyab cing kun tu 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-4: myur zhing rengs bar nad skyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-5: stobs dang ldan zhing mthu che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-6: mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad ldang bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-7: bshang gci la sogs pa 'dren par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-8: rang dbang can rang rgyud du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-9: de bzhin du nad mang ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-10: rlung nad brgyad cu skyed pa'i phyir nad gzhi gsum cha las kyang rlung nad ni phal cher zhes smos pa ni khyad par du byas pa'i tshig smos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-11: de nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i mi rnams ni /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-12: nad kyi bdag nyid rdul can skra bshor pags pa gas //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-13: grang lhags mi bzod brtan dran blo gros spyod mdzad sred //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-14: blta dang 'gro ba g-yo zhing smra ba shin tu mang //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-16: rgyu de nyid kyis ni rlung gi nad kyis bskyod pa'i mi rlung gis khu chu dang khrag la sogs pa bskyod par 'gyur ba'i mi rnams ni /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-17: nad kyi bdag nyid can du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-18: rdul gyis gtor ba lta bur skra dang lus la sogs par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-19: de bzhin du grang lhags mi bzod cing dro bar 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-20: de bzhin du brten pa nas 'gro ba'i bar shin tu g-yo zhing brten pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-21: brtan pa ni sran thub pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-22: dran pa ni mi brjed pa'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:43a-23: / blo gros ni shes rab bo //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-25: mdza' la sred pa ni yid gcugs par dga' ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-27: 'gro ba ni kun tu 'phyan pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-28: de dag g-yo zhing mi brtan pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-29: de bzhin du shin tu mang du smra zhing smra ba la dga' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-30: bad kan nor nyung tshe thung gnyid srab dang //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-31: gcom chung tshig thogs g-yo zhing skad 'dzer dang //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-32: chad lta mang du za zhing sgeg dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-33: glu dang dgod dang rngon las 'thab la dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-35: gzhan yang rlung can gyi mi'i mtshan nyid ni bad kan dang nor nyung ba la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:43a-36: gcom chung ba ni tshig phra ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-37: tshig thogs pa ni phyed lus pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-38: g-yo ba ni mi brtan pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-39: skad 'dzer ba ni skad gsang nyams pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-40: chad par lta ba ni med par lta ba'i gzhung la dga' ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43a-41: mang du za ba ni lto che ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-0: sgeg pa dang bcas pa ni bsgyings tshul dang bcas pa @43b dang glu dang dgod pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-1: rngon pa'i las ri dags shor ba dang 'thab pa la dga' ba rnams dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-2: mngar skyur kha dang tsha ba'i ro goms sred //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-3: lus skem dbyibs reng 'gro tshe sgra dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-4: mi brtan dbang po mi thul dam pa min //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-5: bud med mi chags bu mang skye mi 'gyur ;
T13TD4312.2E:43b-7: rlung gi rang bzhin can gyi bu gang yin pa de ni ro mngar ba la sogs pa'i goms par sred pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-8: lus skem zhing dbyibs ring ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-9: 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i tshe tshigs sgra 'khrol ba dang bcas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-10: 'gro zhing 'chags mi brtan zhing g-yo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-11: dbang po mi thul zhing zhi ba'i spyod pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-12: dam pa'i spyod pa med cing 'phags pa ma yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-13: bud med rnams la mngon par mi dga' zhing rjes su chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-14: bu tsha mang po skye zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-15: de yi mig ni rtsub cing rdul gyis gang //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-16: zlum zhing mi mdzes 'chi ba lta bu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-17: phye gdangs gnyid log lta bur snang ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-18: de ni shing dang ri 'dzeg mkha' 'phur rmi //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-20: rlung gi rang bzhin gyi skyes bu mig rtsub cing snum pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-21: rdul gyis gang zhing phyag dar gtor ba ltar snang ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-22: mig gi dbyibs zlum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-23: mi mdzes shing blta na mi sdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-24: 'chi ba'i mig dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-25: phye zhing gdangs par gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-26: gnyid kyis log pa 'dra bar snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-27: de bzhin du rmi lam gyi nang du shing chen po la 'dzeg pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-29: nam mkha' la 'phur ba rmi ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-30: skal ngan ser sna che zhing khengs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-31: rku zhing byin snying rtsa rings bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-32: khyi dang wa dang bya rgod rnga mo khrag / byi ba'i mtshan nyid ldan mi rlung can yin //
T13TD4312.2E:43b-34: rlung gi mtshan nyid can gyi mi ni skal ba ngan cing bkra mi shis pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-38: rku 'phrog la dga' ba dang byin snying gi rgyab kyi rtsa mtho zhing rtse mo 'khyil zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:43b-39: byin pa'i nyva glo zhing mtho ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-0: byi ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing de dag gi rang bzhin can gyi gzugs dang ro dang spyod @44a * //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-1: pa rjes su mthun pa gang dag yin pa dang ldan te /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-2: de lta bu'i mi ni rlung gi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-3: mkhris pa me 'dra me las byung yin phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-4: mkhris pa rgyas pa skom dang bkres shas che //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-5: mdog ser lus tsha rkang lag gdong yang dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-6: skra ser spu nyung dpa' zhing nga rgyal che //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-8: drang srong thang la 'bar gyi gzhung gis mkhris pa rang nyid me dang 'dra ste /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-9: smin pa la sogs pa'i las byed pas ma'i sgrar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-10: me'i rang bzhin can gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-11: me drod kyi gzhi yin par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-12: de las byung ba ni tshigs ma'i rang bzhin can gyi khrag ni mkhris pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-13: de'i phyir mkhris pa de rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i srog chags rnams ni skom pa dang bkres pa'i shas che ba dang lus kyang mdog ser ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-14: lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-15: rkang pa dang lag pa dang gdong gi kha dog dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-16: skra dmar ser du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-17: spu'i tshogs 'byi zhing nyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-18: dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-19: nga rgyal che zhing khengs pa dang bcas pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-20: phreng ba byug pa rgyan la lhag par dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-21: spyod bzang gtsang sbra che zhing mnyes gshin la //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-22: 'byor dang rtul phod blo gros stobs dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-23: 'jig rten dgra bo 'ang skyabs 'ongs skyob par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-25: mkhris ba can gyi mi ni /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-26: phreng ba la sogs pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-27: phreng ba ni me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-28: byug ba ni dri zhim pos bskus pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-29: rgyan ni mu tig gi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan cing bzhag pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-30: spyod pa bzang po ni byed spyod mdzes pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-31: gtsang sbra che ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid skyon med pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-32: mnyes gshin pa ni bran g-yog la sogs pa la byams pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-33: 'byor pa ni longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-34: rtul phod pa ni nyams kyis mi lcogs ba dag kyang byed par spro ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-35: blo gros kyi stobs ni shes rab kyi nus pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-36: de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:44a-37: de bzhin du 'jigs shing skrag pas nyen pa'i dgra bo dag kyang skyabs su 'ongs shing 'dud par byed pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:44a-38: skyob cing gnod pa las srung bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-0: yid @44b gzhungs tshigs kyi mtshams dang sha ni rab tu lhod //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-1: bud med mi dga' khu ba dang ni 'dod pa chung //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-2: gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sngo'i gnas gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-3: zas ni mngar dang bska dang kha bsil za bar dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-5: yang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi ni yid gzhungs shing blo dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-6: rus pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel mtshams sha'i tshigs lhod cing grims bag med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-7: bud med rnams de la dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-8: khu ba'i shas chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-9: 'dod pa chung zhing 'khrig pa la mngon par mi gdu ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-10: phags pa'i tshogs gnyer ma mang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-12: mig sngo ba'i nad rnams su 'gyur zhing de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-13: kha zas kyang mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan pa la sred cing dga' ba la longs spyod par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-14: than pa mi bzod rdul zhing dri nga la //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-15: bshang gci bza' btung khro dang phrag dog mang //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-16: rmi lam dong ka ba la sha'i me tog / glog 'gyu phyogs tshig skar mda' nyi me mthong //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-18: gzhan yang mkhris pa can gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-19: tshad pa mi bzod cing bsten mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-21: lus dri nga zhing mnam pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:44b-22: de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa mang zhing shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-23: gnyid log pa'i rmi lam gyi nang na dong ka'i shing dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-24: de bzhin du pa la sha'i me tog dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-25: de bzhin du glog 'gyu ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-29: me chen po 'bar ba mthong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-30: 'di yi lus phra mig ser g-yo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-31: rdzi ma srab cing nyung zhing grang la dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-32: khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-33: mig ni myur bar dmar por 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:44b-35: mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu 'di'i mig dbyibs phra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-36: mig ser skyar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-37: rnam par g-yo zhing dgod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-38: de bzhin du mig gi rdzi ma'i phyogs srab cing grangs nyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-39: grang zhing bsil ba la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:44b-40: khro zhing 'khrugs pa dang chang 'thungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-0: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog na de'i mig myur du dmar zhing sngo bar @45a * //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-2: tshe ni ran zhing stobs ni 'bring ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-3: mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag la sran chung 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-4: stag dang dred dang sbre'u byi la dang //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-5: gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan pa mkhris can yin //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-7: yang de ni tshe'i tshad ran cing 'bring tsam du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-8: stobs shin tu che ba ma yin gyi 'bring tsam du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-9: mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-10: sdug bsngal sran chung zhing nyon mongs pa la bzod par mi nus shing 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-11: gzhan yang stag la sogs pa'i gzugs dang skad kyi nga ro dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-12: spyod pa dang rjes su mthun par byed pa ni mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-13: bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-14: rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing sha rus 'brel //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-15: bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal than pa bzod //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-16: blo ldan snying stobs che zhing dam bca' brtan //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-18: gang gi phyir bad kan gyi rang bzhin bsil ba yin pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-19: bad kan can gyi rang bzhin skyes bu yang bsil zhing khong drang ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-20: gang gi phyir na 'bras bu rnams ni rgyu dang rjes su mthun par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-21: de bzhin du bad kan can gyi skyes bu rus pa'i tshogs mi mngon par bags pa'i mdog snum ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-22: sha rus phan tshun 'brel cing gcig la gcig 'byor par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-23: de bzhin du bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams bzod cing sran thub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-24: blo dang ldan zhing shes rab che ba dang snying stobs kyi rang bzhin shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-25: dam bca' ba brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:45a-26: / pri yang ku dang d'ur ba 'dam bu'i mdog / tshon dang gi wang padma gser mdog can //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-27: lag ngar ring zhing brang ni yangs la rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-28: dpral ba'i dbyes che skra ni mthug cing gnag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-29: yang bad kan can gyi mi bri yang ku la sogs pa'i mdog dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-30: la la ni pri yang ku lta bu'i mdog can yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-31: la la ni d'ur ba lta bu'i mdog can nas /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-32: la la ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i bar du 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:45a-33: de yang de bzhin du lag ngar ring zhing pus mo'i bar du phyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-34: brang pel che zhing yangs la sha rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45a-35: dpral ba'i dbyes che zhing yangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-0: @45b skra'i tshogs mthug cing mdog gnag par gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-1: lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag mdzes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-2: mdangs che khu bcud bu tsha g-yog 'khor mang //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-3: chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-4: dgra la zhe sdang 'dam ring sa kho na 'dzin byed //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-6: yang lus kyi sha mdangs 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-7: yan lag gi tshogs snyoms pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-8: yan lag dbyes shing mdzes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-9: mdangs che zhing mang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-10: 'khrig pa la dga' zhing khu chu'i bcud che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-11: brang phel che zhing yangs la shas rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-12: de bzhin du bu tsha dang 'khor g-yog mang zhing 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-13: chos dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-14: tshig rtsub cing zhe la phog pa'i tshig nam yang mi smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-15: de bzhin du dgra bo la zhe sdang gi 'dam rings shing rgyun du 'jog ba kho na du 'dzin cing yid la 'jog pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-16: glang po'i mchog dregs bcas pa lta bur 'gro //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-17: rgya mtsho 'brug dang rnga sgra seng ge yi //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-18: sgra ldan drang dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-19: byis pa'i tshe na'ang du dang skom shas chung //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-21: glang po che'i mchog dam pa dag dregs pa dang bcas shing ra ro ba lta bu'i 'gros dang ldan par 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-22: de bzhin du sgra'i skad gsang rgya mtsho dang 'brug skra la sogs pa lta bu zab pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-23: dran zhing brjed pa med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-24: brtson 'grus kyi 'bad pas bya ba rnams sgrub par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-25: zhi zhing dbang po bsdams pa la sogs pa'i dul ba dang ldan pa dang byis pa'i gnas nyid na yang du pa'i shas chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-26: de bzhin du skom zhing zas la gdu ba'i shas chung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-27: zas ni kha ba ska tsha dang dro zhing rtsub //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-28: nyung du zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-29: mig ni mtha' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-30: dkar nag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:45b-32: bad kan gyi rang bzhin can gyi skyes bu des kha zas kyi rnam pa kha zhing bska ba la sogs pa stobs 'bri bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-33: tshad chung zhing nyung zhig zos par gyur kyang de stobs dang ldan par 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:45b-35: de'i mig mtha' dmar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-0: smra dang khro dang bza' btung @46a * //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-2: tshe ring nor mang ring lta tshig 'jam smra //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-3: dad cing blo zab lta che bzod dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-4: rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mtha' ring //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-6: smra ba'i tshig nyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-8: bza' ba dang btung ba chung du za zhing 'thung pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-9: spyod pa ste lus kyi bya ba nyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-10: tshe ring bar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-11: nor mang zhing longs spyod che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-12: ring du lta ba ste phyis 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i don gyi legs nyes rnam par dpyod de 'di ltar byas na las kyi mtha' nges par 'dir 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-13: zhes dpyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-14: tshig snyan cing 'jam par smra ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-15: gtong ba dang ldan ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-16: gtong ldan snyan smra shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-18: yang de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa dad pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-19: blo zab cing gting ring ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-21: gang gis sems dga' spyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-22: khro dang mya ngan 'jigs pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-23: gnas skabs shes par mi 'gyur ba //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-24: de ni zab pa yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-25: zhes bshad pa dang ldan pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-26: de bzhin du lta ba che ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-27: don che ba la gtsor 'dzin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-28: bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-30: rang bzhin bzang zhing dam pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-31: sdig pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-32: gnyid che zhing stug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-33: las kyi mtha' ring zhing yun ring por rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-34: byas gzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo tshar ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-35: bla ma la gus mdza' bshes dag la brten //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-36: rmi lam padma bya yi phreng bar bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-37: chu yi gnas dang sprin yang mthong ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:46a-39: phan pa byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-40: bsam pa drang zhing g-yo chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-41: mkhas shing bye brag phyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-42: skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-43: ngo tsha dang ldan zhing 'dzem pa dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-44: bla ma la gus shing lus 'dud par 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46a-45: mdza' bshes la ngo brtan zhing dus thams cad du byams pas gnas kyi nam yang de'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed la byams pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46b-0: gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam gyi nang du yang me tog padma dang bya'i phreng ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas pa'i chu'i gnas mtsho la sogs pa @46b mthong ba dang sprin gyi tshogs 'dus pa dag mthong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-1: tshangs pa drag po dbang phyug chu lha dang //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-2: nam mkha' lding dang ngang pa glang po mchog / de bzhin seng ge dang ni khyu mchog dang //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-3: bad kan can ni rang bzhin 'drar shes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-5: bad kan gyi rang bzhin can gyi mi ni spyod pa'i rang bzhin tshangs pa la sogs pa dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-6: glang po che'i mchog ni sa srung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-7: rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-8: gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-10: nad gzhi gnyis po rlung dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46b-14: bad kan byung pa'i rang bzhin ni gnyis 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:46b-15: de ni rang bzhin gsum yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-16: rang bzhin bzhi pa ni thams cad las skyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-18: yon tan gnyis pa las byung ba de dang rjes su mthun pa'i rang bzhin bskyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-19: gtsang sbra yod par smra tshogs kyi //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-20: yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-21: ces bya ba rnams de dag gis na rlung la sogs pa'i rang bzhin re re dang gnyis gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46b-22: kun las byung ba ni gtsang sbra dang yod par smra ba la sogs pa'i snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang ldan par bshad cing bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-23: de yang gtsang sbra dang yod par smra ba la sogs pas ni snying stobs dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-24: mang du smra ba la sogs pas ni rdul dang ldan par bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-25: 'jig pa la sogs pas ni mun pa dang ldan par bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-26: de ltar so sor bshad pa dang rang bzhin gnyis dang ldan pas ni gnyis ka dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:46b-27: rang bzhin thams cad kyis ni thams cad dang ldan par ston to //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-28: de ltar na sems snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin bdun bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-29: na tshod bcu drug bar byis pa //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-30: de las lus zungs dbang po gzi //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-32: zad pa phan chad rgan po yin //
T13TD4312.2E:46b-34: dus kyis byas shing de las byung ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs la ni na tshod ces bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-1: po'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-2: skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa'i bar du byis pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-3: byis pa'i na tshod de la ni /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-4: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-5: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-6: de bzhin du mdangs rnams 'phel zhing rgyas bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-7: lo bcu bdun lon pa nas lo bdun cu'i bar du ni na tshod bar ma ste /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-8: gnas skabs der lus zungs la sogs pa shas cher 'phel ba dang 'bri ba gnyis kar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-9: bdun cu rtsa gcig yan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rgan po yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-10: na tshod de'i skabs su ni lus zungs la sogs pa rim gyis zad cing 'bri ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-11: byis pa dang bar ma'i na tshod smos pa las ni gsum pa 'di don gyis ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-12: rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-13: lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-15: skyes bu rang rang gi khru'i tshad kyi phyed dang bzhi ni skyes bu'i tshad yin pas de dang ldan pa'i lus ni tshe ring ba dang bde ba'i snod yin pas der srog gi dbang po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-16: nad med par legs par gnas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-17: spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-18: ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-19: smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-20: gang yin de ni snod mi na 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-22: gang gi lus la rang bzhin gyis sbu med pa la sogs pa smad par bya ba brgyad dang rang nyid ldan pa de ni tshe ring ba dang bde ba'i snod du mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-23: smad pa brgyad ni shin tu sbu med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-24: shin tu sbu mang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-32: skra ni rab snum 'jam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-33: phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-35: skyes bu'i skra kha dog gi mdangs snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-37: phra zhing mi sbom pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-38: rtsa ba ma 'dres shing bu ga re re nas skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-39: brtan zhing mi 'byi ba bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-41: zla ba kha ma pa 'dra ba bzang //
T13TD4312.2E:47a-43: dpral ba ni dpangs mtho zhing dpral mtshams 'byes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-44: mur 'gram 'byar zhing legs par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47a-45: de bzhin du zla ba kham pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-0: @47b zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-1: rna ba rgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-2: rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-4: rna ba'i rgyab kyi phyogs rgya che zhing mdzes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-5: rna shal che zhing sha rgyas pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-6: mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-7: rdzi ma mthug cing snyoms pa bzang //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-9: mig gi mtshan nyid ni mig 'bras dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-10: rdzi ma'i tshogs mthug cing snyoms pa dang ldan pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-11: sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-12: sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-14: sna ni mtho zhing legs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-15: dbugs chen po 'byung zhing rgyu ba rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-16: sha rgyas shing ma zhum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-17: drang zhing ya yo med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-18: snyoms shing mthon dman med pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-19: mchu ni dmar zhing ma 'phyangs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-21: mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-22: 'phyang zhing phyi rol du ldog pa med pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-25: skyes bu'i 'gram pa gnyis ni yangs shing rgya che ba dang 'bar 'bur med pa bzang ngo /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-28: kha'i zheng ni che ba bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-30: snum zhing 'jam la dkar zhing snyoms //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-32: so tshags dam zhing legs par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-34: 'jam zhing snum bag med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-35: dkar zhing rnyog pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-36: snyoms shing mtho dman med pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-37: lce ni dmar zhing yangs la srab //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-39: lce ni kha dog zangs bzhin dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-42: ko sko che zhing sha yis rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-44: ko sko'i dbyibs ni lhun che zhing shas legs par rgyas pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-45: mgrin pa thung zhing sha rgyas zlum //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-47: de la mgrin pa ni mgo bo'i rten te /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-48: mtshams thung zhing ha cang mi ring ba dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:47b-49: shas legs par rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-50: zlum zhing bum pa'i mgul pa ltar gnas pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-51: phrag pa mtho zhing sha yis rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-53: phrag pa'i dpangs mtho ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:47b-54: shas legs par rgyas pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-55: lto ba zum zhing lte ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:47b-56: zab cing mtho la g-yas su 'khyil //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-1: lto ba'i dbyibs cung zad zlum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-2: lte ba zab cing dma' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-3: kun nas mdzes par mtho ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-5: rkang pa lag pa legs gnas shing //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-6: sen mo 'jam zhing mtho la dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-7: snum zhing kun dmar sha rgyas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-8: sen mo ring zlum bug med //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-10: rkang pa dang lag pa'i phyogs ni sa la legs par gnas shing mthil mnyam par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-11: sen mo 'jam zhing mnyen la cung zad mtho zhing dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-13: kun nas dmar la sha rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-14: sen mo'i dbyibs ring zhing zlum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-15: phan tshun 'byor zhing bu ga med pa bsngags so //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-16: rgyab zheng che zhing sgal tshigs nub //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-18: rgyab ni zhing shin tu che zhing sgal tshigs rnams nang du nub pa lta bu bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-19: tshigs mtshams mi mngon dam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-21: tshigs rnams kyi mtshams phyir mi 'bur zhing mi mngon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-22: dam zhing brtan par rus pa'i tshigs thams cad gnas pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-23: tshigs gsang mtho zhing brtan pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-25: tshigs kyi gsang mtho zhing ring du 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-26: brtan zhing zhum bag med pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-27: mdog snum kha dog brtan par gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-29: lus kyi mdog mdangs snum zhing kha dog mi 'gyur bar gnas pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-30: rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs can //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-31: phongs pa'i tshe na'ang zhum pa med //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-33: rang bzhin gyis 'byung zhing rkyen gyis bskyed pa ma yin pas na rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-34: de lta bu'i snying stobs dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-35: spyod pa brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48a-36: de nyid kyis na phongs shing rgud par gyur pa'i tshe na yang zhum zhing mi dga' ba med pa bzang ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-37: 'ang zhes smos pa ni phongs pa'i tshe na zhum pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na yang khengs pa med pa bsngags so zhes pa'i don to //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-38: mngal nas brtsams te nad med pa //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-39: gong nas gong du zhing bzang la //
T13TD4312.2E:48a-40: shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-0: dang po mngal du @48b zhugs shing skyes pa nas brtsams te /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-1: gnas pa'i skabs su nad kyi skyon med pa'i rgyu gong nas gong du 'phel zhing gnas pa'i zhing bzang po la brten cing de bzhin du /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-2: rtsol ba la sogs pas rim gyis bskyed pa'i lus ni dge bar 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-3: de la shes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bya ba cung zad cig shes pa la mkhas pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-4: ye shes ni bstan bcos la mkhas par byas pa la sogs pa las skyes pa don dam pa'i ye shes rtogs pa'i bar te /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-5: de dag kyang rgya cher 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-6: de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-7: lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag tu //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-8: tshe dang dbang phyug 'dod pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-9: dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-11: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lus ni ston brgyar gnas shing lo brgyar 'tsho ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-12: de bzhin du dbang phyug gi 'byor ba dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-13: de bzhin du 'dod cing yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-14: yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-15: pags pa khrag tshogs snying stobs par //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-16: brgyad po phyi ma bzhin du mchog / stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-17: lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-19: pags pa dang sha dang khrag dang tshil dang rus pa dang rkang dang khu chu dang snying stobs zhes bya ba'i bar gyi brgyad po ni phyi ma bzhin du mchog yin par bshad pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-20: de yang stobs dang tshad ji tsam pa shes par bya ba'i phyir lus can rnams kyi snying po brgyad po de dag bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-21: snying po kun dang ldan pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-22: mchog tu bkur bar bya bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-23: rtsom pa kun la'ang re bcas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-24: bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-26: de ltar gong du smos pa'i snying po brgyad po thams cad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni mchog tu bkur zhing bla mar bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-27: de bzhin du ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba'i las kyi rtsom pa thams cad la re ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-28: bya ba'i las 'di dang 'di dag byas pas nges par 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:48b-29: zhes re ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:48b-30: de bzhin du bzod pa dang ldan pa ste lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal gyis de zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-0: de bzhin du blo gros bzang zhing @49a * //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-1: shes rab dam par 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du bya ba rnams la brtan zhing mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-2: dregs dang zhum pa med pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-3: bde dang sdug bsngal bsten 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-4: snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-5: mun pa can ni de ltar min //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-7: skyes bu ga snying stobs dang ldan pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-8: snying stobs kyi shas che ba ni bde ba la spyod pa na yang dregs shing nga rgyal med pas bde ba la brten pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-9: sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba na yang zhum zhing gdung ba med par de nyams su myong zhing bsten par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-10: skyes bu rdul can zhe sdang gi shas che ba dag ni /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-11: bde ba myong ba na yang khengs shing dregs pas bsten la /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-12: sdug bsngal yang nga rgyal gyis bsten pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-13: bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-14: zhes sems pa dang rtag tu nga rgyal bas khengs pa sems la gnod pa'i phyir bdag 'ba' zhig gis sdug bsngal mi bzad pa 'di lta bu nyams su myong ba yang bzod par nus so zhes khengs par byed pa bsten pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-15: skyes bu mun pa'am gti mug gi shas che ba dag ni /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-16: bde ba yang de ltar bsten par mi byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-17: sdug bsngal yang de ltar bsten par mi byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-19: de bde ba myong ba na yang bde ba myong bar mi sems la /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-20: sdug bsngal myong na yang sdug bsngal myong bar mi sems la /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-21: gti mug pa'i phyir de'i rgyu bsgrub pa la yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal du 'dzin par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-22: yang na mun pa can ni dregs pa dang zhum pa dang bcas pas bde ba dang sdug bsngal la bsten par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-23: bde ba myong na yang dregs pa'i shas che la ;
T13TD4312.2E:49a-24: sdug bsngal myang na yang zhum pa'i shas che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-25: sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-26: tshangs par spyod dang byas pa gzo //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-27: byams ldan bcud kyis len bsten pa //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-28: tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i sde //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-30: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa sde tshan 'di ni tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:49a-31: de yang sbyin pa ni gser la sogs pa'i dngos po ci nus par gtong ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-32: tshul khrims ni nyes pa sdom pa'i bdag nyid do //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-33: snying brtse ba ni sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang ldan pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49a-34: bden pa ni brdzun med pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-0: tshangs par spyod pa ni mya ngan @49b 'das pa thob pa'i don du spyod pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-2: byas pa gzo ba ni phan du byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-3: byams pa dang ldan pa ni sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra bar bde ba dang ldan par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-4: bcud kyis len ni tshangs pa dang 'phrog byed dang gnas 'jog la sogs pas bshad pa'i tshul bcud kyis len gyi le'u las bshad pa lta bu ste /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-5: sbyin pa la sogs pa 'di dag la brten cing goms par byas na la la ni bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa yin /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-6: la la ni gnyis ka 'phel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-7: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-8: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-9: lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-11: // / de nas lus kyi gnad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-13: yan lag gi bye brag bsten pa'i 'og tu gnad kyi bye brag brtsams pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-14: gnad rnams kyang yan lag la brten pa yin pa'i phyir 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-15: de yang gnad rnams kyi khyad par dbye ba ni bye brag bstan pa ste gong du bstan pa de bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-16: gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag pa //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-18: lus 'dir gnad ni brgya rtsa bdun yod pas na brgya las bdun lhag ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-19: de las bcu gcig brla dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-20: de bzhin lag ngar gnyis so sor //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-21: lto ba la gsum brang la dgu //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-22: rgyab la bcu bzhi nam tshong ni //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-23: yan chad sum cu rtsa bdun yod //
