T13TD4312.2E:49b-25: gnad de rnams brla gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-26: de bzhin lag ngar gnyis ka so sor gnad bcu gcig gnas pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:49b-27: / lto ba la gnad gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-30: nam tshong yan chad du gnad sum cu rtsa bdun yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-31: zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-32: rkang pa'i mthil nas gung mo yi //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-33: thad ka yi ni mthil 'phrog ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-34: gnad yod ces ni rnam par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:49b-37: rkang pa'i mthil gyi dbus na gung mo'i sor mo'i thad ka na /
T13TD4312.2E:49b-38: mthil 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do zhes sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyi bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-0: gnad de phug cing brtol na gzer ba la sogs pa'i nad de 'chi zhing lus dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba @50a * //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-2: mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshigs te //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-3: de phug bskyod pa'i gnad kyis 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-5: rkang pa'i mthe bong sen mo'i dbus na rgya tshigs zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-6: de phug na bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung gi gnad kyis 'chi bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-7: de gong sor gnyis shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-10: rgya tshigs kyi gong nas sor gnyis kyis chod par pir zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-11: de bcad dam phug na rkang pa 'khor zhing g-yo la 'dar bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-12: long mo'i tshigs 'og pir mgo ste //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-13: de bcad skrang dang nad skyed byed ;
T13TD4312.2E:50a-15: long mo'i tshigs kyi 'og na pir gyi mgo 'dra ba dang po'i 'og na pir gyi mgo drangs pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-16: de phug cing bcad na skrang pa dang nad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-17: byin pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-18: long mo'i gnad rengs bem por byed //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-20: byin pa dang rkang pa gnyis kyi bar mtshams na long mo zhes bya ba'i gnad phug na na zhing gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:50a-21: brla zug rengs pa bem por 'gyur zhing tshor ba med par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-22: byin pa'i nang na nyva zhes pa //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-23: khrag zad pa yis 'chi bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-25: byin pa'i nang na rting pa yan chad sor bcu gzhal ba na /
T13TD4312.2E:50a-26: byin nyva zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-27: de phug na khrag zad pa'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-28: byin pa brla mtshams pus mo ste //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-31: byin pa dang brla gnyis 'dus pa'i mtshams na pus mo zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:50a-32: de phug na skyes bu gson zhing srog dang ma bral na yang 'theng po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-33: pus gong sor gsum par gnyan gong //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-34: de phug brla rengs skrang bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-36: pus mo'i gong du sor gsum gzhal ba'i gnas na gnyan gong zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:50a-37: de phug na brla rengs pa dang skrang bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-38: brla nang brla dbang zhes bya ba //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-39: de phug khrag zags brla skam 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-41: brla'i nang na brla dbang zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:50a-42: de phug cing gtses pa na khrag gzags shing zad pas brla skam par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50a-43: brla rtsa mig dmar zhes bya ba //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-0: khrag zad pas ni gzhogs phyed @50b 'joms //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-2: brla'i steng dang chu so'i mtshams na mig dmar zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-3: de phug na khrag zad pas lus kyi gzhogs phyed 'joms shing zad par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-4: brla rtsa rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-5: ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-7: rlig pa dang brla'i bar na ljon shing zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-8: de phug na ma ning ste /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-9: bu tsha med pa'am bud med la spyod pa'i nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-12: de dag ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i tshig se brla rtsa man chad na gnad ji snyed yod ba rdzogs par byas shing bstan zin to zhes bya ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-15: dpung pa gnyis kyi bar gyi gnad rnams kyang grangs de snyed yod pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-16: de bzhin zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-18: mkhrig ma 'di ni long mor mtshungs //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-19: gru mo byin 'dra de gnyis phug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-20: rkang pa dang byin pa'i mtshams su ni long mo zhes bya ba'i gnad yod par bshad la /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-21: de lag pa'i skabs su lag pa lag dar gyi mtshams kyi gnad ni mkhrig ma zhes pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-22: de bzhin du gru mo dang lag dar gyi mtshams kyi dpung pa'i dbus kyi phyogs kyi gnas ni gru mo zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-23: de ltar mkhrig ma dang gru mo'i gnad gnyis phug na sgur zhing zha bo nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-24: zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-25: mchan khung nang na mchan khung 'dzin //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-26: de phug zha bo nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-28: sngar gyi ji ltar ljon shing zhes bya ba'i gnad la /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-29: rlig pa dang brla rtsa'i bar na 'dug pa dang 'dra bar mchan khung gi dbus nas dpung mgo'i bar na mchan khung 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-30: gnad de phug na lag ngar zha zhing sgur ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-31: de ltar na de dag gis yan lag gi gnad rnams smras pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-32: long kha'i gnad ni gzhang zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-33: de phug gzhang rlung gis 'phral gsod //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-35: long kha rgyu ma sbom po zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa ni gzhang kha zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:50b-36: de phug na bshang ba dang rlung ngam 'phyen 'byung zhing zags pas 'phral du de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-37: lgang pa gzhu ltar yo ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-38: chu so'i gnad ni sha khrag nyung //
T13TD4312.2E:50b-39: dbus na kha cig thur du lta //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-2: de yang ngos gnyis phug ste 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-3: gcin 'dzag gnas dang gcig tu phug / rma ni 'tsho bar shin tu dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-5: lgang ba'i gcin gyi gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-6: de na gzhu'i dbyibs ltar yo ba'i gnad chu so zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-7: sha dang khrag nyung zhing shas chung bar gnas pa /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-8: dbus na kha gcig yod pa kha thur du bltas pa rked pa'i dbus na yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-9: de phug na srog 'phral du de'i mod la 'jig cing 'jig par byed de gcin nad rde'us 'gags pa 'byin ba'i rma gang zhig byed pa de ma gtogs te /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-10: rde'u 'byin pa'i rma'i skabs der yang ngos gnyis su phug cing brtol na snga ma dang 'dra bar 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-11: chu so'i phyogs gcig tu phug na gcin 'dzag pa'i rmar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-12: de yang 'tshob cing 'byor pa ni shin tu dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-13: lus ni zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-14: dbus la lte ba rtsa kun gyi //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-15: rten yin de yang 'phral gsod byed //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-17: lus kyi dbus su zhu ba dang ma zhu ba'i gnas na lte ba zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-18: de yang rtsa thams cad kyi rten dang gnas yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-19: de phug par gyur na yang 'phral du gsod cing srog dang 'bral bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-20: ma zhu ba yi gnas sgor gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-21: 'dod chags sogs gnas snying zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-22: brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-24: ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor gyur pa 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi gnas su gyur pa snying zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-25: de yang brang dang nu ma dang lto ba'i dbus na gnas pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-26: de phug na yang 'phral du 'chi ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-27: nu 'jing nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-28: steng 'og sor gnyis nu ma'i gnad //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-29: de phug bad kan khrag gis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-33: nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-34: nu ma gnyis kyi gong 'og na yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-35: nu ma gnyis kyi gong gi sor gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.2E:51a-36: nu ma gnyis kyi rtsa ba'i sor gnyis kyi zabs na yod la /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-37: nu 'jing dang nu ma'i rtsa'i gnad de nyid phug pa'i mi ni khrag dang bad kan gyis lto 'gengs nas 'chi bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-38: de yang rim bzhin khengs pa /
T13TD4312.2E:51a-39: nu 'jing gi gnad phug pa ni bad kan dang khrag gis /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-1: nu ma'i rtsa phug pas ni khrag gis khengs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-2: rengs bral brang gi ngos gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-3: rtsa sbubs gnyis po rlung rgyu ba //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-4: de phug khog ba khrag gis khengs //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-5: lud pa dbugs mi bde bas 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-7: rengs pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi bye brag brang gi ngos gnyis na rtsa sbubs gnyis po ni rlung rgyu bar byed pa yod la /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-8: de phug cing brtol na khong ba khrag gis bkang nas lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-9: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs brang gi bar //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-10: de nyid kyi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-11: phrag pa gnyis kyi 'og na ni //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-12: mig gsal zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-13: de nyid phug pas khong pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-16: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs dang mdun gyi brang gi bar te /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-17: nang rgyab dang brang bar de nyid kyi ngos kyi nang na phrag ba'i mgo logs mi gsal ba zhes bya ba gnad gnyis yod par shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-18: de nyid phug na khong pa'i byang khog khrag gis khengs shing /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-19: khrag de nyid rnag tu gyur nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-20: sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-21: rked pa'i cha gnyis gnas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-22: rkub chos ltag gnas sgal tshigs brten //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-23: rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-24: de snad khrag zad skya rbab dang //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-27: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs kyi ngos g-yas g-yon gnyis na rked pa'i dbyi zur gyi cha gnyis na gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-28: rkub tshos kyi ltag na gnas pa'i sgal tshigs rus pa la brten cing gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-29: rked pa can na gzhon nu zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-30: gnad de gnyis snad cing phug na khrag zad pas skya bo bseng bseng por 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:51b-31: gzugs dang gzi mdangs zad pas kha dog mi sdug pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-32: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-33: rked pa'i mtshams ni gang yin pa //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-34: ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-35: khung bu zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-36: de snad bskyod pa nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:51b-37: ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-0: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis ni rked ba'i mtshams ro smad kyi phyi rol gyi rgyab kyi cha na khung bu zhes bya ba'i gnad @52a * //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-2: de gnyis snad cing nyams pas lus kyi ro smad kyi bskyod cing 'gul ba nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-3: ro smad la tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-4: gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis dang 'brel //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-5: sta zur rtse mo gnyis steng gi //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-6: gnas ni g-yogs bar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-7: ro smad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-8: de snad ro smad skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-11: gnad gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis kyi gnad dang 'brel zhing rtsib logs kyi bar dang 'dab 'byor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-12: sta zur gyi rtse mo gnyis kyi steng gi gnas gang yin pa de g-yogs shing bsgribs par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-13: gnad ro smad ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-14: de yang gzhon nu zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi rus bar gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-15: gnad de dag phug cing snad pas ni /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-16: lus kyi ro smad kyi cha skrang pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-17: nyam chung zhing stobs zhan pa nyid du gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-18: de'i 'og tu 'chi ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-19: rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-20: rked pa'i ngos gnyis dbus gang gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-21: thad ka dang ni gyen gnas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-22: rtsib logs mtshams te de phug na //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-23: khong pa khrag gis gang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-24: lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-26: rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang grol dang 'brel cing 'dab 'byor pa /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-27: rked pa'i ngos gnyis kyi dbus na thad ka dang gyen du gnas pa'i gnad gnyis ni drang srong rnams kyis rtsib logs kyi mtshams zhes bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-28: de gnyis phug cing snad par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-29: khong pa khrag gis gang nas lus dang bral te 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.2E:52a-30: / nu ma gnyis kyi thad ka'i cha //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-31: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-32: rtsa chen zhes bya de phug na //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-35: nu ma gnyis kyi rtsa'i thad ka'i cha ni rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten cing gnas pa'i gnad ni rtsa bo che zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:52a-36: de phug na khrag zad nas 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-37: dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-38: sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-39: phrag pa gnyis kyi sog pa ste //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-40: de snad bskams shing tshor bral 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:52a-42: dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba'i gnas la /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-0: sgal tshigs kyi ngos gnyis @52b dang yang 'brel pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-1: sog pa zhes bya ba de la brten pa'i gnad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-2: de snad pas ni lag ngar bskams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-3: tshor ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-4: mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis rtsa //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-5: dpung mgo dang ni mgrin pa'i bar //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-6: phrag pa phrag pa la brten gnad //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-7: da phug lag ngar bya ba nyams ;
T13TD4312.2E:52b-9: mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis kyi mtshams gnyis na dpung pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-10: mgo bo dang mgrin pa'i bar na gnas pa'i gnad phrag pa zhes bya ba yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-11: de yang phrag pa la brten cing gnas la /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-12: de lta bu de phug na lag ngar gyi bya ba nyams shing 'jas te /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-13: brkyang ba ba dang bskum pa'i bya ba byed mi nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-14: srol gang gi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-15: 'gram pa la ni brten pa'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-16: bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-17: gnyis pa'ang mjing pa'i gnad du bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-18: de phug skad 'gags mi sdug dang //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-19: lce yis ro ni mi tshor 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-21: srol gong gi ngos g-yas g-yon gnyis na 'gram pa la brten cing gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-22: rtsa de dag gi nang nas rtsa gnyis ni sngon po zhes bya ba'i gnad yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-23: gnyis ni mjing pa'i gnad yin par bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-24: de phug cing bcad na skad 'gags pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-25: de la skad 'gags pa ni skad thams cad nas thams cad du 'gags par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-26: yang na mi sdug pa ste skad gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-27: ro mi tshor zhing lce bem bem por 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-28: lkog ma'i sbubs kyi ngos gnyis nas //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-29: lce dang snar ni 'gro ba'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-30: so sor bzhi bzhi yod ma mo //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-33: lkog ma'i sbubs kyi g-yas g-yon gnyis nas lcer 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i rtsa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-34: de bzhin du snar 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i rtsa so so zhing bzhi bzhi yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-35: de ni ma mo zhes bya ba'i gnad yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:52b-36: de phug na skad cig ma de nyid la 'phral du srog 'joms shing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-37: mgo bo ske mtshams ltag pa ste //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-38: de phug mgo bo ldem por 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:52b-40: mgo bo dang ske'i mtshams na ltag pa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis tshigs mtshams kyi ngos gnyis na gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-0: de phug na mgo bo ldem zhing 'dar bar @53a * //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-2: rna ba gnyis 'og lcong ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-5: rna ba gnyis kyi 'og na lcong zhing dma' ba na rna rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-6: de gnyis phug na sgra thos ba 'joms shing 'on bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-7: sna yi bu ga gnyis dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-8: sna yi lam 'gro mgrin nang gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-9: sbrul mgo zhes bya de bcad na //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-10: dri mi tshor bar byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-12: sprul mgo zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi bye brag sna'i bu ga'i gnas g-yas g-yon gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-13: sna'i bu ga'i lam du 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-14: de bzhin du mgrin pa'i nang na gnas shing brten par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-15: de'i ming ni sbrul mgo can zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-16: de bcad na dri mi tshor zhing sna'i dbang po nyams par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-17: mig gnyis kyi ni phyi rol mtshams //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-18: smin ma skyes pa'i mtha' yi 'og / mig zur smin steng dma' bar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-21: mig gnyis kyi phyi rol mur 'gram gyi phyogs kyi mtshams smin ma skyes pa'i rgyun chad pa'i mtha' 'og nas mig zur zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i gnad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-22: de bzhin du smin ma'i steng na dma' zhing lcong ba la 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-23: mig zur dang 'khyil pa zhes bya ba ni gnad bzhi po de dag phug na skyes bu long bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-24: rna mchan dpral ba'i mtha' na ni //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-27: rna ba'i mchan dang dpral ba'i mtha' bar na mur 'gram zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis yod de ;
T13TD4312.2E:53a-28: de phug na skyes bu de 'phral la 'chi zhing myur du dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-29: mur 'gram gnyis steng skra mtshams na //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-30: gdeg pa zhes bya gzhag bya yang //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-31: smin mtshams bar gnas gsum char la'ang //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-32: zug rngu dag ni ma phyung zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-33: smin nas rang nyid byung na 'tsho //
T13TD4312.2E:53a-36: mur 'gram gnyis kyi steng ma ltag skra mtshams kyi steng na gdeg pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod la /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-37: yang gzhag par bya ba'i gnad ni smin mtshams kyi bar na yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:53a-38: gdeg pa gnyis po dang ldan pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-0: gnad gsum char la @53b mtshon gyi zug rngus zug na /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-1: de ma phyung bar dus gzhan zhig na smin nas rang nyid byung bar gyur na 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi zug de phyung na skyes bu de 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-2: lce mig sna dang rna ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-3: bu ga bzhi ni 'dus ba dag / rkan dang sgo ru kha bzhi ste //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-4: bu ga'i gnad ni de rnams kyi ;
T13TD4312.2E:53b-5: / gnad ni sum mdo ris zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-8: lce dang mig dang sna dang rna ba'i bu ga ste /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-9: rtsa sgo bzhi po 'du zhing 'phrad par gyur ba dag / rkan gyi phyogs su kha bzhi par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-10: de bzhin du bu ga dang 'brel ba'i gnad ni sum mdo ris zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-11: gnad de rnams bcad na skyes bu'i srog 'phral du 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-12: thod pa yi ni mtshams lnga po //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-13: thad ka gyen 'gro mtshams kyi mtha' //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-14: de snad pas ni mgo 'khor dang //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-15: smyo zhing dran pa nyams te 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-17: mgo bo'i thod pa'i mtshams lnga po ni /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-18: mtshams kyi mtha' zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-19: de thad ka dang gyen du 'gro bas gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-20: mtshams kyi mtha'i gnad de rnams snad bas ni mgo 'khor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-21: smyo zhing dran pa nyams pa'i nad kyis skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-22: spyi bo'i steng na gtsug 'khyil ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-23: rtsa dang ldan sbubs 'dus pa na //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-24: spu 'khyil bdag po zhes bya ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-25: gnad kyis srog ni 'jig par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-27: mgo bo'i steng gi gtsug rtsa 'khyil pa'i mtshams 'dus pa spu 'khyil ba'i gnas kyi gnad ni ming bdag po zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-28: gnad de bcom pa na srog 'phral du 'jig cing 'dor bar 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.2E:53b-29: / gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-30: rab na de ni gnad ces bya //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-32: 'di ni yang gnad rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-33: lus kyi phyogs gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul zhing 'phar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:53b-34: yang de bzhin du mnan par gyur na mi bzod par na ba de ni gnad yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-35: sha rgyus rus pa rtsa chen dang //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-36: rtsa dang tshigs ni 'dus pa ru //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-37: gnad ces bya ste des na der //
T13TD4312.2E:53b-38: srog ni lhag par gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-0: sha la sogs pa nas tshigs kyi bar rang rang gi rigs mthun pa la ltos pa 'dus shing phrad par gyur pa de ni gnad ces @54a * //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-2: de ni na zhing mi bde bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-3: rgyu des na gnad rnams su srog lhag par gnas pa yin pas der gnod pa byas pas srog la lhag par gnod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-4: mang du rnam par bstan mod kyi //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-5: gnad ni rnam pa drug tu bstan //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-7: gnad grangs mang du bstan mod kyi sha la sogs pa la gnas pa'i rnam pa 'dis gnad kyi grangs ni rnam pa drug kho nar bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-8: srog gi gnas su thun mong pas //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-9: gnad ni gcig tu gnas pa'ang yin //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-11: yang na gnad ni drug tu yang rnam par mi dbye'i /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-12: gzhan du na srog gi gnas yin pa'i mtshan nyid du gcig pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-13: thun mong yin pas gnad ni gcig kho nar bstan gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-14: drug tu rnam par mi gzhag go //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-15: shar gtogs bcu ste byin lag nyva //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-18: gnad la sha'i rigs su gtogs pa'i gnad ni bcu ste /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-20: byin snying dang lag ngar gyi sha'i gnad dbang po'i chu so zhes bya ba bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-21: mthil 'phrog pa zhes bya ba bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-22: nu 'jing dang nu rtse gnyis te bcu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-23: rus pa'i gnad brgyad mur 'gram dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-24: rked pa can dang gzhon nu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-25: ro smad dang ni sog pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-27: rus pa la gnad brgyad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-29: rked pa can dang gzhon nu zhes bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-30: ro smad ces bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-31: sog pa zhes bya ba gnyis te brgyad yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-32: rgyus ba'i gnad ni nyi shu gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-33: gnyan gong zhes bya'i pir dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-34: pir mgo mig zur rgya tshigs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-35: phrag pa gzhag dang chu so yi //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-37: rgyus ba'i gnad ni nyi shu rtsa gsum ste /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-38: gnyan gong gi gnad bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-39: gru mo'i gong gnyis kyi pir zhes bya ba bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-40: pir mgo zhes bya ba bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-41: mig zur gyi gnad gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-44: gzhag ces bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54a-45: chu so zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-46: rtsa chen gnad ni rnam dgu ste //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-47: gzhang dang rengs bral rna rtsa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-48: sum mdo ris zhes bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:54a-50: rtsa chen po'i gnad ni rnam pa dgu yod par bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-0: gzhang @54b zhes bya ba gcig dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-1: rengs bral zhes bya ba'i gnad dang gnyis /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-2: rna rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-3: sum mdo ris zhes bshad pa bzhi ste dgu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-4: rtsa lag nas gnad sum cu bdun //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-5: rtsa chen gnyis dang ma mo sngo //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-7: ljon shing snying dang lte ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-8: rtsib logs mtshams dang nu ma'i 'og / mi gsal gzhag dang brla dbang dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-9: dmar po zhes bya bzhi bo'o //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-11: rtsa la gnas pa'i gnad kyi bye brag ni sum cu rtsa bdun yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-16: mchan khung 'dzin pa'i gnad gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-21: rtsib logs mtshams kyi gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-23: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-26: dmar po zhes bya ba bzhi'o //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-27: tshigs la nyi shu 'khyil ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-28: mkhrig ma gnyis dang khung bu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-29: mtshams mtha' gru mo long mo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-30: ltag pa pus mo bdag po'o //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-32: tshigs la gnas pa'i gnad ni nyi shu ste 'khyil pa zhes bya pa'i gnad gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-34: khung bu zhes bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-35: mtshams kyi mtha' zhes bya ba lnga dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-40: bdag po zhes bya ba gcig ste nyi shu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-41: gzhan dag gzhang sha'i gnad ces zer //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-42: mchan khung 'dzin dang ljon shing dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-43: rgyus pa la brten rna rtsa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-44: sum mdo ris dang rengs bral dang //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-45: mig 'gram rtsa ni gnad yin te //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-46: rtsa chen gnas par de ma bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-48: slob dpon gzhan dag ni gzhang gi gnad ni sha'i nang du gtogs pas rtsa bo che'i gnad ma yin no zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-49: de bzhin du mchan khung 'dzin ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-50: ljon shing zhes bya ba'i gnad bzhi bo ni rgyus pa la brten pa'i gnad yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:54b-51: rtsa la gnas pa'i gnad ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:54b-53: de bzhin du rna rtsa yang rtsa la gnas pa yin gyi rtsa bo che la gnas pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-0: @55a * // sum mdo ris kyi gnad bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-1: rengs bral zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-2: mig 'gram gyi gnad gnyis po dag ni rtsa'i gnad yin gyi rtsa bo che dang rgyus pa'i gnad ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-4: de bas na de dag ni rtsa bo che la gnas par ma bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-5: sha yi gnad bcad khrag rgyun 'dzag / sha bkrus 'drar 'gyur sla ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-6: skya zhing dbang po nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-9: shar gtogs shing gnas pa'i khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa sha bkrus pa lta bur gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-10: sla zhing rkyang rkyang por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-12: dbang po'i tshogs nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-13: myur du 'chi ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-14: rus gnas gnad bcad rkang bcas na //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-15: sla dang bar bar chad cing 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-16: rus pa la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na rkang dang bcas pa'i khrag 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-19: bar bar du rgyun chad cing 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-20: rgyus pa'i gnad bcad na zhing 'khrug / brkyang bskum mi shes gnod par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-21: 'gro dang stan gnas nus pa chung //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-24: rgyus par gnas pa'i gnad bcad na /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-25: na zhing kun tu shas cher 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-26: brkyang ba dang bskum mi shes pa'i rlung nad kyi gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-27: de bzhin du 'gro ba la sogs pa la yang nus pa chung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-29: gnas pa ni sngon pa'am stan la 'dug pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-30: de dag mi nus par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-31: yang na dbang po nyams shing mi gsal ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:55a-33: rtsa chen gnad bcad lbu ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-36: rtsa bo che la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na khrag lbu ba dang sgra dang bcas pa 'byung zhing dran ba nyams par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-37: rtsa yi gnad bcad khrag ska zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-39: de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:55a-42: rtsa la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na khrag ska bar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-1: des na khrag de zad pas mgo 'khor ba la sogs pas 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-2: lus ni gra ma lta bus khyab //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-5: skyes bu de'i lus nas kyi gra ma lta bus khyab par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-6: rma de 'tshob cing 'byor par gyur na yang lus sgur ba dang yan lag 'jas shing 'theng por 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-7: tshigs gnad stobs dang spyod pa nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-8: lus skem tshigs ni skrang bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-10: tshigs la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na stobs zad ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-11: lus kyi g-yo 'gul gyi spyod pa nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-12: lus kun skem zhing sbeg pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-13: tshigs kyi tshogs rnams skrang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-14: lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzhang //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-15: snying dang chu so sum mdo ris //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-16: ma mo brgyad dang bcas dgu po //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-17: 'phral du srog ni gcod par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-19: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-21: lte ba dang mur 'gram la sogs pa'i gnad bcu dgu phug cing bcad na 'phral du de'i mod la 'chi zhing gsod par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-22: gal te tshe'i lhag ma yod na yang zhabs bdun gyis nges par 'chi'o //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-23: de las lhag par ni nges par mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-24: rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsib logs mtshams //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-25: rked pa can gzhon mtshams kyi mtha' //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-26: mur rtsa dbang po chu so'i gnad //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-27: rgyab tshigs mi gsal rtsa chen dang //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-28: ro smad nu 'jing sum cu gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-29: zla ba'am zla phyed son nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-30: dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-32: rengs bral la sogs pa'i gnad sum cu rtsa gsum phug cing /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-33: snad pa ni 'phral du 'chi bar mi byed na yang zla ba phyed dam zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-34: brdeg dang gzhag pa zhes bya gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-35: der ni zug rngu byung gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-36: rlung gis sha dang tshil rkang dang //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-37: klad rgyas dag ni skems par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-38: mtshon phyung lud pa dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:55b-41: brdeg pa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis dang gzhag pa zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:55b-42: gsum po de dag tu mtshon gyis zug rngu zug pa phyung na 'chi bar 'gyur gyi //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-0: zug rngu ma phyung bar ni myur du 'chi bar @56a * //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-2: ci'i phyir zug rngu phyung bas 'chi zhes bya /
T13TD4312.2E:56a-3: de zug rngu phyung yang rlung byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:56a-4: des lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba bskyed nas srog 'joms par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:56a-5: ci zhig byas nas 'joms she na /
T13TD4312.2E:56a-6: sha la sogs ba bskams pas gsod par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-7: sbrul mgo mig zur rna rtsa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-8: sngon po 'gram gnas ltag pa'i gnad //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-9: phrag pa'am phrag sogs 'khyil pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-10: ljon shing brla dbang khung bu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-11: mig dmar bus mo'i gnad dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-13: de ltar gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhis //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-15: gal te tshabs cher snad gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-16: des ni srog kyang 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-18: sbrul mgo la sogs pa'i gnad bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi snad pas ni /
T13TD4312.2E:56a-19: rkang lag 'jas shing 'phye bo la sogs pa'i gnod pa skyed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:56a-20: gal te de dag bsod nams ma yin pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis snad tshabs chen srog 'joms shing 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-21: pir mgo 'dra dang long mo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-22: mkhrig ma'i gnad brgyad nad tshabs skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-24: pir mgo 'dra ba la sogs pa'i gnad brgyad po phug pas ni shin tu nang tshabs chen po skyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-25: de las ljon shing mchan khung 'dzin //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-26: brla dang pir mgo lta bu ste //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-27: bcu gnyis sor gcig tshad yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-29: gnad de rnams las ljon shing la sogs pa gnad bcu gnyis kyi tshad ni rang gi sor tshad kyi sor gcig gi tshad du gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-30: mkhrig ma dang ni long mo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-31: nu ma'i rtsa ba sor gnyis tshad //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-33: gnad de rnams la mkhrig ma'i gnad gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:56a-36: gnad drug po de dag gi tshad ni sor gnyis su gnad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-37: pus mo gru mo sor gsum tshad ;
T13TD4312.2E:56a-41: bzhi po'i tshad ni sor gsum yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-42: gzhang dang chu so lte ba snying //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-43: sngon po mtshams mtha' ma mo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:56a-45: gnad ni nyi shu rtsa dgu'i tshad //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-0: rang gi lag mthil @56b tshad yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-2: gzhang kha la sogs pa'i gnad kyi khyad par nyi shu rtsa dgu rang gi lag mthil tsam gyi tshad du gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-3: lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug / sor phyed kyi ni tshad du 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-5: de ltar tshad bshad pa'i gnad kyi lhag ma tshad ma bshad pa dag ni lhag ma yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-6: de dag ni grangs lnga bcu rtsa drug yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-7: de dag gi tshad ni rang gi sor phyed yod par 'dod do //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-8: gzhan dag gnad de til 'bru ste //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-11: sman pa gzhan dag ni gnad de dag til 'bru tsam gyi tshad du gnas par 'dod la /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-12: gzhan dag ni 'bras tsam gyi tshad du yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-14: rtsa bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-15: lus kun brtas par byed ba rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-16: de ni gnad la gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-18: sngar gang rtsa bzhi por rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-19: nad med pa ste rtsa bzhi po grangs bdun brgya yod par sngar bshad la /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-20: gang yin pa des ni lus ma lus pa thams cad la brtas shing tshim par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-21: de dag thams cad kyang gnad la gnas shing brtan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-22: des na de phug khrag drag 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-23: lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-25: rlung gis mkhris pa rgyas par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-26: mkhris pa rgyas par gyur bas na //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-27: skom dang mgo 'khor skam dang myos //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-29: gang gi phyir rtsa thams cad gnad la gnas pa yin pa'i rgyu des na /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-30: rtsa de phug cing khrag drag tu phyung zhing shas cher brten na des na lus zungs bdun po rnams zad par byed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-31: lus zungs de zad pas rlung nad skye zhing 'phel ba'i gnas skabs su gyur nas mi bzad pa'i nad kyis 'debs shing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-32: gzer ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba de skye zhing 'debs la /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-33: yang rlung de mkhris pa'i tshogs kyi nad rgyas shing 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-34: mkhris pa des rgyas shing bdo bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-35: skom dad dang mgo 'khor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:56b-37: myos pa'i nad skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-38: lus rngul tshigs 'bye lus lhod dang //
T13TD4312.2E:56b-39: de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-1: phug cing snad pa'i skyes bu de lus rdul zhing tshigs 'bye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-2: lus lhod cing shig shig por gyur bas /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-3: de gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-4: gnad gcod na ni myur ba ru //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-5: lus kyi tshigs ni chod 'gyur te //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-6: tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pas na //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-7: rtsa ni 'khums par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-9: gnad gcod cing snad par gyur ba na myur ba nyid du lus kyi rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa'i tshigs chod cing snad bar 'gyur /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-11: tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-12: rtsa thams cad kyang 'khums shing gcod par byed pa yin no de la srog chags rnams kyi srog / khrag gnas na ni gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-14: de la srog chags rnams kyi srog ni shas cher khrag la gnas pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-15: de'i nang na gnas zhing skyon med na ni /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-16: srog de yang gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-17: de bas gnad min legs phog ni //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-20: gang gi phyir gnad de phug cing chod pas ni srog chags 'chi bar byed pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-21: gzhan du snad cing rma byung ba tsam gyis ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-22: de bas na gnad ma yin par log par phog cing snad par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-23: mda' brgya phog kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnad ni yod pa kho na yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-24: 'ga' zhig sman pa'i yon tan dang //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-25: phyogs gcig tu ni phog pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-26: 'tsho bar gyur yang de yi ni //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-27: dbang po ma tshang nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-29: gang gi phyir srog chags 'ga' zhig gnad du phog ba yod na /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-30: yang sman pa mkhas pas bcos ba'i yon tan nam /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-31: gnad kyi phyogs gcig gi mthar phog pas gnad du phog kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-32: 'on kyang de'i dbang po mtshang zhing zha bo'am 'theng po nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-33: de bas 'bad de gnad du ni //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-34: thal sman me btsa' la sogs spang //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-36: gang gi phyir gnad la phog cing snad pa ni gnod ba dang bcas shing srog la gnod pa byed ba yin ba de bas na thal sman rnon po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:57a-37: me btsa' gdab ba la sogs pa yang gnad du mi bya bar spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:57a-38: sogs pa smos pas ni bse shing gi 'bras bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-0: ka pid tha'i khu ba la @57b sogs pa dag 'bad de gnad du ma phog par spang zhing dor bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-1: gnang du phog na chung ngus kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-2: phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-4: gang gi phyir gnad du phog na tshabs chung dus kyang phal cher zhes ba mang du shin tu gnod cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-5: de bzhin gnad la brten pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-6: rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-8: gnad du phog cing snad pa la 'ba' zhig gis gnod pa skyed par ma zad kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-9: gnad rnams kyang gnad rnams la brten cing gnas par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-10: mtshon gyis phog ba dang 'dra bar gnod pa skyed pa yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-11: de ni shin tu 'bad cing brtson pas gso dgos pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-12: 'bad pas gsos kyang 'tsho ba dka' ba yin par ston to //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-13: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-14: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las ;
T13TD4312.2E:57b-15: lus kyi gnad kyi le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-17: // / de la lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-19: gnad kyi bye brag shes par byas pa'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-20: 'chi bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gnad ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-21: 'chi ba de yang rang bzhin snga ma las 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid 'chi ltas kyi rnam par 'gro ba rnams sngar gnas pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-23: lus kyi 'gyur ba ni rang bzhin snga ma las gzhan du 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-24: de'i bye brag gam khyad par shes shing rtogs par bya na /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-25: gang na yod pa de bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-27: 'gyur ba de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-29: ji ltar 'bras bu me tog dang //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-30: me yi du ba char gyi sprin //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-31: phyis 'byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:57b-34: tshul ji ltar 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sngon du me tog 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-35: me 'byung ba'i sngon du du ba 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:57b-36: char 'bab pa'i dus su sprin 'dus pa dag ni rgyu sngar byung ba 'bras bu phyis 'byung ba'i mtshan ma yin pa ltar /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-0: tshul de bzhin du rang bzhin las gzhan du 'gyur ba las 'chi bar shes par @58a * //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-1: 'gyur ba'i ltas sam mtshan ma yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-2: de las phyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur bar ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-6: gang la sngar 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma'i ltas med na /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-7: ltas kyis mtshon pa'i 'chi bar yang med pas mi 'chi la /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-8: de bzhin du 'chi ltas snang ba las kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-10: mi mkhas 'chi ltas med min shes //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-12: yang dag par na gang 'chi ltas nyid du ston par 'os pas de la yang 'chi ltas ma yin par shes la /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-13: 'chi ltas med pa dag la yang 'chi ltas med pa mi shes te /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-15: mi mkhas shing 'chi ltas dang 'chi ltas ma yin pa shes pa la ma byang bas /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-16: 'chi ltas yod med mi shes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-17: la la rten dang brten pa po'i //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-18: khyad par gyis de gnyis su 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-19: nad kyi tshul ni mang po las //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-21: nad zhi na ni zhi 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-24: yang sman pa gzhan dag ni 'chi ltas de rten gyi lus dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-25: brten pa'i nad la sogs pa khyad par gyis te ;
T13TD4312.2E:58a-27: de yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshul rnam pa mang po las 'chi ltas gyi tshul du snang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur bde dag las rlung la sogs pa'i nad zhi bar 'gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-28: de las byung ba mtshan ma yang zhi bar 'gyur la ma zhi bar brtan par gnas pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:58a-29: de nges par 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur bas 'chi ltas zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-31: gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog / gzugs brnyan bya ba sogs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-32: dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-33: tha mal pa las rgyu med par //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-34: gzhan du gyur gang mdor gang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-35: 'chi ltas yin par de shes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-37: gzugs ni kha dog dang dbyi bas kyi rnam pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-38: dbang po ni mig la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:58a-40: mdog ni 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga'o //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-0: gzugs brnyan ni nyi ma dang chu dang me long la sogs par gang zhig snang ba'i gzugs dang mthun @58b par byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-2: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las su bya ba'i rnam pa mang po'o //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-3: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni lus su gtogs pa'i dngos po gzhan dag kyang bsku'o //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-4: de ltar na gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos por gtogs pa de dag dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-5: 'dir smos pa'i rnam pa gzhan dag ste //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-6: blo dang dran pa dang rang bzhin brtan pa la sogs pa'i sems kyi spyod pa dag tha ma la pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-7: rang bzhin du gnas pa las rgyu med pa ste 'gyur pa'i rgyu yang med bzhin du glo bur gzhan du 'gyur zhing snang ba mdor bsdu na /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-8: de lta bu gang yin pa de ni 'chi ltas yin pa shes par bya'i //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-9: rgyu gang yang rung ba las gzhan du gyur pa ni 'chi ltas su ni gzung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-10: skra dang ba spu ma bskus par //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-11: snum gyis bskus ltar gang snang dang //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-13: 'gro ba gang zhig skra dang spu rnams ma bskus par bskus shing byugs pa ltar snang ba de yang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-14: dus kyis bskus shing 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-15: gang zhig mig ni rab g-yo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-16: mi 'gyur phyir byung khung bur zhugs //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-17: yo dang bgrad dang 'dzums pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-18: bcum zhing smin ma smad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-19: 'khrul dang mthong ba nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-20: sre mo'i mig ltar blta ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:58b-24: de bzhin du mi gang zhig mig rab tu g-yo zhing 'gul ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-25: yang na mi 'gyur zhing har har por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-26: yang na phyir 'byung zhing glo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-27: yang na mig 'bras khong du zhugs shing gting du song bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-28: yo zhing ma snyoms par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-29: lhag par bgrad cing gdangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-30: de bzhin du shas cher 'dzums shing mi 'byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-31: smin ma bcum zhing 'dus pa 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-32: khyad par du smad cing dma' bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-33: yang de bzhin du 'khrul par mthong zhing log par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-34: mthong ba nyams shing rtul ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-35: de bzhin du sre mo'i mig ltar blta ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-36: thi ba'i mdog ltar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-37: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba lta bur snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-38: rgyu med par mchi ma 'dzag cing 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:58b-39: de bzhin du rdzi ma 'khrugs shing g-yo bar 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-1: sogs pa'i rgyu med par snang ba ni 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-2: sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-3: zhom dang 'brum phran gyis khyab dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-4: skrang dang gas dang rnyid pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-6: de bzhin du gang zhig gi sna rgyu med par glo bur du gdangs shing yangs par snang ba'am ;
T13TD4312.2E:59a-8: 'brum phran rnams kyis kyang khyab cing gang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-9: skrang zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-10: gas shing pags pa zhig pa ltar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-11: rnyid cing skams pa yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-12: gang gi ma mchu 'phyang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-13: ya mchu gyen du brdzes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-16: skyes bu gang zhig ma mchu thur du 'phyangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-17: ya mchu gyen du brdzes shing ldog par 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-18: yang na mchu gnyis ga 'dzam bu smin pa ltar kha dog nag por snang ba yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-19: so nag gseg mar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-20: dmar zhing so zho nag nog can //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-21: glo bur rgyu ni 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-23: gang zhig so gnag par gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-25: rdo'i gseg ma phra mo lta bu byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-26: yang na dmar zhing zangs ltar snang ba glo bur du so zho chags pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-27: 'dam gyis bskus pa ltar nag nog tu gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-28: glo bur rgyu med par 'khrul zhing 'byung ba yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-29: lce ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-30: skrang dang skams dang lci dang gnag / gos dang rtsub dang tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-32: gang gi lce glo bur du yon por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-38: ljan ljin gyis gos pa dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-39: rtsub cing tsher mas khyab pa ltar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-40: tshor ba med cing bem por gyur pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-41: mjing pas mgo ni mi theg dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-42: rang gi ltag rgya ba khur ltar lci //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-43: 'gram pas kha na gnas pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-44: kha zas bldad par mi nus pa //
T13TD4312.2E:59a-46: mjing pa ni ske ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-47: des mgo bo mi theg cing brten par mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59a-48: gang rang gi ltag pa rgyab khur ltar shin tu lci bar sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-0: gang gi 'gram @59b pas kha zas bldad cing ming par mi nus pa de yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-1: gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag / shin tu lci ba'am shin tu yang //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-3: skyes bu gang zhig nad la sogs pa'i rgyu med par brla dang dpung pa la sogs pa'i yan lag shin tu lci ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-4: yang na lan 'ga' zhig tu yang bar sems pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-5: dug dang snad pa med pa yang //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-6: bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-8: yang skyes bu gang dug 'thungs pa'am lus la snad pa med par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-9: mig la sogs pa'i bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung ba yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-10: gang zhig pho mtshan nub pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-11: rlig pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-13: gang gi pho mtshan nub cing gyen du brdzes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-14: rlig pa thur du 'phyang ba'ang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-15: de las go bzlog gyur pa rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-18: skyes bu gang gi pho mtshan dang rlig pa de las go bzlog pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-20: rlig pa nub par gyur pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-22: skra dang ba spu ma bskus par //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-24: de las go bzlog gyur pa rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-25: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa'i mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa thams cad kyang 'chi bdag gi dbang du 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-26: zhes thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-27: gang gi rtsa ris sngon med par //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-28: zla ba tshes pa lta bu ni //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-29: dpral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-30: de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-32: skyes bu gang zhig nad med bar gnas ba las rtsa ris sngon med pa'i sar pa snga na mi gnas pa /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-33: zla ba tshes pa lta bu'i yon po dpral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas par gyur na skyes bu de zla ba drug las mi 'tsho zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-34: lus can gang gi lus la chu //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-36: rkyal tshe chu la mi chags pa //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-37: de ni zla ba drug na 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:59b-39: lus can de mi gang rkyal zhing chu'i nang na zhugs pa khrus byed pa na /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-40: de'i lus la chu padma'i 'dab ma la chu gtor ba'i tshul du /
T13TD4312.2E:59b-41: chu de 'dril zhing chags par ma gyur pa de yang zla ba drug nas 'chi ba yin no /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-0: @60a * // spyi bo du ba'am snum bcas snang //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-1: de ni zla ba gcig nas 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-3: skyes bu gang gi spyi bor du ba lta bu'am /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-4: snum dang bcas pa lta bur rgyu med par snang na /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-5: de ni zla ba gcig nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-6: spyi po'am smin mtshams gsar du ni //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-8: nad med zhag ni drug gis 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-12: smin mtshams kyi gnas su gsar du mtshams bye zhing gyes pa ltar snang ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-13: gtsug 'khyil ba lta bur snang ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-14: mtshams bye ba ni ri mo drang po'o //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-15: gtsug 'khyil ba ri mo zlum por 'khor ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-16: de lta bu snang na nad med cing bde bar gnas pa ni zhag drug gis 'chi la /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-17: nad pa zhig yin na ni zhag gsum nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-18: lce gnag kha ni mnam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-19: mig g-yas phugs su bros pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-20: bya ni mgo la babs pa dag / gang yin de ni yongs su spangs //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-22: gang zhig gi lce'i mdog gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-23: kha'i dri mnam pa dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-24: mig g-yas phugs su bros shing khung bur zhugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-25: yang na mgo la bya babs shing 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni gso bar mi bya zhing spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-26: gang zhig khrus byas byugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-27: lus kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-28: snying ga bzhin du myur bar skams //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-29: de ni zla phyed las mi 'tsho //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-31: skyes bu gang zhig dang por khrus byas shing de'i 'og tu byug pas byugs pa na lus thams cad gsher dang rlan dang bcas par gnas bzhin du snying ga'i phyogs cher myur du skams par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-32: mi de zla ba phyed las mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-33: glo bur du ni lus kun mdog / cig car thams pa las nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-34: de bzhin du ni sogs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:60a-37: glo bur du rgyu med par lus kyi mdog thams cad cig car dus gcig tu tha mal pa las nyams te /
T13TD4312.2E:60a-39: tha mal pa'i mdog ni dkar ba dang gnag pa la sogs pas yongs su myur ba'i mdog sngo ba dmar ba la sogs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-0: de bzhin du @60b lus thams cad dam /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-1: de'i yan lag la nad la sogs pa dang rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-2: snum par gyur cing grang ba dang dro ba la sogs pa cig car byung bar gyur na yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-3: gang gi sor mo drang ba na //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-6: skyes bu gang zhig gi sor mo'i phyogs la drang ba'am mnan par gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-7: sgra mi 'byung ba de yang 'chi ltas yin pas mi 'cho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-8: de bzhin lud pa sprid sogs la //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-9: gang zhig sngon med sgra 'byung ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-11: mi gang gi lud pa lu ba dang sprid pa 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-12: gcin gtor ba la sogs pa'i skabs su sngon med cing tha mal pa'i rang bzhin las 'das pa'i sgra byung na de yang mi 'tsho'i //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-16: mi gang zhig dbugs 'byin pa ni shin tu thung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-17: shin tu ring bar 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-18: glo bur du dri mnam pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-19: dri zhim par gyur na yang mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-20: lus ni khrus byas ma byas rung //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-21: mi ma yin pa'i dri byung ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-22: gos rma dri mar byung na yang //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-25: skyes bu gang gis khrus byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-26: mi ma yin pa'i dri ste /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-27: mi'i spyod yul las 'das pa'i dri mi zhim pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-28: dri nga ba yid du 'ong ba'am mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-29: gang gi gos la rma'am dri ma la mi ma yin pa'i dri byung na de ni lo gcig nas 'chi bar 'gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-30: gang zhig shig dang sprang ma sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-32: dri nga ba yis spong gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-33: de ni lo gcig las mi 'tsho //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-35: mi gang zhig la shig dang sprang ma la sogs pa dri zhim po bro bas 'du shing 'phungs par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-36: yang na dri nga ba'i dbang gis spang zhing lus 'dor bar 'gyur ba de yang lo gcig las mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-37: gang zhig rtag tu lus tsha ba //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-38: grang ba nyid du snang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-39: bsil ba shin tu tsha bar snang //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-40: rgyu med par ni rdul dang rengs //
T13TD4312.2E:60b-42: yang skyes bu gang zhig rgyu med par rtag tu lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-43: rtag tu grang zhing bsil bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:60b-44: lus bsil ba nyid la yang shin tu tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-1: rgyu med par shas cher rdul ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-2: grang zhing rengs pa de yang lo gcig las mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-3: gang zhig grang ba'i chu bur 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-4: lus grang ba las tsha ba skye //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-5: grang gdungs than la mi dga' ba //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-6: de ni gshin rje'i dbang gyur yin //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-8: skyes bu gang lus grang bar gyur kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-10: lus grang ba las tsha ba skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-11: grang bas gdungs kyang tsha ba'i than pa la mi dga' na /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-12: de ni gshin rje'i dbang du gyur cing 'chi ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-13: gang gi snying ga dro gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-14: lto ba shin tu grang gyur cing //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-15: bshang ba 'khru zhing skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-16: de ni ro dang 'dra ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-18: skyes bu gang gi snying ga dro zhing tsha bar gyur kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-19: lto ba shin tu grang bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-20: bshang ba sla zhing 'khru ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-21: skom dad che zhing skom pas gdungs pa de yang gson bzhin du ro dang 'dra ste 'chi ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-22: bshang dang gci ba mchil snabs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-23: khu chu chu nang nub gyur pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-24: mchil ma kha dog sna tshogs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-25: gang yin pa de zla gcig 'chi //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-27: srog chags gang gi bshang ba la sogs pa chu'i nang du nub cing 'og tu 'gro ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-28: gang gi mchil ma kha dog mang zhing sna tshogs par snang na /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-29: de yang zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-30: sa ni nam mkhar mthong ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-31: nam mkha' sar ni mthong gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-33: skyes bu gang gis sra zhing stug pa'i sa ni nam mkha'i bar snang du gyur par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-34: nam mkha' yang sa'i rnam pa ltar gzugs can du mthong ba gang yang rung ba de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-35: zhes thog ma dang thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-36: gzugs med gzugs can lta bu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-37: gzugs can gzugs med lta bur mthong //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-39: dngos po gang gzugs med cing bltar med pa de gzugs can snang ba ltar mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61a-40: gzugs can gyi rnam pa la la gzugs med pa ltar gnas par mthong zhing 'khrul pa de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61a-42: dkar po gnag dang yod pa med //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-0: yang de bzhin du me la sogs pa'i @61b 'od can gang yin pa 'od med par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-1: dkar po ni nag por mthong la /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-2: nag po ni dkar por mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-3: yod pa ni med par mthong la /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-4: med pa ni yod par mthong ba de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-5: mig nad med par zla ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-6: gzugs mngar ri med mthong dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-8: mig la nad kyi skyon med bzhin du zla ba gzugs du mar mthong /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-9: ra ri med pa ste ri bong gi mtshan ma med pa mthong na de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-10: gnyid ma log pa dri za srin //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-11: yi dags gzhan yang de 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-12: gzugs mi sdug par mthong gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-15: skyes bu gnyid kyis ma log par dri za la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-16: gzhan yang de 'dra ste mi'am ci dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-17: sha za la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-18: gzugs mi sdug pa 'dir ma smos su zin kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-19: skye gnas tha dad pa phye ba'i mi ma yin pa de mthong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de yang 'chi zhing dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-20: sme bdun dang ni nyer gnas pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-21: skar ma sgrib byed ma mthong dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-22: dgu tshigs gung tshugs ma mthong ba //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-25: skyes bu gang skar ma sme bdun dang nye bar gnas pa'i skar ma sgrib byed ces bya ba chung du zhig ma mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-26: de bzhin du dgu tshigs zhes bya ba nam mkha'i gang g'a zhes grags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-27: skar ma gung tshugs ma mthong ba de ni lo gcig mi 'tsho ste lo 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-28: 'brug sgra chu bo'i sgra dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-29: gling bu pi wam rnga yi sgra //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-30: sgra gzhan med par thos pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-31: yod pa yang thos par ma gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-33: 'brug sgra nas rnga'i sgra'i bar gyi sgra rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-34: sgra gzhan gang yin pa dag mi gzhan pa dag yod kyang ma thos pas de thos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-35: de bzhin du 'brug sgra la sogs pa sgra rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-36: sgra che ba gzhan dag grag par gyur ba gzhan yod du zin kyang mi thos pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-37: de lta bu de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-38: zhes 'og nas smos pa'i tshig dang sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-39: rna ba'i bu ga bkag pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:61b-42: gang zhig rna ba'i bu ga sor mos bkag pa na /
T13TD4312.2E:61b-43: 'ur 'ur po'i sgra me 'bar ba'i sgra dang 'dra ba de mi thos pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-1: ro dang reg / gang zhig log par shes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-3: yang de bzhin du dri la sogs pa phyin ci log tu shes pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-4: dri zhim pa ni dri nga bar 'dzin la /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-5: dri nga ba ni dri zhim par 'dzin pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-6: de bzhin du ro mngar ba yin yang /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-7: kha ba la sogs pa gang yang rung bar 'dzin pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-8: kha ba mngar ba la sogs pa gang yang rung bar tshor ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-9: de bzhin du reg bya yang 'jam pa ni rtsub par shes la /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-10: grang ba ni tsha bar shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-11: de las go bzlog par shes pa'i 'khrul pa dang ldan pa de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-12: yang na yong ye mi tshor dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-14: yang rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du dri la sogs pa mi tshor zhing yong ye mi shes pa de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-15: me mar shi ba'i dri mi tshor //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-17: skyes bu gang zhig me mar shi bar gyur ba'i dri sna'i dbang pos mi tshor ba de yang 'chi ba'i ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-18: cho ga bzhin byas nad skyes la //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-19: cho ga log pas bder gnas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-21: mi gang la sman dpyad kyi gzhung las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du gso bar byas kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-22: nad skyed cing thu bar 'gyur ba dang yang gang zhig sman dpyad kyi cho ga ltar ma byas bar sbyor ba log par bsten du zin kyang bde bar gnas pa ltar byed ba de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-23: gang gi lus ni rdul g-yogs 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-24: lus la snad par mi tshor dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-26: skyes bu gang zhig lus rdul gyis g-yogs shing phyag dar gyis khebs pa ltar rdul can gnas ba de yang mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-27: yang gang gi lus la mtshon gyis snad cing bcad kyang tshor ba med pa de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-28: dka' thub drag dang cho ga ni //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-30: dbang po las 'das shes pa skyes //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-31: de rnams 'chi bar shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:62a-33: dka' thub drag po'i sbyor ba med par dbang po las 'das shing mi shes pa'i yul ma yin pa lha yul la sogs pa na yod cing shes pa'i shes pa skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62a-34: yang de bzhin du bstan bcos ji lta ba'i yang dag pa'i man ngag cho ga sngon du 'gro ba'i sems nang du bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor sems rtse gcig pa med par dbang po las 'das ba'i shes ba skye ba de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-0: skad 'gags @62b dman zhing mi gsal dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-1: gang zhig skad ni 'dzer gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-5: skyes bu gang glo bur du rang bzhin gyis skad 'gags nas dman zhing zhum pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-6: mi gsal zhing brda sprod ma nus par gyur na de mi 'tsho 'o //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-7: yang de bzhin du skad 'gyur zhing 'dzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-8: gang smra bar 'dod pa ni rgyu med par 'phral du brjed par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-9: ci yang smra bar mi nus pa de yang mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-10: skad gsang shin tu nyam chung 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-11: mdog dang stobs ni nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-12: rgyu med par ni nad 'phel bar //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-15: yang gang zhig smra ba'i skad gsang dma' bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-16: de bzhin mdog dang stobs nyams shing bri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-17: zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa'i nad skye ba'i rgyu med par nad 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar snang ba dag kyang mi 'tsho ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-18: skad gsang nyams par gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-19: bdag nyid 'chi bar smra ba ste //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-20: de 'dra'i sgra ni thos pa dag / ring du yongs su spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-22: rang bzhin gyis skad gsang nyams te /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-23: skad kyi gsang gzhan du gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-24: bdag nyid 'chi bar smra ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-25: kho bo ni 'chi'o 'chi'o zhes rtag tu smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-26: yang de lta bu'i sgra thos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-28: / zhes gzhan smra ba dag thos pa'i skyes bu de 'chi bar 'gyur bas ring du spang bar bya'i gso bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-29: lus kyi dbyibs dang tshad dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-30: mdog gam gzi mdangs gang dag gi //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-31: gzugs brnyan 'gyur ba'i rmi lam du //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-34: lus kyi dbyibs ni ring thung la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-35: de dag rang gi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-36: tshad ni chu zheng la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-37: mdog ni sngo bsangs la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-38: gzi mdangs ni kha dog de nyid 'byes par byed cing ring nas gsal bar snang pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-39: de ltar skyes bu'i dbyibs la sogs pa'i rnam pa de dag gi gzugs gzhan du 'gyur zhing mi mthun par snang ba rmi lam gyi gnas skabs su mthong na yang skyes bu de 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin na /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-40: gnyid kyis ma log pa'i gnas skabs su mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T13TD4312.2E:62b-41: nyi ma me long chu sogs la //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-42: gang zhig dbyibs dang tshad dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:62b-43: lus kyi rnam pa snang gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-1: brnyan zhes ni de la bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-3: gang gi lus la nyi ma dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-4: me long dang chu la sogs pa lus kyi dbyibs dang tshad kyi rnam pa gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs can du 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-5: mdog dang gzi mdangs la brten gang //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-6: lus gtogs gzugs brnyan lta bu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-8: gang gi mdog dang gzi mdangs kyi rnam pa la brten cing gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lus su gtogs pa nyid kyi gzugs brnyan ltar logs shig na snang ba ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-9: gang gi gzugs brnyan bcad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-10: gyes dang lhag dang 'khrugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-11: mgo med mgo gnyis yon po dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-12: mi sdug gzhan du gyur snang ba //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-13: mtshan nyid las byung ma yin na //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-14: de ni tshe zad yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-16: skyes bu gang zhig gi gzugs brnyan bcad cing du ma bu gnyis su byas pa lta bur snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-17: de bzhin du gyes shing bkas ba lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-18: de bzhin du lhag pa ste tshad las che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-19: 'khrugs pa ste rnam par g-yo zhing kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-20: mgo med cing bcad pa lta bur snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-22: mgo bo yon por snang pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-23: yang na mdog mi sdug pa'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du snang ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-24: 'dir bshad pa las gzhan pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-25: rta dang glang po dang ba long dang bong bu la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su nyi ma dang me long dang chu la sogs par snang na /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-26: skyes bu de ni tshe zad pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-28: de'i mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin nam /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-29: bcos pa'i rgyu la sogs pa las byung ba ma yin par de ltar snang ba 'chi ltas yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-30: gang gi mig gi rgyal mor ni //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-31: gzugs brnyan snang bar ma gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-33: mi gang gi mig gi rgyal mo zhes 'jig rten na grags pa'i mig gi dbang po dang bar gzhan gyi gzugs snang bar ma gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-34: de yang tshe zad pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-35: nam mkha' la sogs lnga po yi //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-36: gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs lnga //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-38: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i 'byung ba chen po lnga la /
T13TD4312.2E:63a-39: gzugs brnyan dbyibs dang kha dog gi rnam pa sna tshogs pa yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-40: nam mkha' dangs shing sngo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63a-41: snum bcas mdog dang bcas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-0: de @63b la nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan nam /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-1: mdangs ni dangs shing dri ma med pa dang kha dog sngo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-2: snum pa dang bcas shing rtsub bag med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-3: mdog dang bcas shing mdangs dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-4: rlung las rdul can dmar dang gnag / thal mdog rtsub cing mdog nyams yin //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-6: rlung gi gzugs brnyan la phyag dar gyis gtor ba ltar rdul can du gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-9: thal ba'i mdog tu snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-10: rtsub cing mdog mdangs nyams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-11: me yi dmar zhing dangs par snang //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-12: mdangs ldan blta na sdug pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-14: me'i gzugs brnyan mdangs ni dmar zhing dangs par snang zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-15: gser btso ma lta bu mdangs dang ldan zhing dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-16: blta na sdug cing mdzes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-18: dag cing rab snum bde ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-20: chu las skyes bu'i gzugs brnyan ni bee d'urya ltar snang zhing sngo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-21: dag cing dri ma med pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-22: snum pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-23: bde zhing nad med par skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-24: sa yi brtan snum dag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-25: mthug cing dkar dang sngo bsangs yin //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-27: sa'i gzugs brnyan brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-29: dag cing dri ma med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-32: sngo ba la sogs su gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-33: rlung ni nad 'chi sdug bsngal skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-35: de dag gi nang nas rlung gi gzugs brnyan ni nad rnams skyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-36: 'chi ba dang sdug bsngal zhing nyon mongs pa chen po skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-37: gzhan dag bde ba skyed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-39: gzugs brnyan nam mdog mdangs de las gzhan pa'i phyi ma bzhi po ni bde ba skyed cing dge ba ston pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-40: nad med pa skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-41: me yis thams cad mdog can te //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-42: de ni rnam pa bdun du bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-43: dmar dang ser dkar nag po dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-44: ljang nag skyu dang gnag pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-46: mdog can thams cad ni me'i rang bzhin las byung ba yin par bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:63b-47: de yang dmar dang ser ba la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas rnam pa bdun yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-48: de rnams las ni gang gsal 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-49: snum dang dri ma med de dge //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-50: dri ma can dang rtsub pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:63b-51: zhum pa sdug bsngal skyed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-1: de rnams kyi nang nas gang zhig snang zhing gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-3: dri ma med cing nag nog dang bral ba de ni dge zhing bde ba skyed pa yin /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-4: dri ma can dang kha dog rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-5: zhum zhing rgyas pa ma yin pa rnams ni mi dge ste /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-6: sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-7: mdangs kyi mdog ni zil gyis gnon //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-8: 'od ni kha dog gsal byed yin //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-10: mdog dang mdangs kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-11: mdangs kyi kha dog gi rnam pa nag po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-12: dkar po la sogs pa zil gyis mnan nas der gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-13: 'od kyi rnam pa ni lus kyi kha dog gsal shing che bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-14: mdangs kyis nye bar snang ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-15: 'di ni ring nas snang ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-17: gzi mdangs kyi rnam pa gang nye bar snang ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-18: 'byung ba lnga'i 'od ni thag ring po nas snang ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-19: de'i khyad par ni de yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-20: gang zhig mdangs dang kha dog gi //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-21: mtshan ma'i khyad par med min te //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-22: mi rnams mtshan ma bzang ngan 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-23: dus su mdangs la brten pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-25: mi rnams la ni mdangs med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-26: kha dog gi khyad par 'ga' yang med pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-27: thams cad kyang mdangs kyang mdog dang bcas pa yin pas de dang bral ba ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-28: des na mi rnams kyi mtshan ma'am /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-29: ltas bzang po dang ngan pa 'byung ba'i dus su mdangs la brten cing gnas nas de'i khyad par ston cing gsal bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-30: gang zhig rkang pa 'drud pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-31: phrag pa g-yo bas 'gro ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-33: skyes bu gang zhig rkang pas sa la drud cing 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-34: de bzhin phrag pa g-yo zhing 'gul bas 'gro ba de yang 'chi bdag gi dbang du 'gro ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-35: gang zhig phan zas mang zos kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-36: rtag tu stobs ni nyams 'gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-38: gang zhig gis phan zhing rjes su mthun pa'i zas mang zhing lhag par zos su zin kyang rgyun mi 'chad par stobs nyams shing 'bri bar 'gyur ba yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-39: gang zhig nyung zos bshang gci mang //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-40: mang zos bshang gci nyung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-42: yang gang zhig zas nyung ba zos kyang bshang ba dang gci ba mang zhing 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64a-43: de las go bzlog pa dag kyang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64a-44: nyung zos bad kan gyis nyen cing //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-2: gang zhig zas nyung du zos kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:64b-3: bad kan gyis nyen cing gzir ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64b-4: dbugs mi bde pa ring bor 'byin cing sa la 'gre ldog na yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-5: gang zhig dbugs ring phyung nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-6: thung ngu rngubs te shugs 'byin dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-8: yang gang zhig dbugs gyen du 'byin pa ring du phyung nas /
T13TD4312.2E:64b-9: de'i 'og tu thung ngu rngubs te shugs 'byin cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-10: thung ngu 'byin cing bsnun pa ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-11: shin tu 'dar bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-13: gang zhig dbugs kyi rgyun thung ngu 'byin cing /
T13TD4312.2E:64b-14: de'i 'og tu bsnun pa ltar shin tu 'gul zhing 'dar bar byed pa yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-15: gang zhig lag ngar bskum nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-16: mgo ni dka' bas 'degs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-18: yang gang zhig lag ngar bskum nas mgo bo shin tu dka' bas 'degs shing bskyod pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-19: gang zhig dpral ba las rdul 'dzag / tshigs mtshams lhod par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-21: yang gang zhig dpral ba'i phyogs nas rgyu med par rdul 'dzag pa dang rus pa'i tshigs kyi bog re lhod par byed pa yang de bzhin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-22: nyams che ba'am nyam chung gyur pa gang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-23: ldong ba'i tshe na mi dran 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-25: gang zhig nyams stobs dang ldan nam //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-26: nyam chung bar gyur kyang rung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:64b-27: mal nas ldang ba'i skabs su mi dran zhing myong bar 'gyur ba yang de bzhin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-28: gang zhig gan rkyal nyal nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-29: rkang pa rnam par bskyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-31: gang zhig glo gnyis mi 'bebs par gan rkyal du nyal zhing rkang pa rnam par bskyod cing 'gul bar byed ba yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-32: rtsig pa mal stan la sogs par //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-33: gang zhig rtag tu snyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-35: gang zhig nyam chung bas rtsig pa la sogs par rtag tu snyes pa yang de bzhin no //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-36: rgyu med par dgod myos tshul gyis //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-37: mchu las ldags par byed ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-39: dgod pa la sogs pa'i rgyu med par shas cher dgod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64b-40: myos shing mi dran pa'i tshul gyis mchu ldags par byed pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-41: ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-42: sgra bcas par yang gang byed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-44: lces ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:64b-45: kha nas sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13TD4312.2E:64b-46: lus mdog nag po ser po dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-3: yang mi gang gi mdog nag po la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan du snang ba yang gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-4: sman pa sman dang kha zas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-5: bla ma mdza' bshes la sdang gang //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-6: 'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-7: dbang gyur yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-9: yang skyes bu gang zhig sman la sogs pa la zhe sdang ba gang yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-10: sngar bshad pa thams cad kyang gshin rje'i dbang du gyur cing 'chi ba yin par shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-11: gang zhig drod chung sems g-yengs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-12: rtag tu mdangs ngan yid mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-14: yang mi gang khong pa'i me drod chung zhing zhan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-15: sems g-yengs shing rtag tu 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-17: yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyis non pa de yang ming 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-18: gang zhig gtor ma bya rog la //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-19: byin yang za bar mi byed dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-21: yang mi gang zhig gi phyir de'i ming nas smos te gtor ma byin zhing gtor ma bya rog la sogs pas mthong nas za bar mi byed pa de yang gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-22: gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-23: mdzes shing lus rgyas dpal thob ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-24: de las nyams par gyur pa dag / de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-25: yid gzhungs pa la sogs pa'i rgyu bcud kyis len pa la sogs pa med par yid gzhungs shing blo rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-27: lus kyi sha rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-28: dpal gyi 'byor pa glo bur du thob bar gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-29: yang na yid gzhungs pa la sogs pa snga na yod pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-30: rgyu med par glo bur du nyams par 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-31: de dag ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug cing 'gro ba'i ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-32: tha mal ba'am nad pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-33: gang gi yon tan skyon rang bzhin //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-34: snga las gzhan du 'gyur bar snang //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-35: de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-37: skyes bu tha mal bar gnas shing /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-38: nad med pa'am nad pa yang rung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-39: snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-40: rlung la sogs pa'i skyon gyi rang bzhin snga ma las gzhan du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:65a-41: rang gi rang bzhin spangs nas dngos po gzhan du gyur na skyes bu de yang zla ba drug las mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-42: dad dang tshul khrims dran dang sbyin //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-43: blo gros stobs ni rgyu med bar //
T13TD4312.2E:65a-44: 'di drug las ni ldog gyur ba //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-2: yang gang zhig dad pa la sogs pa'i chos drug las rgyu med par ldog par gyur pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-3: de la dad pa ni lha la sogs pa la yid dang zhing mnyes par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-4: tshul khrims ni sdom pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-5: dran pa ni 'das pa'i dngos po mi brjed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-6: sbyin pa ni gtong ba'i dang tshul can no //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-8: stobs ni lus kyi nus pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-11: skra byi ba na tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-15: smar ba'i tshig smyon pa lta bur 'chol bar spyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65b-16: lus 'dar zhing sems rmongs par gyur pa dag ni zla ba gcig nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-17: yang de bzhin du skra byi zhing bregs ba na tshor ba med par 'gyur ba'i mi yang zhag drug nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-18: gang zhig lkog nad med pa ru //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-19: mid par kha zas mi chud dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-21: yang mi gang zhig lkog ma'i nad gang yang med par zas ma tshud cing thogs pa de yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-22: bran g-yog log par byed gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-25: yang mi gang zhig gi bran g-yog gam bsnyen bkur ba log par byed cing rgyu med par mi mthun bar byed pa de 'chi ltas yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:65b-26: 'chi ba dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-27: gang zhig rtag tu gnyid log pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-30: yang skyes bu gang zhig nyin mtshan rtag par gnyid log ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:65b-31: gnyid med pa de yang mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-32: mchi mas gdong ni khebs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-33: rkang pa shin tu rdul ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-34: mig ni mi sdug par snang ba //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-37: gang zhig rgyu med par mchi mas gdong khebs par du ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65b-38: de bzhin du rkang pa shas cher rdul ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:65b-39: de bzhin du mig mi sdug cing rnyog ba can du snang ba de yang gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-40: sngon chad dga' ba'i dngos la gang //
T13TD4312.2E:65b-43: gang gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la sngon chad dga' zhing rtsed mo nyams su myang ba las dngos po de nyid la 'phral du mi dga' bar 'byung ba de yang mi 'tsho'o //
