T13TD4312.2E:82a-0: nad la sogs pa'i sgra ni gcig gis gcig bshad pa'i rnam grangs tshig don @82a * //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-1: gcig ston par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:82a-2: ci'i phyir nad ces bya zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:82a-3: sdig pa la sogs pa'i ming gi rnam pas sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i don gyis na nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-4: nad gzhi sngar byung tshul dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-5: de bzhin tshul phyed goms byed dang //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-6: dkyil gyur shes par byed pa ste //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-7: nad ni rnam pa lngar shes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-9: nad rnams kyi tshul ni nad gzhi las dkyil du gyur pa'i bar du rnam pa lngar shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-10: de dag gi tshul yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:82a-11: gzhi dang rgyu dang skye mched dang //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-12: rkyen dang slong bar byed pa'i rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-13: rnam grangs kyis ni nad gzhir bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-14: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs kyi sgra 'di dag gis dang po nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad cing bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-15: gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-17: bye brag phyed par ma gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-18: nad kyi tshul ni ji bzhin par //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-19: chung phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-22: rtags gang gis nad kyi gzhi sngar byung ba'i tshul shes shing rtogs par 'gyur ba ni nad 'byung zhing phyis mi ldang bar ni 'dod par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:82a-23: nad rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi bye brag phyed cing gsal bar ma gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:82a-24: rims la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshul phyis ji lta bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du de'i rtags dang mtshan nyid mi gsal zhing mngon du mi snang ba de ni sngar byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:82a-25: / de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-26: tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-28: sngar byung ba'i tshul de nyid gsal zhing bye brag phyed par gyur pa la ni nad kyi tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-29: dbyibs dang gsal mngon rtags dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-30: mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-32: nad kyi tshul phyed pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs sgra'i tshul gzhan gyis bstan pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-33: dbyibs dang gsal ba la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-34: rgyu dang nad dang mi mthun zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-35: mi mthun pa yi don byed pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:82a-36: sman dang zas dang spyod lam rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-0: nye bar @82b bsgyur bas bde gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-1: nyams brtas byed par shes bya ste //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-2: de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-4: goms shing brten par byed pas na goms pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-5: nye bar bsgyur ba gang gis lus bde bar 'gyur ba de la drang srong rnams kyis goms pa zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-6: gang gis nye bar bsgyur ba goms pa zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-8: sman ni aa ru ra dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-10: zas ni s'a lu rtsa snar la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-11: spyod lam ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par te rtsol ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-13: glu dang kha ton 'don pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-14: bsam gtan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-15: de dag kyang nad kyi rgyu dang nad dang mi mthun pa'i don byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-16: nad gzhir 'gyur ba'i tshul las go bzlog pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-17: de bzhin du nad kyi rgyu de dag dang mi mthun pa'i don byed pa'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:82b-18: / nad kyi rgyu dang mi mthun par bsten pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-19: rgyu dang mi mthun pa ni dper na rtas par byed pa las byung ba'i nad las nyams dmad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-20: nyams dmad pa las byung ba la rtas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-21: rtsub pa las byung ba snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-22: snum pa las byung ba la rtsub par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-23: spyod lam mi mthun pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-24: gnyid log pa las byung ba la gnyid ma log par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-25: gnyid ma log pa las byung ba la gnyid log par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-26: 'dug pa las byung ba la brtsal bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-27: brtsal ba las byung ba la 'dug par bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-28: de dag la sogs pa ni rgyu dang mi mthun pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-29: nad dang mi mthun pa ni dper na /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-30: rims nad la gla sgang dang par pa ta la sogs pa sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-31: gcin nad la skyer pa dang nas thug la sogs pa sbyin pa lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-32: spyod lam ni snum gyi cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra bar thams cad go bzlog pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:82b-33: mi mthun pa'i byed pa ni dper na chang las byung ba'i nad la chang nyid byin na /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-34: chang las byung ba'i nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhing sman du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:82b-35: zas ni dper na tshad pa 'khru ba'i nad la /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-0: nas dang ma sha dang rgya sne'u la sogs pa byin pas @83a * //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-2: spyod lam ni dper na mes tshig pa la mes bsro ba nyid phan pa lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-3: gzhan yang dper na skyugs pa'i nad la skyug sman btang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-4: kha zas kyang de 'byin par byed pas s'a lu la sogs pa byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-5: spyod lam ni sor mo dang autpa la'i chu la sogs pas slon du gzhug pa lta bu de la ni nye bar bsgyur bas bde bar 'gyur ba'i goms pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-6: gang gi phyir de nyid goms pa ni nad zhi bar byed pas na goms pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-7: de las bzlog pa'i ma goms nad //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-10: gong ma de las bzlog pa ma gtogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-11: goms pa'i mtshan nyid ji skad du bstan pa'i nye bar bsgyur ba de dang mi mthun pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-12: sman la sogs pa bsten pas sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba las nyams par byed pa de la ni mi 'phrod pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-13: de nyid ni ma goms pa'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-14: gang gis nad ni dkyel gyur pas //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-16: nad rnams rdzogs shing mngon gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-17: skyes shing 'ongs pa dkyel gyur yin //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-19: rnam pa gang gis rlung la sogs pa'i nad dkyel du gyur cing sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-20: ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'phel zhing shas cher skyi bar 'gyur bas nad kyi tshul lam dbyibs kyi khyad par so sor skyes shing nad rnams rdzogs par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-21: mngon du gyur pa de la ni dkyel skyes pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-22: yang de nyid ni skyes shing 'ongs pa zhes kyang bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-23: de nyid mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-24: de ni grangs brtag gtso bo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-25: stobs dang dus kyis phye ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-27: dkyel skyes pa ni grangs la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lngar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-28: grangs ni ji ltar 'di nyid las //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-29: rim ni brgyad du bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:83a-31: dbye ba de yang ji ltar na nad gzhi bstan pa 'di nyid las rim rnam pa brgyad yod par bshad pa lta bu ni re zhig grangs kyi rnam pa bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:83a-32: de yang de bzhin du khrag dang mkhris pa ni rnam pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-0: @83b lud pa ni rnam pa lnga'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grangs yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-1: nad rnams spyir ni bsdus ba las //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-2: cha shas dbye ba brtag pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-4: rlung la sogs pa'i nad tha mi dad pa spyir gcig tu bsdus pa las cha shas su dbye zhing cha re re bgos pa ni brtag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-5: rang dbang gzhan dbang gnyis las ni //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-6: nad rnams gtso bor bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-8: rang dang gzhan gyi dbang du zhes bya ba rjes su 'brel pa yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-9: rjes su 'brel pa med pa'i tshul rnam pa gnyis las nad rnams la gtso bor gyur pa zhes bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-10: rgyu sogs ma lus phyogs gcig las //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-11: stobs ni che chung shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-13: nad kyi rgyu ni nad gzhi sngar byung ba'i tshul dang /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-15: goms pa rnams ma lus pa 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-16: phyogs gcig las stobs che chung gi bye brag tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-17: nad gzhi la sogs pa bzhi po de dag las ma lus pa'i khyad par tha dad par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-18: nad re re zhing bstan bcos rtsom par byed pas nad kyi rgyur bshad pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du ma lus par nad skyed par byed pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin nam /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-19: 'on te phyogs gcig gis kyang nad skyed par 'gyur /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-20: de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs pa yin nam /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-21: ma rdzogs pa yod ces rtogs na /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-23: nyin mtshan dus dang zas zos chas //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-24: nyes pa ji bzhin nad kyi dus //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-26: nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang dus dang zas zos pa ni nyin mtshan dus dang zas zos pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-27: de rnams kyi cha ni cha shas te /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-28: des nyes pa ji ltar 'byung ba ni nad kyi dus yin par shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:83b-29: de ltar na dus kyi khyad par gyis phye ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-30: de ltar nad gzhi'i don bshad nas //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-32: de ltar mdor bsdus pa'i rnam pa 'dis nad gzhi zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don bshad cing bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:83b-33: de ni rgyas par bshad par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-0: nad gzhi'i don de 'og nas gzhung @84a * //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-1: rtsom par byed pas rgya cher ston cing 'chad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-2: nad rnams kun gyi nad gzhi ni //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-3: nad ni 'khrugs par gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-5: gnod par gyur pa'i nad ma lus pa kun gyi rgyu 'am gzhi ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan te /
T13TD4312.2E:84a-6: nad kyi skyon gsum po 'khrugs shing g-yos par gyur pa las ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-7: de ni gnod 'gyur sna tshogs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-8: bsten pas ldang bar 'gyur bar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-10: de rnams ldang ba'i rgyu ni zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa gnod par 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsten pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-11: gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-12: gnod 'gyur sngar ni bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-14: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum po chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:84a-16: drag pa'i mtshan nyid gnod par 'gyur ba sngar mdo'i gnas kyi skabs su bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-17: kha dang tsha dang bska cung zad //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-18: rtsub dang bcud med sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-19: bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-20: mtshan mo mi nyal skad cher smra //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-21: sbyangs pa'i sbyor drags mya ngan 'jigs //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-22: sems las drag shul bud med drags //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-23: so ga nyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-24: rlung gi nad ni ldang bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-26: de la rlung gi nad ni kha ba dang tsha ba la sogs pas ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-27: chung du za ba ni cung zad za'o //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-28: bcud med par za ba ni brnga zhing btu ba'i dus las yol ba'i 'bru gang yin pa de ni bcud med pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:84a-30: 'bru ni ma smin thal ches pa //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-31: bcud med zas ni yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-33: bkag pa ni bshang gci la sogs pa 'byung ba'i shugs bkag pa'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:84a-34: / nan gyis btsir ba ni de rnams mi 'byung bzhin du btsir ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-35: mtshan mo mi nyal ba ni mtshan mo gnyid ma log pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-36: skad cher smra ba ni gsang che zhing nga ro chen po dang smra ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:84a-37: sbyangs pa'i sbyor ba drags pa ni slon sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drags pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-0: mya ngan ni @84b yid gdung ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:84b-1: de dag la sogs pas rlung nad ldang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-2: de yang dus ni so ga'i rjes te dbyar gyi dus dang /
T13TD4312.2E:84b-3: de bzhin du nyin mo'i rjes te dgongs ka dang /
T13TD4312.2E:84b-4: mtshan mo'i rjes te tho rangs dang /
T13TD4312.2E:84b-5: zas zhu ba'i rjes te kha zas zhu zin pa'i rjes la rlung gi nad ldang zhing 'khrugs par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-6: mkhris pa tsha dang skyur dang rno //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-7: lan tshva bro dang lus tsha dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-8: ston ka nyin phyed mtshan phyed dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-9: tsha ba'i dus su ldang bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-11: mkhris pa sman tsha ba dang skyur ba la sogs pas ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-12: tsha ba'i dus su ni kha zas tsha zhing smin te skyur por gyur pa'i skabs la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-13: mngar skyur lan tshva snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-14: lci dang bad kan skyed bsil dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-15: 'dug dang bde dang gnyid ma zhu //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-16: nyin par gnyid log brtas drags dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-17: slon sogs sbyor ba nyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-18: zos ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-19: snga dro mtshan stod bad kan ldang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-21: bad kan gyi nad ni ro mngar ba la sogs pas ldang zhing 'khrugs par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-22: 'dug bzhin pa ni las kyi bya ba spangs te gnas pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-23: slon pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nyes pa ni log par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-24: zos ma thag pa ni zas zos nas mngar por gyur pa'i skabs dang /
T13TD4312.2E:84b-25: dpyid la sogs pa'i dus su yang bad kan ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-26: 'dres pa la ni ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-28: sngar bshad pa'i rgyu de dag cha 'dres par gyur pa las ldan pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:84b-29: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan la sogs pa 'dren ma ldang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-32: sngar bshad pa'i rgyu khab dang tsha ba dang mngar ba la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par bsten pa las rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa'i nad ldang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-33: de bzhin gzhan yang 'dres mar zos //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-34: ma zhu ma snyoms mi 'phrod dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-35: lhag par zos pa la sogs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-36: chang dang btung ba nyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-37: tshod ma skam dang la phug rjen //
T13TD4312.2E:84b-38: til tshigs sa zhag so ba'i chang //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-0: @85a * // sha rul sha skam sha rid rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-1: de dang de yis nyes gsum skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-2: de bzhin kha zas sbos pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-3: dus tshigs log pa bdun gyi rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-4: gdon zhugs dug dang dbyig dug zos //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-5: be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri rtsar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-6: btsas skar la ni gza' zhugs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-7: log par sbyor ba thams cad dang //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-8: sdig pa'i las la brten pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-9: bud med bu btsas log par byung //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-10: gso ba log par byas las ldang //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-12: yang de bzhin du sngar bshad pa de dag bsten cing spyad pa las 'dus pa'i nad ldang bar 'gyur bar ma zad kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-13: 'dren mar zos pa la sogs pa 'di dag gis kyang 'dus pa'i nad ldang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-14: zos pa ni tshig kun dang sbyar te 'dren mar za ba ni 'phrod pa dang mi 'phrod pa dang gnod pa can dri ma can zos pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-15: ma zhu ba ni kha zas snga ma ma zhu bar zos pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-16: mi snyoms par za ba ni zas kyi dus la bab pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-19: tshad las chung du zos pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-20: mi 'phrod pa ni ri bong gi sha dang la bug rlon pa dus gcig zos pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-21: nya dang 'o ma lhan cig zos pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-22: zas lhag par za ba ni 'grangs shing zos pa'i rjes la zos pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-23: nyes pa'i chang ni kha dog dang bri dang ro la sogs pa'i nyes pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-24: phal cher rul zhing dri mi zhim pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-25: de bzhin du btung ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang rul zhing kha dog la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang ldan pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-26: tshod ma skam po ni rgya sne'u la sogs pa'i tshod ma skam po'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-27: til tshigs ni til gyi 'ba' tsha'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-28: sa zhag dang so ba'i chang ni sa dang so ba 'dres pa las chang du byas pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85a-29: yang sha'i rnam pa rul zhing zhig pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-30: skam zhing khu bcud med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-31: rid pa ste rus pa dang rtsa rgyus tsam lus pa zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85a-32: gzhan yang 'dir ma smos su zin kyang de lta bu nad skyed par byed pa'i rnam pa 'di dag dang cha 'dra ba dag gis kyang nges par gsum 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-0: de bzhin du kha zas spos pa ste sngar gang la goms @85b pa'i kha zas spangs nas gzhan zos pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-1: de bzhin du dus tshigs log pa ni dman pa dang log pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan no //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-2: mdun gyi rlung ni mdun phyogs nas ldang ba'i rlung ngam shar nas ldang ba'i rlung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-3: de bzhin du gdon zhugs pa ni lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa'i gdon lus la zhugs shing kun tu 'dzin pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-4: yang de bzhin du dug dang dbyig dug ste /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-5: ma sbyar ba dang sbyar ba'i dug zos pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-6: de bzhin du ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs kyi nad 'khrugs shing ldang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-7: ri'i rtsar gnas shing 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-8: btsas pa'i tshe skar ma gang bab pa la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' zhugs shing gnod par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-9: de bzhin du kha zas log par zos pa la sogs pa log pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-10: sdig pa'i las srog gcod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-11: rkub la sogs pa la bsten zhing spyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-12: bud med bu btsas pa'i dus su log par byung ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-13: de bzhin du gso ba log par byas shing legs par ma bcos pa dag las kyang nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-14: de ltar so so'i nad ldang bas //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-15: nad kyi gnas su 'gro byed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-16: rtsa sbubs rnams su phyin pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-17: nad rnams lus la myur du skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-19: de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rnam pas nad so so tha dad par ldang zhing 'khrugs pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams lus la myur du skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-20: ci zhig byas pas nad skyed ce na /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-21: nad kyi gnas gang yang rung bar 'gro bar byed pa'i nad des rtsa'i sbubs bcud rgyu ba'i sar song zhing phyin nas /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-22: gnod pa skyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-23: dngos su na nad kyi gnas bcud rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsar gnod pa de dag zhugs pas nad ldang bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:85b-24: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-25: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:85b-26: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-0: // / @86a * // de nas rims nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-2: nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i 'og tu rims kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i dgos pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-3: rims de nad kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-4: nad rnams kyi gtso bo ni rims yin no zhes bshad pas so //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-5: rims ni nad bdag sdig can dang //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-7: khros pas myur ba'i mchod sbyin brlag / drag po dpral ba'i mig las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-8: skye dang 'chi tshe rmongs byed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-9: mi 'phrod sna tshogs bsten las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-10: mi bzad ming ni sna tshogs pas ;
T13TD4312.2E:86a-11: / skye gnas du ma rnams la gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-13: rims de ni nad kyi bdag po ste /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-14: nad thams cad kyi rgyal po 'am gtso bo yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-15: sdig can ni sdig pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-16: 'chi bdag ni srog chags thams cad 'chi ba la sbyor ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-17: mdangs za ba ni lus la yod pa'i mdangs za zhing spyod pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-18: 'chi bar byed pa ni srog chags rnams zad cing mthar phyin par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-19: khros pa ni lha chen po khros pa'i ba las byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-20: myur ba'i mchod sbyin brlag pa ni skye dgu'i bdag po myur ba zhes bya ba'i mchod sbyin brlag cing 'jig par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-21: de yang lha chen po drag po'i mig gsum pa las byung bas /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-22: khros pa'i dpral ba'i mig las byung zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-23: skye dang 'chi zhes bya ba ni bcas pa na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe ste /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-24: de dag gi skabs su rmongs par byed cing dang po skyes pa rjod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-25: de bzhin du kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa mi 'phrod pa sna tshogs bsten pa las byung ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-26: yang de ni mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba yin zhing nad kyi ming sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rta dang glang po la sogs pa skye gnas du ma tha dad pa rnams kyi lus la gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-27: glang po che'i lus la ni smin ma 'dzin pa zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-28: rta'i lus la ni so so'i zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:86a-29: lug gi lus la ni tal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gis gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:86a-30: de ni nad rnams so sor 'dres //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-2: rims de ni rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-3: de yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so dang /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-5: gnyis gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-6: nad gzhi gsum char 'dus shing tshogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-7: de bzhin du glo bur gyi rims ni brgyad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-8: de ltar nad gzhi so so'i gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-11: glo bur ba'i gcig ste brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-12: de la nad rnams rang rang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-13: rgyu las 'khrugs te ldang ba yis //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-14: ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-15: lhan cig gnas nas rtsa sgo bkag / zhu ba'i gnas nas me drod ni //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-16: phyi rol du ni 'byin par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-17: de dang lhan cig mngon khyab nas //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-18: lus kun tsha bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-19: yan lag shin tu tsha byed par //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-20: rims ni de yis skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-22: de la nad gzhi rnams ni nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byed cing rims skyed cing 'byung bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-23: de yang rang rang gi rgyu ji skad bshad pa las rnam par 'khrugs shing g-yos par gyur pa las ldang zhing nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba na /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-24: rgyu des ma zhu ba'i gnas su song nas /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-25: ma zhu ba lus zungs kyi dang po dangs ma zhes bya ba mas sbyin pa'i nang du zhugs nas de lhan cig gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-26: dangs ma dang rdul rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa sgo rnams kyi kha bkag cing bcad nas /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-27: zhu ba'i gnas lte ba'i phyogs nas khod pa'i me drod gang dag yin pa de phyi rol du 'byin par byed cing phyung nas me'i drod de dang lhan cig tu mngon par rgyu zhing khyab par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-28: lus ma lus pa kun tsha bas khyab par byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:86b-29: kun tu gdung la lus shin tu dro zhing tsha ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-30: des na yan lag rnams kyang shin tu tsha bar byed cing lus dang yan lag thams cad nas cher tsha ba bskyed pa'i rims su nad kyi dri ma des skyed par byed cing dkyel rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-31: rtsa sgo bkag pas de 'og tu //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-32: rdul ni mang du mi 'byung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:86b-34: nad des rtsa'i sgo bkag cing gags byas pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-4: phyi rol du mang du mi 'byung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-5: de yi sngon tshul sgyid zhan dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-6: nyams mi dga' zhing lus lci la //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-7: ro mi tshor zhing yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-9: yan lag na zhing 'ju stobs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-10: nyam chung gnyid ni che ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-11: spu ldang bya rmyang byed 'dod dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-12: byin pa'i nyva na lus snyom dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-13: phan par bstan pa mi bzod khro //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-14: skyur dang tsha dang drod la sred //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-15: kha zas mngar ba la mi dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-16: byis pa la sdang skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-17: sgra me grang lhags rlung dang chu ;
T13TD4312.2E:87a-18: / grib ma nyin mtshan rgyu med par //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-19: dga' dang mi dga' dag tu byed //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-20: de rjes rims ni gsal bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:87a-22: rims de'i sngon du 'byung ba'i tshul ni mi gsal ba'i rtags te /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-23: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-24: ngal zhing sgyid ngan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-25: nyams mi dga' ba ste stan dang gnas la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-26: gcig tu sems mngon par dga' ba med cing sems so na mi gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-27: lus khong lci zhing gdegs par dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-28: khas ro mi tshor zhing bem por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-29: kha zas yi gar mi 'ong zhing sred pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-30: glal zhing kha gdangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-31: mig 'khrugs shing mi sdug la mchi ma 'byung ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-32: yan lag na ba ste yan lag rnams gcus pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-33: brdungs pa'am bsdams pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-34: kha zas 'ju ba'i stobs chung zhing 'ju mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-35: nyams stobs chung zhing nus pa zhan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-36: gnyid che zhing bying ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-37: ba spu rnams ldang zhing bshor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-38: de bzhin du yan lag rnams bskyod pa la sogs pa'i bya rmyang byed 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-39: byin pa gnyis kyi nyva btsir ba ltar na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-40: lus snyom zhing lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-41: zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa phan par bstan pa'i gdams pa mi bzod cing khro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87a-43: tsha ba la sogs pa'i bye brag la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-0: kha zas mngar po la sogs pa rnams @87b la mi dga' zhing 'dod pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-1: de bzhin du byis pa nu zho 'thungs pa skye bo ma lus pa'i yid dge bar byed pa dag la yang khro zhing 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-2: de bzhin du skom dad che zhing skom dad kyis shin tu gdungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-3: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa'i yul rnams la rgyu med cing dgos pa med par ched 'ga' ni dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-4: ched 'ga' ni mi dga' bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-5: lan 'ga' nyan bar 'dod na yang zhe sdang bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-6: lan 'ga' ni 'dod pa skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-7: me la sogs pa la yang rgyu med par ched 'ga' bsten par dga' la /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-8: ched 'ga' ni bsten par mi dga' ste /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-9: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid byung na /
T13TD4312.2E:87b-10: de'i rjes la rims kyi mtshan nyid gsal zhing dkyel skyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-11: rims thebs 'byang nye'i tshe nad tshabs //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-12: chung zhing tsha ba mi snyoms la //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-13: yan lag de dang der 'pho zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-14: na ba de dang der g-yo 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-15: rkang pa bem po rengs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-16: byin snying na zhing ngal ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-17: tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur sems //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-18: brla dang rked pa na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-19: rgyab ni brdungs pa lta bur sems //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-20: lto ba btsir ba snyam sems dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-21: rus pa bcad pa snyam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-22: rtsib ma lhag par na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-23: snying ni btsir snyam sems shing zug / brang du btsugs pa lta bur gzer //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-24: phrag pa brdungs snyam dpung pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-25: bcom snyam sems shing sgrog rus na //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-26: 'gram pas kha zas bldad mi nus //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-27: glal 'byung rna ba sgra dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-28: mur 'gram zug cing mgo bo na //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-29: lce yis ro ni mi tshor ram //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-30: yang na kha bska bro bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-31: dri ma rnams ni sri ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-32: lpags mig kha dang sen mo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-33: bshang sogs rtsub cing dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-36: / gnyid yar mchu dang gre ba skam //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-37: skom dad che zhing lud pa skam //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-38: lud pa lu zhing skyugs pa skam //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-39: sems zhum lus kyi ba spu ldang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-40: pags pa so dag brtse ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-41: rkang lag 'dar zhing sbrid pa thogs //
T13TD4312.2E:87b-42: mgo 'khor tshig ni bla ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-2: rlung gi rims su shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-4: rlung gi rims kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma'am rtags ni 'di dag yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-5: rims kyis thebs pa ni dang po mgo zug pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-6: tsha ba la sogs pa 'byung bar mgo rtsom pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-7: 'byang du nye ba ni 'brel zhing 'byang bar bskyod pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-8: nad tshabs ni nad kyi tshul sna tshogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-9: chung ba ni shugs dal ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-10: mi snyoms pa ni rims kyis thebs pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-11: de dag gi tshul mi snyoms shing rnam pa tha dad par gnas pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-12: yang na de dag mgo la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang der rnam par tshor bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-13: 'og nas bshad pa'i nad kyi tshor ba de dang de dag rnam par g-yo zhing mal gcig na mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-14: rkang pa bem po ni tshor ba med cing sems dang bral ba ltar gnas pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-15: rengs pa ni lus shing ltar rengs shing gyong pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-16: byin snying na ba ni btsir ba snyam pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-19: tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur sems pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-20: gnyis su gshags pa ltar sems pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-21: brlan ba ni rang gi bya ba mi nus shing zhum pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-22: rked pa na ba ni mnan pa 'am zags pa snyam sems pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-23: rgyab brdungs pa snyam sems pa ni grugs pa snyam sems pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-24: phyir btags pa snyam du sems pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-25: lto ba btsir ba snyam sems pa ni lag pas btsir zhing mnan pa ltar sems pa'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:88a-26: / rus pa bcad pa ltar sems pa ni mtshon gyis bcad pa ltar tsha zhing na ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88a-27: de las kyang khyad par du rtsib logs su gtogs pa'i rus pa bcad pa snyam sems shing lhag par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-28: snying ga btsir zhing bsdams pa lta bur sems shing nang du zhugs pa'i tshul gyis na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-29: brang du lcag yu btsugs pa lta bur sems zhing gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-30: yang gzer ba de nyid kyis phrag pa'i phyogs khyab cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88a-31: dpung pa'i phyogs tho bas bcom pa lta bur sems shing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-0: sgrog rus kyi phyogs su til btsir ba'i @88b 'khrul 'khor gyis btsir ba ltar sems shing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-1: 'gram pas kha zas bldad mi nus shing nyam chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-2: kha gdangs pa dang bcas pa'i glal dang bya rmyang byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-3: rna ba 'bod pa lta bu'i sgra dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-4: mur 'gram gnyis su khab kyis gtsags pa ltar na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-5: mgo bo'i phyogs gzer zhing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-6: lces ro mi tshor ba ste lces ro'i khyad par mi shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-7: yang de bzhin du khar ro bska ba'i bag tu za ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-10: rdul la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams sri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-11: pags pa la sogs pa'i kha dog dmar zhing rtsub par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-12: mchil ma mang zhing bad kan 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-13: yi ga 'chus shing zas la sogs pa'i blo mi skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-14: sred pa chung ba ste zas la sogs pa la lhag par dga' ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-16: zos pa'i zas kyang mi 'ju ba'i stobs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-17: rdul mi 'byung ba'i phyi rol du mi thon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-18: gnyid yar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-20: skyugs pa'i bar skam zhing kha zas la sogs pa mi 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-21: sems zhum zhing sdug bsngal bas yid zhum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-22: lus kyi ba spu ldang zhing bshor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-23: pags pa dang so gtsags pa snyam sems shing brtse ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-25: sbrid pa thogs shing mi thon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-26: mgo 'khor zhing 'khor lo bskor ba ltar sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-27: tshig bla ba ste 'brel pa med pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-28: drod bag la dga' ba ste me dang nyi tshan bsten 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-29: bya rmyang byed pa ste yan lag brkyang zhing sdud 'dod pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:88b-30: de dag ni rlung las gyur pa'i rims nad kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:88b-31: lus kun cig car khyab pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:88b-32: bla zhing kha'i ro kha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:88b-34: mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:88b-35: bshang sla mkhris pa slon pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-2: thor bu dmar po 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-3: pags pa la sogs ser rtsa sngo //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-4: rdul 'byung dbugs ni mnam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-5: skom dang rab che mkhris pa'i rims //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-7: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni ;
T13TD4312.2E:89a-8: lus kun cig car khyab pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-10: mgo la sogs pa'i yan lag dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-11: lus kun tsha ba la sogs pa'i 'ur 'ur pos cig car dus gcig tu khyab ste na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-12: de bzhin du bla zhing tshig 'chol ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-13: kha'i nang kha ba bro bar 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-14: bsil ba 'dod cing grang ba la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-15: kha dang sna'i nang na thor bu 'byung zhing shu ba smin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-17: myos pa ste 'og nas chang nad kyi skabs su bshad pa lta bu'i myos pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-18: sems mi dga' ba ste blo mal na mi gnas shing 'phyo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-19: bshang ba sla zhing 'khru ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-20: mkhris pa slon zhing skyugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-21: kha nas mchil ma khrag dang bcas pa 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-22: sgregs pa ro skyur por 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-23: thor bu 'am 'brum phran dmar po tal til 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-24: pags pa dang lce dang gdong dang gcin gyi mdog ser zhing rtsa sngo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-25: lus rdul 'byung zhing tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-26: dbugs 'byung ba'i dri mnam zhing rul ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-27: skom dad kyi shas shin tu che ba 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-28: mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa ni mkhris pa'i rims yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-29: lhag par yi ga 'chus shing rmongs //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-30: bu ga 'gags shing rims shugs dal //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-31: mchil mang kha nang mngar ba bro //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-32: dang ga lci zhing dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-33: cham btab snying na skyug pa 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-34: lud pa lus rengs lpags sogs skya //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-35: yan lag thor bu grang mo 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-36: snyom zhing lus 'dar bad kan rims //
T13TD4312.2E:89a-38: rims thams cad las bad kan gyi rims kyi mtshan nyid ni lhag par ram khyad par du yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89a-39: sems rmongs bag tu 'gyur zhing bying ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-0: bu ga'i @89b tshogs 'gags shing dri ma rnams 'byung ba thogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-1: rims kyi shugs dal zhing nad tshabs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-2: mchil ma mang zhing ljan ljin che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-3: kha nang ro mngar ba bro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-4: snying ga lci zhing dang ga mer mer por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-6: cham bas btab cing sna chu 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-8: skyug pa 'byung zhing bod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-10: lus kyi yan lag rengs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-11: pags pa la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-17: gci ba rnams skya zhing dkar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-18: mgo dang lag ngar la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams thor bu 'am 'brum bu bad kan gyi rang bzhin can grang mo 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-19: snyom pa ste gnyid kyis non pa ltar yul rnams nges par 'dzin par mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-20: lus 'dar ba ste grang lhags kyis lus kyi khong 'dar bar gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-22: chu bsil dag gis reg pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-23: khyad par du ni dgun dus su //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-24: grang bas nyen te skrang 'gyur ba //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-25: bad kan las byung lus 'dar yin //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-27: mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa ni bad kan gyi rims yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-28: rang gi dus su thams cad ni //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-30: nad gzhir bshad pa'i mi mthun bsten //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-31: bsgyur bas bde bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-33: rims nad rang rang gi dus nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-34: zas zos pa'i skabs dang 'brel pa'i dus der rang rang gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rims thams cad 'byung zhing skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-35: 'phel zhing rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-36: nad gzhi nyid du bshad pa'i mkhris pa'i rims la tsha ba la sogs pa mi mthun pa bsten pas ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:89b-37: de bsgyur zhing bde ba dang 'brel par byas pas ni bde bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:89b-38: rang rang mtshan ma 'dres pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-0: sngar smos pa'i rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dres par gyur pa las ni de'i @90a * //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-1: mtshan ma ldan pa'i rims te /
T13TD4312.2E:90a-2: nad gnyis gnyis las byung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-3: de nas rlung dang mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma 'dres pa dang ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i rims yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-4: rlung dang bad kan gyi mtshan ma gnyis ka dang ldan pa ni rlung dang bad kan gyi ldan pa'i rims yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:90a-5: mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis ka'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pa'i rims yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-7: mgo na brgyal slon lus tsha rmongs bag 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-8: gre ba kha skam mi dga' rus tshigs na //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-9: gnyid med mgo 'khor spu ldang skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-10: kha glal tshig mang rlung mkhris 'dres pa'i rims //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-12: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:90a-13: rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni mgo na ba la sogs pa yang yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-15: mgo na ba ni mgo lhang lhang por na zhing zug pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-16: brgyal ba ni mi dran pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-18: lus tsha ba ni yan lag tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-19: rmongs bag ni sems rmongs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-20: gre ba nang kha skam pa ni rlan med pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-21: rus tshigs na ba ni brdungs pa snyam du sems pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-22: tshig mang ba ni bla ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-23: tsha med yi ga 'chus shing klad tshigs na //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-24: cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde bshang sri //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-25: khong bsil rmongs bag rab rib mgo 'khor rmya //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-26: bad kan rlung 'dres rims kyi mtshan ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-28: gzhan yang bad kan rlung 'dres pa las byung ba'i ldan pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.2E:90a-29: tsha ba me la sogs pa yang yin par shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:90a-30: tsha ba med pa ni rims kyi tsha ba'i gdung ba chung ba'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:90a-31: / gzhan dag ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-32: lus rdul rengs dang tsha ba sil sor mi gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-33: skom dad lud pa bad kan mkhris bag 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-34: rmongs bag rmya dang kha bro khar dri chags //
T13TD4312.2E:90a-35: bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa'i rims kyi rtags //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-0: gzhan yang bad @90b kan dang mkhris pa las byung ba ldan pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni /
T13TD4312.2E:90b-1: lus rdul ba dang khong rengs pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-2: rengs pa ni yan lag rengs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-3: tsha ba dang bsil ba dus la mi gnas pa yan lag grang zhing lan 'ga' tsha ste rgyud gcig tu mi gnas pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-4: khar dri ma chags pa ni ljan ljin gyis gos pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-5: kun las 'byung ba rtags kun ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-6: 'dir yang thang re tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-7: de bzhin grang dang nyin mo ni //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-8: gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid med byung ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-9: rtag par gnyid 'ong ba'am yang na yang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-11: glu dang gar dang dgod sogs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-12: spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-13: mig dmar mchi ma 'dzag dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-14: zhum zhing rdzi ma 'khrugs par snang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-15: byin snying rtsib logs na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-16: mgo bo rus tshigs na mgo 'khor //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-17: rna ba sgra dang nad bcas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-18: mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-19: lce rtsub kun nas bsregs ltar snang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-20: lus lci tshigs ni 'bye snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-21: mchil mar khrag mkhris bad kan 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-22: mgo bo g-yo zhing skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-25: snying na bshang gci sri ba 'am //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-26: yang na nyung ba'am rab mang 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-27: kha nang snum zhing nyams stobs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-28: gcom chung 'gyur zhing bla ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-29: nad smin dka' zhing rmugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-30: rgyun du gre ba 'dzer ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-31: 'dus pa'i rims te mngon rmugs byed //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-32: de ni mdangs 'phrog ces kyang bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:90b-34: nad gzhi thams cad las byung ba yin pas na kun las byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:90b-35: de ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rims kyi mtshan nyid du bshad pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:90b-36: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims 'dir mtshan nyid gzhan yang skad cig gam /
T13TD4312.2E:90b-37: thang cig re re zhing yang dang yang du lus tsha bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:90b-38: de bzhin du thang cig re re zhing grang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-1: 'ong zhing shas cher 'thibs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-2: mtshan mo ni gnyid med cing yar bar 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-3: yang na nyin mtshan rtag par rgyun du gnyid 'ong ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-4: nyin mtshan rtag par gnyid med par 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-5: yang de bzhin du rdul shas cher 'byung zhing mang du 'dzag la /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-6: cung zad tsam gyi rdul yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-7: glu la sogs pa'i spyod pa ngan cing dman pa la 'jug par dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-8: mig kha dog dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-9: mchi ma'i rgyun 'dzag pa dang bcas shing mi sdug par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-11: rdzi ma 'khrugs shing mig gi spu g-yos par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-12: byin snying la sogs pa na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-13: rna bar sgra drag pa dang bcas nas na zhing gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-14: mgul pa ste gre ba gra ma'i tshogs kyis gang zhing khyab pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-15: lce tsher ma ltar rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-16: kun nas bsregs shing tshig pa ltar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-17: lus kyi khong lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-18: yan lag gi tshogs bye zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-19: mchil mar khrag dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rnam par 'byung ba dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:91a-20: mgo bo g-yo zhing 'dar ba thor bu dang 'brum phran mgo bo 'am pags pa mtha' 'khor ba zlum po 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-21: de yang mdog nag pa dang dmar bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-22: snying na zhing gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-23: bshang gci la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams sri zhing mi 'byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-24: yang na nyung zhing cung zad 'byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-25: shin tu mang zhing shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-26: kha'i nang snum zhing 'byil ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-27: nyams stobs chung zhing zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-28: gcom chung zhing dma' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-29: bla zhing tshig 'chol pa mang du smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-30: nad smin par dka' zhing yun rings nas 'byang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-31: shas cher rmugs pa dang rgyun mi chad par rtag tu gre ba 'dzer zhing sgra mi gsal ba ngar ngar po 'byung ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:91a-32: mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa ni 'dus pa'i rims zhes bshad pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-0: de nyid la ni ming @91b gi rnam grangs su mngon par rmugs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-1: mdangs 'phrog par byed pa zhes bshad cing btags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-2: nad kyis bkag cing me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-3: mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-4: gsor mi rung ste de las gzhan //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-5: gso dka' 'am dbang po ma tshang 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-7: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi skyon gyis 'byung ba'i rgyun bkag cing me drod nyams par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-8: de bzhin du ji skad smos pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par gyur na gsor mi rung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-9: gso bar mi nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-10: de las gzhan pa 'dus pa'i rims de nad kyi tshabs chung zhing mtshan nyid ma rdzogs na /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-12: dbang po ma tshang ba ste lus ngag gi las kyi rten nyams par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-13: gzhan yang 'dus pa las byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-14: gang du mkhris pa logs shig gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-15: pags pa'am nang grol tsha ba dag /'debs pa'am tsha ba snga phyis 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-17: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims snga ma las mtshan nyid gzhan du 'byung bar gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-18: 'dus pa'i rims gang las mkhris pa logs shig na gnas shing /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-19: lan 'ga' ni pags par gnas pa 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-20: lan 'ga' ni nang grol na gnas nas tsha ba skyed par byed pa sngar byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:91b-21: phyis 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can ni gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-22: de bzhin bad kan rlung grang ba //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-24: yang de bzhin du rlung dang bad kan logs shig tu tha dad par gnas shing snga phyir grang bar byed pa ni gso dka' ba ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-25: de gnyis tsha snga gso dka' yin //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-27: 'dus pa'i nad de gnyis las tsha ba snga ba'i nad ni gso dka' zhing bcos par dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-28: grang snga der ni mkhris pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-29: bad kan gsher ba skam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-30: grang ba zhi byas kha skyur brgyal //
T13TD4312.2E:91b-31: myos dang skom dad skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-0: grang ba sngar byung ba'i 'dus pa'i rims der ni mkhris @92a * //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-1: pa'i tsha bas bad kan gyi gsher bag skam par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92a-2: skyur ba la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba bzhir 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:92a-3: de bzhin du grang ba zhi bas kyang bzhi po de dag nyid skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-4: tsha ba snga ma de rjes la //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-5: rmugs slon mchil mang khong snyom 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-7: dang po tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'dus pa'i rims la tsha ba de'i rjes la rmugs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-8: glo bur drag shul las byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-9: mngon zin byad byas dmod byung bzhi //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-11: rims brgyad po glo bur ba zhes bya ba la ni drag shul las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92a-14: dmod pa las byung ba'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-15: de la smas bcad mes tshig sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-16: ngal ba drag shul las byung yin //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-18: glo bur ba'i rims kyis drag shul las byung ba zhes bya ba 'dir mtsho na gyis smas shing bcad pa la sogs pa las rims 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92a-19: de bzhin du ngal zhing lam gyis dub pa las byung ba'i lus nyon mongs pa las drag shul las byung ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-20: der ni phal cher rlung nad kyis //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-21: khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-22: na bcas mdog nyams skrang dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-23: zug gzer bcas pa'i rims skyed 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-25: drag shul las byung ba'i rims der phal cher ram mang du rlung gi nad kyi dbang gis khrag la gnod par byas shing rnam par 'khrugs par 'gyur ba las na ba sogs pa dang bcas pa'i rims skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-26: gdon zhugs sman gyi dri dang dug / khros 'jigs mya ngan gdon las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-27: mngon par zin las byung rims yin //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-29: gdon zhugs pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i rims ni mngon par zin pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:92a-30: gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rims yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:92a-31: gdon ni lha la sogs pa'i 'og nas bshad pa rnams so //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-0: 'dir gdon rgyu med @92b dgod cing du //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-2: rims kyi gnas skabs 'dir lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i gdon gyis ni rgyu med par glo bur du ched 'ga' ni dgod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92b-4: sman gyi dri skyes brgyal ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-5: sbrid pa klad nad skrangs par 'gyur ;
T13TD4312.2E:92b-7: sman gyi dri las skyes pa'i glo bur ba'i rims ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-8: dug las brgyal dang tshad par 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-9: mdog nag lus tsha snying nad 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-11: 'dir dug las byung ba'i rims ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-14: shin tu khros pa las ni lus 'dar zhing g-yo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92b-15: de bzhin du klad nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-18: mya ngan 'jigs pa las byung ba'i rims ni bla zhing bab col mang du smra bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-20: ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-22: 'dod pas gdungs pa las skyes pa'i rims mgo 'khor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92b-24: lus dang snying ga tsha bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92b-25: de bzhin du do tsha shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:92b-28: brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba de dag nyams shing zad par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-29: gdon la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rims //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-30: 'jig tshogs gsum ni rlung gi rims //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-31: khros pas mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-33: gdon dang sman dang dug las byung ba'i rims gsum gyis ni nyes pa gsum 'dus pa'i rims su 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-34: 'jigs pa dang mya ngan dang 'dod pa gsum las byung ba'i rims kyis ni rlung 'khrugs pa'i rims su 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-35: khros pa las byung ba'i rims kyis ni mkhris pa ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-36: dmod pa byad byas las byung gang //
T13TD4312.2E:92b-37: 'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzad pa //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-3: dmod pa dang byad byas pa las byung ba'i rims gang yin pa 'dus pa'i rims mi bzod cing rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-4: shin tu bzod par dka' zhing brnag mi nus par 'gyur ro zhes sman dpyad kyi gzhung rtsom pa'i dang srong rnams kyis bshad pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-5: bdag gi slob dpon la sogs kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-7: de la byad byas sngags kyis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-8: sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du byas //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-10: de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-11: tsha bcas brgyal bas zin gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-12: rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-14: 'di dag gi nang nas byad byas pa'i sngags ni srid srung gi rig byed la sogs pa las bshad pa'i bram ze'i ngan sngags la sogs so //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-15: sbyin sreg byas shing sregs shig sregs shig ces smra bzhin du me la bsreg rdzas 'dzud pa na /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-16: gang la byas pa de thog ma kho nar de'i sems la 'bab cing tsha ba nyams su myong bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-17: de'i 'og tu ni lus tsha bar byed cing tsha ba'i rims kyis 'debs la /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-19: mgo 'khor ba la sogs pas zin zhing rims de ni nyin gcig bzhin du 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-20: de ltar rims ni brgyad du bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-22: de ltar rnam pa de dag gis nad gzhi dang glo bur ba las byung ba'i dbye bas rims ni grangs brgyad yod par tshe'i rig byed la mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad cing bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-23: de dag mdor na rnam gnyis te //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-24: lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-25: grang dang tsha dang phyi nang gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-26: rang bzhin dang ni gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-27: gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-28: smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:93a-30: yang rims 'di ni rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-31: lus kyi rims dang sems kyi rims zhes bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-32: grang ba dang tsha ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-33: phyi rol na gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-34: nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93a-35: rang bzhin dang gzhan du gyur pa zhes bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-0: gsor rung @93b ba dang gsor mi rung ba zhes bya ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-1: smin pa dang ma smin pa zhes bya ba gnyis so //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-2: lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-3: sems kyi dang por snying tsha 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-5: lus kyi rims ni thog mar te /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-6: dang por lus tsha bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-7: de'i 'og tu ni snying tsha bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-8: sems kyi rims kyis ni dang por snying tsha bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-9: de'i 'og tu ni lus tsha bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-10: rlung dang bad kan cig car ni //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-12: mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-15: rlung ni zung du 'jug pa yin pas bad kan dang lhan cig tu gnas shing cig car 'byung ba'i dus na ni grang ba'i rims su 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-16: de bzhin du mkhris pa dang rlung du 'jug cing mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na ni tsha ba'i rims su 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-17: 'dres pa ste bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyi ga dang rlung 'dres pa'i tshe na ni rlung de zung du 'jug pa yin la ched 'ga' tsha bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-20: rims nad dkyel ni bskyed 'gyur nas //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-21: nang na na zhing bshang gci sri //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-23: nang na gnas pa'i rims ni nang du chud cing brten pa yin pas nad kyi dkyel bskyed cing 'phel bar 'gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-24: nang de nyid na mi bzad par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-25: bshang ba la sogs pa'i dri ma sri bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-26: phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-27: phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-29: phyi rol gyi rims ni tsha ba'i dngos po yang phyi rol na gnas pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-30: nang na gnas pa ma yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:93b-31: de nyid ni gso bar sla zhing bcos par sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-32: tshig 'dis ni nang na gnas pa'i rims ni don gyi shugs kyis gso dga' ba yin no zhes ston to ;
T13TD4312.2E:93b-33: / dbyar dang ston dang dpyid dus su //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-34: rlung sogs rim 'byung rang bzhin rims //
T13TD4312.2E:93b-36: dbyar la sogs pa'i dus gsum du rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rlung la sogs pa rim bzhin du 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyi rims zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-1: ni rlung gi rims yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-4: gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-5: phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-6: yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-8: de ltar bshad pa las rnam pa gzhan pa de ni 'gyur ba'i rims zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-9: de yang dngos su na dus tshigs rnams su rim bzhin du ma byung ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-10: dper na dbyar gyi tshe mkhris pa dang bad kan las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-11: ston gyi tshe rlung dang bad kan las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-12: dpyid kyi dus su rlung dang mkhris pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-13: de bzhin du dus tshigs thams cad du yang rlung las gyur pa'i zhes bya ba rang bzhin las gzhan du gyur pa'i rims de dag ni gso bar dka' ba yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-14: de las phal cher rlung las gyur pa'i rims ni rang bzhin gyi rims yin yang gso dka' ba yin na ;
T13TD4312.2E:94a-15: de las gzhan du gyur pa'i rims lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-16: phal cher zhes pa ni ma lus par de ltar ma yin pa'i don te /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-17: la lar ni bsod nams kyi dbang gis rlung las gyur pa yin yang gso sla ba ni yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-18: dbyar dus rlung nad ldang gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-19: mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-21: gang gi tshe dbyar gyi dus su rlung nad ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur nas rims skyed par byed pa de'i tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-22: mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pa'i rims su 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-23: de dang mi ldan pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-24: de'i tshe rims de rlung las gyur pa yin du zin kyang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pas mngon par ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-25: ston ka mkhris pas nad slong ste //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-26: bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-27: der ni smyung ba byas gyur kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-28: gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:94a-30: ston ka'i dus su mkhris pa 'khrugs nas rims skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-31: rims skyed par rtsom pa'i mkhris pa de'i stobs sam grogs skyed pa ni bad kan yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:94a-32: des grogs byas nas skye bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-0: rims ni ma zhu ba'i gnas la @94b brten nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-1: des gnas skabs der ni bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyis ni smyung bar byas pas gso bar bya zhing bcos dgos pa yin pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-2: gnas skabs 'dir smyung ba byas pa las gnod cing nad du 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa yod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-3: bad kan dpyid ldang de yang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-4: de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-6: dpyid kyi dus su ni bad kan 'khrugs shing ldang nas rims skyed par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-7: bad kan yang de'i rjes la rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis grogs byed cing stobs skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-8: nyams stobs che zhing nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-9: bla brnan med rims gso bar sla //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-11: skyes bu lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa nyams stobs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-12: de bzhin du nad tshabs kyi dkyel chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-13: lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i bla brnan med pa'i rims nad gang yin pa de ni myur du bde bar bya bar nus pas na gso sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-14: rnam kun 'gyur ba zhes bya bar //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-15: gsor mi rung bar sngar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-17: yong ye rnam pa thams cad du lus kyi 'gyur ba shes par bya ba'i lus kyi gnas su gsor mi rung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rims sngar bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-18: rims ni tshabs che zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig sngar bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-19: rims kyi nad tshabs che zhing tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-20: khong rmya nyam chung gcin mang dang //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-21: bshang sri kha zas mi 'ju la //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-22: bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-24: rims ma smin pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dag yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-25: rims kyi nad tshabs gnad dang tshigs la sogs pa na ba'i tshabs che zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-26: de bzhin du khong shin tu rmya zhing nyam chung ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-27: stobs dang srog par bcas pa gcin mang du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-28: bshang gci sri zhing mi 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-29: kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-30: bkres pa med cing zas mi 'dod pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:94b-31: 'di dag ni rims ma smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:94b-32: rims shugs stobs che skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-2: bshang gci bder 'byung nad bskyod pa //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-3: smin par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-5: rims smin pa'i nye ba'i mtshan ma ni rims kyi shugs drag cing stobs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-6: de nyid kyis na skom dad che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-8: bshang gci bde bar 'byung zhing mi sri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-9: nad bskyod cing bslongs pa ltar snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-10: ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-11: zhag bdun smyung byas las smin bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-13: rims smin cing nad med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rims nad tshabs che ba la sogs pa go bzlog pa las shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-14: rims nad kyi tshabs chung ba bri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-15: khong rmya zhing nyam chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-17: bshang ba bde bar 'byung ba la sogs pa de ni rims ma zhu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin la ;
T13TD4312.2E:95a-18: de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du smyung ba byas pa las rims de smin te smin zhing 'ju ba nyid du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-19: de yang drang srong tsa ra kas /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-20: lus zungs kun gnas nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-21: zhag bdun gyis ni smin par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-22: rims nad phal cher nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-23: smyung byas smin pa yin zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-25: rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-26: stobs chung che las rnam lngar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-27: phal cher 'dus par gyur pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-28: rims su mang du 'gyur bar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-29: rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-30: nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-32: rims nad kyi grangs ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rgyun la sogs pa'i rnam pa lnga yod do zhes drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:95a-33: de gang las ji ltar zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-34: dus dang yul dang stobs che chung las gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-35: rlung la sogs pa'i rims nad stobs che ba dang stobs chung ba'i dbang dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-36: yang de bzhin du rims nad 'byung ba'i nad gzhi 'khrugs pa'i dus dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-37: yul stobs chung ba dang stobs che ba'i dbang gis sam /
T13TD4312.2E:95a-38: yang na nad rnams kyi dus yin pas na nad kyi dus te /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-0: nyin @95b mo dang mtshan mo dang dus tshigs dang zas zos pa'i cha de'i stobs che chung las nad zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-2: de yang rnam lngar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-3: de las kyang 'dus pa'i rims ni phal cher ram /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-4: mang du nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las phal cher 'dus pa'i rims su 'gyur bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-5: phal cher zhes smos pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba yod pa'i don te /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-7: rlung las phal cher rtag par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-8: mkhris las phal cher nyin gsum pa //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-9: phal cher bad kan las nyin gcig /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-10: 'dus pa las ni bzhi pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-12: rgyun dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga po'i ming bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-13: lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-14: bu ga nad kyis khyab byas pas //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-15: lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-16: gnod bya sogs dang mnyam par 'phel //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-17: stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-18: khyad par du ni dangs mar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-19: gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-20: rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-22: rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pas na shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur zhing skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-23: de yang lus zungs la sogs par rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa'i bu ga rnams nang kyis khyab par byas shing kun tu phyin par byas la /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-24: der nad de lus ma lus pa kun du rims kyi tsha bas tsha bar 'gyur zhing tsha ba'i gdung bas gzir bar byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-25: de bzhin du gnod par bya ba dangs ma dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-28: rang bzhin de dang cha mnyam par 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-29: gnod bya ni lus zungs bdun dang dri ma rnams so //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-30: dus tshigs ni dbyar ka la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-31: yul ni rlan la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:95b-33: de yang stobs che ba ste nus pa dang ldan pa dus yun rid po la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-34: de bzhin du lci zhing brnag dka' la /
T13TD4312.2E:95b-35: lus kyis mi thegs pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-1: rnams rengs shing bskyod mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-2: khyad par du yang lhag par dangs ma zhes bya ba'i lus zungs la gnas pa'i gnyen pos bcos par dka' zhing gso ba'i thabs cis kyang bzlog tu med pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-3: gnod bya la sogs pa dang cha mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-4: yang de bzhin du bzod par rab tu dka' ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-5: sdug bsngal zhing brnag par mi nus pa'i rims la ni rgyun gyi rims zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-6: de lta bur 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-7: de yi drod kyis dri ma dang //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-8: lus zungs myur du zad par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-9: de 'og rnam kun lus zungs sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-10: dag pa'am ma dag rims kyis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-11: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhag / bdun nam bcu'am bcu gnyis gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-12: phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-15: rims de'i drod kyi tsha bas dri ma ste bshang ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-16: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa'i rgyus rims des dri ma rnams zad par byed pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-17: lus zungs rnams kyang zad par byas nas de'i 'og tu rnam pa kun du ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-18: thams cad kyi thams cad du lus zungs bshang ba dang gci ba dang bcas pa dag ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-19: rims kyi tsha bas dri ma med par byas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-20: yang na yan lag 'ga' lus zungs la sogs pa ma dag cing ljan ljin dang bcas pa'i rims kyis grangs ji lta ba bzhin du rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi las zhag bdun nam bcu'am bcu gnyis kyi bar du phal cher gnas pa'i mtshams sam /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-21: dus kyi nges pa las ni mi 'da' bar rjes su gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-23: dus de tsam gyi nang du 'chi ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:96a-26: nyin zhag 'di tsam gyis gtong ba'am gsod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-27: de yang gang rlung shas che ba las byung ba de ni phal cher zhag bdun gyis gtong ba'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:96a-28: de bzhin du mkhris pa shas che ba las byung ba ni zhag bcus so //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-0: @96b bad kan shas che ba las byung ba ni bcu gnyis kyis bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba ni rims kyis sbyar ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-1: de skad me bzhin 'jug gis bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-3: de lta bu de ni sman dpyad kyi gzhung rtsom par byed pa drang srong me bzhin 'jug ces bya bas bshad pa'i gzhung yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-4: ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-5: bdun pa nyis bldab gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-6: de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig bldab //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-7: 'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyi tshig /'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-9: drang srong ljang sngon zhes bya bas bshad pa'i gzhung ni 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul 'dir ston pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-10: bdun pa ni nyis bldab tu brtsi ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-11: rlung gi rims kyis zhag bcu bzhi na dangs ma la sogs pa dang ma dag pa gang yin pa yang rung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-12: rnam pa thams cad du zhag bcu bzhis 'tsho ba'am 'chi bar 'gyur ba bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-13: gnyis pa ni zhag dgu pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-14: de yang nyis bldab tu brtsis la zhag bcva brgyad du bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-15: mkhris pa shas che ba'i rims ni zhag bcva brgyad kyis 'tsho ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-16: 'chi ba'i bye brag phyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-17: de bzhin du gsum pa ni zhag bcu gcig pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-18: 'di nyis bldab tu byas pas zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis bad kan gyi shas che ba'i rims kyi bye brag phyed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-19: 'di dag ni nad gzhi gsum las byung ba'i rims kyi dus tshigs kyi bye brag rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-20: rims dus dag dang ma dag las //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-21: yun ring dus su gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:96b-23: de la dag pa'i nad dang bshang ba dang gci ba legs par smin pa rtse zhil zhing ma smin pa'i skyon med pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-24: de las go bzlog pa ni ma smin pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-25: dag pa dang ma dag pa de gnyis cha 'dres pa las ni dus yun ring mo zhig tu gnas shing sngar bshad pa'i dus las yun ring du gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-26: gang gi tshe lus zungs kyi dangs ma la la ni dag cing smin /
T13TD4312.2E:96b-27: la la ni ma dag cing ma smin par 'gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-0: de'i tshe rgyun gyi rims 'byang zhing 'dor @97a * //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-2: yun ring du gnas pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-3: nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-4: kha zas mi 'phrod sogs bsten pas //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-5: nad dkyel chung yang gnod bya sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-6: brten te stobs che nyid gyur las //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-8: mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-10: nad kyi rtse zhil zhing nad las thar ba'i skyes bu nyam chung zhing lus rid par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-11: kha zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa bsten pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-12: zas dang skom dang sman dang spyod lam mi mthun zhing mi 'phrod pa bsten pa'i rgyus rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung ba dkyel chung zhing stobs shin tu zhan pa yin yang mi bzad pa'i rims rgyun gyi rims la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-13: de yang tsha ba mi bzod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'debs pa na mi bzad pa'i rims zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-14: de yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-15: gnod bya la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la brten zhing gnas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-16: lan 'ga' ni gnod bya la sogs pas khrag la sogs pa gang yang rung ba brten la /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-17: lan 'ga' ni nyin mtshan la sogs pa'i dus la brten la /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-18: lan 'ga' ni rlung la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la brten te /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-19: de ni tshabs chen por 'gyur ba'i stobs dang /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-21: de yang gnyen po dang bcas pa yin zhing bcos pa'i thabs yod pa ma yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-22: yang de ni 'phel ba dang 'bri ba gnyis po la brten zhing gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-23: de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-24: rang gi dus su rims stobs skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-26: nyam chung ba la sogs pa de rnams kyi rang gi dus nyin mtshan dang /
T13TD4312.2E:97a-27: dus kyi cha ni mtshan nyid can du rims kyi stobs skyed cing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-28: slar yang de dag bcos thabs ni //
T13TD4312.2E:97a-29: stobs che chung las ldog par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-0: mi bzad pa'i rims kyi rtsom pa de slar ldog cing rang gi bya ba 'gag par 'gyur ba ni bcos thabs kyi @97b stobs che chung las ldog par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-1: bcos thabs ni gnyen po ste lus zungs dang dus la sogs pa cha mi mnyam pa ni gnyen po'am /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-2: bcos thabs kyi stobs yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-3: de stobs chung bar byas pa ni nus pa zad par byas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-5: nad zad rims ni phrar gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-6: bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-8: nad zad pa ni nad kyi nus pa ni bri bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-9: rims ni phra zhing shes par dka' bar gnas pa ni dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs nyid la thim zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-10: thim pas lus rid sha mdog nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-11: rmongs bag la sogs de yis skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-13: rims de lus zungs la thim pas ni lus rid pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid skyed cing 'byung bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-14: nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-15: dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo nas //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-16: lus kun myur du khyab pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-17: nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-18: des na rgyun du rtag rims 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-20: rtsa sgo bar gang nye bar gnas shing kha bye bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-21: dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa'i sgo rnams las rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung bas lus kun khyab cing phyin par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-22: nad des lus thams cad khyab pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-23: rgyu des rims de rtag cing rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-24: de yang tsha ba la sogs pa'i rgyun ma chad par rgyun du 'byung bas na /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-25: rgyun gyi rims 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-26: de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-27: mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-28: bya ba'i dus min mnyam yun ring //
T13TD4312.2E:97b-30: de las bzlog pa ni snga ma rgyun gyi rims de las bzlog pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-31: tsha ba'i rgyun bar bar du chad pa la sogs pa'i tshul mi 'dra ba bzhi las rtag pa'i rims su gzhag ste /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-32: tshul mi mthun pa ni ring zhing shin tu ring ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-33: kha bye zhing shin tu bye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:97b-34: dangs mas bcud rtsa'i sbubs su nad kyis lus ma lus pa la myur du khyab par mi byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-0: tshul de dag gi rgyun de dag @98a * //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-1: gis rtag pa la sogs pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-2: de yang rtag pa la sogs pa'i rims de dag ni cha mi snyoms pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-3: rgyu gang gis mi snyoms pa yin zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-4: rtsom pa mi snyoms pa'i phyir te /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-5: dus kyi 'gyur ba mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-6: rtsom pa mi mnyam pa de yang mkhris pa dang rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-7: bya ba mi mnyam pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-8: sha dang tshil gyi nus pa dro //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-10: dus mi mnyam pa ni rims kyis 'debs pa'i nyin zhag ste /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-11: de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-12: gzhan dag nyin re lan re yin //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de yang lan 'ga' ni nyin mo lnga dang /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-16: lan 'ga' ni dgongs ka ldang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-17: de bzhin du ni yun ring du 'brel pa can yang yin pas na yun ring ste /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-18: dus yun ring zhig tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-19: phal cher nad ni khrag la brten //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-20: rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-21: de yang nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-23: phal cher zhes bya ba mang du rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung ba khrag la brten cing gnas nas rtag pa'i rims skyed cing 'byung bar byed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-24: de yang nyin mtshan gcig gi nang du lan gnyis ldang bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-25: 'dir nyin par lan gnyis ldang la mtshan mo lan cig ldang ngo zhes bya ba'i nges pa yod pa ma yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-26: gzhan du lan 'ga' ni nyin gcig la lan gnyis ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-27: lan 'ga' ni nyin mtshan gnyis la re re ldang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-28: nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-29: de ni sha yi rtsa la brten //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-31: rims nyin gcig pa ni nyin zhag gcig gi nang du lan re re zhig ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:98a-32: nyin gcig pa'i rims de ni sha'i bcud kyi dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa la brten cing gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:98a-33: gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-0: rims @98b nyin gsum pa'i nad ni tshil gyi rtsa'i nad la gnas pas rims nyin gsum pa skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-1: mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-2: bad kan mkhris gyur sum mdo na //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-3: rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-4: de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-6: rims nyin gsum pa las gyur pa yin du zin kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:98b-7: mkhris pa dang rlung gnyis shas che ba ni spyi bo ste mgo nas 'dzin pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:98b-8: bad kan dang mkhris pa shas che na ni sum mdo zhes bya ba dpung pa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:98b-9: gnya' ba 'dus pa'i mtshams sun zhing de nas zug par 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.2E:98b-10: / rlung dang bad kan shas che na ni rgyab nas na zhing de nas 'dzin pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-11: yang rims nyin gsum pa de ni zhag gcig gis chod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-12: nyin bzhi pa'i rims nas tshil dang //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-13: rkang dang nus pa'i nang na gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-14: gzhan dag tshil nyid la gnas zer //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-15: de yi nus pa bstan pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-16: bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-17: rlung gis klad pa na bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-18: rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-19: nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-20: nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-21: nyin gcig na bar mi byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-23: rims nyin bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad rkang dang rus pa gang yang rung ba'i gnas su 'dug cing brten nas nad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:98b-24: lan 'ga' ni rkang la gnas nas nad skyed do //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-25: lan 'ga' ni rus pa la gnas nas nad skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-26: yang sman pa gzhan dag ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyi gnas kyang nyin gsum pa dang 'dra bar tshil nyid la gnas nas ldang ngo zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-27: rims nyin bzhi pa de'i nus mthu ni rnam pa gnyis yod par bstan te /
T13TD4312.2E:98b-28: gang gi tshe bad kan gyi shas che ba de'i tshe na dang po byin pa gnyis nas zug cing na bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:98b-29: de rlung gi shas che ba yin na ni dang por klad pa na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-30: de yang res 'ga' ni rus pa la gnas la /
T13TD4312.2E:98b-31: res 'ga' ni rkang la zhen cing gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:98b-32: res 'ga' ni rus pa dang rkang gnyis ka la zhugs te //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-1: gnyi gar zhugs pa de'i mtshan nyid ni nyin bzhi pa gcig la go bzlog pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-2: de yang nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa nas de'i 'og tu nyin gcig na bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-3: de ltar nyin gcig na ba med nas yang nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-4: 'dis ni mtshan nyid gcig bstan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-5: de las go bzlog pa'i rnam pa gzhan pa ni nyin gcig rims nad de thu nas nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du cung zad bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-6: nyi ma gsum pa la yang thu bar byed pa'i rims kyis na ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-8: nad rnams kyi ni stobs che chung //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-9: zas dang spyod pa las 'byung zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-10: de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-11: yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-13: yang dus de'i tshe rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyi stobs sam mthu che chung las 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-14: zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa las rims nad du 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-15: de bzhin du yid kyi stobs che chung dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-16: las sngon chad spyod pa'i stobs che chung las rims rnams skye bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-17: de yang lan 'ga' ni rtag pa'i rims su 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-18: lan 'ga' ni nyin gcig pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-21: de las go bzlog pa dag tu yang 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-22: ched 'ga' ni nyin bzhi par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:99a-23: nyin gsum pa dang nyin gcig pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-24: nad kyis lus zungs dkrugs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-25: nad sos nyi tshe zhu bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-26: de tshe nad pa dbugs drag rngul //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-27: mkhun zhing slon byed 'gre ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-28: lus 'dar tshig mang tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-29: lus grang bzhin mdog nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-30: dran stor rims kyi shugs kyis gzer //
