T13TD4312.2E:99a-31: khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-32: bshang ba nad dang sgrar bcas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:99a-33: sla ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-0: sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung bas dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs dkrugs shing glogs par gyur pa'i rims de nad @99b sos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-1: nye ba'i tshe na lus zungs de nyid la thim zhing zhu bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-2: de nas nad de zhu ba'i dbang gis de'i tshe nad pa de la dbugs kyi rngam pa cung zad drag tu 'byung zhing rngul te ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas chu 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-3: de bzhin du mkhun zhing sgra mi gsal bar 'don zhing slon pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-4: bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa skyugs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-5: de bzhin du mal lam sa'i steng du 'gre zhing lus 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-7: tshig mar por smra ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-8: dgos pa yod pa de dgos pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-9: lus tsha ba dang grang ba'i rnam pa dus gcig tu smra bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-10: mdog nyams shing gzi mdangs med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-11: dran pa stor zhing 'du shes mi gsal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-12: de bzhin du rims kyi shugs kyis gzir zhing rims nad kyi shugs lhag par skye ba ltar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-13: khros shing 'khrugs pa lta bu'i tshul du sdang mig gis lta bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-14: de bzhin du bshang ba yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad dang rlung gi sgra dang bcas pa sla bag tu shugs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-15: lus kyi yang zhing rmya dang rmongs bag tsha ba med //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-16: kha na thor bu 'byung dang dbang po brtas shing bde //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-17: yid ni sor gnas rngul sbrid bder 'byung yi ga 'byed //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-18: mgo bo g-ya' ba rims nad byang ba'i mtshan ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-20: mtshan ma de dag gi rjes la rims nad byang ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni lus yang bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-21: khong lci ba'i bag med pa dang lus rmya ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-22: rmongs bag dang tsha ba med pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-23: rmya zhing nyam chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-24: rmongs bag gis 'du shes stor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-25: tsha zhing rno bar gyur pa'i rnam pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:99b-26: de bzhin du kha'i nang du thor bu smin pa phra mo 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-27: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams brtas shing rang gi las kyi bya ba bde blag tu byed par nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-28: lus bde zhing nad kyi tshor ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:99b-29: yid so la gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-0: sems kyi rang bzhin sngon chad snying @100a * //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-1: stobs can la sogs pa gang gi shas che ba de de bzhin du ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-2: de bzhin du rngul dang sbrid pa bde blag tu thon zhing 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-3: de bzhin du bkres shing zas la 'dod pa skye ba'i yi ga 'byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-4: mgo bo g-ya' zhing phrugs 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-5: 'di dag ni rims byang ba'i rtags sam mtshan ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-6: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-7: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las ;
T13TD4312.2E:100a-8: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-10: // / de nas khrag dang mkhris pa dang lud pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-12: rims kyi tsha ba las khrag mkhris skye bar 'gyur bar bshad pas /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-13: de'i phyir de myur du gsod pa yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-14: rims kyi nad gzhi'i le'u'i 'og tu khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad gzhi brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-15: lud pa yang khrag dang mkhris pa dang 'dra bar gnod pa myur du skyed pa yin pas de yang le'u 'dir bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-16: rab dro rab rno tsha dang skyur //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-17: lan tshva la sogs tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-18: khre rgod autpa la yi zas //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-19: de bcas shin tu bsten drags dang //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-20: mkhris pa can gyi mkhris nad ni //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-21: gsher dang khrag rgyas nad du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-22: de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur pas //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-23: lus kun khyab par byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:100a-25: zas dang spyod lam shin tu dro zhing tsha ba'i shas che ba dang rab tu rno zhing drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-26: skyur ba'i ro shas cher bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-27: lan tshva'i ro la sogs pa ro rno ba shas cher bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-28: tsha bag la gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-29: de bzhin du khre rgod la sogs pa'i zas bsten par drags shing shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-30: yang de bzhin du tsha zhing rno ba la sogs pa mkhris pa skyed pa'i kha zas skom tshad las lhag par bsten zhing zos pas mkhris pa'i nad gsher ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100a-31: khrag gi nad rgyas shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-0: khrag dang mkhris pa @100b de gnyis phan tshun gcig la gcig 'dres shing gcig pur gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-1: khrag gi mdog can nyid du gyur nas lus mgo nas rkang gi bar du ma lus par kun khyab cing byer bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-2: mkhris pa khrag las gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-3: 'dres dang gnod bya las dang gcig / mdog dang dri ni rjes mthun pas //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-4: khrag gi ming du bstan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-6: mkhris pa gang yin pa ste khrag gi ming du bstan te /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-7: khrag dang mkhris pa gso ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-8: khrag ni thur song zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa tshul gyis de'i ming du 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-9: gang gi phyir mkhris pa ni khrag las gyur pa yin zhing khrag las skyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-11: bad mkhris dri ma bu ga ru //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-12: rngul dang sen mo ba spu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-13: snum dang mig dang pags pa tshil //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-14: rim bzhin lus zungs dri ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-15: zhes smos pa yin pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-16: de'i phyir khrag gi snyigs ma ni mkhris pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-18: gcig la gcig cha 'dres pa'i gnad dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-19: de bzhin du gnod bya las kyang 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-20: gang gi phyir khrag ni mkhris pa nyid kyis myur du gnod par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-21: de bzhin du khrag gis mkhris pa la gnod par 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-22: de la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-24: 'phel dang zad par bya ba'i sman //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-25: gcig gi gang yin pa de gzhan yin //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-27: mdog dang dri yang de gnyis rjes su mthun pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-28: mkhris pa de ni kha dog dang dri yang khrag dang rjes su mthun pas de'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-29: mkhris pa yang dri dang kha dog khrag dang mtshungs pas khrag gi ming du bstan zhing bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-30: de ni khrag gnas mchin pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:100b-33: khrag dang mkhris pa de gnyis ni khrag gi gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-34: khrag dang mkhris pa rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:100b-35: de bzhin du mchin pa dang mcher pa yang khrag gi gnas yin pas de gnyis las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-0: mgo bo lci zhing yi ga @101a * //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-2: / bsil 'dod sgregs pa dud can skyur //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-3: skyug cing skyugs mdog btsog par snang //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-4: lud pa dbugs mi bde mgo 'khor //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-5: khong snyom khrag dmar nya dri bro //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-6: kha dri mi zhim skad 'gags la //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-7: mig la sogs pa'i kha dog ni //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-8: dmar dang ljang dang ser por snang //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-9: rmi lam du yang kha dog de //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-12: khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad 'di phyis 'byung bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-13: nad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul mgo bo lci ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-14: mgo bo lci ba ni dang po mgo bo mi thegs pa snyam sems pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-15: sgregs pa du ba can ni sgregs pa du ba ltar dku ba 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-16: skyur ba ni sgregs pa'i ro skyur bag tu 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-18: skyugs pa'i mdog btsog pa ni kha dog mi sdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-20: ro mi zhim par snang ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-21: gzhan ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-22: khrag de nya dmar po ro hi ta zhes bya ba'i dri ltar shin tu dri mnam pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-23: khrag nyid kyi mdog dmar la dri nga bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-24: kha'i dri mi zhim zhing mnam pa sngar byung ba'i tshul las de shes par bya'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:101a-25: / de bzhin du skad 'gags shing subs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-26: de bzhin du mig dang pags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-30: gcin la sogs pa kha dog dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-31: dud pa ltar ljang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-32: ser por snang ba las shes par bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-33: yang de bzhin du rmi lam gyi nang du yang kha dog dmar po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-35: ser por mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-36: stod du sna mig rna ba kha //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-37: smad du bshang sgo pho mo'i mtshan //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-38: ba spu'i bu ga kun las kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:101a-41: khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad de stod du sna dang mig dang rna ba dang kha'i sgo bdun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-42: smad du bshang sgo dang pho mtshan dang mo mtshan te bu ga gsum las 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:101a-43: de bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa kun las kyang 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-0: rdul 'byung @101b ba'i rtsa sgo thams cad las kyang 'byung ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-1: khrag rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sgo ni de dag yin no /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-2: stod kyi bad kan yin gso sla //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-3: de ni bkru sman btang bas gso //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-4: sman mang yod cing mkhris pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-5: sman gyi mchog ni bkru sman yin //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-6: zla la yod pa'i bad kan yang //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-7: der ni de yis sbyangs byas 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-8: de la sman ni mngar dang bska //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-9: bad kan dag la phan ba la //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-10: gang gtogs dang gis bad kan sel //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-11: kha dang bska ba smos ci dgos //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-13: stod kyi char byung ba'i bad kan dang mkhris pa gang yin pa de ni bad kan rgyas pa las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-14: gso sla zhing bcos par sla ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-15: de yang bkru sman btang bas lam bsgyur te gso dgos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-16: de bzhin du sman yang mang du yod pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-17: sman ro mngar ba dang kha ba dang bska ba rnams phan pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-18: yang stod du byung ba'i khrag mkhris la mkhris pa'i nad la phan pa'i sman bya ba ni sman gyi mchog yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-19: stod du byung ba'i khrag dang mkhris pa'i zla la bad kan yod ba de bkru sman byas pas gang yin pa de sbyang zhing dag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-20: bad kan sbyangs shing dag pa'i skyes bu de la sman mngar ba rnams kyi khu ba la sogs pa rnams kyang bad kan la phan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-21: don du bad kan gnod pa'i mngar ram /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-22: bad kan la phan par gyur na bad kan 'ba' zhig yod pa de la rang bzhin gyis bad kan sel bar byed pa'i sman kha ba dang bska ba dag byin na phan par 'gyur zhing bsngags pa yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T13TD4312.2E:101b-23: thur du 'byung ba'i rlung yin phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-24: de ni skyug sman btang bas gso //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-25: mkhris pa'i sman ni nyung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-26: sgyug sman mkhris pa'i sman mchog yin //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-27: zla la yod pa'i rlung nad kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-28: de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-29: de la ro ni mngar bskol ba //
T13TD4312.2E:101b-32: thur du 'byung zhing ro smad kyi lam nas 'bab pa'i khrag dang mkhris pa ni rlung nad shas che ba las byung ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-0: de gso ba tsam du byas pa las gtan bsal @102a */
T13TD4312.2E:102a-2: de yang skyug sman btang bas gso zhing slon du 'byung ba ni de'i gso ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-3: khrag dang mkhris pa de ni sman shin tu nyung ba yin zhing mngar ba 'ba' zhig gis gso dgos pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-4: lam bsgyur ba'i skyug sman gtang ba de ni mkhris pa'i sman gyi mchog kyang ma yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-5: zla la yod pa'i rlung nad gzhan dbang du byed pa de yang skyug sman gyis zhi bar mi 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-6: 'og tu 'bab ba'i khrag dang mkhris pa de la ni sman ro mngar ba kho na bskol ba la sogs pa phan pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-7: kha ba'i sman khu ba la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-8: de rnams kyis rlung skyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-9: bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-10: gnyi gar 'byung ba gso dka' ste //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-11: bzlog pa'i thabs ni med phyir dang //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-12: sman yang yod pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-14: khrag dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dres pa'i nad las byung bar gyur nas lus kyi stod dang lus kyi smad gnyis ka las 'byung ba de ni shin tu bcos par dka' ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-16: bzlog par mi nus pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-17: de'i phyir nad kyi lam bzlog cing bsgyur nas bcos pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir dang /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-18: de bzhin du de lta bu'i nad dang 'tsham zhing gnyi ga las mi 'byung ba'i sman yod pa ma yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-19: gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-20: 'di las bzlog par bya ba'i thabs //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-21: sbyang ba'ang yod pa ma yin te //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-22: sbyangs pas bzlog par bya ba dag / sman pas khrag mkhris gso ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:102a-24: gang gi phyir khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad rgyas te byung ba 'di la smyung ba bya ba sman dpyad kyi thabs yin na /
T13TD4312.2E:102a-25: sbyang ba de ni gang zhig btang na gnyi gnas 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris bad kan dang rlung 'dres par gyur ba de dus gcig tu 'am gzhan du khrid cing sel bar byed pa de lta bu'i bzlog par bya ba'i thabs su gyur pa'i sbyang ba gang yang yod pa ma yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-0: khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad la ni sbyangs bas mi mthun par bzlog cing lam bsgyur ba nyid @102b kyis sman pas bcos dgos na /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-1: lam gnyis nas 'byung ba 'di ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-2: gang gi phyir thur du 'bab pa las ltos te /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-3: skyug sman btang na ni stod du 'byung ba bzlog par mi 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-4: stod du 'byung ba las ltos te bkru sman btang na ni thur du 'byung ba mi bzlog pas bcos pa'i thabs med pa yin no /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-5: ; mkhris pa nye bar zhi ba yang //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-6: 'di las yong ye yod ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-7: 'dres par gyur pa'i nad la ni //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-8: thams cad sel ba'i zhi bya phan //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-10: 'di la sbyang ba nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs rnam pa thams cad du med pa de bzhin du zhi bar bya ba'i thabs kyang yod pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-11: gal te stod du byung ba'i bad kan dang 'brel pa la phan par 'gyur ba kha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i sman btang na ni /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-12: de rlung la gnod pas thur du 'byung ba 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-13: gang smad du byung ba'i rlung las gyur pa la pha pa sman mngar ba byin na ni /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-14: de bad kan la gnod pas stod du 'byung ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-15: de bas na lam gnyis ka nas 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris 'di la ni sbyang ba dang 'dra bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs kyang yong ye rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-16: de yang gang gi phyir nad 'dres par gyur cing phyogs gcig tu gnas la bya ba cig rtsom par 'gyur ba'i nad la ni thams cad sel ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-17: nad gzhi gsum char sel ba'i zhi bar bya bas phan pa yin na /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-18: stod smad kyi lam gnyis ka nas 'byung ba'i khrag dang mkhris pa la ni nad gzhi gsum char sel bar 'gyur ba'i sman yod pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-19: nad gzhi gsum tha dad par gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-20: de la nad dang rjes mthun pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-21: gtar ga btab ste brtag par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-23: khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad de la ni gtar ga btab ste khrag phyung la /
T13TD4312.2E:102b-24: khrag 'di ni rlung 'khrugs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-25: 'di ni mkhris pa 'khrugs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:102b-26: 'di ni mkhris pa 'khrugs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-1: pa las gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-2: zhes gtar gas bton pa'i khrag nyid la brtag par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-3: rlung khrag gnag dang dmar dang rtsub //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-4: ces bya ba la sogs pas ni rlung las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-5: mkhris khrag ser la rtsa gnag mnam //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-7: bad kan khrag ni 'jam la skya //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bad kan las gyur pa nas /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-9: nyes gsum dri ma rnyog pa can //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-10: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'dres pa dang 'dus pa las gyur bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-11: bla brnan byung bar gyur pa dag /'gyur bar shes las rtogs par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-13: khrag dang mkhris pa de bla brnan byung bar gyur pa dag ni lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u las /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-14: khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa las rtogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-17: de la lud pa myur gnod byed //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-18: de phyir de nyid bshad par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-20: nad de rnams kyi nang nas lud pa ni gnod pa myur du skyed cing khyad par du mi bde bar byed pa yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-21: de'i phyir lud pa de'i mtshan nyid gang dag yin pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-22: lud pa rlung mkhris bad kan dang //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-23: glo rdol glo gcong la lngar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-25: lud pa ni rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yod do zhes lha'i mig dang ldan pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-26: thams cad ma gsos zad byed 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-27: phyi ma bzhin du stobs chen yin //
T13TD4312.2E:103a-29: lud pa de dag thams cad ma gsos shing btang snyoms su bzhag na mthar zad byed kyi glo gcong chen por 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-31: lud pa de rnams kyang phyi ma bzhin du stobs che ste /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-32: rlung gi lud pa bas ni mkhris pa'i lud pa stobs che la /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-33: de bas ni bad kan lud pa stobs che /
T13TD4312.2E:103a-34: de bas ni glo rdol ba'i lud pa stobs che /
T13TD4312.2E:103b-0: de bas ni glo gcong zad byed kyi lud ba stobs che zhing shugs @103b drag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-2: gre ba g-ya' zhing yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-3: gre nang gra mas gang snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-5: lud pa de rnams phyis 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye ba la sogs pa'i rtags sam mtshan ma ni gre ba g-ya' zhing yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:103b-6: gre ba'i nang thams cad nas kyi gra mas gang ba snyam du sems shing rtsub par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-7: de la thur rgyu'i rlung gnod 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-8: stod du song ste brang du phyin //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-9: de tshe mgul pa'i nang du zhen //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-10: mgo bo'i rtsa rnams bkang nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-11: de nas yan lag 'degs pa ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-12: g-yengs byed mig rdol tsam du na //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-13: rgyab brang rtsib logs na zhing zug / kha ru 'byung zhing rgyu ba na //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-16: de la lud pa thams cad la thur du rgyu ba'i rlung gnod pa dang bcas shing thur du 'byung du ma ster bas de stod du song ste brang du phyin par gyur pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:103b-17: de'i tshe des shugs brgal ba las mgul pa yan chad kyi bar zhen cing gnas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:103b-18: mgo bo'i rtsa sgo rnams nas zhugs te /
T13TD4312.2E:103b-19: gnas de dag bkang zhing khyab par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:103b-20: de nas de'i 'og tu lus kyi yan lag rnams gyen du bskyod cing 'degs pa ltar byed pas rnam par g-yengs par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:103b-21: de bzhin du mig gnyis phyung zhing rdol ba tsam du na ba dang rgyab dang brang dang rtsib logs kyi phyogs rnams kyang na zhing zug pa dang bcas pas rlung de kha'i sgor rgyu zhing 'byung bar byed de //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-22: de'i tshe lud pa snod chag pa'i sgra 'byung zhing khar sogs bcag pa'i sgra dang bcas pa 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-23: nad gzhi'i dbye bas nad kyang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-24: tha dad shugs dang bcas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-25: nad gang sgra ni mi snyoms pa //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-26: de las lud pa 'byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:103b-28: nad gzhi'i rgyu'i bye brag dbye bas rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir lud pa'i nad kyang rnam pa tha dad cing rlung de shugs sam stobs dang bcas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-0: des na lud pa'i nad gang yin pa'i sgra yang mi snyoms shing sgra che ba @104a * //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-1: la sogs pas lud pa de 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-2: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-3: de la rlung ni rang bzhin gyi shugs dang bcas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-4: shugs de yang rgyu sna tshogs pa'i dbang gis che ba'am chung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-5: gang de dang phrad pa'i sgra de yang rgyu'i khyad par gyi dbang gis gnod pa sna tshogs pa skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-6: rlung nad skyed pa rlung 'khrugs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-7: brang dang gre ba kha skam zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-8: snying brang rtsib logs klad pa gzer //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-10: lud pa skam po 'byung byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-11: na ba'i shugs drag sgra cher 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-12: lus kun brtse bcas bad kan skam //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-15: rlung nad skyed par byed pa'i kha zas dang spyod lam rtsub cing grang ba la sogs pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-16: lam dang bud med la sogs pas dub pa dag gis rlung nad de 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-17: brang dang gre ba dang kha shin tu skam par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-18: snying ga la sogs par gzer bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-19: lud pa skam po bad kan dang mchil snabs med par 'byung bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-20: de bzhin du tsha ba'i tshabs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-22: sgra chen po 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-23: yang lud pa de ni lus dang yan lag brtse ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-24: bad kan nam mchil snabs nang nas 'thon pa shin tu dka' ba 'byung zhing nyung zhig 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-25: mkhris pas mig dang bad kan ser //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-26: kha nang kha zhing rims mgo 'khor //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-27: khrag mkhris slon zhing skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-29: lud pa'i shugs kyi rgyun 'byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-30: skar mda' 'phro ba lta bur snang //
T13TD4312.2E:104a-32: lud pa mkhris pa las gyur pa las ni mig ser ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-33: bad kan 'byung ba ser par 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-34: de bzhin du kha'i nang khab khro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104a-35: rims la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-0: @104b yang lud pa dud pa 'dra ba 'byung zhing dri skyur ba 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-1: lud pa 'byung ba'i shugs kyi rgyun rtag tu 'byung zhing skar mda'i tshogs 'phro ba ltar mthong bar 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-2: rma bya'i sgro ltar kha dog sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-3: bad kan las brang nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-4: mgo lci snying ga gang snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-5: gre bar bskus 'dra snyom par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-7: spu brtse lud pa skam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-10: bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan nyid ni brang du zug cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-11: na ba'i tshabs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-12: mgo bo lci zhing bem bem por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-13: snying ga mer mer por gang ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-14: gre bar chags shing 'dam pa bskus pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-15: lus dang yan lag snyom zhing lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-17: kha zas skyug cing slon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-18: spu bshor zhing brtse ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:104b-21: dkar bar 'byung ba ni bad kan gyi mtshan nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-22: stobs 'gyed la sogs drag shul rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-23: mi nus bzhin byas de dang des //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-24: rlung gis brang nang glo dral la //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-25: mkhris pa rjes 'brangs dkyel gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-26: 'khrugs te lud pa lu bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-27: de ni bad kan khrag bcas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-28: ser zhing gnag la skam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-29: ril ril bor mnam mang du 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-30: 'byung tshe gre ba na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-31: brang ni dral ba snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-32: khab ni rnon pos phug snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-33: gzer gyis 'debs par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-34: tshigs 'bye rims dang dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-36: phug ron lta bur mkhun 'byin to //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-37: rtsib logs gzer 'gyur de nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-38: rim gyis stobs dang me drod dang //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-40: zad byed kyis gcin khrag dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:104b-41: rgyab dang rkang pa na bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-0: stobs 'gyed pa ni lag stobs 'gyed cing rtsal bskyod pa la sogs @105a * //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-2: / la sogs pa zhes smos pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-3: bud med bsten drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-4: khur dang las kyis dub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-5: glang po che dang rta 'dul ba la sogs pa'i drag shul rnams mi nus bzhin du byas pa dag bsdu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-6: de ltar stobs 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i drag shul mi nus bzhin du nan gyis rtsom par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-7: bsten par byas pa'i rgyu rnam pa mang po de dang des rlung 'khrugs pas brang gi nang gi glo 'bral zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-8: mkhris pa rjes su 'brangs pa zla la yod na de stobs skye zhing dkyel du gyur pas lud pa lu bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-9: de nas lud pa des bad kan khrag dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-12: skam zhing ljan ljin med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-13: ril ril por gnas la mnam pa dag mang du 'byung zhing slon la 'byung ba'i tshe gre ba'i nang na zhing gzer ba dang bcas pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-14: brang gi phyogs dbral zhing gshags pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-15: yang brang de nyid khab rnon pos phug cing gtsags pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-17: ji lta bu'i tshul du 'byung zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-18: tshigs bye ba snyam du sems pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-19: yang de bzhin du phug ron ltar sgra mi gsal ba'i tshig tu mkhun zhing 'byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-20: rtsib logs kyi phyogs gzer ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-21: de nas de'i 'og tu lud pa can gyi skyes bu des dus kyi rim gyis lus kyi stobs la sogs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-22: de la stobs ni khu chu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-23: me drod ni zas 'ju zhing smin par byed pa'i pho ba'i me drod do //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-24: nus pa ni nyams stobs so /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-25: de zad cing nyams pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-26: gcin khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105a-27: rgyab dang rkang pa mi bzad par na bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-28: gtso bo rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-29: lus zung zad byed nad rgyal po //
T13TD4312.2E:105a-30: glo gcong gi ni gnas byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-0: lud pa lu @105b zhing bad kan byung //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-1: rnag 'dra mnam zhing ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-2: rul zhing rtsa sngo dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-3: rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems shing //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-4: snying ni lhung ba snyam du byed //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-5: rgyu med dro dang grang ba 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-6: zas mang za zhing nyams stobs zad //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-7: bzhin ni snum zhing dang bar snang //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-8: mig ni mdangs ldan blta sdug 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-9: de nas de las zad byed 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-12: glo gcong dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la ni rlung gtso bor gyur pas /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-13: 'og nas bshad pa'i glo gcong gi nad kyi rgyu rnams kyis 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-14: des lus zungs rnams zad par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-15: nad kyi rgyal po zad byed dam //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-16: glo gcong zhes bya ba'i gnas gzhir byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-17: rgyu des na lud pa lu bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-18: des na skyes bu de bad kan 'byung zhing slon par phal cher rnag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-19: rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems pa ni gnas de dag bsgul zhing phyung ba snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-20: yang de bzhin du glo gcong gi lud pa de snying la gnas nas lhung zhing 'byung ba snyam byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-21: rgyu med par glo bur du tsha ba dang grang ba 'dod cing bsten pas dga' bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-22: grang bas nyen pa med par dro ba 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-23: tsha bas nyen pa med par grang zhing bsil ba 'dod par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-24: kha zas mang du zos su zin kyang nyams stobs 'bri zhing chung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-25: bzhin ras snum zhing cung zad dang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:105b-26: mig mdangs dang ldan zhing blta na sdug pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-27: de nas de'i 'og tu lud pa can gyi skyes bu de la zad byed kyi tshul thams cad de gcong chen po'i mtshan nyid ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-28: de ltar glo rdol las byung lud //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-29: nyam chung lus ni 'jig byed de //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-30: stobs ldan gso ba tsam du rung //
T13TD4312.2E:105b-31: glo gcong las byung de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-0: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar na glo rdol ba las byung ba'i lud pa 'dis ni @106a * //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-1: skyes bu nyam chung zhing stobs zad pa'i lus 'jig cing 'joms par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:106a-2: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa la ni re zhig gso ba tsam du rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-3: glo gcong las byung ba'i lud pa yang glo rdol gyi lud pa dang tshul 'dra ba yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:106a-4: / de gnyis gsar byung mgon ldan 'grub //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-6: glo rdol ba dang glo gcong las byung ba'i lud pa de gnyis gsar du byung zhing nad kyis btab nas ring po ma lon par yang yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-7: mgon dang ldan pa de gso ba'i yan lag bzhi car dang ldan pas legs par gsos na 'grub cing 'tshor rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-8: nad gzhi tha dad gsum gsor rung //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-10: lud pa de dag gi nang nas nad gzhi tha dad pa'i lud pa rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan las byung ba ni gsor rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-11: gnyis 'dres kun kyang rgan po ni //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-12: na tshod zad btab 'tsho ba tsam //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-14: nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba'i lud pa gang yin pa de ni gso ba tsam du byar rung ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:106a-15: yang lud pa gsor rung bar bshad la /
T13TD4312.2E:106a-16: nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba dag kyang mi rgan pa las byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:106a-17: na tshod dengs shing zad pa la btab na re zhig gso ba tsam du byar rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-18: lud pa yal bar bor ba las //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-19: dbugs mi bde dang zad byed slon //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-21: de phyir de ni myur du gso //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-23: gang gi phyir lud pa yal bar bor zhing ma bcos pa las dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
T13TD4312.2E:106a-24: de'i phyir lud pa gsar pa de myur du gso zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:106a-25: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:106a-26: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:106a-27: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-0: // / de nas dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bus btab pa'i nad gzhi @106b bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-2: 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-3: dbugs mi bde ba ni lud pa las 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-4: 'di nyid las lud pa 'phel ba las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar gzhung rtsom pas bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-5: de bas na 'di'i 'og tu dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gzhi bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-6: skyigs bu yang de'i rkyen gyis 'byung bas dbugs mi bde ba'i zhar la skyigs bu yang bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-7: lud pa 'phel ba'am sngar nad gzhi //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-10: skya rbab rims btab las kyang 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-12: lud pa 'phel ba ni lud pa shas cher rgyas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-13: de las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-14: yang na nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i skabs su sngar bshad pa'i nad gzhi kha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-15: tsha ba dang dro ba'i bag zos pa las nad gzhi 'khrugs pas dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-16: de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab pa las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-17: phran tshegs mun can chad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-18: chen po gyen 'byung rnam pa lnga //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-20: dbugs mi bde ba ni phran tshegs la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-21: bad kan gyis ni rgyu lam bkag / rlung ni sna tshogs khyab par gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-22: srog dang zas skom rgyu ba'i lam //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-23: sbu gu nad kyis bkag pas na ;
T13TD4312.2E:106b-24: / ma zhu'i gnas nas 'byung ba'i dbugs //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-25: brang gnas dbugs mi bde bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-27: rlung gang bad kan gyi rgyu ba'i lam gyi sgo bkag nas /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-28: rlung de sna tshogs par thams cad du khyab ste gnas nas ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:106b-29: yang rlung de srog la sogs pa rgyu ba'i lam gyi bu ga nad kyis 'khrugs par byas pas ma zhu ba'i gnas nas byung ba'i dbugs gang yin pa de brang na gnas shing brten nas dbugs mi bde bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-30: de yi sngon tshul snying rtsib logs //
T13TD4312.2E:106b-31: gzer zhing srog rlung mi mthun rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-3: de'i sngon tshul ni dbugs de sngar byung ba'i nad kyi tshul lam rtags ni snying la sogs pa gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:107a-4: srog ces bya ba'i rlung mi mthun pa rgyu zhing phyin ci log tu 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:107a-5: lto sbos pa dang mur 'gram gnyis sun zhing zug par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-6: des ni drag shul 'grangs drags pas //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-7: bskyod pa'i rngam ba phran tshegs 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-8: de ni rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-10: de la dbugs mi bde ba rnams kyi nang nas phran tshegs ni drag shul la sogs pas bskyod pa'i rlung las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-11: de la drag shul ni lus dub par byed pa'i las khur 'degs pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-12: 'grangs drags pa ni tshad las lhag par mang du zos pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-13: de dag gis bskyod pa ni ldang bar byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:107a-14: de lta bu'i rngam pa ni phran tshegs yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:107a-15: chung ngu phran tshegs de ni gso ba'i sman dpyad bya mi dgos par dus cung zad cig ngal bso ba tsam gyis rang nyid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-16: rlung gis rtsa sbubs log rgyu byed //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-17: bad kan slongs par gyur nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-18: klad pa mgul pa'i nad song ste //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-19: brang dang rtsib logs na bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-20: lud pa'i ngar sgra 'dzer mi dran //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-21: cham pa mi bzad yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-22: mi bzad shugs ni skyed byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-23: dbugs mi bde ba de'i shugs kyis //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-24: srog la gnod 'gyur lud pa'i mthar //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-25: skad cig bde bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-26: nyal tshe shin tu mi bde la //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-28: mig gdangs dpral ba'i phyogs nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-29: rdul 'dzag shin tu na bas nyen //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-30: kha skam dbugs ni bstud mar 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-32: char 'bab grang dang ser bus phog / bad kan skyed pas rnam par 'phel //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-33: mun can de ni 'tsho bya tsam //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-34: nyams ldan gsar du btab gso bla //
T13TD4312.2E:107a-36: rlung gis mi mthun pa rgyu zhing rtsa'i sbubs su log par rgyu bar byed /
T13TD4312.2E:107a-37: des bad kan slongs shing stod du bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-0: klad pa dang @107b mgul ba'i nang du song zhing kun tu khyab ste /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-1: brang dang rtsib logs na zhing gzer bar byed nas lud pa la sogs pa'i shugs mi bzad pa skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-2: dbugs mi bde pa yang shugs mi bzad pas srog la gnod cing 'tshe bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-3: gang gi srog ces bya ba'i rlung la gnod cing gzer bar byed pa de ni srog la gnod pa'i dbugs mi bde ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-4: yang na srog ni 'tsho ba'i dbang po'am stobs la bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-5: de dbugs mi bde ba'i shugs kyis gnod par byas pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-6: lud pa'i mtha' ni bad kan dang /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-7: snabs la sogs pa 'dor ba'i mthar skad cig gam thang cig tsam gyi bar du bde bar gnas par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-8: yang de ni mal na gnas shing nyal ba'i tshe shin tu mi bde zhing sdug bsngal bas dbugs 'byin par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-9: de nas langs te tsog tsog po la sogs pa'i tshul du 'dug na cung zad bde zhing shugs ngal ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-10: mig gdangs pa ni gyen du blta ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-11: dpral ba'i phyogs nas rdul 'dzag pa ni rdul 'byung zhing dri ma rlan can du 'dzag pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-12: shin tu na bas nyen pas ni brnag par dka' ba'i nad kyis nyam thag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-13: kha skam pa ni khyad par du kha skam zhing rlan med pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-14: yang de bzhin du dbugs bstud mar 'byung zhing yang yang du rtseg mar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-15: dro ba'i bag yid la 'dod cing bsten par dga' ba dang lus 'dar ba dang bcas pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:107b-16: / yang dbugs mi bde ba de ni char mi 'bab pa la sogs pa bad kan skyed pa'i kha zas dang spyod lam gyis rnam par 'phel zhing dkyel skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-17: mun pa can gyi dbugs mi bde ba de ni gso bar bya ba tsam yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:107b-18: de nyams stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de la gsar du btab pa yin na ni gso bla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-19: rims dang brgyal las byung grang ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:107b-20: sman gyis zhi ste rab mun can //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-0: dbugs mi bde ba mun pa can zhes bya ba de nyid gang gi tshe rims dang brgyal ba las byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe grang zhing bsil @108a * //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-1: ba'i sman dang bzas kyis de zhi zhing bsal bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-2: de la rab tu mun pa can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-3: dbugs chad dbugs 'byin rgyun chad ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-4: gnad gcod nad kyis gzir bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-5: rdul bcas brgyal dang spos dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-6: lgang pa tsha zhing gcin 'gags byed //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-7: mig mi sdug cing thur du blta //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-8: mig gcig dmar zhing dran pa stor //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-9: kha skam smre zhing skad gdangs dma' //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-10: gzi mdangs nyams shing sems bral ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-12: dbugs rgyun chad pa zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-13: dbugs rgyun chad pa'i tshul gyis 'byin par byed kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-14: bar mi chad par mi byed par mi 'byin zhing rngub pa ma yin ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-15: gnad gcod pa'i tshul gyis gzir zhing nyam thag par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-16: rdul dang bcas par brgyal zhing de gnyis dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-17: stod smad du rlung rgyu ba 'gags pas sbos pa dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-18: lgang pa tsha zhing chu so'i phyogs lhag par tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-20: mig mi sdug cing gcig tu song mi gnas par gyur par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-21: thur du blta zhing sa la rtogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-22: mig gcig dmar bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-23: dran pa stor zhing sems shas cher mi gsal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-25: smre sngags kyi tshig tu smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-26: skad gdangs dma' zhing zhum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-27: mdog dang gzi mdangs nyams shing yal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108a-28: sems dang bral zhing dran pa med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-29: chen po nga ro cher 'byung zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-30: sgra cha sdur pa drag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-32: khyu mchog rgyags pa'i nga ro 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-33: shes dang rnam shes rab nyams shing //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-34: mig 'khrul bzhin ni gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-35: ro stod zhum par 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-36: bshang gci 'gags shing skad gdangs nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-37: mgul skam yang dang yang me smra //
T13TD4312.2E:108a-38: rna ba mur 'gram klad ba na //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-0: dbugs mi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba dbugs rgyu ba chen po 'byung zhing nga ro chen po dang ldan pas dbugs 'byung bar @108b 'gyur zhing sgregs pa rab tu che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-1: sdur pa drag po sna nas 'byin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-2: bskyod cing 'gul ba bzhin du rngam pa drag par 'gyur zhing dbugs mi rtsom pa'i shugs g-yo ba dang bcas pa las byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-3: khyu mchog rgyags pa lta bu'i dbugs rgyun tu 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-4: shes pa dang rnam par shes pa'i khyad par gang dag yod pa rab tu nyams par 'gyur /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-5: shes pa ni khong du chud pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-6: rnam par shes pa ni khyad par gyi shes pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-9: rang bzhin yongs su gyur cing mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-10: ro stod zhum zhing rnam par 'gyur ba dang ldan pas dbugs 'byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-11: de bzhin du bshang ba dang gci ba 'gags shing sri ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-13: slar ni thur du rngub mi nus //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-14: bad kan gyis kha rtsa sgo 'gags //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-16: gyen du blta zhing 'khrul byed bas //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-17: mig ni kun tu lta byed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-18: gnad rnams chad par byed bzhin du //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-21: gyen du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dbugs mi bde ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-22: dbugs ring ba gyen du ring du 'byin zhing gtong la /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-23: dbugs de phyung nas slar thur du rngub cing sdud par mi nus te /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-24: yang nang du sdud par mi nus zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:108b-25: yang de'i rnam pa ni bad kan gyis kha dang rtsa'i sgo rnams 'gags shing bar mchod par byas pas rlung gi nad 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur bas gzir zhing shas cher gnod par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-26: mig gyen du blta zhing 'degs par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-27: 'khrul zhing nor bar byas pas phan tshun kun tu lta zhing rtogs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:108b-28: de bzhin du gnad rnams chad par 'gyur ba bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa'i smre sngags skad gsang 'gags shing nang du 'dus bar gyur pa'i tshul gyis smre sngags 'don par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-2: tshang na nges par srog 'phrog byed //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-4: dbugs mi bde ba 'di dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyid 'di dag ma rdzogs na gsor rung zhing bcos su 'dod pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-5: gal te 'di dag rang rang gi mtshan nyid rdzogs shing tshang ba yin na ni nges par gdon mi za bar srog 'phrog cing 'tsho ba gcod par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-6: dbugs mi bde rgyu sngon tshul dang //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-7: grangs dang rang bzhin rten gcig yin //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-9: de la skyigs bu'i nad ni dbugs mi bde ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-10: rgyu la sogs pa'i nad gcig yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-11: 'dir gcig ces bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i ming gi rnam grangs te /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-12: des na skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba ni rgyu la sogs pa tshul 'dra bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-13: de yang lud pa'i rgyu ni lud pa 'phel ba'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-14: sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni snying rtsib logs zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-15: de ltar na de dag thams cad tshul gcig cing 'dra ba yin bas zhes bya ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-16: skyigs bu zas byung phran tshegs dang //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-17: zung dang chen por 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-18: za ba dag dang rnam pa lnga //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-20: skyigs bu zas las byung ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas ming rnam pa lnga yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-21: de la rlung gis ring zos dang //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-22: rtsub tsha sra dang ma goms pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-23: zas dang skom gyis btsir gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-24: rlung gis skyigs bu nad med dang //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-25: sgra mi drag cing sbrid 'byung ste //
T13TD4312.2E:109a-27: de la skyigs bu ni rlung gis bskyed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-28: de yang kha zas ring bag tu zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-29: de bzhin du rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-30: tsha ba dang sra ba'i bag zas zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-31: sngon chad ma goms shing ma bsten pa'i zas skom zos shing 'thungs pas btsir zhing bsdams par gyur pa'i rlung gis skyigs bu'i rnam pa nad med cing sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba med pa sgra mi drag pa'i rjes la sbrid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skyigs bus 'debs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:109a-32: de ni zas las byung ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-0: gang zhig goms pa'i zas skom @109b gyis ;
T13TD4312.2E:109b-1: / zhi 'gyur skyigs bu zas byung yin //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-3: yang skyigs bu gang sngar goms shing bsten pa'i zas dang skom gang yang rung ba btang bas zhi zhing chad par 'gyur ba'i skyigs bu de ni zas las byung zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-4: drag shul gyis rlung cung zad bskyod //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-6: nam tshong rtsa nas 'byung byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-7: de ni shugs dal 'jam pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-9: zas zos tsam gyis dal bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-11: drag shul gyi rtsol bas rlung cung zad cig bskyod de skyigs bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-12: de yang nam tshong gi rtsa ba nas 'byung zhing ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-13: de ltar chung du bskyod pa las phran tshegs 'byung ba'i phyir skyigs bu de'i shugs dal zhing tshabs chung la dal zhing shas cher na bar mi byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-14: de yang rtsol ba drag po'i shugs bsten pas ni 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-15: kha zas gang yang rung ba zos pa tsam gyis ni de'i mod kho na la rgyu ba dal zhing shugs bul bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-16: zung 'byung tshigs ni ring ba la //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-20: mgo dang mgul pa 'dar byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-21: sbo dang shin tu skom dad skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-22: bla dang slon dang tshad par 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-23: mig gdangs gla la ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-24: skyigs bu zung 'byung shugs drag pa //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-25: gzhung dang bcas par de shes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-27: skyigs bu zung du 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-28: tshigs ring pos chod pa gang shugs gnyis gnyis bstud mar 'byung ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-29: de yang kha zas 'ju ba dang nye zhing smin pa la phyogs pa'i tshe 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-30: zas zhu zin nas ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:109b-31: gzhan yang skyigs bus btab pa'i skyes bu'i mgo dang mgul pa 'dar zhing skyod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-33: skom dad shin tu skye zhing skom gyis gdungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:109b-34: glal ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-0: skyigs bu zung du byung ba zhes bya ba @110a * //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-1: de ni shugs drag pa dang zhu ba'i tshe na 'byung bas na zhu ba dang bcas pa zhes bya bar nges so //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-2: skyigs bu chen po 'byung ba'i tshul //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-3: smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rengs shing //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-4: mig nas mchi 'dzag har bar blta //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-5: lus rings tshig ni thogs byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-7: med pa'am sbubs ni 'gags byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-8: gnad kyi tshogs ni skyod bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-9: rgyab sgu lus ni khong skem byed //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-10: rtsa ba che zhing sgra che la //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-11: nad tshabs che zhing stobs cher 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-13: skyigs bu chen po zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i tshul ni smin ma dang mur 'gram gnyis rengs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-14: smin ma gnyis dang mur 'gram gnyis na zhing bskyod mi shes pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-15: lus rengs shing bskyod mi shes par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-16: de bzhin du tshig thogs shing lkugs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-17: dran pa dang 'du shes te dngos po ma brjed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-18: sems 'khrugs shing nyams par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-19: de bzhin du zas rgyu ba'i lam med par 'gags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-20: snying la sogs pa'i gnad kyi tshogs bskyod cing g-yo bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-22: lus kyi khong skem par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-23: de ni rtsa ba che zhing rgyun ring pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-25: nad tshabs che zhing shugs drag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-26: stobs dang nus pa chen por 'byung ba yin pas na de ni chen po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-27: zhu ba'i gnas sam lte 'og nas //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-30: glal dang rkang lag bya rmyang byed //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-33: skyigs bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni zhu ba'i gnas mkhris pa'i gnas sam /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-34: lte ba'i 'og nas 'byung bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-35: de yang 'byung zhing rgyu ba'i tshul ni skyigs bu chen po'i mtshan nyid ji skad bshad pa dang tshul 'dra bar 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:110a-36: smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rengs shing //
T13TD4312.2E:110a-37: rgyab sgu las ni khong skem byed //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-0: @110b ces bya ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-1: de las kyang khyad par du de bstud mar 'byung zhing glal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-2: bya rmyang byed cing rkang lag skyod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-3: brag ca'i sgra zab tu 'byung bar byed pas na 'di'i ming ni zab mo zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-4: de rnams las ni dang po yi ;
T13TD4312.2E:110b-5: / gnyis po gso bar bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-7: skyigs bu lnga po de rnams las zas las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-8: phran tshegs zhes bya ba'i skyigs bu gnyis ni gso sla ba yin pas gso bar bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-9: tha ma gnyis dang zung 'byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-10: mtshan nyid kun rdzogs shugs drag spang ;
T13TD4312.2E:110b-12: tha ma'i skyigs bu gnyis po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-14: skyigs bu zab mo bya ba gnyis ni spang bar bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-15: de bzhin du zung du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skyigs bu rang gi mtshan nyid dam rtags kun rdzogs shing ma lus pa dang ldan la /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-16: shugs drag pa ni spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-17: 'di dag thams cad yun ring bsags //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-18: rgan po bud med kyis dub dang //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-19: nad kyis nyam chung zas bcad pa //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-20: glo rdol nad can spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-22: skyigs bu 'di dag thams cad yun ring du bsags shing rgyun ring po gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-24: bud med la nyal po drags pas dub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-25: nad kyis lus kyi nyams dmad cing stobs zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-26: de bzhin du zas bcad cing smyung ba byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-27: glo rdol ba'i nad dang ldan pa la skyigs bus btab pa spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-28: mi rgan gyis 'chi byed mod kyi //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-29: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-30: nad gzhan myur du gsod mi byed //
T13TD4312.2E:110b-33: nad pa de lta bu dag ni skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-34: rims la sogs pa nad thams cad kyis kyang 'chi bar byed mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-35: nad de dag las 'di gnyis kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:110b-36: skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gnyis kyis myur du gsod par byed pa de ltar nad kyi dngos po gzhan gyis myur du gsod cing 'chi bar mi byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-1: 'di gnyis ni 'chi zhing srog dang bral ba'i tshe nges par gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-2: tshig 'di dag gis ni de gnyis myur du gso dgos par bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-3: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-4: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-5: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-7: // / de nas glo gcong chen po zad byed kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-9: lud pa btang snyoms su bzhag cing ma bcos na dbugs mi bde ba dang zad byed 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-10: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-11: glo gcong chen po zad byed ces bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs so //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-12: nad ni du ma rjes 'brang zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-14: rgyal po zad byed skem byed dang //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-15: nad kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-17: zad byed kyi rjes su nad du ma mang po zhig 'brang zhing rgyu bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-18: de bzhin du nad mang po sngon du 'gro zhing thog mar rgyu bas nad de ni nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya zhing ming gi rnam grangs bzhi po gnod pa'i rgyal po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-21: nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-22: rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze yi //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-23: rgyal po'i gcong du sngon gyur cing //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-24: gang yang nad kyi rgyal por 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-25: de phyir gnod pa'i rgyal por bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-27: snar ma la sogs ba'i rgyu skar rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-28: bram ze rnams kyi rgyal po ni zla ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-29: de yang sngon bskal pa dang po'i tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-30: zla ba snar ma la mchog tu chags pas gcong chen po'i nad byung bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-31: de bas na nad 'di la nang kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111a-32: des ni rgyal po'i nad yin pas nad kyi rgyal po zhes drug pa'i mtshams sbyar bas bsgrub pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-33: yang na zad byed kyi nad kyang yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:111a-34: rgyal po yang yin pas nad kyi rgyal po ste /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-0: nad rnams kyi nang na gnas shing rims la sogs pa'i nad @111b du mas yongs su bskor la /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-1: bshad ma thag pa'i tshul du nad du ma rjes su 'brang zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-2: nad mang po sngon du 'gro bas gcong chen po la gnod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o zhes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-3: lus dang sman ni zad byad cing ;
T13TD4312.2E:111b-4: / zad las 'byung bas zad byed yin //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-6: lus dang sman gyi dngos po gnyis zad pa ni med par byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-7: de bas na lus dang sman zad par byed pa'i nad 'di la zad byed ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-8: gang gi phyir nad 'di skyes par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-9: lus zad cing 'ju bar 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-10: sman mang po yang zad cing gtugs par byed pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-11: nad 'di la zad byed ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-12: yang na zad pa las byung bas na zad byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-13: lus zungs rnams zad pa'i rgyu las byung bas na ming zad byed ces bya ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-14: dangs sogs skems pas skem byed yin //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-15: de rnams de las gsal bas rgyal //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-17: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs bdun po skem zhing rengs par byed pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-18: de la skem byed ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-19: yang nad de rnams kyi nang na rags shing gsal la nus pa che bas na nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-20: drag shul bsten dang shugs bkag dang //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-21: khu chu dangs ma snum zad dang //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-22: zas skom cho ga dang bral bsten //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-23: bzhi po 'di dag de yi rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-25: gcong chen po'i rgyu ni ma lcogs bzhin du drag shul gyi las byed pa la sogs pa bsten drags pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-26: de la drag shul gyi stobs 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i las nyams kyis lcogs par dka' ba bsten zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:111b-27: lus dang ngag dang yid la gnod par 'gyur ba'i rtsol ba drag po byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-28: shugs bkag pa ni ngo tsha pa sogs pa'i rgyus bshang ba dang gci ba dang 'phyen la sogs pa bkag cing bsdams pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:111b-29: khu chu la sogs pa zad pa ni rang gi rgyu las byung ba zad cing dengs par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-0: zas dang skom gnyis kyi cho ga dang bral bar bsten pa ni sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos dang mi @112a * //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-2: de'i cho ga dang mi mthun par byas nas mi 'phrod pa za ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-3: de yis rlung dang mkhris pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-4: bad kan bslangs nas thams cad du //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-5: lus kyi tshigs kun la zhugs te //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-6: de yis rtsa sgo la gnod cing //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-7: bu ga'i sgo ni bkag pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-8: yang na shin tu kha bye 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-9: stod smad thad kar gnas nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-10: rang gi nad ni ji bzhin skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-12: drag shul la sogs pa de dag gis rlung bslang zhing 'khrugs par byas pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-13: rgyas shing 'phel bar byas pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:112a-14: mkhris pa bslangs nas rang gi gnas las gyen du 'pho zhing rgyas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-15: de bzhin du bad kan bslangs nas stod smad dang rtsib logs la sogs pa thams cad du khyab cing lus kyi tshigs kun gyi nang du zhugs te /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-16: tshigs dag la gnod cing rab tu na bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-17: yang de bzhin du des lus thams cad khyab pa'i rtsa sgo la yang gnod cing bcom pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-18: de bzhin du bu ga rnams kyi 'byung zhing rgyu ba'i sgo bkag nas gnas par 'gyur ba 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-20: kha bye zhing rgyas par byas nas lan 'ga' ni stod du 'gro //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-21: lan 'ga' ni ro smad dam rtsib logs su thad kar song nas rang rang gi nad ji lta ba bzhin du bskyod de stod du rgyu na ni ro stod kyi nad skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-22: smad du rgyu na ni ro smad kyi nad skyed par byed /
T13TD4312.2E:112a-23: thad kar 'gro na ni rtsib logs kyi nad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-25: cham 'debs sbrid pa shin tu mang //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-26: mchil ma kha nas ro mngar bro //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-27: lus dang me drod nyam chung byed //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-28: gzhong snod zas skom la sogs ni //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-29: gtsang yang mi gtsang nyid du mthong //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-30: phal cher zas dang skom stsogs la //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-31: sbrang ma rtsa dang skra sogs 'bab //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-33: kha zas zos kyang nyams stobs zad //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-34: lag par lta zhing rkang gdong skrang //
T13TD4312.2E:112a-35: mig ni shin tu dkar por snang //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-0: lus la @112b 'jigs su rung bar mthong //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-1: bud med chang dang sha la dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-2: smod dang klad pa 'gebs par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-3: skra dang sen mo shin tu 'phel //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-4: rmi lam du ni phye ma leb //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-5: rtsangs pa sdig sbrul gcan gzan spre'u //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-6: bya rnams kyis ni gtses par mthong //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-7: skra rus phub ma thal sogs kyi ;
T13TD4312.2E:112b-8: / phung po la ni 'dzeg pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-9: yul dang grong ni stong pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-10: chu klung skam par rmi lam mthong //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-11: skar mda' ri bo ltung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-12: ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-14: gcong chen po zhes bya ba'i nad de 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-15: skye bzhin pa'i tshul sngar byung ba'i rtags ni cham pa la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-16: cham pa ni sna nas 'dzag pa'i nad des 'debs so //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-17: sbrid pa shin tu mang ba ni sbrid pa drag tu 'byung zhing mang ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-18: mchil ma mang ba ni bad kan gyi ljan ljin kha nas mang du 'ong pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-19: kha'i nang ro mngar bar bro ba ni mngar ba nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-20: lus dang me drod nyam chung ba ni lus khong rmya zhing zhum pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-21: zas 'ju bar byed mi nus pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-22: gzhong pa dang snod phra mo la sogs pa gtsang ba yang mi gtsang ba nyid du mthong ba ni de'i tshe log pa'i shes pa skye zhing 'khrul ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:112b-23: yang phal cher zas skom la sogs par sbrang ma la sogs pa ltung zhing 'bab par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-24: snying 'phar zhing rgal pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-25: lag pa gnyis la yang dang yang du lta zhing rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-26: rgyu med par rkang pa dang gdong skrang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-27: de bzhin du mig gnyis shin tu dkar zhing skya bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-28: de bzhin du lag ngar gnyis 'jal bar 'dod cing nga'i lag ngar tshad ji tsam du song zhes shes par 'dod cing 'jal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-29: rang gi lus mdzes shing skyon med la 'jigs pa'i bag med par gyur pa la yang mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung bar mthong ba'i log pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:112b-30: bud med dang chang dang sha la dga' zhing mngon par 'dod pa bskyed ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-1: nyid la smod par yang byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-2: klad pa ste spyi bo gos kyis 'gebs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-3: skra dang sen mo rnams shin tu 'phel zhing ring bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-4: rmi lam gyi nang du phye ma leb la sogs pas gtses shing mnan par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-5: de bzhin du skra la sogs pa'i phung po la 'dzeg par rmi ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-6: yul dang grong stong zhing skye bo mi gnas pa rmi lam du mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-7: chu rnams skams shing grog po stong pa rmi lam du mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-9: ri bo ltung zhing bsnyil ba rmi ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-10: ljon shing bzang ba rnams las skyes pa de dag 'bar zhing me'i phung por 'gyur ba rmi ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-11: mtshan ma de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-12: stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-13: lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-14: phrag pa spyi bo na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-16: / smad gnas bshang sla rtug skam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-17: nang grol nang gnas slon par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-18: thad kar gnas pas rtsib logs zug //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-19: tshigs la gnas na rims su 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-21: gcong chen po'i nad ro stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs pa la sogs pa nad bdun skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-22: nad de ro smad du song bas ni bshang ba sla ba'am rtug skam du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-23: rtug pa sla ba ni zhig cing 'khru bar 'gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-24: skam pa ni sra zhing 'gags te 'khren par 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-25: de las lan 'ga' ni sla bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:113a-27: de gnyis cha mnyam par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-28: nad de nang grol gyi nang na gnas pa ni slon zhing 'dor bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-29: thad kar gnas pa'i nad kyis ni rtsib logs su zug cing na bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-30: nad de ni tshigs la gnas pas ni rims skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-31: de ltar nad tshul bcu gcig ni //
T13TD4312.2E:113a-34: gcong chen po'i nad de dang ldan pa la cham ba la sogs pa nad bcu gcig pa 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-0: de la rtsa sbubs rnams bkag pa @113b las ni skams par 'gyur ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:113b-1: de rnams kha bye ba las ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-2: des na grangs kyis 'di gnyis gang yang rung ba gcig gis bzung gi /
T13TD4312.2E:113b-3: gnyi ga dus gcig tu 'byung ba ni mi srid do //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-4: de rnams kyi grangs ni cham pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113b-15: rims te bcu gcig po 'di dag ni zad byed kyi nad yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-16: de rnams kyi ni bla brnan dag / skad 'gags brang du na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-17: kha glal lus grugs mchil snabs mang //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-18: drod nyams kha mnam yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-20: cham pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi bla brnan ni skad 'gags pa la sogs pa bdun yin bar shes par bya /
T13TD4312.2E:113b-21: nad snga na gnas pa'i steng du nad phyi ma byung nas sdug bsngal dang rjes su 'brel par byed pa ni bla brnan zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-22: de la rlung gyur klad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-23: rtsib logs zug sha yan lag na //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-26: de la rlung gi shas che ba las gyur pa'i gcong chen po ni /
T13TD4312.2E:113b-27: klad pa na ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-28: mkhris rgyas rkang lag phrag pa tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-29: tshad 'khru khrag tu slon pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-32: de la mkhris pa shas che ba las byung ba'i gcong chen po ni /
T13TD4312.2E:113b-33: rkang pa dang lag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:113b-34: phrag pa tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-35: bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-36: slon lud lus dang yan lag lci //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-37: mchil snabs mang zhing cham pas 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-38: dbugs mi bde skad 'gags drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-40: bad kan rgyas pa las gyur ba'i gcong chen po'i nad ni yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:113b-41: nad kyis me drod nyam chung bas //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-2: / rtsa sbubs sgo ni 'gags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-3: lus zungs drod ni chung gyur pas //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-4: dangs ma rang gi gnas su ni //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-5: ma zhu bla brnan de dang de //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-6: skyed cing sha sogs mi 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-7: khrag ni gyen du 'byung bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-9: rlung la sogs pa'i nad me drod chung zhing nus pa bri ba la sogs pa'i rgyus 'byar bag dang bcas pa'i bad kan rgyas par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-10: rtsa sbubs kyi sgo rnams 'gags shing bkag par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-11: de bzhin du lus zungs kyi drod nyam chung bar gyur bas dangs ma rang gi gnas su legs par ma zhu zhing smin par nus pa'i dangs ma de las bla brnan skad 'gags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-12: brang du na ba la sogs pa rang gi rgyu las byung ba de dang de skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-13: des na sha la sogs pa'i lus zungs su mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-14: de bzhin du khrag gyen du 'byung zhing mchil ma la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-15: khong pa nyid du zas 'ju bas //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-16: dangs mar 'gyur bar mi byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-17: phal cher dri ma nyid 'gyur gyi //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-18: lus zungs 'phel bar mi byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-20: gang gi phyir gcong chen po'i nad 'di yod pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-21: khong pa'i drod kyis kha zas 'ju bar byed kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-22: me drod gzhan gyis dangs ma la sogs pa'i rim pa smin par mi byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-23: de'i phyir 'phral du dri ma bshang gci nyid du 'gyur bas zungs rnams 'phel shing rgyas par mi byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-24: dangs ma'i bcud lus kyang brtas shing tshim par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-25: dangs ma khrag tu mi 'gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-26: shar 'gyur ba lta smos ci dgos //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-27: zad byed can ni bshang 'phel ba //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-28: 'ba' zhig gis ni gnas par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:114a-30: gcong chen gyi skyes bu de'i lus zungs dangs ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang khrag tu mi 'gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-31: sha'i lus zungs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T13TD4312.2E:114a-32: zad byed dang ldan pa'i skyes bu bshad ba 'ba' zhig nye bar 'phel bas gnas par 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-0: dangs mas khrag la sogs pa @114b 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'ba' zhig gi sgra nges par bzung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-1: mtshan ma chung yang nyam chung zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-2: nad kyis sman gyi stobs mi bzod //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-5: cham pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-6: de bzhin du snying ga dang rtsib logs gzer ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma chung du zin kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-7: mi mnyam stobs chung zhing nad kyis sman gyi stobs bsten par mi bzod pa gang yin pa de ni spar bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-9: thams cad ldan yang gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-11: de las gzhan ba'i nad kyis nyams kyi stobs bzod cing /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-12: nyams stobs dang ldan pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin yang gsor rung ba yin pas nad pa nyams stobs dang ldan pa ni rnam pa thams cad du gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-13: de yan chad du gcong chen po'i nad bshad zin nas /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-14: de nas de'i 'og tu de'i yan lag tu gyur pa skad 'gags pa la sogs pa'i nad ston pa'i phyir smras pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-15: nad ni sna re 'dus pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-16: zad byed tshil las gyur pa drug / skad 'gags kyi ni dbye ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-18: nad sna re re zhes pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang so so las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-19: gsum car 'dus pa las gyur te bzhi pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-20: zad byed las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-22: drug po de dag ni skad 'gags pa'i dbye ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-23: de las rlung g-yo nyam chung rtsub //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-24: gre ba grams gang snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-25: de la snum dro 'o mas phan //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-27: de la skad 'gags pa drug gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni g-yo zhing skad 'gyur te mi brtan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-28: lus nyam chung zhing khong rmya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-29: rtsub bag tu gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-30: gre ba nas kyi gra mas gang ba snyam du byed cing na ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:114b-34: mkhris pa las gyur rkan lkog tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:114b-35: skam zhing smra bar mi nus 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-0: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skad @115a * //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-2: rkan dang lkog ma'i phyogs su tsha bar 'gyur ba de dag nyid sgam pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:115a-3: smra bar mi nus shing tshig mi thon pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-4: bad kan mgul pa byugs snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-5: skad kyi gsang dma' ngar ngar 'dzer //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-6: thogs bcas 'gyur ro thams cad kyi //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-7: mtshan ma thams cad ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-9: de yang sgra ngar ngar por 'don zhing 'dzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:115a-10: thogs pa dang bcas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:115a-11: bar bar du 'khrul zhing brjed par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-12: thams cad kyi zhes nad gzhi gsum po thams cad las byung ba'i skad 'gags pa ni mtshan ma gsum po thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-13: zad byed las ni drud snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-14: du bas bdugs ltar shin tu na //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-16: zad byed ces te gcong chen po las byung ba'i skad 'gags pa ni ldog ma drud pa snyam du sems shing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:115a-17: lkog ma dang rkan gyi phyogs du bas bdugs pa ltar shin tu na ba dang smra ba na yang du bas subs te smra ba snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-18: tshil gyur bad kan bdag nyid can //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-19: tshig gi brda sprod mi nus 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-21: tshil las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni mgul pa byugs pa snyam du byed pa la sogs pa bad kan gyi skabs su bshad pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-22: yang de bzhin du tshig brda sprod bar mi nus shing shin tu mi gsal bar smra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-25: 'dir skad 'gags pa 'di dag gi nang nas nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:115a-26: tshil las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-27: yi ga 'chus pa'i nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-28: lce snying gnas pa so so dang //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-29: 'dus pa dang ni yid kyi ni //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-30: gdung ba las gyur lnga pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:115a-32: yi ga 'chus pa'i nad ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad lce dang snying ga las gnas pa so so ste /
T13TD4312.2E:115a-33: gsum po so so las gsum du 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:115b-0: 'dus pa'i nad lce dang snying la @115b gnas pa las bzhi par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-1: yid kyi gdung ba mya ngan dang khro ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma gsungs pa las yig 'chus pa lnga par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-2: kha ni bska dang kha mngar bro //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-3: rlung sogs gsum dang rim bzhin sbyar //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-5: rlung la sogs pa las yi ga 'chus pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni rim bzhin kha bska ba la sogs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:115b-6: rlung las gyur pas ni kha bska bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-7: mkhris pa las gyur bas ni kha kha bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-8: bad kan las gyur pas ni kha mngar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-9: kun las gyur pa ro bro med //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-11: nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa ni ro bro ba med pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:115b-12: dri nga ba yod med kyi nges pa 'di ltar bro zhes bya bar brda sprod mi nus so //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-13: mya ngan khro sogs nad ji bzhin //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-15: mya ngan dang khro ba la sogs pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni nad ji lta ba nyid las mi 'da' ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:115b-16: ro bska ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-17: de la mya ngan dang 'jigs pas gdung ba'i yid las ni rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing bska ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-18: khro ba las gyur pas mkhris pa skyed par 'gyur ba yin pas kha ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-19: 'dod pas gdung ba las ni bad kan 'khrugs pas mngar ba bro ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-20: slon bro nad gzhi sna re kun //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-21: mi sdug yul las byung lnga ba //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-23: slon bro ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T13TD4312.2E:115b-24: nad gzhi gsum sna re las byung ba gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:115b-25: kun 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang /
T13TD4312.2E:115b-26: mi sdug pa'i don nam yul yid du mi 'ong ba'i yul lam don gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams las byung ba ni lnga ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-27: 'di dag stod du rgyu ba'i rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:115b-28: 'khrugs pas nad ni thams cad phul //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-0: yi ga 'chus pa 'di dag ni stod du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs shing rang gi tha mal pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan du gyur pa des bad kan mdang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad gyen du slong zhing stod du @116a * //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-1: phul bas nam tshong yan chad nas kha'i bar du khyab par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-2: de rnams ba slongs na kha tsha bro //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-3: mchil mang yi ga 'chus sngon byung //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-5: slon bro ba de rnams la ni nad slong zhing bslongs nas kha tsha bro ba la sogs pa sngar byung ba yin pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-6: sngon byung ba ste 'di dag ni nad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul yin no zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-7: rlung gyur lte ba rgyab tu zug / rtsib logs na zhing zas slon nas //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-8: cung zad 'byung zhing chad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-9: ro bska lbu ba can du skyug / sgregs pa'i sgra bcas mdog gnag la //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-10: sla zhing 'byung dka' sgra dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-11: lud pa kha skam klad snying na //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-12: skad 'gags pa dang khong snyom bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-14: rlung las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni lte ba dang rgyab kyi phyogs na zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-16: skyug pa kha zas gyen du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-17: de'i 'og tu cung zad 'byung zhing bar bar du chad pa'i tshul gyis ro bska ba'i rnam pa las lbu ba can skyug par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-18: sgregs pa sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-20: sla zhing dangs par 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-21: 'byung bar dka' zhing sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-22: de bzhin du lud pa la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-23: mkhris gyur thal chu 'dra ba la //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-24: dud kha ljang sngon mdog ser skyug / khrag bcas ro skyur tsha zhing dro //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-25: skom dad brgyal tsha gdung bcas yin //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-27: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni thal chu dang 'dra bar 'byung zhing kha dog dud khar gnas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-28: du ba ltar tsha zhing dku ba'i sgregs pa dang bcas pa kha dog ljang khu dang sngon po dang ser po skyug cing khrag dang bcas par 'byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:116a-29: ro ni skyur ba dang tsha ba dang ldan zhing dro ba'i bag tu slon la skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-30: bad kan las gyur snum pa bsil //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-31: nal nal por 'dug dra ba ris //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-32: ro mngar lan tshva bro tshabs che //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-33: chags shing ba spu brtse bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:116a-34: gdong skrang kha nang mngar ba bro //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-0: snyom zhing snying na @116b lud pa can //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-2: bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni snum bag tu slon zhing skrang pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-3: bad kan gyi rgyun nal nal por 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-4: skyug pa dra ba ris sam skar khung gi tshul du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-5: ro mngar zhing lan tshva bro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-6: tshabs che zhing mang du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-7: gre bar chags shing 'byar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-8: ba spu pags pa brtse zhing reg mi bzod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-9: gdong skrang ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-10: gsum char las byung rtags kun ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-11: 'chi ltas las bshad gang de spang //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-13: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum char las byung ba ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-14: de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-15: yang 'chi ltas kyi skabs su bshad pa'i slon bro ba'i nad shugs drag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-16: bshang gci bro ba la sogs pa de yang spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-17: rul dang mi gtsang btsog pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-18: skyug bro mthong dang thos sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-19: yid gdungs snying la phog gyur slon //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-20: mi sdug yul las byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-22: rul pa la sogs pa'i dngos po mthong ba dang thos pa dang mnam pa dang zos pa dang reg pa dang yid la byed pa la sogs pas yid gdungs shing sems bcom par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-23: snying la phog cing gnod par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-24: slon pa gang yin pa de ni mi sdug pa'i yul las byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-25: mngon par mi 'dod pa'i yul dang phrad pa las byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-26: yid mi bde skom srin be'u snabs //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-27: rlung sogs nyid la gnas par brtag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-28: srin bu la sogs pa bzhi pa ni rlung la sogs pa slo na bro ba gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du brtag cing dpyad la shes par bya'i /
T13TD4312.2E:116b-29: rlung la sogs pa med par de rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-30: yid mi bde ba ni sbrum ma zla gnyis lon phan chad mngal bsal nas 'byung ba la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-31: gzer dang 'phar dang snying na ba //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-32: bye brag tu ni srin bu'i nad //
T13TD4312.2E:116b-33: srin bu'i snying nad mtshan ma las //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-0: de ni shes par bya ba @117a * //
