T13TD4312.2E:117a-3: srin bu'i nad las skyes pa'i slon bro ba ni gzer la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-4: de bzhin du srin bu'i nad kyi mtshan ma mig gnag pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-5: snying nad nad ni re re 'dus //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-6: srin bu las gyur rnam lngar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-8: snying nad ni rlung mkhris pa bad kan las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-10: srin bu las gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-11: rnam pa lnga yod par bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-12: rlung gis shin tu zug cing na //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-13: gas dang gshags pa snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-14: bcom snyam sems shing skam la rengs //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-15: snying ga stong snyam zag par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-16: rgyu med zhum zhing mi dga' la //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-17: 'jigs shing sgra ni mi bzod cing //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-19: rmongs bag dbugs thung gnyid chung 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-21: rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad ni snying du zug cing gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-22: btsugs pa ltar na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-23: de bzhin du snying gas pa snyam du sems shing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-24: tshal par gshags pa snyam du sems shing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-25: grugs pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-26: khong skam par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-27: rengs shing gang ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-28: snying ga stong zhing med pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-29: zag cing g-yos la sems 'phyo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-30: rgyu med par glo bur du sems zhum zhing mi dga' ste mya ngan du byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-32: sgra mi bzod cing tshig thogs pa la sogs pa la 'khrul pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-34: sa la 'gre zhing ldog pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-35: snying gcus pa snyam du dung dung por na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-36: rmongs bag tu gyur cing mi dran pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117a-38: gnyid chung zhing yar ba ste mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-39: mkhris gyur skom dad mgo 'khor brgyal //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-40: tsha rdul snying skyur lus snyom byed //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-41: mkhris pa skyur ba slon par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:117a-42: dud pa khar song ser rims 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-0: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying nad la ni skom dad la @117b sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-1: snying ga skyur ba dang tsha zhing sgregs par skyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-2: bad kan las gyur snying ga rengs //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-3: khong na rdo bcug lta bur lci //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-4: drod nyams mchil mang lud pa lu //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-5: gnyid che snyom rims yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-7: bad kan las gyur ba'i snying nad la ni snying ga rengs shing mi 'gul bar na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-8: khong na rdo bcug pa ltar sems shing nang na rdo yod pa lta bur lus lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-9: de bzhin du me drod nyams pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-10: nyes gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-12: rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa las byung ba'i snying nad ni de gsum char gyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-13: srin bus mig ni gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-14: mun par zhugs snyam byed snying 'phar //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-15: lus skam g-ya' zhing bad kan 'dzag /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-16: 'di ni rtag tu sog le yis //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-17: snying la 'drud pa lta bur sems //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-18: mi bzad nad des myur gsod pas //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-19: de ni rings par gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-21: srin bu las gyur pa'i snying nad ni mig gnag par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-22: mun pa'i nang du zhugs pa ltar mun 'thibs zhes byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-24: lus skam zhing sha zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-25: kha nas bad kan ljan ljin 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-26: yang rtag tu snying la sog les 'drud cing gshags ba lta bur sems te /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-27: srin bu snying na ba zhes bya ba'i nad mi bzad pa des ni myur du gsod cing 'chi bar byed pas ring zhing myur bar gso bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-28: gnad chen po snying zhes bya ba 'bus zos pa ni bsad pa chen po skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-29: de ltar snying nad kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-30: da skom dad kyi nad bshad par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:117b-31: skom dad rlung mkhris bad kan dang //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-32: 'dus pa dangs ma zad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:117b-35: rlung la sogs pa'i dbye bas skom dad rnam pa drug yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-0: nad dang 'dres pa ni rims la sogs pa nad gzhi gzhan dang 'dres pa'i rkyen @118a * //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-1: las skom dad du gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-2: de ltar gyur pa thams cad la //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-3: rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgyu yin te //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-5: de ltar skom dad thams cad ldang zhing 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T13TD4312.2E:118a-6: mkhris pa dang rlung yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-7: de 'khrugs lus zungs bsil ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-8: skams nas ldang bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-10: skom dad khong tsha rmongs par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-12: rlung dang mkhris pa de dag ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba ni lus zungs bsil ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:118a-13: dangs ma 'am bad kan skams nas ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:118a-14: rlung dang mkhris pa 'khrugs par byed pa de yang lus thams cad 'dar zhing mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa byed pa yin bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-15: lce drud mgul ba glo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-16: skam dang skom 'thungs rgyu ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-17: skam pas skom dad skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-19: skom dad thams cad ni lce drud pa la sogs pa skam nas 'byung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-20: de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-21: kha skam skom gyis mi ngoms dang //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-22: zas la mi dga' skad 'gags dang //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-23: gre ba lce mchu rtsub par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-24: lce 'byin byed cing khong snyom la //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-25: bla zhing sems ni myos pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-26: de bzhin skom gdungs nad du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-28: skom dad de rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de thun mong gi mtshan nyid de skams pa nas skom dad du gyur pa'i bar gyis bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-29: de la skom gyis gdungs pa'i nad ni nad mi 'byung bar bya ba'i le'u las bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-30: lus skams rmya zhing 'on pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-31: rmongs bag mgo 'khor snying nad de //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-32: 'di lta bu yi nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-33: skom pas gdungs las skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-35: yang skom dad kyis gdungs pa las lus skams pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-36: rlung gyur khong rmya nyam chung la //
T13TD4312.2E:118a-38: sna lces dri dang ro mi tshor //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-0: 'on zhing gnyid med nyams stobs @118b zad ;
T13TD4312.2E:118b-3: skom dad kyis gdungs pa lus skams pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-4: rlung las gyur pa'i skom dad ni khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:118b-5: tshig gi don ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-6: mkhris pa kha nang ro kha brgyal //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-7: mngar por mthong zhing rtag par ni //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-8: kha skam khong tsha dbugs mnam pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-10: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skom dad ni kha'i nang gi ro kha ba nas dbugs mnam pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-11: bad kan ldang bas skom rgyu'i rtsa ;
T13TD4312.2E:118b-12: / bkag pas rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-13: de tshe de yis bad kan ni //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-14: 'dam bzhin de yis skem par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-15: mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-16: gnyid che kha nang mngar bar bro //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-17: lto ba mgo bo tshor ba chung //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-18: rmongs bag slon gyur yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-21: bad kan 'khrugs shing ldang bas chu rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa sgo rnams su rlung rgyu ba bkag cing g-yogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:118b-22: de'i tshe rlung des bad kan de skam par byed pa ni 'dam ltar skem par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-23: dper na phyi'i rlung gis 'dam skem par byed pa bzhin du rlung gis bad kan skem par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:118b-24: de nas bad kan skams pas mgul pa gra mas gang ba snyam du sems shing tshal rtsub par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-25: gzhan yang gnyid che zhing kha'i nang mngar bar bro bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-26: kun las gyur pa rtags kun ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-28: nad gzhi gsum char gyis bskyed pa'i skom dad ni 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-29: be'u snabs las gyur kha zas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-30: mid dka' rlung mkhris las gyur yin //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-32: be'u snabs las gyur pa'i skom dad ni kha zas mid par dka' zhing thogs par 'gyur ba de las ni mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:118b-33: tsha bas ngal bas 'phral du na //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-0: chu grang bsten gyur skom dad @119a * //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-2: / khong par tsha ba bsdus pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-3: skom dad [?] de ni mkhris skyes yin //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-5: skyes bu tsha bas ngal zhing dub par gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:119a-6: de 'phral du de'i mod la chu grang bsten zhing khrus la sogs pa byas pas /
T13TD4312.2E:119a-7: phyi rol gyi tsha ba khong pa'i nang du bsdus te /
T13TD4312.2E:119a-8: de'i dbang gis skom dad skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mkhris pa las skyes pa 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-9: gang yang chang drags me drod rno //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-10: snum zos skyes pa'ang mkhris 'byung yin //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-12: yang skom dad gang chang mang du 'thungs shing drags pa las gyur pa de yang mkhris pa las gyur pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-13: yang de bzhin du me drod rno zhing shas che ba las snum zos pa las byung ba'i skom dad de yang mkhris pa las byung bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-14: snum zhing skyur dang lan tshva'i bag / zos pas bad kan las skyes 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-16: kha zas snum bag la sogs pa zos pa las skom dad skyes pa ni bad kan las byung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-17: zad byed las ni skom dad 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-18: dangs ma zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-20: zad byed las skom dad du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dangs ma zad pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T13TD4312.2E:119a-21: dangs ma zad nas rtsub la skem //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-22: nyam chung sgra ni zhes bya ba smos pa yin pas 'di nyid las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-23: khong skam gcin nad rims nad sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-24: yun ring nad ni rims skom nad //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-25: gang zhig skom dad mi bzad skyes //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-26: de ni 'dres las byung bar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-28: khong skam pa la sogs pa dang 'dres pa dang skom dad gang mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skyes pa de ni 'dres pa las byung ba'i mtshan nyid can yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:119a-29: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:119a-30: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:119a-31: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:119a-33: // / de nas chang nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-1: rlung la sogs pa ldang zhing 'khrugs pa'i gzhi gcig pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-2: nyes pa gsum las byung bar tshul mthun pas gcong chen po'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-3: chang gi nad du gyur pas na chang gi nad dam /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-4: chang las myos pa la sogs pa'i nyes par gyur pas na chang nad de /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-5: myos pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i nad ces bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-6: de yang myos pa ni sems dang lus zungs 'gyur bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-7: de yang chang la sogs pas myos par gyur pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-8: de'i rgyu ni chang yin par bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-9: rno dang drod che rtsub drag skyur //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-10: nyal po 'dod myur byed dang yang //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-11: gsal dang dang bar byed par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-12: mdangs ni 'di las go bzlog yin //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-14: chang ni rno ba la sogs pa yon tan bcu dang ldan par bshad la /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-15: mdangs ni chang gi yon tan ji skad du bshad pa 'di las go bzlog pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-16: rdul ba dang grang ba dang snum pa dang rags pa dang mngar ba dang brtan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-17: yun ring por byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-21: dug kyang rno stsogs yin mod kyis //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-22: sems la gnod par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-23: nus pas 'chi bar byed pas na //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-24: dug ni lhag par mthu che'o //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-26: chang gi yon tan rno ba la sogs pa bcu po 'di dag ni chang 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi dug la'ang yod mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-27: de'i khyad par ni sems la lhag par gnod cing 'khrul par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi nus pa dug la yod pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-28: gang gis 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nus pa dug la yod pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:119b-29: dug gi nus pa chang bas lhag par mthu che zhing nus pa lhag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-30: chang ni rno sogs yon tan gyi //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-31: mdangs kyi yon tan rtul la sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-32: bcu po bcu yis 'khrugs byas nas //
T13TD4312.2E:119b-33: sems ni sgyur bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-0: chang gi yon tan rno ba la sogs pa bcus mdangs kyi yon tan rtul ba la sogs pa bcu po zil gyis mnan zhing 'khrugs par byas shing @120a * //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-1: kun du dkrugs nas sems sgyur zhing rnam pa gzhan du gyur par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-2: ra ro dang po gnyis pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-3: bag med pa yi gnas la gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-4: rnam rtog ngan 'joms rmongs pa rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-5: bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-7: ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang ra ro ba'i shugs gnyis pas ni bag med pa'i gnas la gnas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-8: bag med pa'i nyes par spyod pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-9: de nyid kyis ni rang gi rnam rtog ngan pa bcom zhing sems kyi kun du rtog pas brlag par gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-10: de nyid ni rmongs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-11: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-12: de rnams ni ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-13: gnyis pa'i skabs la gnas pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-14: de bde ba yin par shes shing shin tu bde ba kho nar 'dzin gyis /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-15: de lta bu'i bdag nyid can gyi bde ba yin par ni mi rtogs so //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-16: 'dir bag med pa ni tshe phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las mi dge ba rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu las bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-17: de 'byung ba'i gnas la gnas pa ni ra ro'i shugs dang po dang gnyis pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-18: 'bring dang chen po bar gyi tshe //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-19: rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-20: glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-21: rmongs pas mi bya ci yang med //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-23: 'bring dang chen po ste ra ro ba'i shugs gnyis pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-24: gsum pa'i bar mtshams su phyin pa'i skyes bu de rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin du thob pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:120a-25: mi bya ba ci yang med de mi dge ba thams cad mi bya ba ci yang med do //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-26: rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-27: smos pas ni skyes bu snying stobs can ni nam mkha' yang 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-28: glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:120a-29: zhes bya ba bstan pa ni rang dbang can du ci dgar spyod pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:120b-0: dper na glang po che myos pa lcags kyu med pa dag na mi srun pa'i spyod pa thams cad ston par byed pa dang 'dra bar ra ro ba 'bring dang chen po'i bar tshigs su @120b phyin pa ni skyes bu rmongs pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci yang mi bya ba med de thams cad byed do ces bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-1: 'di ni kha na ma tho'i gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-4: ra ro ba 'bring dang chen po'i bar tshigs ni kha na ma tho ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:120b-5: smad par bya ba yin pas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sdig pa rnams kyi gnas dang gzhi ni 'di dag nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-6: yang 'di nyid ni tshul khrims 'chal zhing bslab pa nyams pa'i gnas sam gzhi yang 'di dag yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-8: mang po ston par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-10: ra ro ba'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par 'di nyid ni ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i lam du ma'i rgyu yin zhing lam mang po de dag tu khrid cing ston par byed pa'i slob dpon yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-11: ra ro gsum pa'i tshe na ni //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-12: sems med par ni ro ltar nyal //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-14: ra ro ba'i shugs chen por phyin cing /
T13TD4312.2E:120b-15: de la gnas pa'i tshe na ni sems med par ro ltar nyal te /
T13TD4312.2E:120b-18: mi ro dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-19: nyes pa'i bdag nyid shi ba las //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-20: shin tu ma rungs gnas skabs thob //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-22: nyes pa'i bdag nyid de shi ba las kyang ches thu ba'i ma rungs pa'i gnas skabs thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-23: chos dang chos min bde dang sdug / don dang don min phan dang gnod //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-24: gang la chags pa mi shes pa //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-25: de la mkhas pas ji ltar bsten //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-27: gang la chags shing mngon par zhen na chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs pa shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i chang de la mkhas pa blo dang ldan pas ji ltar bsten par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:120b-28: bsten par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-29: de la chos ni sbyin pa gtong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:120b-30: dkon mchog mchod pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-31: chos ma yin pa ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-32: bde ba ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i bde ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-33: sdug bsngal ni sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:120b-34: don ni rgyal po'i khrims su bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-0: @121a * // don ma yin pa ni gzhung lugs 'chol ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-1: phan pa dang gnod pa ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-2: de dag gi bye brag mi shes pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-3: chang las myes 'jigs mya ngan dang //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-4: khro dang srog dang bral ba nas //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-5: smyo byed myos dang brgyal bar bcas ;
T13TD4312.2E:121a-6: / brjed byed bcas pa kun song nad //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-8: chang la ni myos pa la sogs pa gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-9: de dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-10: kun song nad ces bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i nad ro dang 'dra bar byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-11: ming gi rnam grangs su na ltung bar byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-12: gang du dran pa nyams gcig yod //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-13: der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-15: mang du smras pas ci zhig bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-16: gang du chang gang la dran pa nyams pa gcig pu yod pa der ni /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-17: dngos po gang dang gang dag yod pa thams cad mi dge ba'i tshul thams cad 'byung zhing chos ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-18: mi 'phrod zas ni zos pas kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-21: gang gi phyir mi 'phrod pa'am mi rigs par sbyar ba'i zas zos pas /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-22: zas de srog gi rten yin yang nad nyid skyed par 'gyur ba 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-23: 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin na chang lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-24: chang gi sde tshan gsum blo ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-25: ngo tsha sogs kyang 'jig par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-27: gang yang chang gi nyes dmigs ni shas cher bsten pas sde tshan gsum la sogs pa nyams shing 'jig par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:121a-28: sde tshan gsum ni skyes bus btsal bar bya ba'i chos dang nor 'dod pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-30: nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-31: zas cher za dang snum ngag za //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-32: snying stobs lang tshor ldan pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-33: rtag tu chang 'thung de'i rigs skyes //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-34: tshil dang bad kan shas che la //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-35: rlung dang mkhris pa shas chung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-36: me drod che zhing brtan pa rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:121a-37: shas cher ra ror mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-0: skyes bu stobs dang ldan zhing nyams 'tshag bzang ba dag gis chang 'thungs na shas cher @121b ra ro bar mi 'gyur zhing de'i 'gyur bar mi skye'o //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-1: yang de bzhin du kha zas legs par zos zin pa'i rjes la 'thungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-2: zas cher za zhing mang du zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-3: snum bag dang ldan pa'i kha zas zos pa 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-4: rang bzhin gyis snying stobs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-5: lang tsho dang ldan zhing dar la bab pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-6: rtag tu chang 'thungs shing goms pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-7: de'i rigs las skyes pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-8: chang 'thungs shing sred pa'i rigs rgyud du byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-9: bad kan dang tshil gyi shas che zhing mang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-10: rlung ngang mkhris ba shas che zhing brtan pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-11: de thams cad kyis chang 'thungs su zin kyang ra ro bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-12: de las bzlog pa chang dad can //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-13: khros dang chang rtsub skyur shas che //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-14: ma zhur bcas dang mang 'thungs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-15: gang yin shas cher ra ror 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-17: de ltar ji skad bstan pa las go bzlog pa nyams stobs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-18: kha zas ma zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-19: kha zas nyung du zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-22: dar la bab pa las yol ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-23: rtag tu chang mi 'thung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-24: chang 'thungs pa'i rigs su ma skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-25: tshil dang bad kan zad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-26: rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-27: khong pa'i me drod chung zhing mi brtan pa dag gis chang 'thungs na shas cher ra ro bar 'gyur /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-28: yang de bzhin du chang dad can te chang la sred cing yid rton pa dang khros shing 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-29: chang skyur zhing rtsub pa shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-30: de bzhin du chang ma zhu ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-31: snga de zhag 'thungs pa'i chang ma zhu ba'i rjes la 'thungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-32: de bzhin du shin tu mang du 'thungs pas shin tu ra ro bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-33: rlung mkhris bad kan kun las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-34: chang nad rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-36: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi re re dang /
T13TD4312.2E:121b-37: kun 'dus pa las gcig ste chang nad rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-38: kun kyang kun las skyes mod kyi //
T13TD4312.2E:121b-39: shas che ba las ming du btags //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-0: chang nad kun kyang nyes pa gsum char @122a * //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-2: 'on kyang nad gzhi gang dang gang shas che ba de dang de las phye ste ming du btags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-3: de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-4: rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-5: 'khru zhing rtag tu skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-7: / mgo bo rtsib rus na dang 'dar //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-8: gnad 'jig ltag pa na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-9: brla rengs rab rib khyer ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-10: lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid med //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-12: skrang zhing sems ni 'khrul ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-13: bla zhing slon par byed pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:122a-14: / mgo 'khor rmi lam ngan mthong ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-16: chang nad de rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de rnam par dbye ba med par thun mong gi rtags ni 'di dag yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-17: sems rmongs shing shin tu blun bag tu 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-19: 'khru zhing bshang ba sla ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-20: rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par skom dad che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-21: rims tsha ba dang grang ba'i bag dag gis btab par 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-22: yang na tsha grang ste mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-23: mgo la sogs par na ba dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:122a-25: gnad rnams 'jig cing 'bye ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-26: ltag pa'i phyogs na zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-27: brla rengs shing 'gyur ba mi bde ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-28: mig rab rib khyer zhing mi gsal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-29: lud pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-30: sems 'khrul zhing nyams pa la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-31: rlung gyur khyad par gnyid mi 'ong //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-32: dbugs mi bde zhing klad na 'dar //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-34: gshin po rnams dang gtam smra rmi //
T13TD4312.2E:122a-36: rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad ni khyad par bye brag tu gnyid mi 'ong ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-37: de bzhin du rmi lam gyi nang na 'phyan zhing yul gzhan nas gzhan du 'gro bar rmi ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122a-38: nam mkha' la 'phur zhing lding bar rmi ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122b-0: sngon chad shi ba'i nye du la sogs pa gshin po rnams dang lhan cig @122b gtam smra ba rmi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-1: mkhris las lus tsha skad 'gags dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-3: lus mdog ljang dang ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-4: mig dang mkhur tshos dmar bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-6: mkhris pa rgyas pa las gyur pa'i chang nad ni lus tsha ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-7: bad kan gyis slon snying na dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-8: gnyid che grang 'dar yan lag lci //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-10: bad kan shas che ba las gyur pa'i chad nad ni slon pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-11: grang 'dar ni grang lhags kyis phog pa'i lus 'dar ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-12: kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-14: nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las byung ba'i chang nad ni mtshan nyid kun 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-15: chang spangs pa las 'phral du ni //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-17: de las 'joms dang lus skam nad //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-18: rlung las sdug bsngal ldan pa 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-19: nyam chung ba la mchog tu 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-21: chang dang 'phrod par gyur pa las kyang de spangs te dus yun ring por lon pa las chang de nyid mod la mang du 'thungs pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:122b-22: yang na sngar ma goms pa'i chang gzhan 'thungs par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:122b-23: rgyu de las 'joms byed ces bya ba'i nad dang lus skam zhes bya ba'i chang nad gnyis po rlung la sogs pa las sbug bsngal zhing gso bar dka' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-24: rnam pa de gnyis ni skyes bu nyams stobs chung ba la mchog tu shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-25: 'joms pas bad kan mchil ma mang //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-26: lkog ma skams shing gnyid rab che //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-27: sgra grag mi bzod glong bag 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-29: chang nad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan ma bad kan dang mchil ma'i ljan ljin mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:122b-30: de bzhin lkog ma skam pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-31: lud skam yan lag mgo rab na //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-32: snying nad mgul nad rmongs bag dang //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-33: lud pa skom dad slon rims 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:122b-35: chang nad lud pa skam pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-1: mtshan ma ni yan lag dang mgo bo shas cher na zhing mi bde ba nas rims kyis 'debs pa'i bar du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-2: gang zhig chang rnams spangs pas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-3: dbang po thul zhing brtags te byed //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-4: nam yang de la lus sems kyi //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-7: skyes bu gang zhig chang spangs shing chang mi 'thung ba'i brtul zhugs blangs pa de ni dbang po thul zhing zhi la brkam shas chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-8: brtags te byed pa ste bya ba rnams la blo sngon du song bas 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-9: de bzhin du yang skyes bu de'i lus la dus nam yang lus dang sems kyi nad kyi skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-10: lus las byung ba'i nad rims la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-11: sems las byung ba'i nad brjed byed la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing de'i gnod pas nyen par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-12: rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod zas //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-13: mchog tu bsten las nad gsum 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-14: dangs ma khrag dang sems rgyu ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-15: rtsa sbubs bkag pa las byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-16: myos dang brgyal dang kun song nad //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-17: phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab che //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-19: rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin la mchog tu bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-20: kha zas mi 'phrod pa za ba la mchog tu bsten cing gnas par byed pa mi la myos pa dang brgyal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-21: kun du song ba zhes bya ba'i nad de rnam pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-22: de yang dangs ma dang khrag dang sems rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa sbubs lus la gang dag yod pa de bkag cing chod ba las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rgyu byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-23: yang de dag ni phyi ma bzhin du stobs dang nus pa che ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-24: de na myos pa bas ni brgyal ba stobs dang ldan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:123a-25: de bas ni kun du song ba stobs dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-26: 'dir myos nad sna re re kun //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-27: khrag chang dug rnams las kyang 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:123a-29: 'dir myos pa dang brgyal ba dang kun du song ba zhes bya ba gsum gyi nang nas myos pa ni rnam pa bdun te /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-0: nad gzhi re re las @123b gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-2: khrag dang chang dang dug las gyur pa rnams so //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-3: de dag kyang phyi ma bzhin du stobs che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-4: rlung las gtam la chags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-5: mang smra nyung smra spyod pa 'khrul //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-6: lus ni rtsub gnag dmar ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-7: myos pa rlung las skyes pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-9: rlung las gyur pa'i myos pa ni gtam smra ba la chags par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-10: mang du smra ba la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-11: myur du smra zhing rings par smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-12: spyod pa 'khrul zhing nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-14: dmar ba'i bag tu gnas pa ni rlung las skyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-15: mkhris pa las khro dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-16: ser por snang zhing rtsod la dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-18: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i myos pa ni lus kyi mdog dmar zhing ser bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-19: rtsod cing 'thab mo la dga' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-20: bad kan chig nyung 'brel smra skya //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-21: sems las che zhing le lo che //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-23: bad kan las gyur pa'i myos pa ni tshig nyung zhing 'brel par smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-24: kha dog dkar zhing skya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-25: sems las che zhing le lo che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-26: 'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-28: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i myos pa ni mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-29: khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-30: mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-32: khrag las gyur pa'i myos pa ni mig ser zhing har bag tu gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-33: yan lag rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-34: gzhan yang mkhris pas myos pa'i mtshan nyid khro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-35: mdog dmar zhing ser ba dang rtsad pa la dga' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-36: chang gis yan lag skad spyod 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-38: chang las gyur pa'i myos pa ni yan lag dang skad dang spyod pa gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:123b-40: yan lag 'gyur ba ni lus rnam gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:123b-41: skad 'gyur ba ni skad gdangs nyams shing 'gags pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-0: spyod ba 'gyur ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa nyams shing sngar @124a * //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-1: gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-2: dug gis 'dar zhing gnyid rab che //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-3: de ni kun las myos tshabs che //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-5: dug gis myos par gyur pa ni 'dar zhing lus 'gul ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-6: gnyid shin tu che zhing stug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-7: de ni myos pa kun las shin tu tshabs cher myos pa yin te nad kyis gnod pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-8: khrag sogs pa yis rlung sogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-9: mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-11: khrag dang chang dang dug las gyur pa'i myos pa las rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi mtshan nyid lhag par mtshan nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-12: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-13: khrag dang chang dang dug gi mtshan nyid bshad mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-14: rlung la sogs pa gang yang rung ba lhag par gnas pa yin no zhes shes par ro //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-15: de ltar myos pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-16: brgyal ba'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-17: brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-18: nam mkha' dmar sngo gnag par ni //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-19: mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-20: myur du sangs par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-22: skem zhing bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-24: brgyal ba'i nad rlung las gyur pa'i bdag nyid can la ni /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-25: skyes bus nam mkha'i me tog kha dog dmar ba dang sngo ba dang gnag par mthong bar 'gyur zhing mun par zhugs pa snyam du mun 'thibs zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-26: myur du sangs shing dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124a-28: bzhin ras dang lus kyi mdog dmar nag tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-29: mkhris bas dmar ba'am ser por ni //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-30: nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-31: sangs nas rngul dang bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-32: tsha skom gdungs pas nyen pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-33: 'khru zhing kha dog ser dang dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-34: mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:124a-36: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i brgyal ba ni nam mkha'i mdog dmar bo'am /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-0: ser po nyid du mthong par 'gyur @124b ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-1: mun 'thibs zhes byed cing rmongs nas mi dran par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-2: de nas sangs nas dran pa rnyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-3: lus rdul zhing tsha ba la sogs pas gdungs shing nyen par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-4: bshang ba 'khru zhing sla ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-5: kha dog ser zhing dmar bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-6: mig dmar zhing ser bar snang bas lta bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-7: bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-8: nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-9: rings nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-10: snying na bcas pas mchil ma mang //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-11: pags pa rlon pas g-yogs pa bzhin //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-12: yan lag lci zhing tshor ba chung //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-14: bad kan las byung ba'i brgyal bar gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha' gnyis par g-yogs pa lta bur mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-15: mun 'thibs zhes byed cing mi dran par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-16: brgyal nas yun ring zhig nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-17: snying 'phar zhing na ba dang bcas pa'i mchil ma dang bad kan gyi ljan ljin mang po 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-18: pags pa rlon pas g-yogs shing dkris pa bzhin du yan lag dang bcas ba'i lus lci zhing tshor ba chung bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-19: nyes pa gsum gyi mtshan kun ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-20: brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-22: 'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-24: nad gzhi'i nyes pa gsum char gyis bskyed pa'i brgyal ba ni mtshan nyid de dag thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-25: brjed byed gnyis pa yin zhing dran pa nyams par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-26: brjed byed kyis zin pa ltar myur du 'gyel zhing dran pa med par brgyal bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-27: khyad par ni brjed byed kyi gdon lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:124b-28: 'jigs su rung ba'i spyod pa med par gzhan thams cad tshul mthun pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-29: lus can myos dang brgyal ba yis //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-30: nad la shugs yod gyur kyang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-31: rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:124b-32: kun zhugs sman med par mi zhi //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-0: lus can te mi rnams la myos pa dang brgyal ba'i rlung nad la sogs pa'i shugs drag po yod @125a * //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-2: rang nyid sman gyis bcos mi dgos par rang nyid zhi zhing ldog par 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:125a-3: kun du zhugs pa 'am kun du song ba zhes bya ba'i brgyal ba'i nad ni sman gyis ma bcos par zhi zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-4: kun du zhugs pa zhes gang zhig la bya zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:125a-6: nad ni shin tu stobs che ba //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-7: 'dus pa las gyur kun zhugs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-8: srog gi gnas la brten pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-9: lus dang ngag yid spyod pa 'phrog / de yis skyes bu ro dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-10: shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-11: rings par gso bar ma byas na //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-12: myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-14: rlung la sogs pa'i nad shin tu stobs che zhing dkyel cher sogs pa rang gi rgyu'i khyad par gyi tshogs pas nus pa thams cad 'dus par gyur cing gsum char bya ba'i rtsom pa gcig la zhugs shing 'bras bu gcig 'byed par byed pa'i kun du zhugs pa'i nad srog gi gnas snying ga'i gnad la brten cing 'dug par gyur pa na kun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i brgyal ba'i nad du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:125a-15: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa 'phrog cing bsdus nas kun du zhugs pa des skyes bu shi ba'i ro dang 'dra bar 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:125a-16: shing dang rtsig pa ltar sems med par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:125a-17: des na gal te nad de dag gso ba myur du ma byas na myur zhing rings pa nyid du srog dang bral bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-18: mtsho zab chu srin mang po can ;
T13TD4312.2E:125a-20: kun zhugs pa ni nub byed las //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-21: mi ni myur du gdon par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:125a-23: de bas na sman pas kun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nad mi bzad pas zin cing sdug bsngal de'i 'dam du bying ba'i mi myur du gdon bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:125a-24: de yang dper na mtsho shin tu zab cing rtogs par dka' la /
T13TD4312.2E:125a-25: chu srin byis pa gsod la sogs pa'i srog chags gdug pa mang pos gang ba'i chu 'jing pha rol du byung ba'i 'jug ngogs med par nub par gyur pa dag ni /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-0: nyam nga ba'i gnas yin pas myur du gdon dgos @125b pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-1: rigs pas brten dang phral ba'i chang 'thungs pas //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-2: myos dregs khro dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-3: rang gi dgra bos yongs su 'khyud 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-4: rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-6: chang rigs shing 'os par brten pa dang bral ba ste 'og nas smos pa'i stobs dang dus la sogs pa dang sbyar ba med pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-7: rigs par brten pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-8: de lta bu'i rigs par brten pa med pa chang 'thungs pas ni myos pa la sogs par dang gis te /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-9: lus dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dgra bo 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma'i yon tan 'joms shing 'phrog par byed pas dgra bo ltar gnod par byed pa'i dgra bo rnams yongs su 'khyud par gyur cing shin tu brtse bar gyur pha ma yin zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-10: de bzhin du rigs pa dang mi rigs pa cha mnyam zhing mtshungs pa nyid du sems par 'gyur ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-11: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i bye brag phyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-12: stobs dang dus dang yul dang goms pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-13: rang bzhin grogs dang na tshod nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-14: legs brtags de dang rjes mthun gang zhig 'thung //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-15: de ni bdud rtsi 'thungs pa dang mtshungs pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-18: dus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam rang bzhin blos legs par rtogs shing so sor phyed nas de dang mtshungs par skyes bu gang zhig chang ran zhing dus la bab par 'thungs pa de ni bdud rtsi 'thungs pa dang mtshungs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-19: skyes bu rigs pa dang ldan par 'thungs pas gnod pa med par lus bde bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:125b-20: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-21: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-22: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:125b-24: // / de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-0: ji ltar kun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nad bshad ma thag ba de ni srog gi @126a * //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-1: gnas snying la brten cing 'byung ba de bzhin du /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-2: 'dir yang srog gi gnas gzhang la brten te 'byung bas na srog gi gnas la brten par chos mthun pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-3: de'i 'og tu 'di brtsams ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-4: dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-5: gzhang 'brum byung bas gsod byed pas //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-6: de phyir bshang ba'i lam 'gegs pas //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-7: gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-9: gzhang 'brum ni gzhang khar sha'i mdzer pa sbom po skyes pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-10: de ni dgra bo ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe 'phrog cing gzhang 'brum du skyes pas gsod par byed pa'i phyir nges par tshig gi tshul gyis na gzhang 'brum zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-11: nad kyis lpags tshil sha rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-12: gnod byas dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-13: sha yi myu gu gzhang sogs su //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-14: skyes de gzhang 'brum yin par bshad ;
T13TD4312.2E:126a-16: nad ces bya ba ni rlung la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-17: des pags pa dang tshil dang sha rnams la gnod cing ma rungs par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-18: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs shing tha dad pa'i sha'i myu gu sha mdzer sbom po lta bu gnod pa sna tshogs skyed pa gzhang la sogs par skyes shing byung bar gyur pa de la ni gzhang 'brum gyi nad ces bya ba yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-19: lhan cig skyes dang phyis 'byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-20: skam dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-21: dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-23: gzhang 'brum gyi nad de ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-24: la la ni lhan cig skyes te 'byung ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-25: la la skyes nas phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-26: yang de bzhin du skam ba dang gsher ba'i dbye bas kyang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-27: la la ni skam por gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:126a-28: la la ni khrag 'dzag ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-29: gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom por brten //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-30: sor ni phyed dang lnga yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:126a-32: gzhang ni rgyu ma'i zhabs rgyu ma sbom po la brten cing gnas pa de'i tshad ni sor phyed dang lnga yod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-0: gnyer gsum sor ni phyed dang @126b gnyis ;
T13TD4312.2E:126b-2: gzhang de ni gnyer ma'i rim pa gsum re re zhing sor phyed dang gnyis gnyis yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-3: rim pa de yi nang ma ni //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-4: phyir 'phul bar ma sel ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-5: de yi phyi rol 'dzums pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-7: rim pa de rnams kyi rim pa nang ma 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-8: phugs ma ni dri ma rnams phyir 'phul zhing 'bab par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-9: gnyer ma'i rim pa bar ma ni dri ma rnams sel zhing phyir 'byin pa yin pas na sel ba zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-10: phyi rol gyi gnyer ma ni dri ma la sogs pa mi 'byung bar sdom zhing 'dzums par byed pas na 'dzums pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-11: de yi phyi rol sor gcig kha //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-12: nas ni phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-13: de phan chad ni spu skye 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-15: 'dzums pa de'i phyi rol sor gcig ni gzhang kha zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-16: gzhang kha de'i tshad ni nas phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-17: gzhang kha'i tshigs de thams cad ni rkub tu spu skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-18: de la lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-19: gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-22: de la lhan cig skyes pa dang phyis 'byung ba'i gzhang 'brum gnyis las /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-23: lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum 'byung ba'i rgyu ni gnyer ma de 'byung zhing dang por skyes pa nyid kyi tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-24: de'i sa bon khu khrag la sogs pa la rlung las gos par gnod par gyur pa de nyid las gzhang 'brum 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-26: pha mas mi 'phrod zos pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-29: sa bon de la gnod par byed pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-30: pha dang mas kha zas mi 'phrod pa gzhang 'brum skyed pa'i rgyu zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-31: sngon bdag nyid kyis de lta bu'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-33: 'khrugs pa las gyur de dag ni //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-34: gsor mi rung ba nyid du bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:126b-36: pha dang ma'i gnod pa'i rgyu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:126b-37: sngon gyi las de gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127a-0: nad gzhi 'dus par 'khrugs pa gang yin pa las gyur pa de dag ni gang gi phyir gsor mi rung ba nyid yin te lhan cig skyes pa yin pa'i @127a * //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-4: nad gzhan gang yang rung ba kun kyang de dang 'dra ste /
T13TD4312.2E:127a-5: dang po lhan cig skyes pa ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes tshig 'dis ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-6: lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-7: rtsub cing brta bar dka' ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-8: nang du kha bltas dkar ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-9: bla brnan mi bzad can gso dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum de yang khyad par 'di dag dang ldan na lhag par gso dka' ste /
T13TD4312.2E:127a-12: reg pa rtsub par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127a-13: brta zhing brtags par dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127a-14: kha nang du blta zhing phyir mi phyogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127a-16: bla brnan gyi nad mi bzad pa yod pa ni gso dka' zhing bcos su mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-17: cig shos drug ste nad tha dad //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-20: lhan cig 'byung ba las cig shos su gyur pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i gzhang 'brum ni rnam pa drug yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:127a-21: nad tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang 'dres pa las byung ba dang 'dus pa las byung ba dang khrag las byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-22: rlung dang bad kan gnyis las skam //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-23: khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-25: de la gzhang 'brum skam po khrag mi 'dzag pa ni rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pas zin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-26: gzhang 'brum rlan can khrag 'dzag pa ni khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pas zin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-27: nad rnams ldang rgyu sngar bshad pa //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-29: nad rnams ldang zhing 'khrugs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa ni sngar nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i skabs su bshad cing bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-30: 'khrugs pa de yis khong pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-31: me drod nyams shing bshang ba 'phel //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-32: gzhan yang nyal po rab drags dang //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-33: bzhon pas khong 'khrugs stan dag ni //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-34: ma snyoms sra dang tsog pur 'dug /'jam rtsi gce'u sa dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-35: rdo dang gos kyis brud pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:127a-36: shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-0: rtag tu 'khru bar @127b byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-1: bshang dang gci dang 'phyen gyi shugs //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-2: bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-3: rims dang skran dang tshad par 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-4: 'or nad skya rbab be'u snabs kyis //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-5: skem byas gnod par 'gyur ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-7: bud med zla grangs ma tshad 'phyil ;
T13TD4312.2E:127b-8: / zla ba rdzogs pas gzir las 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-9: de 'dra dag dang gzhan yang rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-10: thur sel 'khrugs pas dri ma ni //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-11: gzhang gi gnyer mar de gzhag pas //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-12: de ni mi mngon gyur pas gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-15: nad ldang ba'i rgyu des khong ba'i me drod nyams shing bri la bshang ba zhes bya ba'i dri ma 'phel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-16: rgyu gzhan yang bud med la 'khrig pa spyad pa'i nyal po drags par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-17: bzhon pa las khong 'khrugs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-18: rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pa mi srun pas g-yengs shing 'khrugs par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-19: stan mtho dman ma snyoms pa la 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-20: stan srab pa la 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-21: rtag tu tsog pur 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-22: 'jam rtsi gce'u legs par ma btang bas snad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-23: sa gzhi dang rdo la sogs pas brud de snad par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-24: shin tu rgyun mi 'chad par chu grang mos bkrus shing reg par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-25: rtag par rgyun tu 'khru bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-26: bshang ba la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag cing brnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-27: de dag nyid mi 'byung bzhin du nan gyis btsir ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-28: rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis skem zhing rid par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-29: lus la sogs pa la gnod cing gdung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi spyod pa bsten pa de dag las gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-30: yang bud med rnams la ni nad de dag gi steng du zla ba ma tshang zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-31: mngal na gnas pa'i sems can skye ba'i dus la ma bab cing /
T13TD4312.2E:127b-32: 'phyil ba dang zla ba rdzogs shing tshang bar 'dug kyang de gzir ba ste gnod pa dang bcas par bu btsas pa las gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:127b-33: nad kyi rgyu de 'dra ba de dag dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-0: rnam pa gzhan yang thur du @128a * //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-1: sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs shing gnod par 'gyur bas dri ma sogs par byed de //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-2: gzhang gi gnyer ma'i gnas su bkag nas gnas par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-3: des na gzhang gi gnyer ma de rnams su ni mi mngon par gnas shing gseb tu zhugs pa de dag rul bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pas nyen nas gzhang 'brum skye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-4: de yi sngon tshul me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-5: brla ni rengs shing na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-6: byin pa'i nyva na mgo 'khor zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-7: yan lag na zhing mig gnyis skrang //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-8: bshang ba 'khru ba 'am yang na sri //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-9: rlung chen nang nas 'khyil ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-10: phal cher lte ba'i 'og nas rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-11: nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-13: rgyu ma krul krul zer zhing spo //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-14: skem zhing sgregs pa mang du 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-15: gcin mang bshang nyung yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-17: mgo dang rgyab dang brang du gzer //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-18: snyom zhing kha dog nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-19: glong bag dbang po nyam chung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-20: khro zhing bsnyen bkur dka' ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-21: ma zhu skem nad skya rbab dang //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-22: dmu rdzing rnams la som nyi skyes //
T13TD4312.2E:128a-24: gzhang 'brum de rnams kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul lam /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-25: gzugs ni pho ba'i me drod nyams shing bri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-26: brla thog thag na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-27: byin pa gnyis kyi nya gcus pa snyam du sems shing na ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-28: bshang ba ched 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sla la /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-29: ched 'ga' ni sri zhing rtug skam du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-30: rlung che zhing mang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-31: rgyu ma'i lam bkag nas nad nang du 'khyil zhing mi thon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-32: de nyid kyis na phal cher nad lte ba'i nang na rgyu zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-33: phan tshun gzer ba'i nad dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-34: rgyu ma'i nang kun du bcad pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-35: 'byung bar dka' zhing thogs la phyir 'byung ba yang sgra can du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-36: rgyu ma'i nang phan tshun krul krul zer zhing 'khrog pa dang sbo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-37: skem zhing rid pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128a-38: sgregs pa dud pa dang 'dra bar dku bar 'ong zhing skyur bar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-0: mgo la sogs @128b pa gzer zhing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-2: las la mi brtson pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-4: thal ba'i rang bzhin gyi kha dog las gzhan du gyur ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-6: dbang po nyam chung zhing rang rang gi las la 'jug mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-8: bsnyen bkur dka' zhing sdug bsngal bas bsnyen bkur bya dgos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-9: ma zhu ba'i gnas dmu rdzing gi bar gyi gnas rnams yod par som nyi skyes shing dogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-10: gzhang 'brum skye bar gyur pa la //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-13: gzhang 'brum gyi nad skyes shing byung bar gyur pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-14: sngar byung ba'i tshul gyis rtags 'di dag nyid 'phel zhing de'i tshul gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-15: de yis 'og gi lam bkag pas //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-16: thur du sel ba'i rlung ldog ste //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-17: lus dang dbang po kun gnas pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-18: rlung gzhan thams cad 'khrugs par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-19: de bzhin bshang gci mkhris pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-20: bad kan lus zungs rten bcas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-21: 'khrugs shing me drod nyams par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-23: gzhang 'brum des 'og gi lam bshang sgo zhes bya ba bkag pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'byung bar ldog pa na lam bkag pa'i phyir rlung de slar ldog par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-24: de ltar ldog pa des lus dang dbang po'i tshogs kun la gnas shing brten pa'i rlung dang me dang mnyam du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-25: khyab byed dang stod du rgyu ba dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:128b-26: srog ces bya ba thams cad 'khrugs shing g-yo bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-27: de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa rten nam gnas dang bcas pa dang 'khrugs shing g-yo bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:128b-28: khong pa'i me drod kyang nyams par byed do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-29: de nas gzhang 'brum nad can la //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-30: phal cher thams cad nyer 'byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-31: skem zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-32: stobs zad khong rmya bzhin mdangs nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-33: lus lhod snying po med 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:128b-35: bla brnan ma lus dag gis 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-2: lud pa skam dang skad 'gags dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-3: khas ro mi tshor cham 'debs spo //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-4: sgyid skyur rkang lag na zhing slon //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-5: sbrid pa skrang dang rims nad dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-6: khu ba zad cing rab rib slon //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-7: rde'u chags nad kyis gzir ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-8: skad 'gags zhum la sems khong chud //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-10: rus tshigs kun dang snying lte ba //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-11: gzhang dang rna rtsar gzer dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-12: gzhang nas 'bru ni ma smin btsos //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-13: khu ba lta bu'i sbyin bag 'dzag / rtug skam spyin pa'ang sla bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-14: smin dang ma smin bar bar 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-15: skya zhing ser dang sngon po yi //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-18: de nas sngon po'i tshul gyi 'og tu gzhang 'brum gyi nad can la phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshul ni skem zhing sbeg pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-19: mchog tu smra 'am shin tu bskyod par mi nus shing rtsol ba chung pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-20: nyams stobs zad cing nus pa chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-21: khong pa rmya zhing sgyid zhan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-22: bzhin mdangs nyams shing bzhin ras kyi mdog mi sdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-23: lus lhod cing bya ba mi lcogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-24: snying po ltar sra zhing mkhrang ba'i bag med de /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-25: de yang dper na 'bus zos pa'i shing ltar shin tu snyi zhing snying po med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:129a-26: de bzhin du bla brnan gyi nad du ma gzhan ji skad bshad pa rnams kyis kyang 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-27: de bzhin du sngar ji skad bshad pa'i gnad rnams gzir zhing gnod par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-28: de bzhin du lud pa la sogs pas gnod cing nyen par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-29: yang de bzhin du skad 'gags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-30: skad gsang zhum par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-31: sems khong du chud cing yid la byed pas gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-32: mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing bad kan las kyis ljan ljin mang du 'dor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-33: yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129a-34: de bzhin du ma smin pa btsos pa'i khu ba lta bur sbyin bag tu 'dug cing 'byil ba gzhang kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-0: de bzhin du bar skabs bar skabs @129b su lan 'ga' ni bshang ba sri zhing 'gags pas rtug skam du 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-1: lan 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sla bag tu 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-2: de bzhin du lan 'ga' ni smin par 'khru /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-3: lan 'ga' ni ma smin par 'khru ba nas sbyin bag tu 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-4: gzhang 'brum rlung shas che las gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-5: skem zhing tseg tseg tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-6: rnyid cing dmar nag rengs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-7: mi snyoms rtsub cing sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-8: phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-9: rtse mo rno zhing gas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-10: bim pa rgya shug khardzu ra //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-11: ras bal sa bon dang 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-12: la la ka dam me tog 'dra ;
T13TD4312.2E:129b-13: / la la yungs kar lta bur skyes //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-14: mgo dang phrag pa rtsib logs brla //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-15: chu so dag tu lhag bar na //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-16: sbrid pa sgregs pa bshang ba sri //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-18: lud dbugs mi bde me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-19: rna ba sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-20: des nyen rtug skam nyung du ni //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-21: sgra bcas ska sla 'dren ma dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-22: na zhing lbu ba 'byar bag can //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-24: pags pa sen mo bshang gci dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-25: mig dang gdong ni gnag par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-26: skran dang mcher pa dmu rdzing dang //
T13TD4312.2E:129b-29: gzhang 'brum gyi nad rlung gi shas che zhing rgyas pa las ni gzhang 'brum skam zhing khrag mi 'dzag cing skam pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-30: yungs kar gyi lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba'i bag tseg tseg por byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-31: rnyid cing rtse mo yo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-32: mdog dmar nag tu 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-33: phur pa ltar rengs shing 'greng ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-34: dbyibs mtho dman mi snyoms pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-35: sog le'i kha ltar rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-36: rdo la reg pa ltar sra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-37: dbyibs phan tshun gcig la gcig mi 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-38: yo zhing gzhu ltar gug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-39: rtse mo ltar rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-40: rtse mo gas shing kha bye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-41: bim pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu dmar po zhig yod pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-42: rgya shug phra mo'i 'bras bu'am shing kha rdzu ra'i 'bras bu'am ras bal gyi sa bon dang 'dra zhing mtshungs par skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:129b-43: yang la la ni ka dam pa'i me tog dang 'dra bar skye la /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-1: 'brum la la yungs kar gyi tshad tsam du phra ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-2: yang de bzhin du mgo bo la sogs pa lhag par na zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-3: sbrid pa la sogs pa mang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-4: bshang ba sri ba la sogs pa nas /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-5: rtug skam gyi tshul gyis bshang ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-6: pags pa la sogs pa gnag par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-7: yang rlung gi gzhang 'brum de nyid las skran la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-8: mkhris shas che la rtse mo ni //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-9: sngo zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-10: phra zhing dri ma rnam khrag sla 'dzag / srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-11: mcher pa'i dum bu ne tso'i lce //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-12: srin pu pad pa'i mchu 'drar snang //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-13: tsha zhing rnags la rims dang rngul //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-14: skom dad yi ga 'chus rmongs skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-15: bshang dro sla zhing sngo la tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-17: nas rul nang 'dra pags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-18: sen sogs sngo ser ljang bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-20: mkhris pa shas che ba las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum ni 'brum bu'i rtse mo sngon po dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-21: kha dog dmar ser dang dkar por snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-22: phra zhing chung ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-23: mtsher pa'i dum bu la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam pa 'dra ba tsha ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan rked pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-24: bshang ba dro zhing sla ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam par 'khru ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-25: nas rul ba'i nang gi dbyibs 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130a-26: pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang bzhin dang dri ma rnams sngo zhing ser ba dang ljang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-27: bad kan shas che rtsa ba sbom //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-28: mthug cing nad kyi shugs dal dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-29: skrangs shing rgyas la snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-30: 'greng zhing zlum la lci zhing brtan //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-32: g-ya' zhing reg na dga' bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-33: ka ri ra pa na sa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-34: rus pa ba yi nu sor 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-35: chu sor zug cing sbo gzhang na //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-36: lte ba lgang pa bcad snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-37: lud pa dbugs mi bde snying na //
T13TD4312.2E:130a-39: gcin sri mgo bo tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-0: grang ba'i @130b rims ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-1: kha chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-2: slon zhing ma zhu'i nad kun skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-3: bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan mang //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-5: 'dzag par mi byed rdol mi byed //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-6: pags pa la sogs snum zhing dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-8: gzhang 'brum bad kan shas che zhing bdo ba las gyur pa'i nad ni rtsa ba sbom zhing che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-9: mthug cing lhun che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-10: nad kyi shugs dal zhing mi drag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-11: mdog dkar ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa nas reg na dga' ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-12: shing ka ri ra'i 'bras bu'i rus pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-13: pa na sa'i 'bras bu'i rus pa dang dbyibs 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-14: de bzhin du ba'i nu sor gyi dbyibs 'dra ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-15: de bzhin du chu sor zug pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-16: bshang ba tshil la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-17: khrag la sogs pa 'dzag par mi byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-18: rdol ba'am kha bye bar yang mi byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-19: pags pa dang mig dang sen mo la sogs pa snum zhing mdog dkar bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-21: 'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-23: gnyis pa 'dres pa las byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dag las byung ba de dag 'dres mar snang ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-24: nad gsum 'dus pa las byung ba ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-25: khrag shas che las gzhang 'brum ni //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-26: mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba la //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-27: n+ya gro dha yi myu gu 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-29: shin tu tsha dro na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-30: bshang ba shugs kyis rab btsir las //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-33: sbal pa 'dra zhing khrag zad las //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-34: byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen 'gyur ;
T13TD4312.2E:130b-35: / mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:130b-38: khrag shas che zhing rgyas pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum ni mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa dang 'dra bar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:130b-39: dbyibs shing n+ya gro dha'i myu gu dang 'dra zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-0: @131a * // mdog byi ru'am 'ol ma se ltar dmar ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-1: gzhang 'brum de ni tsha zhing dro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-2: na ba dang bshang ba shugs kyis rab tu btsir ba las 'phral du khrag 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-3: khrag de nyid yang dang yang du shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-5: khrag zad pa las byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal brnag par dka' bas nyen cing gzir bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-6: mdog la sogs pa nyams shing bri bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-7: mdangs phrogs shing nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-8: dbang po nyam chung shing nus pa zhan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-9: mungga ko dra ba'i phye ma //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-10: tsa na ka ri ra sogs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-11: rtsub dang bshang ba sri bas rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-12: rang gnas 'khrugs pa stobs ldan pas //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-13: thur du rgyu ba'i bu ga ni //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-14: bkag ste smad du rab skams nas //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-15: bshang ba gci ba 'phyen rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-16: 'gags pas nad ni mi bzad skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-17: de yis khong pa rgyab rtsib logs //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-18: snying gar nad ni shin tu skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-19: lto sbos gsus pa na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-20: snying gcu rgyu ma bcad snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-21: chu sor shin tu zug pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-23: rlung ni gyen du song gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-24: de la slon rims yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-25: snying nad be'u snabs ma zhu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-26: gcin sri bshang ba 'khru ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-27: 'on dang rab rib dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-28: mgo nad lud pa cham pas 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-29: yid kyis 'gyur ba skom dang khrag / mkhris pa skran dang dmu rdzing sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-30: rlung gi nad gtogs de dang de //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-33: 'di ni mchog tu gnod byed yin //
T13TD4312.2E:131a-36: rtsa 'bru ko dra ba la sogs pa rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-37: bshang ba sri bar byed pa'i zas kyis thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung gi gnas 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur pa stobs dang ldan zhing nus pa che bas thur du rgyu zhing 'bab pa'i bu ga gang yin pa de bkag cing bcad nas /
T13TD4312.2E:131a-38: ro smad du bshang ba de dag rab tu skams nas /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-0: bshang ba dang gci ba dang 'phyen rnams bkag @131b cing phyir ma 'thon pa'i nad shin tu mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skyed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-1: bshang ba la sogs pa 'gags pa des khong pa la sogs par nad shin tu gnod pa skyed la /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-2: lto sbos pa dang gsus pa gcus pa lta bur na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-3: snying gcus pa snyam du sems shing mchil ma 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-4: rgyu ma'i nang gris bcad pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-5: chu so'i phyogs su zug cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-6: mkhur ba gnyis la skrang pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-7: rlung de ro stod du gyen du song bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-8: rgyu de las slon pa la sogs pa'i nad rlung las gyur pa'i nad grangs med pa mi bzad pa du ma dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-9: gzhang 'brum gyi rgyus rlung gyen du 'khyil pa las gyur pa'i nad 'di ni mchog tu mi bzad par gnod cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-10: rlung shas che ba'i khong par ni //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-13: khong pa rlung gi shas che zhing lto bar rlung nad rgyas par gyur pa'i srog chags rnams ni gzhang 'brum gyi rgyu de med par yang gyen du 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i rlung nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-14: lhan cig skyes dang nad gsum ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-15: phugs ma'i gnyer mar gang gnas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-16: de dag gsor mi rung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-17: me drod stobs che sogs kyis 'tsho //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-19: gang gi lus la gzhang 'brum lhan cig skyes par gyur pa de ni gsor mi rung ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-20: phyis 'byung ba yin du zin kyang nad gzhi gsum char las skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-21: gnyer ma phugs mar gnas pa gang yin ba de dag kyang gsor mi rung ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-22: yang de ni me drod kyi stobs che ba la sogs pas re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gnas su rung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-23: sogs pa zhes smos pas lus kyi stobs dang /
T13TD4312.2E:131b-26: sngon gyi las la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-27: 'dres las gyur dang gnyer ma ni //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-28: bar mar gnas pa gang yin pa //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-29: lo gcig yan chad lon gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:131b-30: de dag gso dka' yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-0: yang gzhang 'brum nad gzhi gnyis 'dres par @132a * //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-2: de bzhin du gnyer ma rim pa gnyis par brten zhing gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-3: de bzhin du lo gcig yan chad lon zhing lo 'das par gyur pa de dag ni gso dka' ba yin par bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-4: phyi rol gnyer mar byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-5: nad gcig shas che las byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-6: skyes nas ring por ma lon gang //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-7: gzhang 'brum de ni gso bar sla //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-9: yang gzhang 'brum gang phyi rol gyi gnyer ma'i rim par brten zhing byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-10: de bzhin du nad gzhi gcig shas che zhing rgyas pa las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-11: de bzhin du skyes nas yun ring por ma lon zhing lo gcig man chad kyi nang du byung bar gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum de ni gso sla zhing bcos su rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-12: pho mtshan sogs kyi 'og nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-17: rna ba dang sna gong la sogs par yang 'brum bu 'byung mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-18: de dag ni 'og nas lba ba'i nad kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya ba la sogs pa rang rang gi le'u las bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-20: rta bla ba yi kha 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-23: lte bar skyes pa'i 'brum bu ni srog chags rta bla ba zhes bya ba'i 'bu zhig yod pa'i kha dang dbyibs 'dra zhing 'byar bag can la reg na 'jam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-24: pags pa'i mdzer pa smras pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-25: khyab byed kyis ni bad kan bsdus //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-26: pags pa'i phyi rol thor bur byed //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-27: mdzer pa 'dra zhing rtsub par gnas ;
T13TD4312.2E:132a-28: / pags pa'i mdzer pa yin par shes //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-30: rlung khyab byed kyis bad kan gyi tshogs bsdus nas thor bur 'byung bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-31: de yang pags pa'i phyi rol du gnas par byed cing sha'i mdzer pa 'dra bar rtsub cing reg na mi bde bar gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-32: de ni mdzer pa dang 'dra bas na /
T13TD4312.2E:132a-33: pags pa'i mdzer pa yin par mngon shes can gyi drang srong rnams kyis shes shing khong du chud pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-34: rlung gis zug cing rtsub par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:132a-35: mkhris pas gnag la dmar rtsar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-0: bad kan gyis ni snum nyid @132b dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:132b-3: pags pa'i mdzer pa de rlung las gyur pa yin na /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-4: zug cing na la reg pa rtsub par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-5: mkhris pa las gyur na mdog gnag la rtsa dmar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-6: bad kan las gyur pa yin na ni pags pa'i mdzer pa de snum pa nyid dang /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-7: rmen bu'i mdog dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-8: blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-10: de yis gzhang ni myur bkag nas //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-11: dmu rdzing nad ni skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-13: blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa'i sman pas myur zhing rings par 'bad pa dang ldan pas gzhang 'brum gyi nad gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-15: gzhang 'brum gyi nad des gzhang gi sgo myur du 'gags par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-16: 'og nas bshad pa'i dmu rdzing gi nad gang yin pa des skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-17: de'i phyir nad de shin tu myur ba kho nar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-18: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-19: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-20: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-23: // / de nas tshad par 'khru ba dang pho ba'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-25: gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-26: zas dang rlung dag shugs dgag pa la sogs pa rgyu thun mong yin pas bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-27: nad gzhi sna re kun dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-28: 'jigs dang mya ngan las gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-29: tshad par 'khru ba rnam drug yin //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-31: tshad par 'khru ba'i nad ni rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi sna re las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-32: kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-33: de bzhin du 'jigs pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:132b-34: mya ngan las gyur pa ste ;
T13TD4312.2E:132b-35: tshad par 'khru ba ni rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-36: de ni chu 'thungs drags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-37: sha rid sha skam ma goms pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-38: til gyi khu ba ma smin 'bru //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-39: chang rtsub kha zas tshod ma zin //
T13TD4312.2E:132b-40: gzhang 'brum snum bag drags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-2: yang tshad par 'khru ba de ni chu 'thungs drags pa la sogs pa las shin tu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-3: yang de bzhin du sha rid dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-4: sha skam rul bag zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-5: de bzhin du sngar za ma myong zhing ma zos par til btags pa'i khu ba zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-6: de bzhin du ma smin pa'i 'bru las byas pa'i kha zas zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-7: chang rtsub cing mang bar 'thungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-8: de bzhin du zas kyi tshod ma zin par gsud bag tu zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-10: snum bag mang du zos shing drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-11: lto na srin bu yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-12: bshang ba la sogs pa'i shugs bkag pa las kyang chad par 'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-14: chu khams thur du bskyod gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-15: de nyid kyis ni me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-16: de 'og khong pa khyab nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-17: bshang ba sla ba nyid du byed ;
T13TD4312.2E:133a-20: 'dir ma bshad pa de dang tshul mthun pa dag gis rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-21: chu'i khams lus la gang yod pa thur du bskyod cing 'byung bar byed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-22: de'i 'og tu de'i khams de nyid kyis pho ba'i me drod shin tu nyam chung bar byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-23: de nas de'i 'og tu chu'i khams de nyid kyis lto ba'i nang bshang bas khyab par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-24: de nas bshang ba de sla zhing gsher bag nyid du byed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-25: tshad par 'khru ba ni tshul de ltar 'byung ba yin par bshad cing brtags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-27: bshang lam snying ga lto bar zug / lus snyom bshang ba sri ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-28: sbo zhing kha zas mi 'ju ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-30: tshad par 'khru ba de phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma'am rtags ni bshang ba las gzhang kha'i phyogs dang snying ga dang lto ba'i phyogs su zug cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-31: lus dang yan lag snyom zhing lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133a-32: bshang ba sri ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-33: de las rlung gyur bshang chur bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:133a-34: nyung zhig 'byung zhing gzer sgra bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-1: rtsub sla lbu bar bcas pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-2: gong bur yang dang yang du 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-3: de bzhin bu ram tshig pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-4: sbyin bag bcas shing bcad snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-5: kha skam gzhang ni snad pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-6: spu langs ba dang 'khru ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-8: tshad par 'khru ba de dag gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba ni bshang ba na ba dang chur bcas te /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-9: chu rul ba lta bu 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-10: mkhregs shing nyung zhig 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-11: sgra dang bcas shing gzer ba dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-12: 'gags shing ska bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:133b-14: sla zhing rkyang rkyang por 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-15: lbu ba dang 'dren mar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-16: gong bur chags shing bar bar na mdud pa yod ba 'dra bar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-17: yang dang yang du skad cig ma re rer 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-18: de bzhin du bu ram tshig pa'i mdog 'dra bar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-19: sbyin bag la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'khru ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-20: mkhris pas ser zhing gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-21: sngo zhing du ba'i mdog 'dra la //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-22: khrag bcas shin tu dri mnam pa //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-23: skom dad brgyal tsha rdul dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-24: gzer bcas gzhang kha tsha dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-25: gzhang khar thor bu 'byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-27: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-28: 'khru ba'i mdog ser po la sogs par 'khru bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-29: tshig gi don ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-30: bad kan las gyur ska ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-31: 'byar bag ska zhing nal nal po //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-32: snum zhing be'u snabs bad kan bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-33: rgyun du 'khru zhing lci la mnam //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-34: ska zhing nad rjes 'brang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-35: gnyid che khong snyom yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-36: nyung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-37: ba spu brtse zhing glongs bcas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-38: chu so lto ba gzhang kha lci //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-39: bshang yang bshang ba ma btang snyam //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-41: bad kan las gyur pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni 'khru ba ska zhing gar gar por 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-42: 'byar bag la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:133b-43: khong snyom pa ni bya ba rnams la spro ba chung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:133b-44: glongs pa ni nad rnams bskyod par gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-0: lci ba ni chu so dang @134a * //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-1: lto ba dang gzhang kha kun tu lci zhing sbom pa snyam du sems pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-2: bshang yang bshang ba ma btang ba snyam du sems pa ni bshang ba bshang zhing 'dor du zin kyang khong lci bsam bshang ba snyam du sems shing yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-3: kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
