T13TD4312.2E:134a-5: nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-7: rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-8: sla byed de nas 'khru ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-9: tsha zhing sla la 'phyo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-10: mtshan ma rlung mkhris las byung 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-11: mya ngan las byung de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-13: 'jigs pa'i rgyus sems 'khrugs shing glongs par gyur pa rlung gis mkhris pa dang bcas pa'i bshang ba sla zhing gsher bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-14: de nas de'i 'og tu tshad par 'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'khru ba'i rang bzhin tsha zhing dro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-15: sla zhing gar bag med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-17: mtshan ma rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba dang 'dra ba yin par slob dpon rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-18: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshad par 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid kyang rlung dang mkhris ba las byung ba'i tshul de dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin par bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-19: mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-20: ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-23: tshad par 'khru ba ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-24: smin pa dang ma smin pa'i rnam pa 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-25: khrag dang bcas pa'am khrag med pa'i rnam pas so //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-28: dri mnam lto ni sbo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-29: mkhregs shing mchil snabs shin tu mang //
T13TD4312.2E:134a-31: tshad par 'khru ba smin pa dang ma smin pa de gnyis kyi nang nas /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-32: dang po ma smin pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'khru bar 'byung ba'i bshang ba de rang bzhin lci zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-33: chu la bcug na nang du 'bying zhing nub par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-34: dri mnam zhing nga ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:134a-35: lto sbo ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-0: smin pa de las bzlog @134b pa yin ;
T13TD4312.2E:134b-2: bshang ba smin pa'i mtshan nyid de las go bzlog pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-3: bshang ba yang zhing chur mi 'bying ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-4: lhag par dring ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-5: lto sbo pa la sogs pa med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-6: bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'bying //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-8: bad kan gyi rgyu las tshad par 'khru ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-9: smin zhing ma zhu ba med pa yin yang chu'i nang du 'bying bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-11: med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-13: skyes bu gang la tshad pa'i nad kyis thebs par gyur nas spang bar bya ba'i dngos po spang bar bya ba la 'bad pa med par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-14: des grang ba la sogs pa'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-15: me drod nyams par byed pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-16: zas bsten pa yis me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-18: pho ba'i nad de yang khong pa'i me drod nyams par byed pa'i kha zas dang btung ba bsten zhing longs spyod pa las me drod nyams shing grang ba'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-19: pho ba'i nad dang tshad par 'khru ba la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-21: gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-22: be'u snabs bcas dang be'u snabs med //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-24: rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-26: nad kyi khyad par gang dag gis zas zhu bar gyur nas bshang ba be'u snabs dang bcas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-27: be'u snabs med pa'i rnam par 'khru bar gyur pa ni tshad par 'khru ba zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-28: de ni rang gi rang bzhin gyis myur du gsod cing gnod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-29: ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-31: rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-32: rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-33: pho bar ma zhu sogs shing 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-34: yun ring na bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-36: pho ba grang ba'i ma zhu ba'i nad ni bshang ba ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs sam /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-37: zas dang bcas par nges par 'khru bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:134b-38: zas zhu nas ni bshang ba sri bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas ma smin par 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:134b-39: yang rgyu med par glo bur du bshang ba de yang dang yang du sri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135a-0: @135a * // yang lan 'ga' ni rgyu med par bshang ba de sla bar yang dang yang du 'byung zhing 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-1: yang pho ba'i ma zhu ba de ni yun ring du sogs shing bshang ba 'khru ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135a-2: yun ring por na bar byed cing myur du gsod par mi byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-3: de ni nad sna re re 'dus ;
T13TD4312.2E:135a-4: / las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-6: pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad de ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:135a-7: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi re re nas skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135a-8: 'dus pa las byung ba'i bzhi yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-9: de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-11: mchil mang kha yis dri mi tshor //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-12: rmya snyom skom zhing yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-13: lto sbo slon ni bro ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-14: rna ba rgyu ma sgra dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-16: pho ba ma zhu ba grang ba'i nad de phyis 'byung ba'i tshul ni yan lag snyom zhing nyam chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135a-17: pho ba'i me drod zhan zhing zas rid nas 'ju ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135a-18: de bzhin du sgregs pa skyur bag 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-19: spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-20: du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-21: brgyal zhing mgo na bshang ba 'gags //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-22: rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-24: pho ba'i nad bzhi char gyi spyi'i thun mong gi mtshan nyid ni lus skom zhing rid pa nas rkang pa dang lag pa skrangs par 'gyur ba'i bar yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-25: de la rlung la rkan skams shing //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-26: rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-27: rtsib logs brla dang chu sor na //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-28: bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-29: yang yang sbo zhing gsud pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-30: ro rnams kun la brkam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-31: bkres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-32: zas zhu nas ni sbo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-33: zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-34: rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-35: mdzer pa skya rbab 'byung bar dogs //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-37: de yang be'u snabs sgra can 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-38: gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:135a-40: de la pho ba'i nad bzhi po'i nang nas rlung la sogs pa'i pho ba'i mtshan nyid ni rkan skams par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135a-41: mig rab rib kyis 'debs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-0: rna @135b bar sgra zi zi por 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-1: rtsib logs la sogs pa na bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-2: mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro rnams kun la brkam zhing chags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-3: rgyu ma bcad pa bzhin du sems shing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-4: zas zhu nas lto spo bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-5: de ltar na na bas kha zas zos shing longs spyad na sla bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-6: rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad la sogs pa 'byung bar dogs shing yid gnyis su 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-7: yun ring zhig na bshang ba 'byung zhing thogs la na bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-8: ska ba dang sla ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ldan par 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-9: mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-11: mnam zhing sgregs skyur snying lkog tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-12: yi ga 'chus zhing skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-14: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho ba'i nad ni 'khru ba sngo zhing ser ba 'dres mar 'byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-15: ser por 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-16: bad kan las gyur 'ju dka' zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-17: zas slon yi ga 'chus pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-18: khar chags mchil ma mang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-19: lud pa snying nad cham pas 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-20: snying ga mer mer por sems shig / lto ba chor ba chung zhing lci //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-21: sgregs pa dri mnam mngar 'byung snyom //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-22: bud med mi dga' me drod chung //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-25: rid pa min yang nyams stobs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:135b-27: bad kan las gyur pa'i pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad kyis 'khru ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-28: kha zas 'ju bar dka' zhing ring zhig nas 'ju bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-29: snying mer mer por gyur cing khengs pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-30: lto bar tshor ba chung zhing lus lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-31: sgregs pa mnam zhing shas che ba'i legs par mi 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-33: bud med la dga' ba med cing nyal po la mi gdung ba dang me drod chung zhing bshang ba be'u snabs la sogs pa dang ldan par 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:135b-34: rid pa ma yin zhing sha ma zad kyang nyams stobs chung zhing nus ba zhan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-3: nad gzhi gsum char las byung ba'i pho ba'i nad ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan zhing rtags kun tu 'dres pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-4: ma snyoms la sogs me drod gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-5: yan lag char phye gang bshad pa //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-6: de yang pho ba'i nad du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-8: ma snyoms pa la sogs pa'i me drod gsum po ste /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-9: me drod ma snyoms pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-10: me drod shas che zhing rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-11: zhan zhing rtul ba gsum po lus kyi gnas su yan lag char phye ba'i skabs su bshad pa gang yin pa de yang pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-12: snyoms pa bder gnas rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-14: yang me drod ma nyams shing snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni lus bde bar gnas shing nad med pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-15: rlung nad rde'u nad mdze nad dang //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-16: gcin snyi dmu rdzing mtshan par rdol //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-17: gzhang 'brum pho nad ces bya brgyad //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-18: nad chen gso bar dka' ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-20: pho ba'i nad kyi zhar la rlung nad la sogs pa brgyad po ni nad chen po yin zhing shin tu gso dka' ba yin par bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-21: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'brel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-22: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-23: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-25: // / de nas gcin 'gags pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-27: 'di brtsams pa'i 'grel pa ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-28: dri ma reg pa'i nad gzhi'i le'u bshad nas /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-29: gci ba zhes bya ba'i dri ma dangs pa'i nad gzhi'i le'u gnyis kyis bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-30: gcin 'gags pa ni gcin sri ba la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:136a-31: de'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-32: lgang pa lgang pa'i mgo pho mtshan //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-33: rked pa rlig pa gzhang kha ni ;
T13TD4312.2E:136a-34: / gzhang kha'i rus par brten gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-35: gcig tu 'brel ba yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:136a-37: lgang pa la sogs pa lus kyi char gtogs pa rnams ni 'brel ba gcig cing mdor bsdus pa gcig yin par bshad la /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-0: de dag gi gnas sam rten ni gzhang gi @136b nang na gnas te de dang 'brel lo zhes bya ba'i don no //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-1: lgang pa kha ni thur bltas kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-2: gcin 'dzag pa yi rtsa sgo nas //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-5: zhugs pa gang yin de yis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-6: gcin 'gags pa dang gcin snyi ba'i ;
T13TD4312.2E:136b-7: / gso dka' gnad la brten pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-8: nyi shu skyed par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-10: gang gi phyir lgang pa de ni kha thur du bltas te gnas pa yin du zin kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-11: gcin 'dzag cing rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa'i sbubs phra mo las rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag cing 'bab par byed pa'i rtsa'i ngos gnyis na gnas pa de las gcin gyi phre'u 'dzag pas lgang pa 'gengs par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-12: gang las zhugs pa'i rtsa de nyid kyi sgo nas rlung la sogs pa'i nad zhugs nas /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-13: de las gcin 'gags pa'i nad nyi shu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-14: gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu gso zhing bcos par dka' ba'i gnad kyi nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-15: lgang pa chu so pho mtshan na //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-16: cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-17: sri ba rlung las gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-19: rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-20: skyes bu lgang ba dang chu so'i phyogs pho mtshan lhag par na zhing ;
T13TD4312.2E:136b-21: / gcin cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-22: mkhris pa las gyur ser tsha na //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-25: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i gcin gyi mdog ser por 'byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-26: mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dra bar 'byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-27: de dag kyang tshab dang na ba dang bcas par 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-29: lgang pa pho mtshan lci zhing skrangs //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-32: bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin 'gags pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-33: lgang pa dang pho mtshan gnyis lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:136b-35: 'byar bag dang bcas shing thogs pa dang bcas pas 'gags shing gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:136b-36: nad kun las byung mtshan kun ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-0: nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa'i gcin sri ba ni nad kyi mtshan nyid gsum car dang @137a * //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-2: gang tshe rlung gis lgang pa'i kha //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-3: bkag pa de tshe gcin mkhris pa //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-4: bad kan khu chur bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-5: rim gyis skams par byas pa las //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-7: ba lang mkhris par gi wang ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-8: thams cad bad kan la brten 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-10: gang gi tshe rlung gis nad 'khrugs par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-11: lgang pa'i kha bkag nas gnas pa de'i tshe gcin mkhris pa dang bcas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-13: khu chu dang bcas pa rim gyis skam par byed kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-14: gcin 'ba' zhig skam par ni mi byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-15: de'i tshe ni rde'u chags par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-16: de yang mi bzad par na la /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-17: gso dka' zhing thogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-18: de yang dper na ba lang gi mkhris pa skam zhing 'thas pas rim gyis gi wang skye ba dang 'dra bar rde'u chags par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-19: de yang thams cad bad kan la brten zhing gnas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-20: 'di yi sngon tshul mtshan nyid ni //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-21: lgang pa sbo zhing de yi ni //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-22: nye 'khor kun tu rab tu na //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-23: gcin yang lhag par dbre bro zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-26: de nas rde'u chags pa 'di'i sngon byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam rtags ni lgang pa spo zhing rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-27: de bzhin du de'i nyen kor lgang pa'i mgo dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-28: pho mtshan dang rlig pa la sogs pa kun tu thog thag rab tu na zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-29: gcin dbre ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-30: spyi yi mtshan nyid lte ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-31: lgang mgo lgang pa'i srubs na zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-32: de yis gcin 'byung sgo bkag pas //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-34: de byung zin nas bde bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-35: sla zhing ba lang tshil 'dra la //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-36: de bskyod pa yis khrag tu 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-37: drag shul spyod pas rab tu na //
T13TD4312.2E:137a-39: spyi'i mtshan nyid dang thun mong gi rtags ni lte ba la sogs par na zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-40: rde'u chags pa des gcin 'byung ba'i rgyun srang gi sgo bkag pas /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-41: gcin gyi rgyun chad cing srus srus 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137a-42: de byung zin zhing de dang bral nas bde bar byed pa yin pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-0: yang na rde'u sa bkag pa @137b de bzhin du gyur na bde bar 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-1: gcin 'byung ba de yang dangs shing sla la ba lang gi tshil 'dra ba 'byung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-2: yang de bskyod cing rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pas g-yengs par gyur na khrag tu 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-3: drag shul gyi spyod lam tshar bcad de rgyug pa 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-4: smyung ba byas pas rab tu na zhing mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-5: de la rlung gyur shin tu na //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-7: pho mtshan nyid cing lte ba 'tshir //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-8: rgyun du na zhing mkhun par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-10: gcin gyi thigs pa yang yang 'ong //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-11: rde'u gnag cing rtsub pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-12: chu sor tsher mas gang snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-14: rde'u chags pa de rnams kyi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i rde'u chags par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-15: shin tu na bas gzir zhing de nyid kyis na so 'thams par sdom zhing krig krig 'cha' bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-17: pho mtshan nyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-18: lte ba'i phyogs lag pa gnyis kyis 'tshir par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-19: nyin mtshan rgyun du mkhun zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-20: bshang ba 'phyen dang bcas par 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-21: mkhris pas lgang pa tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-22: btsos pa snyam byed rab tu dro //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-24: rde'u mdog dmar zhing ser la gnag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-25: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rde'u chags pas ni lgang pa shin tu na zhing btsos pa snyam byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-26: de bzhin du rab tu dro ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-27: rde'u'i dbyibs kyang bse shing gi 'bras bu'i dbyibs dang 'dra la /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-28: rde'u'i kha dog kyang dmar ser du 'dug cing rtsa gnag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-29: bad kan gyis bsil lci ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-30: lgang pa'i nang du zug cing na //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-32: sbrang rtsi'i mdog gam yang na dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-34: bad kan las gyur pa'i rde'u chags pas ni reg na bsil ba dang rang bzhin lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:137b-35: lgang pa'i nang lag pas mnyes shing btsugs pa ltar na ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:137b-36: 'di dag byis pa rnams la ni //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-2: bzung dang dbyung ba bde ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-4: rde'u chags pa gsum po 'di dag ni phal cher ram /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-5: mang du byis pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-6: de yang byis pa rnams la 'byung ba ni rde'u bzung ba dang dbyung ba bde ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-8: gnas dang sha chung ba'i phyir te /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-9: lgang pa chung ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-10: sha chung zhing srab pa'i phyir bzung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-11: dbyung ba gnyis ka bde ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-12: mi chen khu ba las byung rde'u //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-14: gnas las 'phos pa phyir ma byung //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-15: rlig par gnas pa rlung gis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-16: skams nas nye bar bsdus gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-17: de ni khu ba rde'u chags yin //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-18: lgang par gcin ni sri byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-19: tsha zhing skrang par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-21: mi chen po lta bu las byung ba'i rde'u 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-22: de yang khu ba bkag pa'i gzhi las byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-23: de yang khu ba gnas las 'phos par gyur cing /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-24: nyal po spyad pa'i bar chad du gyur pas /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-25: phyi ma lam log par song ba de rlig pa dag gi bar na gnas pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-26: rlung gis bsdus te khu ba de skams nas gong por byas pa de ni khu ba'i rde'u chags pa zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:138a-27: de yang lgang par gcin sri ba la sogs par byed cing rlig pa skrang bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-28: de ni skyes ma thag tu ni //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-29: khu ba zhu ste sla bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-31: rde'u skyes ma thag ring po ma lon par khu ba zhu zhing sla bag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.2E:138a-32: / phyogs der mnan na zhu bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-34: rde'u de phyogs gang du chags pa'i phyogs der mnan pa tsam gyis zhu zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-35: rde'u gseg ma lta bur gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-36: rlung gis phye mar bshig gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:138a-41: khu ba rde'u chags pa rlung gis phye mar bshig pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-0: gseg ma lta bu zhes bya ste gseg ma phye ma lta bu de rlung tshul bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur bas ni gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung @138b bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-2: 'khyil na ni rde'u chags par byed kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-3: gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung bar mi byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-4: gcin ni bkag par byas gyur pas //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-5: rlung gis lgang ba'i kha bkag nas //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-8: skyes bus gcin 'byung ba nan gyis bkag par gyur pas de'i skyon gyis rlung gis lgang pa'i sgo bkag nas gcin 'gags shing g-ya' ba'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-9: lan 'ga' rang gnas las spangs nas //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-10: lgang pa rgyas te kha che zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-11: mngal 'dra sbom zhing log par 'dug / der ni na zhing tsha bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-12: 'phar zhing gcus pa snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-13: thigs pa tsam du 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-15: rnam pa gnyis po 'di dag ni //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-16: rlung gi lgang pa'i nad ces bya //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-17: gso dka' gnyis pa rlung gi yin //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-18: mthu che shin tu gso dka' yin //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-22: tshe rabs gzhan gyi rgyu'i dbang gis rang gi 'dug pa'i gnas las spangs shing bskyod de /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-23: lgang pa de rgyas par byas nas kha'i zheng che ba mngal 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-24: sbom zhing log par 'dug pa rang gi tshad las che la gnas las 'phos te log par 'dug par gyur na lgang pa der na ba la sogs par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-25: gcin thogs pa tsam du nyung zhig 'dzag par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-26: lgang pa btsir na rgyun du 'bab cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-27: de ltar rnam pa gnyis po de dag ni rlung las gyur pa'i lgang pa'i nad ces bya ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-28: de ni gso dka' ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:138b-29: de gnyis las kyang gnyis pa ni rlung shas che ba'i phyir shin tu yang gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-30: bshang lam dang ni lgang pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-31: bar na rlung ni brten gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-32: gtun 'dra sra zhing mtho ba dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:138b-33: / mi 'gyur gnas byed mdud pa can //
T13TD4312.2E:138b-34: rlung nad gtun 'dra de sbos bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-0: bshang ba'i lam dang gzhang dang lgang pa'i bar na rlung brten zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de ni gtun 'dra zhing de'i rnam pa can @139a * //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-2: gzhan yang mtho zhing mthug la mi 'gyur bar gnas pa'i mdud pa can lta bu de ni lto sbos pa dang bcas pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-3: log rgyu 'khyil bar byed pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-4: rlung gis chu sor mi bzad gzer //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-5: gcin la zhugs te 'khyil byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-6: rengs byed lci zhing gcus snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-7: gcin ni nyung shas nyung shas 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-8: yang na bshang gci gtong tshe 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-11: rlung thur du rgyu ba'i lam 'gags te 'khyil nas zlum por gnas pa de chu sor brten par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:139a-12: mi bzad pa'i gzer bskyed de gcin la zhugs nas gcin de 'khyil zhing sri bar byed pa la sogs pa'i tshul byed pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:139a-13: yang na gcin nyung shas nyung shas 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-14: de lta bu'i rlung las gyur pa'i gcin nad de ni 'khyil pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-15: gcin ni yun ring bkag gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-17: gcin thon nas ni nad tshabs 'bri //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-19: yang gcin yun ring zhig bkag cing brnag par gyur pa ni phyis gtong ba'i tshe sri zhing bde blag tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la de ni gcin thon nas nad tshabs 'bri ba'i gcin nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-20: gcin bkag pa yis gnod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-21: gang tshe rlung gis bzlog gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-22: lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-23: gcin gyis gang gyur de yi tshe //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-24: rab tu na zhing sbo pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-25: zas mi zhu zhing me drod 'gags //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-26: de ni ltor gcin 'gags zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-28: gcin bkag cing brnag pa'i skyon gyis nad du gyur pa de ni dus gang gi tshe rlung gis gyen du bzlog par gyur pa'i tshe lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar du na ba la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:139a-29: de ni lte bar gcin 'gags pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-31: rlung gis bkag nas gcin nyung 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-32: lgang pa mtshan sbubs nor bur ni //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-33: gnas nas de 'og rim gyis 'dzag / nad bcas pa'am nad med pa //
T13TD4312.2E:139a-34: gcin ni chad dang bcas par 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-0: lhag ma @139b lus te mtshan lci yin //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-2: gcin 'byung ba'i bu ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i skyon nam /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-3: yang na rlung gis bkag pas gcin nyung du 'byung zhing sri bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-4: de yang lgang pa'am mtshan gyi sbubs sam /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-5: pho mtshan gyi rtse mo nor bu zhes bya ba la gnas nas rim gyis 'dzag par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-6: de nad dang bcas pa'am nad med par gcin chad cing sri bag dang bcas pas 'byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-7: 'byung ba'i lhag ma lus pas de mtshan lci bar 'gyur ba yin te pho mtshan khong lci ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-8: lgang pa'i kha nang zlum zhing sra //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-10: gcin sogs rde'u lta bu ni //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-11: gcin gyi mdud par de bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-13: lgang pa'i kha'i nang zlum por gnas la sra bar gyur cing cung zhig 'phral du 'byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-14: de lta bu'i nad de ni rde'u sa 'og gas pa lta bur na la ;
T13TD4312.2E:139b-15: mtshan ma de lta bur na ba la ni gcin gyi mdud pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-16: gcin snyoms pa las nyal po byas //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-17: rlung gis khu ba bskyod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-18: gnas las bskyod cing gcin gtong che //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-19: sngon nam phyi nas thal chu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-21: khu ba 'dres par de bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-23: gcin snyoms shing 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-24: skyes pas bud med la nyal po byas nas rlung gis khu ba bskyod cing g-yos par gyur pas gnas las bskyod cing 'phos par gyur pa de gcin gtong pa'i gcin gyi sngon du 'am gcin gyi phyi nas thal chu dang mdog 'dra bar gyur pa de ni khu ba dang gcin 'dres pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-25: rtsub cing skem la rlung gis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-26: gang tshe rtug skam nad gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-27: gcin 'byung bu gar song nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-28: bshang ba dang 'dres de yi tshe //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-29: gcin ni bshang ba'i dri can 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-30: bshang ba 'gags par de bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:139b-32: skyes bu khong rtsub cing skem por gyur pa dag rlung gi nad kyis gang gi tshe rtug skam gyi nad du 'gyur zhing gyen du bskyur bar gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.2E:139b-33: de'i tshe gcin 'byung ba'i bu gar song zhing kun tu khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-2: des na gcin de bshang ba'i dri ma can du 'gyur zhing 'byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-3: de lta bu'i gcin sri ba de ni bshang ba 'gags pa'i gcin sri ba zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-4: mkhris pa drag shul kha zas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-5: rno tsha nyi tshan la sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-6: 'phel zhing rlung ni zhugs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-7: lgang pa'i nyen kor tsha zhing na //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-9: yang na khrag bcas khrag nyid 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-10: tsha zhing sri la yang yang 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-11: de ni tsha rlung zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-13: mkhris pa'i shas che zhing rtsol ba drag po la sogs pas rlung zhugs pas bskyod par gyur pa la ni lgang pa'i nyen kor tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-14: de ni gcin sri ba'i tsha rlung zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-15: rtsub cing lus ni rmya ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-16: lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-17: gcin zad tsha dang na bar bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-18: skyed pa de yang de skad bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-19: bad kan mkhris pa gnyis ka la //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-20: rlung gis bskyod par gyur na ni //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-21: de tshe gcin sri ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-22: dmar zhing dkar la ska ba 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-23: de ni tsha bcas gi wang ngam //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-25: yang na skam zhing mdog kun ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-26: de ni gcin nyams nad du bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-28: skyes bu khong rtsub cing lus rmya zhing nyam chung bar gyur pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-29: gang gi tshe lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-30: rlung gnyis ni gcin zad pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-31: de yang mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i nad ces bya bar de skad du bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-32: yang gang gi tshe mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis la yang rlung gis bskyod cing g-yos par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-33: gcin shas cher sri zhing kha dog ser po la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-34: de yang tsha ba dang bcas shing gi wang la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i mdog gam /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-35: yang na skam zhing mdog thams cad dang ldan par 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:140a-36: de ni gcin nyams pa'i nad brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don 'gags las byung ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:140a-37: mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-0: @140b de 'og gcin snyi las byung ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-1: nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-3: de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis sngar rnam par spyad pa'i tshul gyis gcin 'gags shing sri ba las byung ba'i nad kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad cing bstan nas //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-4: de'i 'og tu gcin snyi zhing 'dzag pa las byung ba'i nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-5: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-6: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-7: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-9: // / de nas gcin snyi ba za khu'i nad dmigs bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-12: de 'og gcin snyi ba las byung ba'i nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin no zhes gzhung rtsom pa nyid kyis bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-13: gcin snyi'i nad ni nyi shu ste //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-15: gcin snyi ba'i nad ni nyi shur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-16: ste zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-17: de la bad kan las gyur bcu //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-18: mkhris pa las drug rlung gyur bzhi //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-20: de la gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu las /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-21: gcin nad za khu bcu ni bad kan las gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-23: bu ram shing gi khu ba 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-31: kha chu ltar 'byung ba'i za khu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-32: mkhris pa las gyur pa ni drug ste /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-33: nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal chu 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-38: khrag 'dra ba ste rnam pa drug yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-39: rlung las gyur pa ni bzhi ste /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-42: glang po che'i za khu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:140b-43: sbrang rtsi lta bu'i gcin snyi ba'i nad do //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-44: de rnams tshig gcin bad kan skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-45: zas dang skom gyi tshul las ni //
T13TD4312.2E:140b-46: phal cher de dag 'byung bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-1: dang skyur dang lan tshva dang //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-2: lci zhing 'byil la bsil ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-3: 'bru mar chang dang gsher ba'i sha / dar ba bu ram bu ram shing //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-4: gnas gcig stan gcig la rtag gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-5: mal stan cho gar mi ldan la //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-6: brten nad gcin snyi'i nad skyed byed ;
T13TD4312.2E:141a-8: gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu po de dag ni las dang kha zas dang /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-9: spyod tshul dang gcin dang bad kan skyed par byed pa de las byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-10: phal cher te mang du de dag 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-11: gcin snyi ba'i nad skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-12: gzhan yang mngar ba nas bu ram shing gi bar gyi dngos po ming gis smos pa'i zas dang skom yang de 'byung bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-13: spyod lam gyi rnam pa gnas gcig dang stan gcig la rtag tu gnas pa la sogs pa'i bya ba des bskyed par gtogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-14: mal stan cho ga dang mi ldan pa ste stan rlan can dang grang ba la sogs pa'i lam na gnas pa las gcin nad skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-15: bad kan 'khrugs pas lgang bar gcin //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-16: snyi 'gyur lus gsher rngul tshil dang //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-17: sha glongs lgang par brten gcin snyi //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-18: mkhris pas khrag kyang zad byas nas //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-19: bad kan sogs zad gcin nad skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-21: bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las lus kyi gsher ba ga dang rngul la sogs pas glongs shing gnod par byas la /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-22: khrag kyang zad par byas nas bad kan las gyur pa yang zad par byas te ;
T13TD4312.2E:141a-23: gcin la gnas pa'i mkhris pas gcin nad za khu skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-24: rlung 'khrugs pa dang de zad las //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-25: lus zungs lgang par 'khus te skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-27: lus zungs rnams la rlung 'khrugs shing ldang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:141a-28: mkhris pa la sogs pa zad pas dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lus kyi bcud du gyur pa lgang par 'khus shing 'dus par byas nas gcin snyi ba'i nad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-29: de byung gso bya 'tsho tsam dang //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-30: spang bya gcin nad rnam gsum 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:141a-31: mdor na mi mthun bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-0: nad dmigs @141b chen po nyid kyis 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-2: bad kan dang mkhris pa dang rlung de dag las byung ba'i gcin snyi ba'i nad ni gso bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-3: re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gnas pa dang spang bar bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-5: de yang mdor na mi mthun par bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-6: gang gi phyir snum pa la sogs pa rlung nad la phan pa de ni bad kan la gnod la /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-7: gang kha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa bad kan la phan pa de ni rlung la gnod do //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-8: de bzhin du mkhris pa la phan pa bsil ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-9: mngar ba dag ni rlung dang bad kan la gnod de /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-10: gzhan yang nad dmigs chen po'i dpyad kyis kyang 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-11: mi mthun pa gso bas lus zungs zad cing skem pa'i lus 'jig par byed pa'i nad dmigs chen po'i tshul gyis kyang 'byung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-12: de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-13: gcin ni rnyog ma can du 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-14: gnod dang gnod bya khyad med kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-15: de dus khyad par nyid dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-16: gcin gyi mdog sogs dbye ba yis //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-17: gcin snyi'i dbye ba brtag par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-19: gcin nad de thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-20: rtags ni gcin rnyog ma can dul dul po mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-21: gcin snyi'i dbye ba du mar 'gyur ba de ni 'dus shing phrad pa'i khyad par nyid de /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-22: gnod pa dang gnod par bya ba'i 'phel 'bri'i khyad par nyid dang /
T13TD4312.2E:141b-23: gcin gyi mdog dang ro dang dri dang reg bya'i khyad par las gcin snyi ba'i dbye ba brtag par bya zhing yongs su shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-24: dang zhing mang la dkar zhing bsil //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-26: gcin snyi chu yi za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-28: gcin snyi ba'i nad chu'i za khu zhes bya ba ni dang zhing rnyog ma med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i chu'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-29: cung zad rnyog can spyin bag can //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-30: bu ram shing khu lta bur mngar //
T13TD4312.2E:141b-31: za khu bu ram shing khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-0: gcin nad za khu bu ram shing khu lta bu ni cung zad rnyog pa yod pa la sogs pa la bu ram shing @142a * //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-1: gi khu ba ltar shin tu mngar ba'i gcin 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-2: zhag lon na ni ska bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-3: za khu gar po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-5: gcin nad za khu gar po ni gcin mtshan mo 'das kyi bar du ma gcis par bzhag pa ste ska ba gar por 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-6: steng na dangs ma 'og na ska //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-7: chang 'dra chang gi za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-9: gcin nad chang gi za khu zhes bya ba la phyir 'byung ba na steng gi phyogs dangs mar gnas shing 'og ska bar 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:142a-10: de lta bu'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o ;
T13TD4312.2E:142a-14: gcin nad za khu 'bras phye 'dra ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:142a-15: gcin 'byung ba na ba spu ldang zhing ba shor la /
T13TD4312.2E:142a-16: gcin nyid 'bras btags pa 'dra ba dkar por 'byung zhing mang du 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-18: khu ba 'dra ba'i za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-20: gcin nad za khu khu chu 'dra ba ni gcin khu ba dang bcas par 'byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:142a-21: khu ba dang 'dra bar gcis pa la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-22: gcin ni bye tshigs dri ma can //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-23: bye ma'i za khu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-25: gcin nad bye ma'i za khu zhes bya ba ni bye ma'i tshigs ma 'dra bar dri ma lus pa'i gzugs can 'dra ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-26: gcin snyi mang du 'byung zhing bsil //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-27: mngar ba de bsil za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-29: gcin nad bsil ba'i za khu zhes bya ba ni gcin 'byung ba'i reg pa bsil zhing mang du 'byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:142a-30: ro mngar ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-31: dal gyis nyung zad nyung zad 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-32: bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-34: gcin nad bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu zhes bya ba ni gcin 'byung ba'i rgyun dal gyis nyung zad nyung zad du chad cing chad cing 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-35: kha chu 'dra ba'i nal nal po //
T13TD4312.2E:142a-36: 'byil bag kha chu'i za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-0: gcin nad za khu 'dra ba ni kha chu 'dra bar za khu nal nal por 'byung zhing 'byar bag @142b can du 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-1: de ltar bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba bcur bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-2: dri ro kha dog reg bya ni //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-5: gcin nad nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba 'dra ba ni nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'i chu dang dri dang ro la sogs pa 'dra zhing mtshungs pa la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-6: za khu sngon po kha dog sngo //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-8: gcin nad za khu sngon po zhes bya ba ni 'dab ma sngon po'i khu ba 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-9: za khu nag po snag tsha 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-11: za khu nag po ni snag tsha'i mdog ltar gcin nag po 'byung ba la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-12: gcin snyi tsha zhing mdog ser ba //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-13: de ni skyer pa 'dra ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-15: gcin nad za khu skyer pa 'dra ba ni gcin tsha zhing gcin gyi mdog skyer pa'i khu ba 'dra bar 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-16: mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-17: btsod kyi za khu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-19: za khu btsod 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni dri mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra ba mnam pa'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-20: dri nga tsha zhing lan tshvar bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-21: khrag 'dra khrag gi za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-23: za khu khrag 'dra ba ni dri nga zhing mnam la tsha tseg tseg byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:142b-24: cung zad lan tshva bro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:142b-25: khrag ge mdog 'dra bar 'byung ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:142b-26: de ltar na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad drug bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-27: zhag gi za khu zhag dang 'dres //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-28: zhag nyid gcin du 'byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-30: za khu zhag 'dra ba ni zhag 'dren mar 'byung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:142b-31: zhag nyid gcin gyi rnam par 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-33: yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-35: za khu rkang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rkang dang 'dres pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:142b-36: rkang nyid yang dang yang du gcin du za khur 'byung ba ni gcin nad rkang 'dra ba'i za khu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-37: glang chen myos ltar rgyun du ni //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-39: chu ser bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:142b-40: glang chen za khu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-0: @143a * // glang po che'i za khu ni glang po che dregs pas myos pa ltar rgyun du 'byung zhing gcin gyi shugs dal gyis 'dzag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-1: chu ser dang bcas par 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-2: sbrang rtsi'i za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-4: za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra ba zhes bya ba sbrang rtsi dang 'dra zhing ro yang bska ba dang mngar bar 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-5: de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-6: lus zungs zad pas rlung 'khrugs pa 'am //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-7: nad kyis rtsa sbubs bkag ste 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-9: sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khu de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes grags te /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-10: lus zungs rnams zad pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-11: rlung 'khrugs pas nad du gyur ba ni rnam pa gcig yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-12: yang na nad gzhi gsum gang yang rung bas rtsa sbubs bkag ste /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-13: rlung rgyur ma ster ba las byung ba ni rnam pa gnyis yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-14: nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag / de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-15: skad cig zad stong gang 'gyur ba //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-16: gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-18: za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra ba zhes bya ba de rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis lgang pa'i kha bkag cing /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-19: sbu gu 'gags par byas pa'i mtshan ma 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-20: rtags ni 'byung zhing skye ba'i rgyu med par skad cig cing stong par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-21: stong pa nyid las kyang ched 'ga' 'gengs shing gang ba lta bur snang bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-22: de ni gso bar dka' ba nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-23: thams cad dus sum bcos na //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-25: gang zhig thams cad mngar 'gyur bas //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-26: phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-27: sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya kun //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-28: mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:143a-30: gcin nad za khu thams cad kyang sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:143a-32: de thams cad dus su ma bcos shing ma gsos na sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khur 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:143b-0: yang gang zhig gcin nad thams cad mngar ba'i bag las mngar @143b ba las 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:143b-1: phal cher sbrang rtsi lta bu'i mdog can yin pas sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ba'i sgrar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-3: slon lud gnyid che cham pas 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-4: bad kan las byung za khu la //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-7: bad kan las byung ba'i za khu la ni zas mi 'ju ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-8: pho mtshan lgang par zug pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-10: tsha skyur skom dad brgyal dang 'khrugs //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-11: mkhris pa las gyur bla brnan yin //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-13: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin nad la ni pho mtshan dang lgang pa'i phyogs su khab kyis phug pa ltar zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:143b-14: rlig 'bras bye bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-15: rlung las skyes pa'i snying 'phar zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-16: lus 'dar snying na zas la brkam //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-17: gzer zhing gnyid med skem pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-18: lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-20: rlung las gyur pa'i za khu'i nad la ni snying 'phar pa la sogs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-21: kham phor rus sbal 'dra ba can //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-22: sgu po me dpal phra mo dang //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-24: bu bcas 'byung dang bi da ri //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-26: gcin nad ma bcos pa las 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-27: tshigs dang gnad dang sha che ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-30: gcin nad za khu de ma bcos pa las ni kham phor 'dra ba la sogs pa'i 'bras kyi nad bcu po 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:143b-31: de yang khyad par du ni tshigs dang gnad rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:143b-32: sha che ba la sogs pa srog gi gnas su 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-33: mtha' ma mtho zhing dbus ma dma' //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-34: gnag cing rnag dang nad bcas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-35: dbyibs dang tshad ni kham phor 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:143b-36: nor bu kham phor zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-0: 'bras gang mtha' ma kun nas mtho zhing @144a * //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-1: dbus ma dma' bar 'dug pas kham phor gyi dbyibs 'dra la /
T13TD4312.2E:144a-2: kha dog gnag cing rnag dang nad du bcas pa ni 'bras sam thor bu kham phor lta bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-3: nang du zug cing na byed la //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-4: nye 'khor dag tu cher mched cing //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-6: 'bras nad rus sbal can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-8: rus sbal can zhes bya ba'i 'bras nad ni nang du shas cher zug cing na bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:144a-9: rtsa'i nye 'khor du mched cing sbom pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-10: sra zhing rtsa yi dra ba can //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-11: snum zhing 'dzag la khyon che ba //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-12: na zhing nang zug bu ga ni //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-13: phra mor ldan pa dra ba can //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-15: thor bu du ba can zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:144a-17: rtsa ris kyi dra bas khebs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:144a-18: snum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-19: nang du zug cing na la rnags //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-20: rgyab bam lto ba dag tu ni //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-21: thor bu chen po kha dog gnag / sgu bor 'dug pas sgu bor bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-23: 'bras nad sgur po zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:144a-24: nad tshabs che zhing nang du zug la rnag kyang nang du rnags pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:144a-25: rgyab la sogs pa'i phyogs gang yang rung bar skye ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-26: skyes ma thag tu pags pa tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-27: shin tu na byed me dbal te //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-28: dmar zhing gnag la gas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-29: tsha zhing rmugs byed me dpal phra //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-31: me dpal phra mo zhes bya ba'i nad ni skyes ma thag gi rjes thogs nyid la pags pa tsha zhing bsregs ba snyam du sems la /
T13TD4312.2E:144a-32: shin tu na ba'i me dpal kun tu mched par byed cing mdog dmar pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:144a-33: / sran chung 'dra ba'i tshad dang dbyibs //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-34: mnyam pas sran chung can yin te //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-35: tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:144a-36: myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-0: 'brum bu sran chung zhes bya ba ni tshad dang dbyibs sran chung dang 'dra ba @144b yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:144b-1: / de bzhin du tshad dang dbyibs yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran yang yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-2: de ni myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-4: yongs su bskor bas chu bur can //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-5: bu bcas che zhing mang ba la ;
T13TD4312.2E:144b-6: / rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-8: 'bras nad bu bcas zhes bya ba ni yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis yongs su bskor cing /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-9: de bzhin du lhun che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-10: mang zhing shin tu phra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-11: du mas khyab cing g-yogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-12: ldum bu bi da ri ltar zlum //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-13: sra ba bi da ri zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-15: bi da ri zhes bya ba'i 'bras nad ni ldum bu bi da ri zhes bya ba'i dbyibs ltar zlum por gnas la /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-16: rdo ltar shin tu sra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-17: khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-19: khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad ni skabs gzhan du bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-20: 'di'i rjes thogs kyi le'u las bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-21: de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-22: bu bcas dang ni bi da ri //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-23: tshil chen las byung brnag dka' yin //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-25: de la 'bras kyi nad 'di dag gi nang nas dang po'i gsum po khar thor zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-26: rus sbal zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-27: dra ba can zhes bya ba gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-28: bu bcas dang bi da ri zhes bya ba lnga po gal te tshil che ba'i mi 'byung na brnag par dka' zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-29: gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-30: tshil chung las byung brnag nus 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-32: snga ma las gzhan pa'i 'bras nad lhag ma lnga po mkhris pa'i nad las byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-33: mi tshil chung ba las byung ba yin na /
T13TD4312.2E:144b-34: de ni brnag nus shing nad tshabs chung la gso sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-35: de rnams nad shas ji ltar che'i //
T13TD4312.2E:144b-36: gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-0: 'bras bu'i nad de rnams ni gcin snyi @145a * //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-1: ba'i nad kyi dbang las byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:145a-2: rang rang gi nad ji ltar shas che ba bzhin du de'i rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-3: bad kan gyi za khu la ni bad kan shas che bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:145a-4: rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i za khu las kyang rlung dang mkhris pa'i 'bras nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-5: 'di dag za khu med par ni //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-7: ji srid dngos po mi snang ba //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-8: de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-10: thor du'i nad 'di dag ni za khu'i nad med par mi tshil ches pa las nad du gyur pa dag las 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:145a-11: de ni ji srid rang gi dngos po lto dang rgyab la sogs pa gsal por mi snang ba de srid kyi bar du shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-12: kha dog ljang ba'am dmar ba'i gcin //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-13: za khu'i sngon tshul med pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-14: gcin 'byung gang de za khu min //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-15: de ni khrag mkhris yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-17: gang zhig gcin gyi mdog ljang ba la sogs par byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:145a-18: sngon du byung ba'i tshul med pa de ni za khu'i nad yin par slob dpon gyis ma bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:145a-19: gcin ni khrag mkhris kyi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-20: lus rdul yan lag mnam zhing lhod pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-21: stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-22: snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-23: lus sbom skra dang sen mo ring ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-24: bsil bag dga' zhing gre ba rkan skams shing //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-25: kha nang ro mngar rkang mthil lag mthil tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-26: gang du gcis par grog ma 'du 'gyur ba //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-27: gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul //
T13TD4312.2E:145a-29: gcin nad za khu'i tshogs nyi shu po phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags sam tshul sngon du 'byung ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:145a-31: yan lag dring zhing mnam la lhod cing rmya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-0: stan la sogs pa la 'dug pa'i bde ba la chags shing @145b sred pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-1: snying ga la sogs pa lus kyi bu ga rnams su dri ma 'phel bas byugs shing rkyang nul byas pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-2: lus ma thug cing sbom pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-3: de bzhin du skra la sogs pa shin tu ring zhing 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-4: bsil bag la dga' zhing grang ba 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-5: gre ba dang rkan skams par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-6: za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra 'byil ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-7: sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog / lus brtas bad kan can gyi za khu'am //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-8: nyes pa zad pas rlung gi bdag can yin //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-10: gcin nad za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-11: lci zhing 'byil ba shal ma li'i khu ba 'dra bar gnas pa /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-12: sbrang rtsi'i ro ltar mngar ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-13: skyes bu blo dman pa dag tshul gnyis su rtog cing dpyod par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-14: lus kyi nyams brtas par byas pa'i dbang gis ci 'di bad kan las byung ba yin nam /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-15: yang bad kan la sogs pa'i nyes pa zad par byas pa'i nyams dmad pa las byung ba'i rlung gi bdag nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-16: zhes blo zhan pa dag rtog par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-17: sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za khu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-18: gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-19: mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso bar dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-20: gal te tshil nad shas chung gyur gso sla //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-22: sngon byung ba'i tshul gyis lus rngul ba la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba'i bad kan dang /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-23: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i za khu ni gso dka' ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-24: de bzhin du gang yang rim gyis bad kan la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i rlung nad kyi za khu de yang gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:145b-25: de bzhin du mkhris pa las rim gyis byung ba'i za khur gyur pa ni gso bar dka' ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:145b-26: gsor rung ba ni mkhris pa las gyur pa yang yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-0: tshil gyi nad shas che ba yang ma yin na @146a * //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-1: gso bar sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-2: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-3: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-4: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-6: // / de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs dang skran nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-8: gcin snyi ba'i nad gzhi'i le'u'i skabs su slob dpon gyis /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-9: khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-11: de'i phyir 'di brtsams pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-12: rgyu rlugs dang skran nad dag de dang tshul mthun par le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-13: kha zas khengs bu rab tsha dang //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-14: rtsub dang skam dang tsha gyur zos //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-15: nyal ba'i spyod pa mi bde bas //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-16: khrag nad skyed 'gyur de dang des //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-17: pags pa sha tshil rus pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-18: khrag dang chu ba chu ba che //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-19: phyi dang nang du skrangs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-20: rtsa ba che zhing nad tshabs che //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-21: zlum pa'am 'jong par gnas pa gang //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-22: khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug / nad dmigs sna re 'dus pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-23: khrag dang smas pa las byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-25: kha zas g-yos zin nas mtshan mo 'das shing zhag lon pa'i khengs bu la sogs pa rgyud du zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-26: khrag nad skyed par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag tu bsten pa de dang des nad bskyed pas pags pa la sogs pa'i phyi dang nang gi cha la brten te skrangs bar gyur pa gang yin pa de rtsa ba che zhing dbyung bar dka' la /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-27: nad tshabs che zhing brnag par dka' ba'i skrang pa zlum zhing kha zheng che ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-28: 'jong par gnas shing dpangs ring ba gang yin pa de ni khong 'bras zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-29: khong 'bras de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad sna re re 'dus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146a-30: khrag dang smas pa las byung ba ste rnam pa drug yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-31: 'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der //
T13TD4312.2E:146a-32: rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-1: 'dir khong 'bras gnyis yod pa'i nang nas phyi ni lte ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-2: gzhang la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang der mi bzad par rab tu na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-3: mdud pa byas shing brgyus pa ltar rdog rdog por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-5: nang gi shin tu mi bzad cing //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-6: gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-7: grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-8: me dang mtshon ltar myur gsod byed //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-10: nang gi khong 'bras ni shin tu mi bzad cing brnag par dka' bar na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-11: gting ring zhing nang du nub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-12: skran ltar sra zhing rem rem por gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-13: grog mkhar gyis spungs pa'i rtse mo ltar mtho bar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-14: phyi'i khong 'bras pas nang gi khong 'bras myur du gsod par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-15: de yang me dang mtshon gyis myur du gsod par byed pa dang 'dra ba 'dar yang myur du gsod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-16: lte ba chu so mchin mcher pa //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-17: glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-18: mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-20: khong 'bras de ni lte ba dang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-21: de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag / dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-22: 'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-23: ran zhing mgo 'khor sbo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-24: g-yo zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-26: khong 'bras de rlung las gyur pa ni nad tshabs drag cing rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-27: mdog dmar nag tu gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-28: yun ring zhig lon nas 'byung zhing smin pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-29: myur du 'byung zhing smin pa ma yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-30: nad kyi dbyibs mtho dman dang che chung mi snyoms pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:146b-31: tshad ha cang mi che zhing ran pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-32: mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag / skom dang tsha rims rmongs bag skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-33: ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:146b-35: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmongs pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-0: mdog dmar ba la sogs pa gang @147a * //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-1: yang rung ba dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-2: skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan par ldang zhing 'byung ba dang smin zhing rnags pa myur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-3: bad kan las skya g-ya' dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-4: slon zhing bsil la sla ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-5: glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-6: 'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-8: de la bad kan las gyur pa'i khong 'bras ni kha dog dkar zhing skya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-9: g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-10: 'byung ba dang smin pa'i dus yun ring du 'gor ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-13: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras ni mtshan nyid 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-14: 'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-15: don gyi dbang las shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-17: khong 'bras bzhi po 'dir rab tu na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-18: shin tu mi bzad par na ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis phyi dang nang gnyis kyi mtshan nyid don gyi dbang las shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-19: rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa las phyi nang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye bar bya zhing shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-21: rlung las gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid phyi dang nang du rnam bar phye ste ma bshad mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-22: 'on kyang dmar ba nyid la sogs pa phyi rol du snang bar rig pa de ni de nyid las shes par bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-23: gang yang lto sbo ba dang yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa nang gi rnam pa yin par 'thad pa de ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-24: 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag / rab tsha na zhing rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-25: mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi'am nang //
T13TD4312.2E:147a-26: khrag gyur bud med nyid la 'byung ;
T13TD4312.2E:147a-28: khrag las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gang ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:147a-29: mdog ni gnag pa yin zhing rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:147b-0: mkhris pa'i rtags zangs ltar dmar ba la sogs pa @147b dang ldan pa de ni phyi'i yin yang rung nang gi yin yang rung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:147b-1: de ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-2: mtshon la sogs pas smas pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-3: rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-4: rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-5: khrag bcas mkhris pa 'byung bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-6: khong 'bras bla brnan nad mang zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-7: khrag mkhris mtshan nyid can dag byed //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-9: gang mtshon dang rdo la sogs pas smas shing snad par gyur pa des rma byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:147b-10: mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas bsten cing longs spyad pas rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul zhing bskyod pa dang bcas pa'i mkhris pa 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba de las khong 'bras bla brnan gyi nad mang zhing khrag dang mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-11: bla brnan de yi dbye ba yang //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-12: gnas kyi dbye ba las bshad do ;
T13TD4312.2E:147b-14: khong 'bras de rnams kyi bla brnan nad bslangs thabs su byung ba de'i dbye ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:147b-15: rang rang gi gnas sam rten gyi dbye ba las tha dad par gyur bar drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-16: lte bar byung na skyigs bu ste //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-18: khong 'bras de lte bar byung na bla brnan skyigs bu zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-21: chu sor khong 'bras byung na gcin 'gags shing 'byung dka' la /
T13TD4312.2E:147b-22: rnag dang bcas shing dri mnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-25: mcher par khong 'bras byung na dbugs mi bde ba'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-29: mchin par khong 'bras byung na dbugs 'byung ba 'gags shing skom dad dang /
T13TD4312.2E:147b-30: mgo 'khor ba'i nad kyis 'debs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-31: glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-33: khong 'bras glo bar byung na lkog ma'i nad rnams su 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:147b-34: snying byung yan lag kun gzir snyam //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-4: khong 'bras snying la byung na lus kyi yan lag kun dang snying ga shin tu gzir ba snyam sems shing bskyod mi nus pa lta bur 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-5: de bzhin du rab tu rmongs shing 'du shes stor bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-6: mun par zhugs pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-8: na ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-9: lto brtsi ba logs phrag pa'i bar //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-12: khong 'bras lte bar byung na lte ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-14: phrag pa gnyis kyi bar du na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-15: lto ba de nyid sbos shing khrul khrul zer ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-16: chu so mdoms bar byung brla na //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-18: khong 'bras chu so dang mdoms bar du byung na brlan zhing 'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-19: mkhal mar byung na rked pa rgyab //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-20: rtsib logs su ni na bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-22: khong 'bras mkhal ma gnyis su byung na rked pa dang rgyab dang rtsib logs su na zhing zug par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-25: gzhang gi nang du khong 'bras byung na rlung thur du 'byung ba'i gags byed cing nang du 'khyil bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-26: zhu dang ma zhu phyed nyid zhu //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-27: de dag 'or nad lta bur bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-29: zhu ba'i gnas dang ma zhu ba'i gnas dang phyed tsam zhu ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-30: legs par ma zhu ba'i gnas su byung ba de dag ni 'or nad dam skrang bag gi nad kyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra bar bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-31: skrang pa chung ba nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis ston to //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-33: lte ba yan chad smin khar 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-34: khong 'bras lte ba yan chad kyi nang na yod pa de dag smin par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:148a-35: kha'i sgo nas rnag la sogs pa'i nad rnams 'dzag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:148a-36: lte ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:148b-0: lte ba man chad kyi nang na khong 'bras gnas pa las smin par gyur pa gang dag yin pa @148b de gzhang gi sgor rnag la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-1: lte bar gnas pa gnyis kar 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:148b-2: khong 'bras lte ba'i nang du byung na lus kyi dbus na gnas pa yin pa'i phyir kha dang gzhang gnyis ka nas 'byung zhing 'dzag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-3: khong 'bras kyi ni nad dmigs rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-4: 'dzag las rma ltar shes par bya //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-6: khong 'bras kyi nad gzhi rlung la sogs pa ni rang gi 'dzag pa ji lta ba las rma'i tshul bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-7: ji ltar rma la rnag dang gsher bag 'dzag pa'i tshul las nad gzhi'i tshul shes par bya ba mdo'i gnas su ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang tshul de dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-8: de las 'dus pa las gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-9: snying dang lte ba chu sor gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-11: smin te kha nas 'dzag pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-12: nyam chung bla brnan ldan pa spang ;
T13TD4312.2E:148b-14: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-15: de bzhin du rlung la sogs pa 'ba' zhig las gyur pa yin yang snying ga dang lte ba dang chu sor gnas pa yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-16: de bzhin du nang ngam phyir kha bye zhing smin te zag pa yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-17: yang snying ga la sogs par gnas pa smin te kha nas 'dzag par gyur pa nyam chung ba'i nad pa la byung ba yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-18: de bzhin du bla brnan gyi nad yod pa dag kyang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-19: de bzhin bud med bu btsas pa'am ;
T13TD4312.2E:148b-20: / sbrum ma'am nu zho yod pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-21: nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-22: rtsa sgo kha byer phyin gyur nas //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-23: phyi yi khong 'bras mtshan nyid can //
T13TD4312.2E:148b-26: ji ltar khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad khong du zos pa la sogs pas skye ba bzhin du bud med bu btsas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:148b-27: sbrum ma nu mar nu zho dang bcas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:148b-28: nu zho med pa'i nu ma'i rtsa kha bye bar phyin nas phyi'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid rab tu na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:148b-29: mdud pa 'dra zhing mtho ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-0: de yang skrang pa dang 'dra ba'i rang @149a * //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-2: de ni nu ma'i khong 'bras zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-3: bu mo rnams kyi nu rtsa'i sgo //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-6: nu ma'i khong 'bras de ni bu mo gzhon nu la 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-8: de ni nu ma'i rtsa sgo shin tu phra bas de 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-10: skrang dang gzer ni skyed cing rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-11: chu so rlig par phyin pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-12: rlig par rgyu ba'i rtsa dag ni //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-13: btsir nas rlig pa pags pa dag //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-14: 'phel zhing rlig rlugs nyid du byed //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-16: rlung rang gi rgyu ba'i lam 'gags shing phan tshun rgyu ba'i go skabs su chud par gyur pas 'khrugs shing nad skyed pas na skrang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-17: gzer ba'i nad skyed cing rgyu nas rlig pa skrang bar byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-18: chu so dang rlig par phyin nas de la brten te /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-19: rlig pa'i gnas su rgyu ba'i rtsa dag rab tu btsir zhing gnod par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-20: rlig pa dang pags pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rlig rlugs nyid byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-21: nad khrag gcin tshil rgyu ma las //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-22: rlig rlugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-24: rlig rlugs zhes bya ba'i nad de ni nad dmigs so so dang /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-28: rgyu ma las byung ba ste rnam pa bdun yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-29: rgyu ma gcin skyes pa'am rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-30: rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-33: gcin las skyes pa'i rlig rlugs dag kyang rlung las gyur pa dang 'dra mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:149a-34: rgyu ma 'ba' zhig gi dbye bas tha dad pa yin zhing gzhan yang ma yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-35: rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-36: reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na //
T13TD4312.2E:149a-38: rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs ni rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba 'dra zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-0: de bzhin du rgyu med par glo bur du na bar byed pa @149b yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-1: mkhris gyur au dumw'a ra yi //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-4: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni au dumw'a ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang mdog 'dra la /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-5: de bzhin du tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-6: bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-7: g-ya' zhing sra la nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-9: bad kan las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-10: bsil ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-11: khrag gyur gnag cing 'brum bus khyab ;
T13TD4312.2E:149b-12: / mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs mtshan nyid ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-14: khrag las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs ni snag tsha ltar gnag cing /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-15: 'brum bu nag pos khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-16: mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs kyi mtshan nyid au dumw'a ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-17: tshil gyur rlig rlugs bad kan 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-20: tshil las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-21: bsil zhing snum pa la sogs pa bad kan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-22: yang de 'jam zhing t'a la'i 'bras bu dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-23: gcin brnag pa la brten pa rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-25: rkyal pa chu yis gang ba ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-27: gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-30: gcin snyoms la brnag cing nan gyis 'geg par byed pa la brten pa'i skyes bu rnams la ni /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-31: gcin las byung ba'i rlig rlugs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:149b-32: de ni rkyal pa chus gang ba ltar g-yo zhing 'gul bar 'khrug par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-33: de yang nad dang bcas shing 'jam zhing mnyen par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:149b-34: de bzhin du gcin 'gags shing sri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-0: @150a * // de bzhin du rlig pa'i 'og tu gdu bu ltar skrang bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-1: rlung 'khrugs pa yi zas dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-2: chu grang la ni rkyal pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-3: shugs bkag btsir dang khur dang lam //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-4: yan lag log par gcus pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-5: rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-6: gang tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-7: rlung gis log par phul 'gyur te //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-8: rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-9: chu so'i tshigs su phyin pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-10: de tshe mdud pa ltar glo 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-12: rlung 'khrug par byed pa'i kha zas rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-13: bska ba la sogs pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-14: de bzhin du chu grang mo la rkyal gyis brgal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-15: de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-17: khur la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag gis rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa'i dus gang gi tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha ste /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-18: rgyu ma phre'u phyogs gcig log par phul te /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-19: rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod cing chu so'i tshigs su rlung gnas pa de'i tshe /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-20: mdud pa ltar glo ba'i skrang bag skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-21: yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-22: sbo zhing na la rengs par rlung gis byed //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-23: rab tu gzer zhing nang na sgra dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-24: gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung byed //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-26: nad de yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-27: rlig pa skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-28: lto sbo zhing rengs par rlung des skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-29: yang rlung des rab tu gzer zhing nyen pas rlung sgra dang bcas shing krul krul zer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150a-30: yang rlung gis gang bar byed cing phyung ba de bcug kyang slar 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-31: rgyu rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-32: rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-33: rtsub cing gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.2E:150a-34: phra mo'i dra bas khebs pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-0: rgyu @150b rlugs zhes bya ba'i nad 'di ni gso dka' zhing bcos par mi nus pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:150b-1: yang de ni rlung gi rlig rlugs dang mtshan ma 'dra ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:150b-2: rlung gyur rkyal ba gang 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-3: reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-4: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:150b-5: / yang de bzhin du rtsub cing mdog gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa'i tshogs phra mo'i dra bas khebs shing khyab par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-6: skran brgyad nad ni so so dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-8: zla mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-9: brgyad pa bud med rnams la 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-11: skran ni rnam pa brgyad yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:150b-12: de yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi so so las byung ba gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150b-13: nad gzhi gnyis gnyis dang 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur ba gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150b-14: nad gzhi gsum car 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.2E:150b-15: bud med rnams la zla mtshan gyi nad kyi nyes pa las byung ba gcig ste /
T13TD4312.2E:150b-16: de ltar na spyir brgyad yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-17: rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-18: skyug sman sogs dang las rnams kyis //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-19: skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-20: bkres te chu grang 'thungs gyur pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-21: skom 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-22: rkyal dang mchod pa la sogs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-23: bsten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-24: slon mi bro yang skyugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-25: rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba yi ;
T13TD4312.2E:150b-26: / shugs bkag pa'am gcin btsir ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-27: snum dang dugs ni ma bsten par //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-28: sbyang ba'i las ni byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-29: sbyangs zin myur du tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-30: bad kan skyed pa'i zas skom spyad //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-31: rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-33: kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-34: sbubs can la ni brten gyur nas //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-35: steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-36: gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg tu rung //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-37: shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs //
T13TD4312.2E:150b-38: skran ni skyed par 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:151a-0: @151a * // skran 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-1: de bzhin du skyug sman la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-2: skyug sman dang bkru sman dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-3: bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-5: mgo bo'i bkru sman zhes bya ba'i dpyad kyi sbyor ba nyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-6: de bzhin du drag shul gyi nad rnams kyis skem zhing sbegs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-7: rlung skyes pa'i zas rtsub cing kha ba la sogs pa za ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-8: de bzhin du bkres shing zas za bar 'dod pa'i skabs su zas ma zos par chu grang mo 'thung ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-9: yang na skom 'thungs ba'i rjes la rkyal ba dang mchong ba dang nyal po bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-10: rta rgyug pa la sogs pa la brten cing /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-11: lus 'khrugs shing bskyod par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-12: yang na slon mi bro ba bzhin du nan gyis slon zhing skyugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-13: rlung dang bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung bar ldog bzhin du nan gyis bkag cing brnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-14: de dag nan gyis btsir ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-15: yang na snum dang dugs kyi cho ga yang dang yang du bya ba ma bsten cing goms par ma byas par sbyang ba'i las skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa gtang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-16: yang na sbyangs zin cing skyug sman btang ba la sogs pa byas zin pa'i rjes thogs nyid la myur bar lus tsha bar byed pa'i zas skom la bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-17: de bzhin du bad kan skyed pa'i ljan ljin 'phel ba'i zas skom longs spyad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-18: de bzhin du rlung rgyas shing 'phel ba'i nad kyi dri ma rnams so sor 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-20: yang na gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-21: khrag dang bcas pas 'khrugs shing g-yos pas sbubs chen po ste /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-22: lto ba zhes bya ba'i lus kyi dbyibs kyi cha de la brten cing gnas nas de'i 'og tu rtsa bo che'i nang du zhugs te /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-23: steng dang 'og gi lam bkag nas skran skyed par 'gyur la de yang gzer sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas nad skyed par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:151a-24: reg tu rung ba shin tu mtho zhing 'bur bar mdud pa'i gzugs can ltar ril ril por gnas pa'i skran zhes bya ba skyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-0: skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang @151b ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-1: rgyun srang 'gags par gyur pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-2: rlung ni khong par gnas bcas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-3: rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-4: rang gnas ldang gyur rang dbang can //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-5: gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-6: gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-7: gzugs can ltar gnas skran zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-8: chu so lte ba snying ga dang //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-9: rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-11: skem zhing lus zungs zad pas lan 'ga' zhig rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:151b-12: lan 'ga' zhig ni bad kan dang mkhris pa dang bshang ba rgyu ba'i bu ga'i lam srang 'gags par 'gyur bas 'khrugs par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:151b-13: 'khrugs pa'i rlung de khong pa'i nang du gnas bcas shing brten par gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:151b-14: des na rtsub pa'i rgyus sra zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:151b-15: rlung de rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe na ni rang dbang can zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:151b-16: rang gi gnas bad kan dang mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i tshe na ni gzhan dbang can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-17: yang nad de ni gong por gnas pas na reg tu rung bar gyur pas /
T13TD4312.2E:151b-18: rlung de gzugs med pa ste sra ba ma yin du zin kyang gzugs can lta bur gnas shing mdud pa'i gzugs su 'dug pas ming skran zhes bya bar btags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-19: de yang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas su gnas pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:151b-20: chu so dang lte ba snying ga dang rtsib logs g-yas g-yon te lngar gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-21: rlung las mjing pa klad pa gzer //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-22: rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma 'khrug / bshang sri khab kyis gtsags snyam na //
