T13TD4312.2E:151b-23: dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-24: lus rengs kha ni skam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-25: skem zhing me drod mi snyoms dang //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-26: lpags sogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-27: rlung skran g-yo ba yin pa'i phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-28: dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-30: grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni //
T13TD4312.2E:151b-31: skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-0: rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad ni mjing ba dang klad pa gzer ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par @152a * //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-2: khab kyis gtsags ba snyam du na zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-3: dbugs 'byin par dka' zhing yang dang yang du mi thon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-4: lus rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-6: pags pa dang mig dang sen mo dang gdong dang lce la sogs pa gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-7: rlung gi rang bzhin g-yo zhing mi brten pa yin pa'i phyir dbyibs dang rang bzhin brtag par dka' zhing gnas gcig na mi 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-8: 'phel ba dang 'bri bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-9: na zhing zug pa dang grog mas khyab cing gang ba lta bur skran de 'gul ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-10: zug cing na ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-11: mkhris las tsha zhing sgregs skyur brgyal //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-13: pags pa la sogs ser bor snang //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-14: skran ni reg par mi bzod dang //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-15: tsha zhing 'bar la dro ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-16: rang gi gnas ni bsregs snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-18: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran ni tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-19: skran mang zhing reg par mi bzod cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-20: tsha 'ur 'ur po la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-21: bad kan slon bag yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-22: me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-23: cham pa khong snyom dang ga lci //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-24: lud pa lu zhing lpags sogs dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-25: skran phugs ring zhing sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-26: lci zhing rang gnas brtan nad chung //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-28: bad kan las gyur pa'i skran nad ni slon bag la sogs pa dang ldan par na zhing pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar zhing skya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-29: de bzhin du skran phugs ring zhing rdo ltar sra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-30: lci zhing tshor ba med pa lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-31: rang gi gnas na brtan par gnas shing mi 'gyur ba dang nad tshabs chung zhing rgyu ba dal ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-32: phal cher rang gnas 'dug pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-33: rang gi dus su nad skyed byed //
T13TD4312.2E:152a-35: skran de dag ni phal cher nad rang rang gi gnas na 'dug cing brten la /
T13TD4312.2E:152a-36: rang rang gi ldang ba'i dus su nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-0: de yang rlung @152b las gyur pa'i skran nad phal cher ni dku'i phyogs su gnas la /
T13TD4312.2E:152b-1: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran ni phal cher lte ba la gnas so //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-2: bad kan las gyur pa'i skran ni phal cher rtsib logs gnyis dang snying gar gnas so //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-3: rang gi dus ni nyin mtshan dang zas zos pa la sogs pa nad rang rang 'byung ba'i dus su rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa'i skran lhag par ldang zhing na bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-4: gnyis las byung ba'i skran gsum po //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-5: mtshan nyid 'dren mar ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-7: nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba'i skran gsum ni mtshan nyid gnyis po gang dag yin pa de'i cha 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-8: kun skyes mi bzad na zhing tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-9: myur smin sra mtho de gso dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-11: nad gzhi gsum po kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i skran ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan zhing mi bzad par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152b-13: myur du smin pa dang sra zhing dpangs mtho ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:152b-14: de ni gso dka' ba yin pas gso dpyad kyis bcos kyang mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-15: khrag gi skran ni gang yin pa //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-16: de ni bud med nyid la 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-18: skran brgyad pa khrag las gyur pa'i skran ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-19: zla mtshan dus sam bu gsar btsas //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-20: yang na mngal gyi nad can gyis //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-21: bud med rlung skyed bsten gyur pas //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-22: rlung ni 'khrugs par gyur pa las //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-23: zla re 'byung bar byed pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-24: zla mtshan mngal du bkag pas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-25: de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-26: mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-28: skem pa la sogs tshul du snang //
T13TD4312.2E:152b-31: zla mtshan gyi dus la bab pa gsar du btsas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:152b-32: zla bam tshang bar 'phyil bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:152b-33: yang na bud med mngal nad can gyis rlung skyed par byed pa'i zas dang skom bsten cing spyad par gyur pas /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-0: bud med de'i rlung gi nad 'khrugs par gyur pa las @153a * //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-1: zla ba re re zhing rgyu bar byed pa'i zla mtshan bkag cing phyir 'byung du mi ster bas zla re 'byung ba de mngal na bu chags pa lta bu'i tshul de sogs shing 'phel bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-2: mngal du chags pa'i mtshan ma snang zhing gsal bar ston par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-3: snying 'phar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-4: de nas rim gyis rlung 'dres dang //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-5: mkhris pa yi ni rgyu yis na //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-6: rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-7: skran ni khrag de skyed byed yin //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-8: na zhing sra la tsha zhing 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-9: skom dad rims sogs bla brnan 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-10: nad kyi khrag la brten pas na //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-11: mngal gnas dag tu lhag par gzer //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-12: mngal nas dri nga 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-13: na zhing 'phar la zug par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-15: dus kyi rim gyis rlung dang khrag de 'dres shing 'dus par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-16: mkhris pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis nad khrag de rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i skran gyi nad khrag de skyed par byed cing bla brnan gyi nad na zhing sra ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-17: de bzhin du lhag par yang nad kyi khrag la brten cing gnas pas /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-18: mngal gyi gnas su lhag par gzer zhing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-19: mngal nas dri nga ba 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-21: mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-23: de nyid der ni gong por gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-26: skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-28: gal te khrag gi skran chags pa de mngal na bu chags pa dang cha 'dra na yang yan lag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yod pa ma yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-29: 'on kyang 'gul zhing gzer ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:153a-30: yang skran de nyid ni mngal gyi gnas der gong por gzugs can du gnas la /
T13TD4312.2E:153a-31: lan 'ga' yun ring zhig nas 'gul bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-0: yang 'di'i mngal du bu chags nas 'phel bar byed @153b pa ma yin gyi //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-1: gzhan du khrag las chags pa'i skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-2: rang gi nad gzhi la brten nas //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-3: des der skran nad thams cad skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-4: yun ring nas ni smin 'gyur ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-7: nad rang rang gi nad gzhi'i tshul la brten cing gnas nas skran thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:153b-8: rgyu des na yun ring zhig nas smin par 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:153b-9: yang na smin par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-11: nad khrag la ni brten pa'i phyir //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-12: shin tu myur bar smin par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-13: de phyir myur du tsha 'gyur bas //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-14: khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-16: yang khong 'bras su gyur pa ni khrag nad shin tu gnod par byed pa la brten cing gnas pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu myur zhing rings par smin cing rdol bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-17: de nad kyi phyir myur du tsha zhing sreg par byed pas de la ming khong 'bras zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-18: nang gnas skran ni chu so dang //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-19: lto ba mchin pa snying na zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-20: me drod mdog nyams nyams stobs 'bri //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-23: nang na gnas shing brten pa'i mtshan ma ni chu so la sogs par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:153b-24: me drod la sogs pa nyams shing 'bri ba ni bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba 'gag par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-25: phyi rol de las bzlog pa ste //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-26: khong pa'i yan lag nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-27: phyogs de'i mdog ni nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-28: phyi rol du ni mthong zhing 'phags //
T13TD4312.2E:153b-30: phyi rol du byung ba'i skran ni nang du 'byung ba'i skran gyi mtshan ma de las go bzlog pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:153b-31: chu so la sogs par na bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:153b-32: me drod la sogs pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:153b-33: shugs mi 'gag cing bde blag tu 'byung ba dang khong pa'i yan lag lte ba la sogs par nad tshabs chung zhing shas che bar min pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:153b-34: skran chags pa'i phyogs de'i mdog nyams shing kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-0: de bzhin du phyi rol du @154a * //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-1: lhag par mthong zhing 'phags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-2: lto sbo lhag par mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-3: rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-4: sbo bcas lto ba na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-5: rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og bkag / de ni hen gyi zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-7: lto sbo zhing sgra dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-8: steng 'og tu rlung gi lam bkag pas lhag bar mi bzad bar na zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-9: brnag par dka' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-10: lto sbo hen gyi nad ces bya ba yin par slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-11: sra zhing gtun 'dra ma dud pa can //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-12: gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-15: nad gang sra zhing rdo'i gtun 'dra zhing mdud pa can du gnas la /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-16: gtun rdo dang dbyibs 'dra zhing gyen du mtho bar 'jong bag tu gnas pa hen gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni gtun 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-20: gtun bu zhes bya ba'i nad ni 'phred du thad kar gnas kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-21: gyen du 'gro ba ma yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-22: nad kyi tshul ni gtun 'dra ba dang mtshungs te /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-23: de lta bu'i nad la ni gtun bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-24: zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang pho mtshan //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-25: rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-26: thur du zug pa yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-28: zhu ba'i nad lte ba'i 'og tu gnas gzhang dang pho mtshan dag tu rlung rgyu zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-29: lhag par na bar byed pa de ni thur du zug pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-30: de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-32: gyen du zug ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni de las bzlog pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:154a-33: gzhang dang pho mtshan gyi gnas nas lte bar gyen du zug cing na la gyen du zug pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-34: sgregs pa mang zhing bshang ba 'gags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-35: 'grangs za mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-36: sbo zhing hen langs kha zas 'ju mi nus //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-37: skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:154a-39: mi gang la skran nye bar 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni sgregs pa mang po yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-0: bshang ba 'gags shing sri ba @154b dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:154b-1: /'grangs shing tshim par za ma nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-2: rgyu ma sgra dang bcas shing mi gsal ba'i sgra krul krul zer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-3: sbo zhing lto rgyas la hen langs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-4: me drod zhan pas kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-5: de dag ni skran ring po mi thogs par 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin par slob dpon gyis bstan cing bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-6: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-7: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-8: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-10: // / de nas dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-12: 'di na khong 'bras la sogs pa dang tshul 'dra bas 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-13: nad kun me drod nyams las skye //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-14: lhag par dmu rdzing nad skye zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-15: ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-16: dri ma sogs las skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-18: gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-20: lhag par dmu rdzing gi nad ni /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-21: pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-22: de bzhin du ma zhu ba rnam pa bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-23: dri ma can gyi zas rul pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-24: zhag lon pa'i khengs bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-25: 'dren ma la sogs pa'i skyon dang ldan pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-26: de bzhin du nad kyi dri ma yun ring du sogs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba las dmu rdzing gi nad skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-27: de dag ni nad kyi rgyu bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-28: nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-29: steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-30: srog dang thur sel la gnod de //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-31: pags pa sha yi bar gnas nad //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-32: lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzing skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:154b-34: rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis chu'am /
T13TD4312.2E:154b-35: bad kan gyi tshogs rgyu ba'i rtsa lus kyi steng 'og tu rgyu ba bkag nas rgyu des srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pas gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas pags pa dang sha'i bar na yod pa'i nad drangs te /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-0: lto ba bkang nas dmu rdzing skyed @155a * //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-1: cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-2: de yang rnam pa brgyad 'gyur te //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-3: nad gzhi tha dad 'dus mcher pa //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-4: dri ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dang //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-6: dmu rdzing de yang grangs kyi dbye ba rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-7: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gyi nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-8: gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-9: mcher pa las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-10: dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-11: rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-12: chu'i dmu rdzing ste rnam pa brgyad do //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-13: des gzir rkan dang mchu bskams shing //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-14: rkang pa lag pa gsus pa skrangs //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-15: spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs 'bri //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-16: skem zhing gsus pa cher skyes la //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-17: mi ni yi dags gzugs can 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-19: dmu rdzing gi nad des gzir cing nyen pa'i mi ni rkan dang mchu bskams par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-20: rkang pa dang pags pa dang lto ba skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-21: lus kyi spyod pa nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-22: kha zas za ba'i rtsol ba nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-23: lus kyi nyams stobs 'bri zhing zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-24: skem zhing sha dang khrag zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-25: gsus pa cher skyes shing rgyas par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-26: mdor na mi de yi dags kyi gzugs can lta bu'am /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-28: de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag / bkres pa med cing zas kun ni //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-29: ring nas tsha zhing skyur bcas 'ju //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-31: 'grangs par za yang mi nus shing //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-32: stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-33: cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-35: rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-36: chu sor na zhing zas yang ba //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-37: cung zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:155a-38: rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:155a-39: dmu rdzing de nye bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam sngar byung ba'i tshul ni zas ma zos kyang bkres pa'i bag med pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-0: ro drug dang ldan pa'i kha zas kun kyang tsha ba ngang bcas shing skyur bag @155b gi rnam pas ring zhig lon nas gdod 'ju ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-1: zas zos ba zhu bar gyur tam /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-2: zhu bar ma gyur pa blos rtogs shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-3: 'grangs bar za zhing longs spyad par mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-4: lus kyi stobs nyin mtshan rtag tu zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-5: lus bskyod pa'i g-yo 'gul gyi bya ba cung zad byas kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-6: dbugs mi bde zhing brtsegs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-7: bshang ba nang du 'phel zhing sogs la phyir mi 'byung bar 'gags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-8: de bzhin du rkang pa skrangs pa nas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig cing mi snang ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-9: dmu rdzing nad ni thams cad la //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-10: snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-11: dri ma sri zhing me drod chung //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-12: tsha zhing skrangs la gsus pa sbo //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-15: dmu rdzing thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni snyom pa la sogs pa yin te ;
T13TD4312.2E:155b-16: / snyom pa ni gnyid kyis myos pa snyam du yul 'dzin par mi nus pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-17: tsha ba ni lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos khyab pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-18: dmu rdzing de dag thams cad kyi mjug gam mthar ni lto ba'i nang du chu 'byung zhing des gang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-19: thams cad chu med bar du smug / skrang med khur ltar lci ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-20: rtsa dra'i skar khung ris kyis khebs //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-22: rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zhugs //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-24: snying ga lte ba rked pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-25: gzhang dang chu so na bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-26: rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-27: bshang ba 'gags shing gci ba nyung //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-28: me drod chung min skam pa min //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-29: kha ni ro bro med ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:155b-31: dmu rdzing gi nad thams cad ni /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-32: dmu chur ma gyur par sha mdog smug cing dmar bar snang la /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-33: skrang pa'i tshabs mi che zhing cung zad skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-34: khur bu ltar shin tu lci ba ma yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-35: rtsa'i dra ba'i tshogs kyis skar khung ltar g-yogs shing khebs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-36: rtag tu dus thams cad du khong pa'i nang na sgra 'ur 'ur por grag cing bar snang gi 'brug ltar sgra grag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:155b-37: rlung lte ba dang rgyu mar zug cing na bar byed pa nas /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-0: @156a * // sgra'i shugs bskyed cing byung nas 'jig ste mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-1: yang rlung gis snying ga la sogs par na zhing zug par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-2: yang rlung de lto ba'i nang na sgra dang bcas shing rgyu zhing phan tshun 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-3: bshang ba 'gags shing sri bar byed pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:156a-4: gcin gyi tshogs nyung bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-5: khong pa'i me drod shin tu chung ba ma yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-6: skam zhing zas la gdu ba ma yin pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-7: kha'i nang na ro bro ba med pa ma yin te ro dang bcas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-8: de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-9: rkang lag rlig pa lto ba skrang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-10: lto ba rtsib logs rked rgyab na //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-11: tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-12: lud pa skam zhing yan lag snyom //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-13: ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gags //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-14: pags pa la sogs gnag la smug / glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'bri //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-15: gsus par zug cing na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-16: rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-17: brdabs na rkyal pa dbugs kyis ni //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-18: gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-19: 'dir rlung nad dang sgrar bcas pas //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-20: thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:156a-22: de la dmu rdzing rnams kyi nang nas /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-23: rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa skrang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-24: rus pa'i tshigs na zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-25: lud pa bad kan med par skam por 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-26: yan lag snyom zhing grugs ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-27: lus kyi ro smad lci zhing gdeg dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:156a-28: bshang gci dri ma 'gags shing sri ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-29: pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang lce dang bshang ba la sogs pa mdog gnag cing smug par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-30: rgyu med par glo bur du de'i lto ba cher 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-31: zug cing shas cher na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-32: rtsa bran gyi tshogs nag pos khyab cing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-33: lto ba la lag pa la sogs pas brdabs shing bsnun na rkyal ba dbugs kyis gang ba la mnan pa lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156a-34: dmu rdzing 'di la rlung sgra dang bcas pas thams cad du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-0: mkhris @156b pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-1: lus tsha skom dang kha ro kha //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-3: ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-4: rtsa ni dmar ser dag gis khyab //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-5: rdul dang tsha bar bcas pas sreg / ngad 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-6: myur du smin cing nyer gdung 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-8: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-9: pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog ser ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-10: gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-11: rtsa'i mdog dmar po dang ser po dag gis khebs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-12: lus rdul zhing tsha ba dang bcas pas me ltar sreg par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-13: ngad 'byung zhing du ba 'thul ba lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-14: reg na 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-15: myur du smin cing tshos par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-16: nye bar gdung zhing bsreg par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-17: bad kan dmu rdzing lhu tshigs na //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-18: tshor ba med cing skrang la lci //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-19: gnyid che slon zhing yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-20: lud pa dbugs mi bde lpags sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-21: skya zhing lto ba mkhrang la snum //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-22: rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-23: ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-24: reg na grang zhing gsus pa lci //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-26: bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni yan lag gi lhu tshigs na zhing snyom pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-27: tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-28: skrang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-29: pags pa nas bshang gci'i bar du skya zhing dkar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-30: lto ba sra zhing rem rem por 'dug pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-31: rtsa ris kyi mdog skyabs khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-33: ring zhig nas 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-35: reg na grang zhing bsil ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:156b-36: gsus pa lci zhing brtan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-37: gnas gsum 'khrugs pa de dang de //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-38: bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-39: dbyig dug dug sogs kyis gnod 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-40: khag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-41: ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de //
T13TD4312.2E:156b-42: kha skam mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-0: @157a * // rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-1: myur du smin cing mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-2: de ni grang dang rlung dang char //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-3: phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-5: nad gzhi gsum char skyed par byed pa'i rgyu nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi'i skabs su bshad pa rnam pa mang po de dang de dag dang /
T13TD4312.2E:157a-6: de bzhin du bud med kyis dbang du byas pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.2E:157a-7: srog chags kyi yan lag las byung ba'i skra la sogs pa dri ma dang rdul 'byin par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:157a-8: de bzhin du dbyig dug dang dug la sogs pa byin pas gnod par gyur pas khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi dri ma bsal zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lto bar song zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:157a-9: phyin nas gnod pa'i nad skyed cing 'byung bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:157a-10: de kha skam pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa skyed par byed pa de ni myur du smin zhing brnag par dka' bar mi bzad par na ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-11: yang dmu rdzing gi nad de ni grang ba la sogs pa dang phrad pas shin tu gnod cing nad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-12: mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-13: bzhon pa drag tu 'gro ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-14: las lam nyal po drags pas dub //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-15: skyug sman drags dang nad kyis skem //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-16: g-yon logs gnas pa'i mcher pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-18: yang na dangs ma sogs pas khrag / rgyas byas de ni 'phel gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-19: de ni gtun bu bzhin rab sra //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-20: de nas rus sbal rgyal 'dra bar //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-22: lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-23: lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dad //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-24: kha yis ro ni mi tshor zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-25: lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-26: sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-27: brgyal zhing slon par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-28: tsha zhing myos dang ldan par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-29: rtsa mdog dmar ba'am mi sdug ba'am //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-30: sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:157a-32: mang du zos shing ha cang 'grangs drags pas bskyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-0: rta dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i bzhon pas @157b drag tu bskyod cing 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-1: las dang lam gyis dub pa la sogs pas g-yon logs na gnas pa'i mcher pa gnas las 'phos te 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-2: yang na dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi khrag 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa'i dbang gis mcher pa de 'phel bas gnas las 'phos pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-3: rang gi gnas nyid du 'phel bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-4: de nas ni mcher pa de dang por gtun bu ltar sra bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-5: de nas de'i 'og tu rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra bar rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur gyi cig car 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-6: de ltar lto bar dmu rdzing chags par 'byung par byed la de yang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nas rtsa ris sngo zhing ser ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-7: de la rim gyis nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-8: bshang 'gags nad dang lto sbos dang //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-9: rmongs bag skom tsha rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-10: lus lci lto sra yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-12: mcher pa'i skran de la rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni rim bzhin du bshang ba 'gags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-13: de yang bshang ba 'gags pa dang na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-14: lto sbos pa las ni rlung yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-15: rmongs bag dang skom dad tsha ba dang rims kyis 'debs pa las ni mkhris pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-16: lus lci ba dang lto sra ba dang yi ga 'chus pa las ni bad kan yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-17: mcher ba lta bur mchin g-yas logs //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-18: gnas 'phos dmu rdzing skyed ces bya //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-20: ji ltar mcher ba g-yon logs na 'dug ste /
T13TD4312.2E:157b-21: rgyu'i khyad par gyis 'phos shing lhung nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mchin pa g-yas logs na gnas pa yang 'phos shing thur du lhung la 'phel bar gyur nas dmu rdzing skyed par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-22: bya sgro spu dang bcas pa'i zas //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-23: zos pas bshang lam gnas 'gags te //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-24: gzhang 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-25: rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang //
T13TD4312.2E:157b-26: thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs te //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-2: lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-3: des ni tsha skom rims sbrid 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-4: lud pa dbugs mi bde brlan //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-5: klad snying lte ba gzhang kha na //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-7: lto bar rlung ni 'khyims par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-8: brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la smug / rtsa ris snang ba'am mi snang 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-9: phal cher lte ba'i 'og tu ni //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-12: bya sgro phra mo dang spu'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zas zos shing longs spyad pas bshang ba'i lam gyi gnas 'gags shing 'byung du mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:158a-13: gzhang 'brum gyis gzhang 'gags par byas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:158a-14: rgyu mar chags shing thogs par byed pa'i zas sran ma ma sha dang zar ma la sogs pa zos pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:158a-15: bshang ba la sogs pas bkag nas lto sra bar dmu rdzing chags par gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:158a-16: ltor 'khyil zhing dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing des nad pa la tsha zhing skom pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:158a-17: lto bar rlung 'khyims te rlung phyir 'byung bar mi byed cing nang du 'khyil bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:158a-18: brtan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:158a-19: yang dmu rdzing de ni phal cher mang du lte ba'i 'og tu dbyibs ba lang gi mjug ma 'dra bar 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-20: rus sogs zug rngur bcas pa'i zas //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-21: zos sam shin tu drag zos pa //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-22: rgyu ma rdol lam gas gyur nas //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-23: bu ga de nas ma zhu bar //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-25: bshang bcas nyung shas nyung shas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-26: sha rul lta bur mnam pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-28: lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-29: dmu rdzing mi bzad skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-30: de ni lte ba man chad rgyas //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-31: chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-32: nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-33: dbugs mi bde skam mgo 'khor khyab //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-34: rgyu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de //
T13TD4312.2E:158a-35: gzhan dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-0: rus pa dang rtsa dang tsher ma dang rdo dang rva dang shing gi tshal ba la sogs pa'i @158b zas zug rngu dang bcas pa'i kha zas zos par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-1: yang na shin tu drag cing shas cher zos pas gang gi rgyu ma rdol cing bu ga dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-2: gas par gyur nas rdol ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-3: gas ba'i bu ga de nas phyir 'dzag cing zas ma zhu ba kho nar phyir 'dzag par gyur cing bshang ba'i lam nas 'byung bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-4: de yang bshang ba dang bcas par nyung shas nyung shas 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-5: 'byung ba de yang sha rul te mi ro'i dri ltar shin tu mnam par 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-6: shing shal ma li'i thang chu ltar sbyin zhing 'byar bag tu gnas pa la /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-7: mdog dmar zhing rtsa ser bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-8: bshang ba'i lam las byung ba'i lhag mas ni lto ba 'gengs shing rgyas par byas nas dmu rdzing gi nad mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-9: dmu rdzing de ni lte ba man chad rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur la ;
T13TD4312.2E:158b-10: / de yang lto ba chus gang ba lta bu'i dmu rdzing du myur zhing ring por mi thogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-11: de ni nad kyi tshul shas che zhing nad kyi rtags stobs dang ldan pa'i tshabs po che dang ldan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:158b-12: dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pas kyang khyab cing zil gyis mnan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-13: dmu rdzing de ni rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-14: zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-15: drang srong gzhan dag ni dmu rdzing de yongs su 'dzag pa'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-17: snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-19: me drod bri ba'am ha cang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-22: chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-24: de 'og dmu rdzing gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-25: de nas dmu rdzing de las ni //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-26: skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-27: dbugs mi bde lud yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-28: sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-29: rkyal ba chus gang reg pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-30: bskyod na sgra grag lus 'dar la //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-31: dmu rdzing chen pos che zhing snum //
T13TD4312.2E:158b-32: brtan zhing de ni lte ba zlum //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-2: sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas skyug sman dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-3: bkru sman la sogs pa byas shing btang zin pa'i rjes la 'phral du ste ring po ma lon pa nyid du chu grang bskol ba ma yin pa 'thungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-4: yang na chu grang la sogs pa 'thungs drags pas pho ba'i me drod bri zhing nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-5: yang na ha cang skom ches pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-6: zas bcad pa la sogs pas rus pa dang rgyus pa tsam lus par gyur pas chu 'thungs drags te /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-7: gnod pa de'i rgyus rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-8: bad kan kyang 'khrugs par gyur nas chu rgyu ba'i lam gyi rgyun srang bkag cing /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-9: rlung dang bad kan de gnyis lto bar gnas shing chu de nyid der gnas shed de las 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur bas /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-10: de'i 'og tu chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-11: de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzing de skom dad la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-12: rkyal pa chus gang ba la reg pa dang 'dra bar chu'i dmu rdzing de phan tshun bskyod na sgra grag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-13: lte ba kun nas zlum zhing 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin can du gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-14: thams cad yal bar bor na ni //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-15: nad ni rang gnas las 'phos te //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-16: smin pas sla zhing zag 'gyur ba //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-17: tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag / phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rdul 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-20: sbyin bag gyur nas de'i tshe ni //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-21: lto ba lci zhing sra la zlum //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-22: brdabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-23: mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-24: lto ba dang ni rgyab du 'gro //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-25: de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-26: lto bar 'phel zhing de las lhag / rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-27: dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:159a-29: dmu rdzing de thams cad kyang yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-30: rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi gnas nas 'phos nas rang gi gnas spangs te /
T13TD4312.2E:159a-31: smin cing gsher bas sla zhing rnag zag par byed par 'gyur bas tshigs dang rtsa'i sgo nas kyang zag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-0: phyi @159b rol gyi rtsa'i sgo ba spu'i bu gnas rdul 'byung ba 'gags shing 'byung du mi ster bas /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-1: thad kar 'khyil cing yan lag tu 'gro bas gnas la sngar gnas pa'i chu de nyid 'phel zhing sogs par byas nas sbyin bag tu byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-2: de nas de'i 'og tu de'i tshe lto ba de lci ba la sogs par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-3: lag pas brdabs na yang sgra mi 'byung ba la sogs par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-4: de nas de'i rjes la dmu rdzing der chu'i dmu rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bar 'gyur te chu de lto bar lci zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-5: rtsa rnams nub cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-6: chu'i dmu rdzing bshang ba'i mtshan nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-7: skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-9: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-10: 'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-11: phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-13: rlung la sogs pa'i dmu rdzing ni phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-14: rlung gi dmu rdzing bas ni mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing gso bar dka' ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-15: de bas ni bad kan gyi dmu rdzing gso bar dka' bas na /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-16: chu'i dmu rdzing ni shin tu gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-17: gzhan dag phal cher zla phyed gsod //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-19: dmu rdzing de las gzhan pa gnyis po dri ma 'gags pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-20: rgyu ma rdol ba las byung ba'i dmu rdzing dag ni phal cher te mang du zla ba phyed lon pa dang nad pa de gsod cing 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-21: thams cad chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-22: las bshad bla brnan ldan pa'ang gsod //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-24: dmu rdzing thams cad de rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa kun kyang chur skyes pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-25: chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-26: de bzhin du 'chi ltas las bshad pa'i bla brnan dang ldan pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:159b-27: sna dang mig dang mtshan ma yo //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing yang gsod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-29: skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur pa dag / phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-30: stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:159b-31: gsar du byung ba 'bad pas gso //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-1: skyes nas byung ba'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-2: mi stobs dang ldan zhing na tshod dar la bab pa la dam rdzing de skyes par gyur cing /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-3: chur ma gyur te gsar du byung ba dag ni gsor rung mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-4: spyir gso bar dka' ba'i nad yin pas 'bad pa dang ldan pa kho nas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-5: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-6: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-7: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-9: // / de nas skya rbab dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-11: dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi'i 'og tu skya rbab kyi nad gzhi bshad pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-12: dmu rdzing gi nad skyes na skya rbab la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-13: de'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-14: ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pas //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-15: mkhris pa lhag par ldang gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-16: de la rlung ni stobs che bas //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-17: snying la gnas pa'i mkhris pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-18: gtor te rtsa chen bcu'i nang bkram //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-19: lus kun la ni khyab gyur pas //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-20: bad kan pags pa sha khrag la //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-21: gnod byas bar du gnas nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-22: sha dang pags pa de dag las //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-23: lpags mdog tha dad dkar ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-24: ser zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-25: de las skya ba'i shas che bas //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-26: de phyir skya rbab nad ces bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-28: nad rnams ji skad bshad pa'i kha ba dang tsha ba dang mngar ba la sogs pa'i nad gzhi ldang ba'i rgyus 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-29: mkhris pa lhag par shas che bar ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur na skya rbab kyi nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:160a-30: de la nad de rnams kyi nang nas rlung gi nad gang yin pa de ni stobs dang nus pa shin tu che ba yin pas /
T13TD4312.2E:160a-31: snying gar gnas pa'i mkhris pa gang yin pa de gtor zhing byer bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-0: des na mkhris pa de snying la brten pa'i rtsa bo che bcur bkram zhing phyin par byas nas lus ma lus ba kun la khyab cing byer @160b bar gyur nas bad kan la sogs pa la gnod par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-1: de pags pa dang sha gnyis kyi bar du gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-2: mkhris pa de pags pa'i mdog rnam pa tha dad cing du mar gyur pa skya zhing dkar ba dang ser po dang ljang sngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-3: mdog de dag las gang gi phyir skya zhing dkar ba'i shas che bas na rgyu de'i phyir nad de la skya rbab kyi nad ces bya'o zhes drang srong dag gis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-4: nad des lus ni lci ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-5: lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-6: mdangs kyi yon tan zad gyur cing //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-7: de las khrag dang tshil chung ste //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-8: snying po med cing dbang po lhod //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-9: yan lag brdungs pa snyam byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-10: snying ni zag pa snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-11: mig phugs skrang zhing nyams la na //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-12: mchil mang skad gdangs dma' ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-13: zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-14: spu 'byi me drod nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-16: dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-17: mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-19: skya rbab kyi nad des lus kyi khong lci ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-20: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lhod cing gcig tu 'dus pa zhig pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-21: mdangs kyi yon tan gang dag yod pa de zad cing nyams par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-22: rgyu de dag gis mi'i khrag dang tshil chung ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-23: snying po ni lus kyi stobs la bya ste de med par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-24: dbang po'i tshogs rnams lhod cing bya ba'i sbyar ba las nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-25: lag ngar la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams brdungs pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-27: snying zag cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-28: mig gi phugs skrang zhing glo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-29: mig nyams shing mi sdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-30: mchil ma mang ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-31: ro smad 'bying zhing nang du zhum par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:160b-32: de bzhin du rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-33: de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-34: sa zhag zos las rnam ldar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:160b-36: skya rbab kyi nad de rnam pa lnga yod de nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-1: 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-2: sa zhag zos pa las gyur pa ni lnga pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-4: pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-5: yi ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-6: rdul med khong pa'i me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-7: lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-9: skya rbab kyi nad 'di'i sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-11: la lar pags pa rtsub par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-12: de la rlung gyur lus na zug / rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-13: mdog gnag rtsub la 'dar ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-14: skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-15: rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-17: skya rbab kyi nad de rlung las gyur pa ni lus na zhing mi bde ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-18: khab kyis phug pa ltar zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-19: rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog dmar zhing rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-21: skom dad la sogs pas nyen par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-22: mkhris las rtsa dang sen mo sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-24: skom dad rdul brgyal bsil ba 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-25: lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-26: 'khru zhing sgregs pa skyur la tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-28: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-29: rtsa dang sen mo dang mig dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-31: gci ba ljang sngon la sogs pa'i mdog tu snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-32: rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-33: bad kan rtsa sogs dkar ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-34: glongs shing kha nang lan tshva bro //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-35: ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags la //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-36: lud pa lu zhing slon par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-38: bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-39: rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-40: ba spu ldang zhing brtse ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-43: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid 'dres ma dang ldan la /
T13TD4312.2E:161a-44: de yang rnag cing bzod par dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-45: sa zhag bska bas rlung skyed la //
T13TD4312.2E:161a-46: tshva bro mkhris pa mngar bad kan //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-0: dangs ma la sogs @161b gnod 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-1: rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-2: zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-3: snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-4: de nas lte ba rkang pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-5: kha dang pho mtshan skrang bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-6: bshang ba srin bu dang bcas 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-7: bad kan khrag dang bcas pa 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-9: sa zhag zos na de'i ro bska bas ni rlung skyed cing gnod par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-10: lan tshva bro bas ni mkhris pa skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-11: mngar bag las ni bad kan skyed par byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-12: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams la yang gnod cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-13: de'i rtsub pa'i rgyus kha zas zos pa rtsub por gyur nas sa zhag de zhu bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-14: des rtsa sbubs kyi sgo 'gag cing rgyur mi rung bar byas te rtsa sbubs de dag snga ma bzhin du skya rbab kyi nad skyed bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-15: de nas de'i 'og tu lte ba la sogs ba skrang bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-16: bshang ba srin bu dang bcas par 'khru zhing 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-17: khrag dang bcas pa'i bad kan kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-18: gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-19: de yis mkhris skyed zas zos pas //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-20: khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-21: bshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-23: skya rbab kyi nad dang ldan pa'i mi gang zhig mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa'i zas dang skom la sogs pa bsten cing zos pas /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-24: mi de'i khong pa dang yan lag la brten cing gnas pa'i mkhris pas mig ser skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-25: ci zhig byas nas skyed par byed ce na /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-26: khrag dang sha bsregs shing tshig par byas pas mig ser skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-27: des ni mig dang pags pa gdong //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-28: bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-29: lus tsha skom dad zas mi 'ju //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-32: mig ser gyi nad des mig la sogs pa mdog ser por 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-33: de bzhin du lus tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-34: sngal ba ser po lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:161b-35: dbang po rnams nyam chung zhing rang gi yul 'dzin par mi nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-36: de ni mkhris pa'i shas che na //
T13TD4312.2E:161b-37: skya rbab nad med bar de 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-2: mig ser gyi nad 'di ni mkhris pa skyed par byed ba'i dngos bo bsten pa dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin shas che bas mkhris pa shin tu rgyas par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-3: skya rbab kyi nad med par yang khong ba dang yan lag la brten pa'i mkhris pa mig ser skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-4: yal bar bor na cher skrangs te //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-5: gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-7: mig ser gyi nad de nyid gso ba ma byas par yal bar bor na /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-8: tsha bas cher skrangs par gyur ba de ni mig ser 'or thabs zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-9: de ni gso dka' zhing bcos par dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-10: ha li sa ni ljang nag ser //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-11: rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-12: bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-13: khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-14: ha li sa ka khrag ngan gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-15: chu ser can zhes bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-17: gang gi tshe skya rbab kyi nad mkhris pa shas che bas ldang zhing gnas la ser bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-18: rlung dang mkhris ba shas che ba las mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-19: rims cung zad tsam gyis 'debs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-20: khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-21: nad de'i ming ni ha li sa ka zhes bya ba khrag ngan pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-22: de bzhin du chu ser can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-23: zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-24: de rnams kyi ni bla brnan sngar //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-25: 'or nad gtso bo yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-26: de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-28: skya rbab kyi nad de rnams kyi bla ba rnan sngar 'chi ltas kyi le'u'i skabs su 'or nad skrangs pa kho na gtso bo yin par bshad cing bstan pas /
T13TD4312.2E:162a-29: de'i phyir 'or nad skya rbab kyi 'og tu bshad cing bstan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-31: skya rbab 'or nad bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-32: rmig dang sen mo ser por snang //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-34: rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-35: khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-37: pags pa sha la gnas gyur te //
T13TD4312.2E:162a-38: 'or nad mthong zhing skrang bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-0: rlung 'khrugs @162b shang ldang bar gyur pas bad kan dang khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol gyi rtsar 'phros shing bye bar byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-1: bad kan la sogs pa de dag kyang phan tshun 'gro ba'i rgyun srang 'gags pas pags pa dang sha la gnas te 'or nad du 'gyur zhing mthong zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa'i skrang pa'i nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-2: de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-4: rgyu de bas na 'or nad thams cad ni nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no zhes rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-5: rgyu rnams kyi ni bye brag las //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-6: gzugs byed dgu yi bdag nyid can ;
T13TD4312.2E:162b-7: / nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-8: snad dang dug gis phog las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-10: 'or nad kyi rgyu so sor nges pa'i bye brag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba rnam pa dgu'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-11: de yang rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi tha dad las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-12: gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-13: thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste de ltar bdun dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-14: snad pa las gyur pa dang dug gis phog pa las byung ba gnyis te spyir dgu yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-15: yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-16: yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig gnyis //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-18: yang na 'or nad ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-19: nang na rang la yod pa'i nyes pa'i gzhi las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-20: glo bur ba'i nyes pa dug dang snad pa las byung ba gnyis so //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-22: lus kyi yan lag kun skrang ba'i 'or nad dang /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-23: yan lag gi phyogs gcig tu 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-24: khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-25: dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du'ang 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-27: yang 'or nad de ni khyab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin par drang srong rnams 'dod cing bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:162b-28: khyab pa ni rgya che ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-29: mtho ba ni grog mkhar ltar bags kyis mtho ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-30: mdud pa can ni mdud pa ltar tog tog por 'dug pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-31: de ltar na khyad par de dag gi 'or nad ni rnam pa gsum yin par 'dod do //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-32: 'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:162b-33: nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-2: myur du lhag par zos las 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-4: lhan cig skyes pa dang glo bur ba'i 'or nad thams cad kyi spyi'i thun mong gi rgyu ni 'og nas bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-5: nad gzhi las byung ba'i 'or nad kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyu'i khyad par lhag pa gzhan yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-6: de bzhin du glo bur ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-7: skyug sman la sogs pa'i las dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-8: smyung ba byas shing zas bcad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-9: sogs pa zhes smos pa las kyis dub pa la sogs pa nyam chung zhing rid par gyur pa'i mis myur du ste /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-10: de'i mod la zas drag par zos na 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-11: de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-12: skyur dang snum bsil lan tshva dang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-13: thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-14: mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-15: zas zos sha lci sha skam dang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-16: ma zhu ngal dang bud med drags //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-18: bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-20: de nas gzhan yang nad med par gnas pa dag gis zas dang skom lci ba la sogs pa shas cher drags pa bsten pas 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-21: de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pas nad skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-22: lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-23: gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-24: mngal nas khrag zag rims kyis btab //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-25: gsud dang chu ser slon nyes dang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-26: sbrum ma dang ni me dbal gyi //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-27: nad dang skya rbab dag gis btab //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-28: gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-29: nad de brang du gnas na ni //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-30: stod skrang chu sor gnas smad skrang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-31: dbus na gnas pa rab tu skrang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-32: yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrang //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-33: nying lag la brten de skrang byed //
T13TD4312.2E:163a-35: lud pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-36: de las gzhan pa'i nad rnams legs par gsos shing sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gsos par gyur na 'or nad kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-37: rgyu des rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par 'gyur ba de brang na gnas pa lus kyi ro stod kyi cha skrang par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:163a-38: chu sor gnas na chu so man chad kyi ro smad skrang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-0: @163b dbus te lte ba dang rked pa'i phyogs su gnas na lus kyi bar gyi phyogs su skrang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-1: lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab par gnas na thams cad skrang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-2: yan lag re re'i nying lag la gnas na gang la gnas pa'i nying lag nyid skrang bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-3: de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-4: yan lag snyom par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-6: 'or nad kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul ni mig la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams shin tu mi bzod par tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-7: yan lag rnams snyom zhing na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-8: rlung las skrang ba 'pho zhing rtsub //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-9: spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-11: na zhing zug pa bem bem po //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-12: myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-13: skrang ba mnan na dma' bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-14: snum dang dro bas mnyes na zhi //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-15: mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-16: pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-17: bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-19: rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-20: 'pho zhing gnas ma nges pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-22: spu rtsub bar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-23: mdog smug cing gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-24: pags pa 'khums shing gnyer ma yod pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-25: de bzhin du myur du ldang zhing 'byung la /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-26: myur du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-27: skrang ba'i phyogs lag pas mnan na dma' zhing kung kung por 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-28: snum bskus shing drod bag tu byas te mnyes na zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-29: mtshan mo skrang ba bri zhing chung la /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-30: nyin mo skrang ba che zhing 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:163b-31: pags pa yang yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-32: mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag / spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-33: myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-34: dang por dbus su byung dang srab //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-35: skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rdul //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-38: dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam //
T13TD4312.2E:163b-40: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-1: ser po la sogs par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-2: spu'i mdog dmar ser du gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-3: myur du ldang zhing 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-5: thog mar dbus kyi phyogs nas skrangs shing mched pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-6: pags pa srab ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:164a-7: / reg na mi bzod cing na la 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-8: bad kan g-ya' spu pags pa dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-9: mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-11: gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-12: mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-13: zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-14: 'od ma gtsags bu sogs dral yang //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-15: khrag mi 'byung bar sbyin bag 'dzag / dro dang reg pa la mngon dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-17: bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni skrang pa g-ya' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-18: spu dang pags pa dkar zhing skya ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-21: snum pa la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-22: gnyid che ba la sogs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-23: mnan na 'bying zhing spo bar mi byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-24: ldang zhing skye ba dang zhi ba dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-25: mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che zhing nyin mo skrangs tshabs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-27: gtsags bu la sogs pas dbral ba yang khrag mi 'byung bar ring zhig na sbyin bag nal nal po 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-28: dro ba la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164a-29: reg cing byugs na dga' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-30: gnyis byung gsum por ji bzhin pa //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-31: rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-33: nad gnyis las byung ba'i 'or nad gsum ni rgyu dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-34: 'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-36: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-37: mtshon la sogs pas snad gyur cing //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-38: bcad dam dbral lam smas la sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-39: kha ba me dang rgya mtsho'i rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-40: bse rtsi ka pi ka chu yi //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-41: khu ba gra ma sogs reg pas //
T13TD4312.2E:164a-42: skrang ba mched par 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-0: shin tu tsha zhing dmar @164b bar snang //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-1: phal cher 'khris pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-3: mtshon cha la sogs pas snad cing rma phyung la /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-4: bcad pa dang dbral ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-5: rma phug pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i 'or nad dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-6: sogs pa smos pas brdungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-11: dkris pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-12: de bzhin du kha bas phyid pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-14: de bzhin du rgya mtsho las byung ba'i rlung gis phog pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-15: bse shing gi me tog dang thang chus phog pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-16: ka pi ka chu'i zhes ba kha sral phre'u aad ma kub ta zhes bya ba'i gra mas reg na yang skrang par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-17: skrang pa de phan tshun mched cing byer bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-18: shin tu tsha zhing dro ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-19: mdog dmar por snang ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-20: phal cher te mang du mkhris pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-21: dug skyes srog chags dug can ni //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-22: lus la song dang gcin gyis phog / srog chags dug med pa yi yang //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-23: so dang mche ba sen mos zug / gcin rtug khu bas smes pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-24: dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg / dug shing rlung la reg pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-25: dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-26: mnyen zhing g-yo la 'phyang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-27: myur gsod tsha zhing na bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-29: dug las skyes pa'i 'or nad ni sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags dug can gyis reg cing lus la song ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-30: de bzhin du de'i gcin gyis phog pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-31: srog chags dug med pa dag gi yang gcin dang rtug pas phog pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-32: yang zhes smos pa ni dug dang bcas pa bsdu ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-33: de dag gi so dang mche ba dang sen mos zin cing zug pa dag kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-34: de bzhin du gcin dang rtug pa dang khu chus smes par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-35: de bzhin du dri ma dang bcas pa'i gos kyis reg pas kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:164b-36: de bzhin du dug gis shing la reg pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-37: dug dang 'dres pa'i rlung la reg pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:164b-38: de bzhin du dbyig dug sbyar mar byas pa'i phye mas reg pa las kyang 'or nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-4: myur du gsod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165a-6: na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-7: 'or nad gsar byung bla brnan med //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-10: 'or nad gsar du byung zhing skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165a-11: bla brnan gyi nad gzhan gyis ma gcos pa dag ni gso bar sla zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-14: 'or nad gso bar mi rung ba ni sngar lus kyi 'gyur ba bshad pa'i le'u'i skabs su bla brnan du mar ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bshad cing bstan zin pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-15: me dpal nad dang snad pa'i bar //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-16: gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-18: me dpal gyi nad ni nad gzhi so so dang gnyis 'dres pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165a-19: thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-20: snad pa'i bar las byung ba ste //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-21: me dpal rnam pa brgyad yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-22: de bzhin du gnod pa rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-23: de ni phyi nang gnyis ka ste //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-24: gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-26: me dpal de ni phyi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yod do zhes drang srong rnams kyi bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:165a-27: la la ni phyi rol na gnas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:165a-29: la la ni gnyi ga na gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-30: phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-32: me dpal de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso zhing bcos par dka' ste /
T13TD4312.2E:165a-33: de yang phyi rol na gnas pa bas ni nang na gnas pa rab tu gso bar dka' la /
T13TD4312.2E:165a-34: nang na gnas pa bas ni gnyis ka na gnas pa mchog tu gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-35: de la nad ni ji bzhin du //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-36: 'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-37: khyad par du ni tsha ba yis //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-38: lus la myur du mched par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-39: de yang nang gnas nang du mched //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-40: phyir gnas phyir mched gnyis kar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:165a-41: gnyis kar mched par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-0: me dpal gyi nad de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad @165b rang rang gi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrugs shing g-yo bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-1: kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i rgyus ldang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-2: khyad par du ni tsha zhing sreg par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sman dang zas dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-3: spyod lam gyis ldang zhing nad des lus la myur du mched cing rgyas par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-4: de yang ji ltar mched ce na /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-5: nang na gnas pa'i me dpal ni nang na mched cing rgyas par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-6: phyi rol du gnas pa ni phyi rol nyid du mched la /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-7: gnyis kar gnas shing brten pa ni phyi dang nang gnyis kar mched cing rgyas par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-8: de la nang na gnas pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-9: gnas rnams tsha gdung myos par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-10: bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-11: skom dad rab che gcin nad sogs //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-12: mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-13: me drod myur nyams las shes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-15: de las nang na gnas pa la sogs pa'i me dpal gyi nang nas nang na gnas pa'i me dbal ni gnad rnams tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las shes shing rtogs par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-16: snying la sogs pa'i gnad rnams tsha zhing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-17: myos shing rmongs bag tu byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-18: nang du bu ba'i sgo rnams la gnod cing gzir la khyad par du bskyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-19: de bzhin du skom dad lhag par rab tu che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-20: bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i shugs mi snyoms shing legs par mi 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:165b-21: khong pa'i me drod dang lus kyi sbubs shin tu myur bar nyams pa las shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-22: phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-24: phyi rol tu gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid ni nang na gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid las go bzlog par 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-25: de la rlung gyur me dpal ni //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-26: rlung gi rims dang nad thabs 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-27: skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-28: yan lag snyom zhing ba spu brtse //
T13TD4312.2E:165b-30: de la me dpal gyi nad rlung las gyur pa ni rlung gi rims dang na ba'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin par shes par bya la //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-0: yang de bzhin du me dbal de ni skrang ba la sogs pa dang yang ldan @166a * //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-2: mkhris gyur myur du mched cing 'gro //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-3: mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-5: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i me dbal ni lus la myur du mched cing khyab par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-6: mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid ji skad smos pa'i rtags dang ldan pa dang shin tu shas cher dmar ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-7: bad kan las g-ya' reg na 'jam //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-8: bad kan las byung rims 'dar na //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-10: bad kan las byung ba'i me dbal ni shas cher g-ya' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-12: bad kan las byung ba'i me dpal dang rims dang tshul 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-13: me dpal sogs kun yal bar bor //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-14: rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-15: de ni smin rdol rang rang gi / me dpal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-17: me dbal thams cad yal bar bor zhing gso bar ma byas na /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-18: rang gi nad rlung la sogs pa'i tshul bsags shing 'phel bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-19: rlung gi mtshan nyid kyis ni rlung gi me dbal 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-20: mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni mkhris pa'i me dbal 'phel zhing stsogs par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-21: bad kan gyi mtshan nyid kyis ni bad kan gyi me dpal sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-22: de bzhin du smin zhing rdol ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-23: dang por smin nas phyis rdol bar 'gyur ba yin pas na smin zhing rdol ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-24: de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rang rang gi rma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de 'dzin zhing 'phyang bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-27: rlung las sngo nag smug pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166a-29: mkhris pa las gyur smin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas smos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-30: rlung mkhris las ni rims 'debs slon //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-32: rus tshigs chag snyam me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-33: mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-34: yan lag thams cad me mdag ni //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-35: 'bar bas khyab pa lta bur tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-36: phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-37: khyab pas yan lag de dang der //
T13TD4312.2E:166a-38: me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-0: sngo ba 'am dmar @166b bas khyab byed la //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-1: mes bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-2: myur du mched cing khyab par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-3: gnad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-4: de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-5: yan lag na zhing dran pa stor //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-6: gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam pa drag / skyigs bus 'debs shing 'di lta bu'i //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-7: gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-8: sa dang mal khri stan sogs la //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-9: gang du'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-10: 'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-11: lus sems ngal las byung ba yis //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-12: gnyid kyi rmongs bag sad dka' ba //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-13: de ni me 'dra'i me dpal yin //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-15: rlung dang mkhris pa las ni me dang 'dra ba'i me dbal du 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-16: de yang rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-17: lus kyi yan lag thams cad me mdag 'bar bas khyab cing gtor ba lta bur rab tu tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-18: yang me dpal de lus kyi phyogs gang dang gang du mched cing khyab pa'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyogs de dang der me mdag 'bar ba zhi ba bzhin du gnag cing sngo ba dang dmar bas khyab par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-19: yang me dpal de ni mes bsregs pa lta bur chu bur gyis myur du mched par byed cing kun tu khyab par byed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-20: de yang rlung dang mkhris pa'i rgyu nyid kyis myur ba kho nar khyab par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:166b-21: yang de bzhin du snying la sogs pa'i gnad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing me dbal des de'i 'og tu stobs rab tu skyes pa'i rlung des yan lag na zhing gzer bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-22: dran pa stor zhing brgyal bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-23: gnyid yar zhing med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-24: dbugs kyi rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-25: skyigs bu'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-26: me dpal gyi nad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs 'thob cing myong bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:166b-27: sems mal na bde bar mi gnas pa'i dbang du gyur bas sa dang mal khri dang stan la sogs pa gang du gnas su zin kyang lus dang sems bde ba mi 'thob pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-0: de ltar mi bde ba nyid kyis phan tshun 'gre zhing ldog la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba @167a * //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-2: lus dang sems ngal zhing dub pa las byung ba gnyid kyi rmongs bag nyams su myong zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-3: de yang sad par shin tu dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-4: bad kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-5: bad kan de brtol mang du byed //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-6: khrag 'phel ba yis khrag brtol te //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-7: pags pa chu ba sha la gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-8: gnon byas thor bu phra zhing rim //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-9: zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-10: mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-11: mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-12: lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-13: kha skam skyigs bu slon mgo 'khor //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-14: rmongs bag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-15: yan lag na zhing me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-16: de ltar mdzer pa'i me dbal ni //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-17: bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-19: bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las ni mdzer pa'i me dpal zhes bya ba'i nad du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-20: de yang bad kan gyi nad kyis rlung de bkag cing 'byung du mi ster ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-21: rlung gis bad kan de brtol zhing phye nas dum bu mang du byas pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-22: yang khrag 'phel bar gyur pa'i mi'i khrag phye zhing dum bur brtol nas mdzer pa'i phreng ba'am rmen bu'i phreng ba skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-23: de yang pags pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'i khrag gis gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-24: thor bu phra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang mdog dmar ba'i phreng ba chags par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-25: mdzer pa'i phreng ba de yang nang du na zhing rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:167a-26: de ltar bshad pa'i mdzer pa'i me dbal 'di ni bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-27: bad kan mkhris las rims 'debs rengs //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-28: gnyid che slon bag klad pa na //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-29: yan lag na zhing bya rmyang 'dod //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-31: rtsub cing drod nyams rus chag snyam //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-32: skam zhing dbang po mi gsal lci //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-34: de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-35: phal cher ma zhu gnas na zhugs //
T13TD4312.2E:167a-36: phyogs gcig tu ni rab mi na //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-0: @167b thor bu ser po dmar po dang //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-1: dkar pos phyogs kun khyab par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-2: nor bu ltar snang gnag cing snum //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-3: dri ma can la skrang zhing lci //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-4: rnag pa'i zabs che rab tu tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-5: reg na 'jig cing rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-6: 'dam ltar sha ni zhig gyur cing //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-7: rtsa rgyus gsal bar snang ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-8: mi yi ro ltar mnam me dbal //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-11: bad kan dang mkhris pa las ni 'dam 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i me dbal 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-12: der yang mtshan ma rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa snang ste /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-13: yan lag na zhing bya rmyang byed 'dod pa ni phan tshun rkyong zhing 'degs par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-14: rus pa chag pa snyam sems pa ni rus pa dkrum pa snyam du byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-15: dang ga 'khyil ba ni zhal zhal byas snyam du sems shing bad kan la sogs pa 'khyil ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-16: me dbal de yang phal cher ma zhu ba'i gnas nu ma dang lte ba'i bar du zhugs nas /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-17: de'i phyogs gcig la brten te lhag par na bar mi byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-18: yang na de bzhin du thor bu mdog ser po la sogs pas khyab cing gang bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-19: nor bu'i mdog lta bur snang ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-20: gnag cing ser skyar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-21: phal cher mdog nag po dang smug por gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-22: dri ma can la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-23: rnag pa'i zabs che zhing nang du nub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-24: shas cher rab tu tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-25: lag pa la sogs pas reg na 'jig cing nyams la rnags pa 'dam ltar gnas shing sha rnams zhig par 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-26: de nyid kyis rtsa rgyus la sogs pa gsal bar snang zhing gsal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-27: mi ro ltar shin tu mnam zhing dri nga ba'i me dbal gyi nad de ni 'dam 'dra ba'i me dbal zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-28: kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-29: lus zungs kun la rab khyab byed ;
T13TD4312.2E:167b-31: me dpal nad gzhi kun las skyes pa nad gzhi gsum car gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:167b-32: yang des ni lus zungs thams cad la khyab cing mched par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-33: phyi yi rgyu yi smas las 'khrugs //
T13TD4312.2E:167b-34: khrag bcas mkhris pa skyed byed de //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-0: @168a * // me dpal du ni rlung gis byed //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-3: shin tu tsha la dmar zhing sngo //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-5: phyi rol gyi rgyu mtshon cha la sogs pas smas par gyur pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-6: rlung 'khrugs par gyur na khrag dang bcas pa'i mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-7: me dpal gyi nad rlung gis skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-8: de yang rgya sran ku langtha 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis khyab cing khebs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-9: skrang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-10: nad dmigs tha dad las gyur gsum //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-11: gnyis gyur bla brnan med gso bla //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-13: nad dmigs tha dad pa las gyur pa'i me dbal gsum skyed cing gso sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-14: de bzhin du nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa'i me dbal bla brnan med pa dag kyang gso sla ba yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:168a-15: / de la bla brnan ni lus kyi 'gyur ba shes pa'i le'u las smos pa'i skem pa dang kha dog mi sdug pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-16: rma dang 'dus pa las byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-17: thams cad gnad ni khyab pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-18: rtsa dang chu ba sha 'drul dang //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-19: mi ro'i dri 'dra rul gso dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-21: me dbal gnyis po rma 'am gnad pa'i nad las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-22: 'dus pa las byung ba ni gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-23: thams cad de nad gzhi tha dad pa dang nad gzhi gnyis las byung ba'i me dbal thams cad kyang gnad rnams khebs shing khyab pa ni gso dka' la ;
T13TD4312.2E:168a-24: de bzhin du rma la sogs pa 'drul zhing zhig pa yang gso dka'o //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-25: de bzhin du khyad par mi ro'i dri 'dra zhing shin tu mnam pa de yang gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:168a-26: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-27: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-28: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o /
T13TD4312.2E:168a-30: // / de nas mdze dang sha bkra dang gzi gu dang srin bu'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-0: pags pa'i nad du tshul gcig pas me dbal gyi rjes la mdze @168b nad la sogs pa bstan pa'i le'u brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-1: kha zas spyod lam log pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-2: khyad par du ni mi 'phrod bsten //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-3: dam pa smod dang srog gcod dang //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-4: gzhan gyi nor 'phrog sogs bsten dang //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-5: sdig pa'i las ni 'phral byas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-6: sngon chad byas pas nad bslangs nas //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-7: rtsa la thad kar gram nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-8: sha dang pags pa chu ser khrag / gnod byas sla bar gyur nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-10: pags pa'i mdog ni mi sdug byed //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-11: mi bzad de ni mdze ru bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-13: zas dang spyod lam log pa ste //
