T13TD4312.2E:168b-14: zas grang ches pa dang tsha ches pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-15: ya ba ka la sogs pa zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-16: de bzhin du spyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-17: gsod pa dang rku ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-18: khyad par du yang mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas dang nya dang 'o ma lhan cig bza' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-19: sbrang rtsi dang rlan can gyi sha lhan cig zos pa la sogs pa mi 'phrod pa'i rnam pa zas kyi le'u las smos pa lta bu bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-20: de bzhin du khyad par du 'gal ba'i spyod pa byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-21: rnam par 'tshe zhing gzhan la gnod pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-22: tshig rtsub por smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-23: gzhan la gnod par sems pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-24: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi dge ba byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-25: skyes bu dam pa la smod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las 'phral du tshe 'dir byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-26: yang na sngon chad byas shing bsags pa la goms par byas pas /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-27: rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshogs rnams bslang zhing bskyed nas gnod par gyur pa rtsa la thad kar gram zhing zhugs nas /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-28: pags pa la sogs pa la gnod par byas shing nad bskyed nas sla zhing zhum par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-29: de nas de'i 'og tu nad de rnams phyi rol tu byung zhing thon par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:168b-30: pags pa'i mdog mi sdug cing snga ma las gzhan du gyur pa'i mdog du mar byed pa'i nad de ni mdze zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-31: zhes drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pas bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-32: gang phyir dus las yal bar bor //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-33: de ni lus kun ma rungs 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:168b-35: ci'i phyir mdze zhes bya zhe na /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-0: gang gi phyir rang gi gso ba'i @169a * //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-1: dus la bab pa de las yal bar bor zhing gso bar ma byas na nad de las thams cad ma rung zhing gnod par byed pas na de'i phyir ming mdze zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-2: lus zungs la zhugs nang du khyab //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-4: rdul bcas rul zhing mnam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-5: srin bu phra mo mi bzad skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-6: spu lpags chu ba rtsa chen dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-7: rus pa snyi ba rim bzhin za //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-8: de bas sha bkra phyi rol te //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-9: mdze las gzhan ni yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-11: mdze'i nad de dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs thams cad du zhugs shing nang du khyab par byas nas lus zungs de dag thams cad 'drul zhing gsher bar byas nas lus la 'bu skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-12: 'bu de yang shin tu phra ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-13: mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba'i nad skyed par byed pa des spu la sogs pa za bar byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-14: rus pa snyi ba'i rna ba dang sna'i phyogs na gnas pa'i rus pa mnyen pa la bya ste de dag za bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-15: de bas rgyu de'i phyir sha bkra la ni 'drul ba dang 'bu la sogs pa med de /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-16: de pags pa'i phyi rol du gnas pa ni mdze las gzhan pa yin no zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-17: nad gzhi gsum dang 'dres pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-18: 'dus gyur mdze nad rnam pa bdun //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-20: mdze nad ni rnam pa bdun yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-21: nad gzhi tha dad pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-22: nyes pa de dag nyid sna gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-23: de gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste de ltar bdun no //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-24: kun kyang nyes gsum las byung yang //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-25: de las lhag pa las ming 'dogs //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-27: mdze nad kun kyang nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:169a-28: de las nyes pa gang shas che zhing lhag par gnas pa las rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa'i ming du 'dogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-29: rlung gi mdze ni thod pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:169a-31: rlung gi shas che ba'i 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims ni thod pa 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-0: mkhris @169b gyur au dum b'a ra ste //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-2: mkhris pa shas che ba'i 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims nad ni au dum b'a ra zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-3: bad kan las gyur zlum glang shu //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-5: bad kan shas che ba'i 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mdze ni mdze dang zlum po zhes bya ba dang glang shu zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-6: rlung mkhris las skyes ri shya'i lce //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-8: rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis shas che ba las ni ri shya'i lce zhes bya ba'i mdze nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-9: bad rlung las gyur pags pa gcig /'brum phran dang ni sha bkra dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-12: bad kan dang rlung shas che ba las ni mdze nad pags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-13: bad kan mkhris pa las byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-14: shu ba rma kha brgya ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-16: g-yan pa pags pa myags pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-18: bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyis shas che ba las gyur pa'i mdze nad ni shu ba la sogs pa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-21: nad gzhi gsum char cha mnyam pa las ni 'ol ma se zhes bya ba'i mdze nad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:169b-22: de ltar na mdze nad bco brgyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-23: dang po'i gsum dang shu ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-25: ri shya'i lce zhes bya ba ste //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-26: 'di bdun mdze nad chen po yin //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-28: mdze nad de dag gi nang nas dang po'i gsum pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:169b-35: ri shya'i lce zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:169b-36: bdun pa 'di dag ni mdze nad chen po zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-37: mdze nad sngon byung mtshan ma ni //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-38: shin tu 'jam pa'am reg na rtsub //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-39: rdul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug / lus tsha g-ya' zhing lpags tshor med //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-40: thor bu phra'u mtho ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-41: rma ni lhag par gzer ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:169b-42: myur du 'byung zhing ring du gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-2: rgyu chung gis kyang nad cher ldang //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-3: ba spu brtse zhing khrag mdog gnag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-4: mdze nad thams cad la sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni 'di dag yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-6: ched 'ga' ni shin tu rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-8: ched 'ga' ni rdul mi 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-9: mdog shin tu mi sdug par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-10: lus kyi yan lag thams cad tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-11: thor bu tal til mtho bar chags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-14: snad pa las byung ba rnams lhag par na zhing gzer ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-15: yang rma de dag nyid myur du 'gyur zhing smin par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-16: myur du 'byung zhing smin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-17: rma nyid du ring du gnas shing mi 'drubs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-18: gal te rma 'tshobs pa dag kyang reg na rtsub cing mi bde ba nyid du 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-19: rma de 'jig par 'gyur ba'i rgyu chung ngu dag gis kyang slar zhig cing nad cher ldang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-20: ba spu rnams brtse zhing bshor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-21: khrag gi mdog nag po nyid du snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-22: thod pa lta bu gnag cing smug / rtsub sra tshor ba chung la srab //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-23: khyab cing mtha' ma mi mnyam la //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-24: ba spu langs pas khyab par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-25: shin tu zug cing g-ya' ba chung //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-26: myur du khyab byed thod pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-28: mdze nad thod pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i rus pa smug nag lta bu'i mdog can du gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-29: lus reg na rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-31: pags pa tshor ba chung zhing bem bem por gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-32: srab cing zabs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-33: khyab cing rgya che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-34: mtha' ma mi mnyam cing ring thung du 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-35: de bzhin du ba spu langs shing bshor bas khyab cing rgyas pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:170a-36: shin tu zug cing nad tshabs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170a-37: shas cher mi g-ya' ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-38: au dum b'a ra smin pa ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-39: pags spu smug rtsa dkar bas khyab //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-40: shas cher mthug dang shas cher 'drul //
T13TD4312.2E:170a-41: tsha ba'i nad dang khrag shas cher //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-0: myur du smin cing 'drul @170b bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-1: 'bu can au dum b'a ra yin //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-3: au dum b'a ra zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni au dum b'a ra'i 'bras bu smin pa ltar pags pa dang spu nag por gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-4: rtsa dkar zhing skya la khyab cing khebs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-5: shas cher mthug cing lhun sdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-6: shas cher 'drul zhing rnags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-8: nad kyi tshabs che zhing khrag gi shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-9: myur du smin pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-11: dkar dmar myur du mi mched la //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-13: g-ya' zhing rnag che 'bus gang la //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-14: mtha' ma 'jam zhing ser por snang //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-15: gor gor por gnas zlum po yin //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-17: mdze nad zlum po zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-18: kun nas zlum par gnas pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-19: de'i mtshan nyid ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-20: 'thas shing sra bar chags pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:170b-21: lci ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-22: phan tshun gcig la gcig 'dab 'brel bar skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-23: shu ba slon zhing gyen du 'bur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-24: g-ya' ba la sogs pa tshabs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-25: mtha' ma reg na 'jam zhing mdog ser bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-26: zlum po'i dbyibs gor gor po'i tshul du gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-27: g-ya' zhing phra tsag gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-28: chu ser mang ba glang shu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-30: mdze nad glang shu zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-31: g-ya' ba dang bcas shing 'brum phran phra mo tsag tsag pos khyab pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-33: chu ser mang du 'dzag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-34: rtsub cing sra la mtha' ma dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-35: nang na gnag cing mtho ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-36: zug cing tsha la na zhing rnag /'brum bu rtsub pos khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-37: ri shya'i lce ni dbyibs 'dra ba //
T13TD4312.2E:170b-40: ri shya'i lce 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni srog chags ri shya'i lce 'dra ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-41: de'i mtshan nyid ni mdog shin tu rtsub cing reg na mi bde ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-43: nang gi dbus kyi kha dog gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:170b-44: dbus ma de nyid mtho zhing glo ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-0: de bzhin du zug pa la sogs @171a * //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-2: 'brum bu phra mo rtsub pas khyab cing rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-3: 'bu'i tshogs shin tu mang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-4: glang po'i lpags 'dra reg rtsub lpags //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-6: pags pa zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-7: glang po che'i pags pa dang 'dra bar mthug cing reg na rtsub pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-8: gcig pur bshad la gzhi che ba //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-11: gcig pu zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni 'byung ba'i gnas kyi gzhi che zhing lhun sdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-12: de bzhin du rdul mi 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-13: nya'i pags pa dang 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-14: 'brum bu phra mo thug thug po //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-15: reg na rtsub dang ldan pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-16: g-ya' zhing sra la gnag pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-18: 'brum bu phra mo zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni tug tug po zhes bya ba yan lag gi phyogs 'dar zhing drod pa las tug tug por 'byung ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-19: de dang 'dra bar reg na rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-20: g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-21: sha bkra nang rtsub phyi rol 'jam //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-22: phrugs na glog pa 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-23: reg na 'jam zhing srab pa la //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-24: ku ba'i me tog ltar dmar dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-25: phal cher ro stod dag tu 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-27: mdze nad sha bkra zhes bya ba ni nang na rtsub par gnas pa la phyi rol gyi mtha' cung zad 'jam par gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-28: de phrugs par gyur na glog pa'i rdul 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-29: reg na 'jam zhing mnyen pa la zabs chung bas srab cing ku ba'i me tog ltar rtsa dmar po shin tu dkar ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-30: de yang phal cher shas cher ro stod kyi rgyab la sogs par 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-31: rmen bu dmar po g-ya' dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-32: khyab par byed pa'i 'bras zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-34: 'bras byer ba zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni rmen bu dmar po shin tu g-ya' ba dang ldan pas khyab cing khebs pa la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-35: rkang pa lag pa gas pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:171a-36: / mi bzad na zhing g-ya' tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-37: rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:171a-39: rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni lag pa dang rkang pa gas shing ser ka shas cher 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171a-40: mi bzad par na zhing cung zad tsam g-ya' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-0: thor bu dmar @171b pos khyab pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-1: ring du mched cing d'ur ba 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-2: pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-3: g-ya' zhing brtan par gnas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-4: zlum por 'byung ba shu ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-6: shu ba zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni thor bu phra mo dmar pos kun tu khyab cing rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-7: de bzhin du ring du mched cing rgya cher 'phros pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-8: mdog rtsva d'ur ba 'dra bar ljang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-9: pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra bang sngo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-10: g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-11: rtsa ba sbom zhing tsha bcas na //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-12: dmar zhing smug la rma kha mang //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-13: rnag cing 'bu mang kha brgya pa //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-14: phal cher kun tu skye ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-16: mdze nad rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-17: rtsa ba sbom pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-18: rma'i tshogs kha mang du gnas pa la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-19: de yang lus phal mo cher kun tu skye zhing 'byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-20: mtha' ma dmar zhing dbus na dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-21: g-ya' tsha na dang bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-22: mtho zhing ri mo brtan pas khyab //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-24: stug cing chu ser khrag mang la //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-25: phal cher myur rdol pad dkar yin //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-27: mdze nad padma dkar po zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-28: gang du 'byung ba'i mtshan ma thog thag dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-29: dbus na padma dkar po ltar dkar ba dang g-ya' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-30: glo zhing mtho ba dang rtsa ris brtan pas kun tu khyab cing padma'i 'dab ma ltar rtsa'i ri mo rtsa dmar bas rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-31: de nyid mthug cing zabs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:171b-32: chu ser dang khrag gi shas che zhing mang ba dang myur du rdol cing zhig par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-33: pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu dkar //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-34: dmar bas gang ba 'brum bu yin //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-36: mdze nad 'brum bu zhes bya ba ni pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu mdog dkar dmar du gnas pas gang zhing khyab pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-37: g-ya' ba'i nad ni g-ya' ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-38: 'drul zhing lhag par na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-39: 'brum bu phra gnag mang po ni //
T13TD4312.2E:171b-40: phal cher rkub lag gru mor 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-0: mdze nad g-ya' ba zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu phra mo @172a * //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-1: mdog gnag pa mang por 'byung la //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-2: de yang gnas ni phal cher rkub dang lag sor dang gru mo la sogs par 'byung zhing lhag par g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-3: thor bu bcas shing reg mi bzod //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-4: g-ya' zhing dro tsha na dang bcas //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-5: dmar la pags pa myags pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-7: mdze nad pags pa myags pa zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-8: thor bu'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-9: lhag par yang reg na mi bzod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-10: 'ol ma se ni rab tsha na //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-11: stod ni dmar zhing gnag pa ste //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-13: mdze yi mtshan ma kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-14: de bas kha dog du mar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-16: mdze nad 'ol ma se zhes bya ba rab tu mi bzad par na zhing na ba dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-17: stod dmar zhing smad gnag pas 'ol ma se zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-18: 'ol ma se 'dra ba'i mdze nad de yang mdze'i mtshan ma ma lus pa kun dang ldan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-19: de bas na de ni kha dog gcig dang mi ldan gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-20: kha dog tha dad par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-21: mdze nad rnams mtshan ma de las mdzer gyur pa ni mtshan ma de las zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-22: thod pa lta bu la sogs pa'i mdze nad gzhir shas che zhing rgyas pa ni nad kyi dbye ba shes par bya ba de las bshad pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma dang las g-yo ba dang khyab pa bstan pa yin pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-23: yang na mtshan ma yang yin la las kyang yin pas na mtshan ma las te /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-24: rlung gi ni g-yo ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-26: tsha ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-27: bad kan gyi ni 'jam pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:172a-28: sra ba la sogs pa ste mtshan ma'i las de dag gis nad kyi shas rgyas pa rtogs shing khong du chud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-29: mdze nad nad gzhi shas che ba //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-30: nad dbye shes las bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-31: mtshan ma las kyis bstan pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-32: nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-33: gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang //
T13TD4312.2E:172a-34: rus rkang khu chu la gnas spang //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-0: mdze nad nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan nyid rgyas pa las @172b byung ba ni spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-1: de bzhin du 'chi ltas kyi le'u las /
T13TD4312.2E:172b-2: mdze ni yan lag zhig pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa de yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-4: gzhan yang mdze gang yang rung ba la sogs par gnas pa de yang spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-5: tshil la gnas pa 'tsho ba tsam //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-7: tshil la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni re zhig mi na bar 'tsho ba tsam du byar rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-8: mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-10: mdze nad mkhris pa 'dres pa las byung ba gso bar dka' ste /
T13TD4312.2E:172b-11: mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa las gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:172b-12: mkhris pa dang rlung 'dres pa las gyur pa ni mkhris 'dres zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-13: de bzhin du sha dang khrag la gnas pa'i mdze nad kyang gso dka'o //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-14: rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-15: lpags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-17: mdze nad bad kan dang rlung re re'am 'dres pa las gyur pa ni gso sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-18: de bzhin du pags pa la gnas pa'i mdze nad kyang gso sla'o //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-19: de bzhin du nad gzhi gcig las byung ba'i mdze yang gso sla'o //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-20: de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-21: zug cing rtsub la mdog mi sdug / ces bya ba la ;
T13TD4312.2E:172b-22: de la mdze'i nad de rnams kyi nang nas pags pa la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni zug cing na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-23: khrag gnas rdul 'byung gnyid che sgang //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-25: khrag la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni rdul 'byung ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-26: sha la gnas pa rkang pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-29: sha la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni rkang pa dang lag par 'brum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-30: tshigs gnas lhag par tshigs 'drul skem //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-32: yan lag zhig par byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:172b-34: tshigs rnams la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni lhag par tshigs 'drul zhing rnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:172b-36: rkang pa 'jas shing 'gro mi nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-0: tshil la gnas pa'i mdze ni lus kyi yan lag gi tshogs zhig cing 'drul bar 'gyur @173a * //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-2: / rus pa rkang gnas sna zhom zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-3: mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-6: rus pa dang rkang la zhugs pa'i mdze nad ni sna zhom zhing nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-7: mig gnyis dmar zhing sle sle por 'gyur ba dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:173a-11: bu dang chung mar bcas la 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-13: mdze nad khu chu la gnas pa ni rang gi bu dang chung ma dang bcas pa la mdze 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-14: khrag sogs la ni rim bzhin du //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-18: khrag dang sha dang tshil dang rus pa dang rkang dang khu ba rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-19: khrag la sogs pa ni khu ba'i gong na gnas pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-20: des na lus zungs gang la gnas pa'i mdze nad gong ma gang yin pa de la de'i mtshan ma 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-21: des na khrag la gnas pa'i mdze nad la pags pa'i mtshan ma zug pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-22: ma zhu ba'i gnas la gnas pa'i mdze la ni pags pa dang khrag gi mtshan ma 'byung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-23: tshil la gnas pa ni pags pa dang khrag dang sha la gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-24: de bzhin du khu ba la gnas pa'i mdze la mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-25: de ltar mdze nad bshad nas ;
T13TD4312.2E:173a-26: da ni sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad par bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-27: gzi gu mdze dang gcig las 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-28: de ni sha bkra chu dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-29: yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-30: nad gzhi gsum la brten zhing 'byung //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-32: sha bkra'i nad gzi gu ni mdze nad dang nad gzhi gcig pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-33: de bzhin du gnod pa dang gnod bya la sogs pa rnams kyang gcig pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173a-34: de'i ming ni sha bkra gzi gu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:173a-35: chu dang yongs su mi 'dzag pa zhes bya bar slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-0: de yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad gzhi @173b gsum la brten cing nad gang khrag dang sha dang tshil gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dag la brten cing 'byung ba yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-1: rlung las rtsub cing smug pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-3: rlung las gyur pa'i sha bkra gzi gu ni reg na rtsub cing kha dog smug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-5: tsha zhing ba spu 'byi bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-7: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i sha bkra ni padma'i 'dab ma ltar shin tu dmar ba dang tsha ba dang bcas shing spu 'byi bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-8: bad kan las skya stug cing lci //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-11: bad kan las gyur pa'i sha bkra ni stug cing lci ba dang g-ya' ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-13: sha dang tshil la brten par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-15: sha bkra gzi gu de ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sha la sogs pa la brten par bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-16: de la rlung las ni khrag la brten pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-17: mkhris pa las ni sha la brten pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-18: bad kan las ni tshil la brten pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-19: 'di dag mdog ni gnyis ka yin //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-20: de ni phyi ma bzhin gso dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-22: sha bkra 'di dag gi mdog ni gnyis ka la brten pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-23: khrag la brten na ni kha dog gnag pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-24: sha la brten na ni zangs ltar dmar ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-25: tshil la brten na ni dkar ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-26: de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso dka' ste /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-27: khrag dang rlung las byung ba bas ni sha dang mkhris pa las byung ba gso dka' la ;
T13TD4312.2E:173b-28: de bas ni tshil la brten pa nas /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-29: bad kan las byung ba shin tu gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-30: spu dkar ma yin srab pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-31: phan tshun ma 'dres gsar du byung //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-32: mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-34: sha bkra'i nad gang spu dkar ba ma yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-35: srab cing zabs su chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-36: phan tshun gcig la gcig ma 'dres pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-37: skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:173b-38: mes bsregs pa las byung ba ma yin pa ni gso bar sla'o //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-39: de las gzhan pa gso dka' yin //
T13TD4312.2E:173b-40: mdoms dang lag mthil mthur byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-1: du byung yang gso bar dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-3: sngar bshad pa de las gzhan pa ba spu dkar ba dang mthug pa dang phan tshun 'dres pa dang yun ring po lon pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:174a-4: mes bsregs pa las byung ba yin na ni gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-5: de bzhin du mdoms la sogs par byung ba ni gsar du byung ba yin na yang gso bar dka' bas spang bar bya ba nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-6: nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-7: mal gcig reg sogs la brten nas //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-8: thams cad 'go ste mig nad dang //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-9: mdze nad lhag par 'go ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-12: mang du 'go ba'i ngang tshul can yin zhing lus las lus su 'pho ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:174a-14: zas lhan cig zos pa la sogs pas 'pho ste /
T13TD4312.2E:174a-15: gang gi che nad pa dang lhan cig tu za zhing mal gcig tu nyal ba dang reg pa la sogs pa byas na /
T13TD4312.2E:174a-16: de'i tshe nad med pa'i mi la yang nad thams cad ma lus par 'pho ba yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.2E:174a-17: de las kyang khyad par mdze nad la sogs pa pags pa'i nad dang /
T13TD4312.2E:174a-18: mig gi nad ni shas cher 'pho zhing 'go ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-19: sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad nas //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-20: da ni srin bu'i nad bshad de //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-21: phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-22: srin bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-24: srin bu'i nad ni phyi na gnas pa dang nang na gnas pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis yod do //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-25: zhes bya ba mngon bar shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-26: phyi yi dri mas bad kan khrag / bshang skyes dbye bas rnam bzhi yin //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-28: srin bu'i nad ni skye gnas kyi dbye bas rnam pa bzhi yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:174a-29: la la ni phyi'i dri ma las skyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-30: la la ni bad kan las skyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-31: la la ni khrag las skyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-32: la la ni bshang ba las skyes pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-33: ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-35: ming gi dbye ba'i gnas bshang ba rnams kyis de rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-36: de la phyi yi khrag las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:174a-38: skra dang gos la brten pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-0: phra zhing rkang pa mang la @174b ming ;
T13TD4312.2E:174b-1: / shig dang sro ma zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-2: gnyis kas thor bu 'brum bu dang //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-3: g-yan pa dag ni skyed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-5: de la srin bu de rnams kyi nang nas phyi'i srin bu ni khrag dri ma can las byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:174b-6: gang gi tshe khrus la sogs pas dag par ma byas pa de'i tshe shig la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:174b-7: de yang tshad dang dbyibs dang mdog ni til 'bru lta bu yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:174b-8: gnas ni skra dang gos la brten cing 'dug la /
T13TD4312.2E:174b-9: lus ni phra zhing rkang pa mang ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:174b-10: de'i ming ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T13TD4312.2E:174b-12: sro ma zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-13: des kyang lus la thor bu la sogs pa skyed cing 'byung bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-14: nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-16: nang gi 'bu ni mdze dang rgyu gcig cing mtshungs pa yin pas na kha zas dang spyod lam log pa dang kha zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa bsten pas yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-17: de las bad kan las mang skye //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-18: zas mngar bu ram 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-19: tsha dang 'bras sar chan la dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-21: nang na gnas pa'i srin bu de rnams las kyang phal cher ram mang du bad kan las skyes pa'i 'bu ni zas mngar ba la sogs pa la dga' zhing des 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-22: mi gtsang byung bcas bshang lam las //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-23: lo ma 'dab ma la sogs dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-25: bshang ba las byung ba'i 'bu ni bshang ba mang ba dang lo ma la dga' zhing des 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-26: bad kan ma zhu'i gnas su byung //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-27: skyes nas kun tu 'gro ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-29: la la srin bu khol ma 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-31: phra zhing ring la chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-32: dkar zhing dmar bar snang ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-34: bad kan las ma zhu ba'i gnas lte ba yan chad du byung ba ni skyes shing 'phel na yan man kun tu steng 'og tu 'gro ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:174b-35: srin bu de dag kyang 'breng pa 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-36: srin bu la la ni khol ma 'am rta bla ba 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:174b-37: kha cig ni 'bras kyi myu gu 'dra zhing dkar la sra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-0: de bzhin du kha cig ni phra zhing ring ba'i rnam @175a * //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-2: la la ni chung zhing phra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-3: mdog ni dkar ba dang dmar ba nyid du phal cher snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-4: de yi ming ni rnam bdun te //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-5: rgyu ma zad dang lto na 'khyil //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-6: snying za ya mtshan chen po dang //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-10: srin bu de rnams kyi ming gi dbye ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-11: rgyu ma za ba la sogs pa rnam pa bdun yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-15: brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-16: skom zhing sbrid pa cham pas 'debs //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-18: srin bu de rnams ni snying 'phar ba la sogs pa byed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-19: snying 'phar ba ni bad kan tshogs gyen du 'phar bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-20: kha chu 'dzag pa ni kha nas bad kan 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-21: kha zas mi 'ju ba la sogs pa byed pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:175a-22: / khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa nang na //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-23: khrag las byung ba'i srin bu phra //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-24: zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-25: phra zhing la la bltar mi snang //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-27: 'di rnams kyi gnas ni khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa bo che'i nang nas rgyu zhing de yang srin bu shin tu phra ba dang zlum pa la sogs pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-28: shin tu phra zhing chung ba yin pas na la la bltar mi snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-29: skra rtsa za zhing spu 'byi byed //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-30: spu gling au dum b'a ra 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-31: zhags pa bcas dang thong ka ste //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-32: drug po de dag mdze las gcig / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-33: yang srin bu de dag ni ming skra za ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa drug yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-34: yang de dag ni mdze dang las gcig ste /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-37: zug pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-38: skra dang kha spu la sogs pa 'byi ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-40: sha dang rtsa dang rus pa snyi ba dang za bar las gcig pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-41: zhu ba'i gnas su mi gtsang skyes //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-42: 'phel nas thur du rgyu bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-44: bshang ba las byung ba'i srin bu ni zhu ba'i gnas su 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.2E:175a-45: de 'phel zhing skyes par gyur pa na thur du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:175a-46: de ni cher 'phel gyur pa na //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-0: gang tshe ma zhu'i @175b gnas su zhugs //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-1: de tshe sgregs pa dbugs 'byung ba //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-2: phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-4: srin bu de rnams dus gang gi tshe ma zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe mi de sgregs pa dang dbugs 'byung ba phyis lta bur shin tu mnam par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-5: zlum zhing lus phra sbom po dang //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-6: smug dang ser dang dkar dang gnag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-7: srin bu de dag gi dbyibs ni zlum pa dang phra ba dang sbom por 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-8: mdog ni smug pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-9: srin bu de ming rnam lnga ste //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-10: kham gyis za dang dal gyis 'gro //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-11: myong bar byed dang brkam pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-12: lus la gnod byed ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-14: srin bu de rnams kyi ming kham gyis za ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-15: des 'khru gzer dang rtug skam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-16: skem zhing mdog ni skya ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-17: ba spu ldang zhing me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-18: lci g-ya' gzhang ni phyir 'byung byed //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-20: bshang ba de las byung ba'i srin bu de rnams kyis ni 'khru ba nas /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-21: gzhang phyir 'byung ba'i bar du skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-22: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-23: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-24: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-26: // / de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-28: nad chen po yin par mtshan nyid mthun pas /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-29: mdze nad kyi 'og tu rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad cing brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-30: rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-31: 'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-32: khyad par du ni lus kyi ni //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-33: nad dang nad med rgyu gcig pu //
T13TD4312.2E:175b-35: don dang don ma yin pa'i dge mi dge'i las gnyis po de dag de byed cing rdzogs par byed pa'i gzhi de la rlung de ni srid pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa gcig pu kho na yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:175b-36: khyad par ram lhag par ni lus la phan par byed ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176a-0: nad dang nad med pa'i rgyu gcig pu nyid @176a * //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-2: de ni kun byed kun bdag nyid //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-3: sna tshogs gzugs can skye dgu'i bdag /'byin byed 'dzin byed khyab 'jug gtso //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-5: de pas de ldar mi 'gyur bar //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-6: rtag tu 'bad pa nyid du gyis //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-8: yang rlung de ni lus la sogs pa thams cad skyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176a-9: sgrib pa yang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba kun byed pas kun byed ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-10: de bzhin du kun gyi bdag nyid kyang yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:176a-11: de ni thams cad kyi srog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-12: de bzhin sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can yang yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:176a-13: rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-14: de nyid ni skye dgu rnams gnas par byed pas na skye dgu'i bdag go //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-15: de 'byin par byed pa yang yin te de phyi dang nang gi dngos po skyed par byed pa yang yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:176a-16: sna tshogs pa 'dzin pas na 'dzin par byed pa yang yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-17: de bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas na khyab 'jug go //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-18: de bzhin du thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na gtso bo'o //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-19: 'gro ba rnams sdud cing 'ching bar byed pas na sdud byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-20: de nyid kyis na 'chi bdag ste 'gro ba 'jig par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-21: des na 'gro ba rnams mthar 'chi bar byed pas na gshin rje nyid dang 'dra bar bya ba'i phyir gshin rje'o //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-22: gang gi phyir rlung 'di'i rang bzhin de lta bu yin pa de'i phyir rlung de ni ldang zhing 'khrugs par mi 'gyur bar rtag par dus thams cad du 'bad pa kho nar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-23: de yis tha mal gzhan gyur bas //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-24: nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-25: bsdus dang rgyas pa de ming gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-26: rgyu ba'i lam ni re re lnga //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-27: nad tshul shes par bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-29: rlung de'i las tha mal pa ni nad kyi bye brag shes par dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa la sogs pa yin par bshad la /
T13TD4312.2E:176a-30: de bzhin du gzhan du gyur pa'i las kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:176a-31: rlung ni 'phel bar gyur pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-32: skem dang mdog nag dro bag dga' //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-33: 'dar dang lto sbos bshang ba sri //
T13TD4312.2E:176a-34: stobs dang gnyid dang dbang po nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-0: smra mang mgo 'khor zhom @176b par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-2: 'di ni 'gyur ba'i bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-3: de la tha mal ba ni rang bzhin gnas pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-4: gzhan du ma gyur pa la bya la /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-5: gzhan du gyur pa ni nad 'khrugs shing gnod par gyur pa la bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-6: de bzhin du rlung nad 'di mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas ming dang gnas gang dang gang yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-7: rgyu ba'i lam gang dang gang yin pa yang re re zhing lnga lngar nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad cing bstan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-8: de la ming ni srog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-9: gnas kyang spyi bo la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga ste /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-10: ji ltar srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni spyi bo la gnas pa yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-11: gyen du rgyu ba ni brang na gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-12: khyab byed ni snying la gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-13: me dang mnyam du gnas pa ni pho ba'i me drod dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-14: thur du sel ba ni gzhang la gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-15: rgyu ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-16: srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni brang dang lkog mar rgyu la /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-17: de'i las ni glo ba la sogs pa brtan par 'dzin pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-18: stod du rgyu ba ni sna dang lte bar rgyu la las kyi bya ba ni tshig 'byin pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-19: khyab byed ni lus ma lus pa la rgyu la las ni 'gro ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-20: me dang mnyam du gnas pa khong par rgyu la bya ba'i las ni zas 'dzin pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-21: thur du sel ba ni gzhang la sogs par rgyu ste /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-22: bya ba'i las ni bshang gci 'byin pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-23: 'dir ni nad kyi rnam gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-24: de yi dbye ba nad gzhi dang //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-25: mtshan nyid bcas ba nyid du bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-26: grangs med kyang ni brgyad cu yi //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-27: grangs su sngar ni bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:176b-29: yang le'u 'dir ni rlung de'i rnam bar gyur pa'i las tha dad bar dbye ba'i tshul ni nad gzhi'i rgyu dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:176b-30: de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyi tshul ji lta bu yin pa dang bcas pa bshad de /
T13TD4312.2E:177a-0: de yang grangs med cing tshad bzung du med du zin kyang brgyad cu'i @177a * //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-1: grangs su nges par 'chad par sngar nad kyi bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u las bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-2: lus zungs zad byed bsten drags pas //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-4: sbu gu stong par rgyu gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-5: de nyid shin tu 'gengs par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-6: nad gzhan gyis ni gang ba der //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-7: khebs pas mthu can nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-9: lus zungs bdun po zad par byed pa'i sman dang zas dang spyod lam tshad las drags par lhag par bsten pas rlung nad 'khrugs nas ldang bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:177a-10: de ni stong zhing sbu gur gnas pa'i rgyun srang dag tu rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pas na sbu gu stong pa de dag shin tu 'gengs shing rgyas par byas nas ldang bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-11: de las nad gzhan gyis gang ba der phyin zhing de dag khebs par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:177a-12: rlung de mthu can mi bzad pa nyid du ldang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-13: de ltar na rlung ni rnam pa gnyis ldang ste /
T13TD4312.2E:177a-15: nad kyis khebs pa las ldang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-16: de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-17: gzer dang rgyu ma sgra bcas sbo //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-19: rgyab dang rked pa mjug tor na //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-20: ro smad kyi ni phyogs de ru //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-21: mi bzad gnod pa de de skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-23: de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs pa 'khrugs par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:177a-24: gzer la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:177a-25: de bzhin du lte ba man chad lus kyi ro smad kyi phyogs de dang der mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba'i nad kyi gnod pa'i bla brnan du ma de dang de dag skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-26: ma zhu'i gnas zhugs skom dang slon //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-27: lud pa dbugs mi bde gsud nad //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-28: lkog ma 'gags shing sgregs mang na //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-29: lte ba yan chad skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-31: ma zhu ba'i gnas lte ba yan chad du rlung zhugs par gyur na skom dang la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:177a-32: rna ba sogs zhugs dbang por gnod //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-0: rna ba la sogs pa dbang po'i bu ga rnams su rlung zhugs par gyur na mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la gnod cing ma @177b rung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-1: pags zhugs gas shing rtsub par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-3: rlung pags par gnas te 'khrugs pa ni pags pa shas cher gas shing rtsub par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-4: khrag zhugs gnyid stug mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-5: tsha zhing dmar la mdog mi sdug / thor 'byung kha zas sra bar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-8: rlung khrag la gnas te 'khrugs na ni gnyid stug pa la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-9: thor bu zhes bya ba tshigs rnams su rtsa sbom pa rmen bu ltar 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-10: de bzhin du kha zas khyad par du mi 'ju zhing sra ba rem rem por gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-11: de nyid kyis na yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-12: skom pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-13: sha tshil la gnas rmen bu dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-14: rab tu zug cing lus rtsub la /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-15: lus lci rab na rengs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-16: khu tshur dbyug pas phog snyam byed //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-18: sha dang tshil la gnas nas 'khrugs pa'i rlung ni rmen bu la sogs pa skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-19: khu tshur ram dbyug pas phog cing bsnun pa ltar na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-20: rus gnas brla dang rus tshigs na //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-21: mi bzad gzer zhing nyams stobs zad //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-23: rlung de rus pa la gnas te 'khrugs na brla la sogs pa mi bzad par gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-24: de bzhin du nyams stobs zad par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-25: rkang gnas rus pa khong stong zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-26: gnyid med rtag tu na ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-28: rlung rkang la gnas te 'khrugs pa ni rus pa khong stong du byed cing rkang zad pa dang gnyid med cing yar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-29: rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-30: khu bar gnas pa myur 'byung la //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-32: mngal gyi khu bar gnas de bzhin //
T13TD4312.2E:177b-34: khu bar gnas te rlung 'khrugs pa ni khu chu myur par 'byin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:177b-35: yang na 'gags shing mi 'byung bar byed pa'am /
T13TD4312.2E:178a-0: mdog gzhan du 'gyur bar byed pa nyid du byed par 'gyur @178a * //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-2: / mngal du gnas pa'i khu bar rlung zhugs pa'i nad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
T13TD4312.2E:178a-6: khu ba la gnas pa'i rlung 'khrugs pas mngal chags pa de 'jig cing tshul 'di ltar byed par 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.2E:178a-7: / rtsa rnams stong zhing sbo bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-9: rtsa la gnas pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na rtsa de nyid khong stong du gnas pa dang rlung gis rgyas shing sbos par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-10: chu bar gnas pa gzugs 'jas dang //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-11: sgur dang da rgan nad du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-13: chu bar gnas te rlung 'khrugs par gyur na lhu gzugs 'jas shing 'theng ba dang sgur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:178a-14: da rgan gyi nad skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-15: tshigs la gnas pa'i rlung skrang ba //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-16: rkyal pa rlung gis gang reg 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-17: brkyang dang bskum par byed pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-18: bskyod pa na dang bcas par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-20: tshigs la gnas te rlung 'khrugs na ni skrang bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:178a-21: skrang pa de yang rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba la reg pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:178a-22: de bzhin du rkang lag brkyang ba dang bskum par byed pa'i bskyod pa de dag na zhing zug pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-23: yan lag kun la brten pa ni //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-24: zug chag snyam sems 'gul ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-25: rengs dang tshor ba med pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-28: yan lag thams cad la brten te rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa na zug pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-29: gang tshe rtsa chen kun la gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-30: yang dang yang du 'khrugs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-31: de tshe yan lag la 'jug pas //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-32: nad ni lus la 'jug ces bya //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-34: dus gang gi tshe rlung rtsa bo che kun la gnas te 'khrugs par gyur pa de'i tshe lus thams cad yang dang yang du 'khrugs shing gnod par byed cing yan lag thams cad la 'jug pas zil gyis gnon par byed pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:178a-35: rlung nad de ni lus la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-36: zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:178a-37: ro smad du ni 'gags pa'i rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-0: gyen du @178b song ste snying gar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-1: snying ga'i spu gur zhugs nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-2: mgo bo yan lag bcas par zug / lus ni kun tu zhugs gyur nas //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-3: de ni gzhu ltar sgu por byed //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-4: dbugs 'byin dka' zhing mig rengs har //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-6: de nas phug ron lta bur mkhun //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-7: dran pa med de gzhan dbang can //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-8: de nyid aa ba ta nar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-10: ro smad du rlung zhugs par gyur cing rgyun srang gi lam 'gags par gyur na ro smad nas gyen du song ste snying gar gnas shing brten na snying ga'i rtsa'i sbu gu'i nang du zhugs nas snying dang mgo bo dang mur 'gram la sogs par zug cing na bar byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-11: de bzhin du lus kun tu zhugs par gyur cing bsdus par gyur nas nad pa de'i lus gzhu ltar sgur po nyid du byed cing 'gugs par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-12: de lta bu'i mi de ni dbugs 'byung bar dka' zhing rngam pa can du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:178b-13: mig rengs shing har har por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:178b-14: lhod cing gnas las 'chug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:178b-16: de nas de'i 'og tu phug ron ltar mkhun zhing sgra mi gsal bar 'byin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:178b-17: dran pa med de 'du shes mi gsal ba nyid de nad de gzhan dbang can zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-18: la la dag gi gzhung gis ni nad de nyid aa ba ta na zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-19: rlung gis snying ni btang gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-20: skad cig tsam du bde la reg / slar zhugs na ni na bar byed //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-22: gzhan dbang can zhes bya ba'i nad de la rlung gis snying ga btang zhing der mi gnas par gyur na skad cig tsam du bde ba la gnas shing nad med par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-23: yang de slar zhugs shing gnas par gyur na skad cig na zhing mi bde bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-24: de ni mngal 'jig las byung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-25: khrag ni lhag par 'dzag gyur dang //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-26: snad pa dag las byung gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:178b-27: shin tu gso bar dka' bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-0: gzhan dbang can zhes bya ba'i rlung nad de mngal 'jig pa la sogs pa'i rgyu gsum las @179a * //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-1: byung ba ni gso bar dka' bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-2: mjing ba rengs pa'i rlung zhugs shing //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-3: gang tshe rtsa chen la gnas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-4: lus kun khyab par gyur pa na //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-5: de tshe nam tshong 'gugs par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-6: lus ni gzhu ltar nang du gug / mig rengs shugs ni 'byin par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-8: bad kan skyugs par byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-9: rtsib logs zug cing tshig mi thon //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-10: 'gram pa rgyab dang mgo bo na //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-11: 'di ni nang du gug ces bya //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-13: mjing ba ni gnya' ba la brten pa'i gnas nyid gnyis yod de /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-14: de dag tu rlung zhugs nas gang gi tshe rtsa chen por phyin nas gnas par gyur zhing lus thams cad khyab cing khebs par gyur pa de'i tshe nam tshong 'gugs shing yon por byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-15: de bzhin du lus kyang gzhu ltar nang du 'gugs par byed cing sgur por byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-16: mig gnyis rengs shing 'byed pa dang 'dzums mi shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-17: rang gi shugs chags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-18: gug por byed pa la sogs pa'i nad sna tshogs pa'i tshul skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-19: de bzhin du glal mang du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-21: bad kan skyug cing slon par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-22: rtsib logs gnyis su zug cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-24: 'gram pa la sogs pa na bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-25: 'di lta bu'i nad 'di ni nang du gug pa'i rlung nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-26: phyi yi de dang 'dra ba la /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-27: lus ni phyir dgye byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-28: mgo bo rgyab du 'dren byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-29: de la brang ni shin tu 'bur //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-30: gnya' ba bcom pa ltar na zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-31: so dang kha ni mdog mi sdug / rdul zhing lus ni lhod par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-32: phyir dgyed gzhu rengs zhes bya zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-33: de la shugs drag ces kyang bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:179a-35: phyir dgye ba zhes bya ba'i rlung nad gzhan dag ni tshul de dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa las /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-37: lus phyir dgye zhing rgyab tu sgu bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-38: mgo bo rgyab du yo bar 'dren zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-39: phyir dgye ba zhes bya ba'i nad de la brang shin tu 'bur zhing mtho ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-40: gnya' ba na zhing brdungs pa ltar sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-41: de bzhin du so dang kha'i mdog mi sdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179a-42: rdul shin tu mang du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-0: lus lhod cing shig shig po @179b 'gyur bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-1: rlung nad de ni phyir dgyed ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-3: la la na re ni gzhungs rengs zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-4: gzhan dag ni de la shugs drag po zhes bya'o zhes kyang bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-5: gnad la gnas pa'i rmar zhugs te //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-6: rlung gis bskyod bar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-7: rkang pa nas ni mgo bo'i bar //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-8: lus la nad kyis khyab byed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-9: skom zhing lus ni skya gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-10: rma yi da rgan de spang bya //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-12: gnad la gnas shing brten pa'i rmar zhugs pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad de rlung gis bskyod cing bsnan par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-13: rkang pa nas mgo bo'i bar gyi lus thams cad la nad kyis khyab cing zil gyis gnon par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-14: rma'i da rgan de lta bu de skom dad che zhing lus skya ba las byung ba de ni gso dka' ba yin pas spang zhing dor bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-15: lus la 'jug pa'i rlung kun ni //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-16: shugs dang bral nas bde bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-18: sngar bshad pa'i rlung nad lus la 'jug pa la sogs pa de rnams la rlung gi shugs dang bral zhing /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-19: shugs zhi bar gyur na de ni bde zhing nad med par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-20: lce ni brud drags skam zos gnod //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-22: 'gram pa gnyes ni bskyod byas nas //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-23: kha ni gdangs bar byed pa'am //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-25: 'gram pa nyams par byed pa des //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-26: za dang smra ba dka' bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-28: lce brud drags shing so shing la sogs pas gnod par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-29: zas skam po zos shing bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-30: khu tshur dang rdo la sogs pas snad pas 'gram pa'i rtsa bar gnas pa'i rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-31: 'gram pa gnyis bskyod cing rang gi gnas nas 'gul bar byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-32: kha rtag tu gdangs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-33: yang na kha 'dzums shing 'byed mi shes par byed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-34: nad de ni 'gram pa la gnas nas nyams par byed pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.2E:179b-35: 'gram pa bskyod cing nyams bar byed pa des zas zab dang tshig tu smra ba shin tu dka' bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-36: smra bar byed pa'i rtsa gnas rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-37: lce ni ldib par byed 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:179b-38: lce ldebs des ni bza' btung dang //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-0: smra ba la sogs mi nus @180a * //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-3: smra bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa gang yin pa la gnas par gyur pa'i rlung ni lce ldibs shing lkugs par byed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-4: nad de ni lce ldibs pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-5: nad des ni bza' ba la sogs pa la longs spyad par mi nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-6: mgo bos khur ni khyer ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-7: dgod drags mang du smra ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-8: sdangs dang 'chus te sbrid pa gtong //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-9: gzhu sra 'dren par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-10: sngas ni mi mnyam la nyal dang //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-11: sra ba 'cha' bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-12: rlung skyed pa ni de dang des //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-13: rlung 'phel ro stod la zhugs nas //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-14: gdong gi gzhogs phyed yon por byed //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-15: smra dang dgod dang lta ba'ang yo //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-16: de nas de yi de yi mgo 'gul zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-17: tshig mi phyin la mig rengs shing //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-19: sgra mi thos shing sbrid pa thogs //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-20: dri mi tshor zhing dran nyams rmongs //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-21: gnyid log pa na sdangs par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-22: mchil ma g-yon du 'dor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-24: nam tshong yan chad mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-25: gzhogs phyed dag gam ro smad na //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-26: la las de gzhogs phyed nad bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-27: gzhan dag phyogs gcig gug ces zer //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-29: mgo bos khur lci ba khyer zhing gnas gzhan nas gzhan du 'degs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-30: dgod drags pa la sogs pa dang lus 'chus te sbrid pa gtong ba la sogs pa dang sra ba'i zas 'cha' bar byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-31: de dag gis ni rlung skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-32: de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'dir ma bshad pa'i rlung skyed par byed pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de dang des rlung 'phel bar gyur nas lus kyi ro stong la zhugs te gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-33: des gdong gi gzhogs phyed yon por byed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-34: de bzhin du tshig smra bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-36: lta bar byed pa na yang yon por byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:180a-37: de nas de'i 'og tu mi de'i mgo 'gul zhing ldeg la 'dar bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-38: tshig mi phyin cing thogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-39: mig rengs shing har har por lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180a-40: so 'gul zhing g-yo ba la sogs pa mchil ma g-yon du 'dor gyin drang por mi 'dor ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-0: mig gcig 'dzums par byed pa @180b dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:180b-1: nam tshong yan chad mgrin pa la sogs pa mi bzad par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-3: yang na ro smad du na bar byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-4: nad de ni gzhogs phye dan ba'i rlung nad ces bya'o zhes bshad la /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-5: gzhan dag ni phyogs gcig gug pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-6: rlung ni khrag la brten gyur te //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-7: spyi bo 'dzin pa'i rtsar zhugs pa //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-8: rtsub cing nad bcas mdog gnag byed //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-9: rtsa 'dzin de ni gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-11: rlung ni khrag la brten nas rgyu ste song nas spyi bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rtsar zhugs par gyur pa ni rtsub cing na ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-12: mdog gnag par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-13: de lta bu'i nad de ni rtsa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste gso zhing bcos par mi nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-14: rlung gis de la gzhogs phyed bzung //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-15: rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams byas nas //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-16: gzhogs phyed gang yang rung la gnod //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-17: tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-18: de yis lus phyed thams cad ni //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-19: lus sbyor mi nus tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-20: de ni phyogs gcig nad ces zer //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-21: gzhan dag phyogs gcig skams par 'chad //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-23: rlung gis lus kyi gzhogs phyed bzung zhing der gnas par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-24: rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-25: lus kyi g-yas sam g-yon gyi gzhogs phyed gang yang rung ba la gnod cing mi shis par byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-26: tshigs rnams kyi bog re'i sbrel mtshams lhod cing shig shig por byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-27: nad pa de'i lus kyi gzhogs phyed kun ma lus par lus la sbyor bar mi nus shing g-yo 'gul gyi bya ba byed mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-28: tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'dug pa'i nad de ni phyogs gcig gi nad ces zer ro //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-29: drang srong gzhan dag ni phyogs gcig skams pa zhes 'chad do //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-30: lus kun rlung nad de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-31: yan lag kun la brtan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-33: phyogs gcig skams pa dang lus kun la zhugs pa'i rlung nad ni tshor ba med pa la sogs pa tshul 'dra ba yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:180b-34: de ni yan lag thams cad la brten pa'i nad cis bya bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-35: rlung nad nyi tshes gzhogs phyed skams //
T13TD4312.2E:180b-36: shin tu gso dka' yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-0: rlung nad nyi tshe nad gzhan dang ma 'dres pa gang @181a * //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-1: yin pa des gzhogs phyed skams par gyur pa ni shin tu gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-2: gzhan dang 'dres pa gso dka' yin //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-4: nad gzhan bad kan dang mkhris pa gang yang rung ba dang rlung 'dres par gyur pa'i gzhogs phyed skams pa'ang gso dka' ba yin no ;
T13TD4312.2E:181a-5: / zad byed rgyu can spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-7: zad byed kyi rgyu las byung ba'i gzhogs phyed skams pa ni spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-8: ma zhu bad kan ldan pa yis //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-9: rgyun srang bkag ste lus rengs pas //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-10: brkyang bskum kun las nyams gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-11: shing 'dra shing ltar rengs pa yin ;
T13TD4312.2E:181a-13: rlung nad ma zhu ba dang bad kan dang bcas pa dag gis rlung gi rgyu ba'i lam bkag ste /
T13TD4312.2E:181a-14: lus rengs shing 'gyur mi shes par byas pas brkyang ba dang bskum pa la sogs pa'i lus kyi spyod pa kun las nyams par gyur pa ni dbyug ltar rengs pa yin pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:181a-15: shing ltar rengs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-16: phrag pa'i rtsa bar zhugs pa'i rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-17: der gnas rtsa ni 'khums byas te //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-18: dpung pa bskyod par mi nus byed //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-19: dpung pa 'jas pa'i rlung nad yin //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-21: rlung phrag pa'i rtsa bar gnas te /
T13TD4312.2E:181a-22: de na gnas pa'i rtsa 'khums shing 'dus par byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:181a-23: dpung pa bskyod bsgul mi nus par byed pa'i rlung nad skyed par byed do /
T13TD4312.2E:181a-24: gang zhig lag mthil sor mor 'brel //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-25: chu ba rgyab tu 'khums byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-26: lag ngar bya ba nyams byed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-27: rlung de bi sha tse ru bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-29: nad gang zhig lag pa'i mthil du phyogs shing de dang 'brel pa chu ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i chu ba rgyab tu 'khums par byed cing /
T13TD4312.2E:181a-30: lag ngar gyi rgyab tu rlung gis 'khums par byed nas lag ngar gyi bya ba'i las gang dag yin pa thams cad nyams par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:181a-31: g-yo 'gul gyi bya ba thams cad mi nus par byed pa'i rlung nad de ni ming bi sha tse zhes bya ba yin no zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-32: gang tshe rlung ni rked par gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:181a-33: brla yi chu ba'i nang du zhugs //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-0: gang gi tshe rlung gi nad rked pa'i phyogs su gnas shing brten par gyur nas brla'i chu ba'i nang du zhugs shing zhen par gyur pa de'i tshe mi de 'theng por gyur te rkang @181b zug cing 'chal ba'i 'theng por 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-3: gang gi tshe rked par gnas pa'i rlung de brla gnyis ka la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe brla gnyis ka'i spyod pa nyams pas 'phye bor 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-4: gang zhig 'gro bar rtsom pa na //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-6: tshigs kyi sprel mtshams lhod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-7: de ni sran ma'i 'theng por bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-9: skyes bu gang 'gro bar rtsom zhing 'gro ba'i bya ba 'dor zhing g-yo la 'theng po lta bur 'gro ba'i skyes bu de ni tshigs kyi bog re'i sbrel mtshams lhod cing nyams par gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-10: de ni ming sran ma ltar 'theng pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-11: kha zas dro grang skam rlon 'dres //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-12: lci dang snum ches bsten pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-13: zhu dang ma zhu mi bdes bskyod //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-14: nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log pas //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-15: ma zhu shin tu sogs gyur te //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-16: gal te brla nang zhugs gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-17: bad kan tshil dang rlung bcas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-18: nad gzhan zil gyis mnan nas ni //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-19: brla rus nang du gang byas te //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-20: bad kan gyis te rengs gyur la //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-21: de tshe de yis brla rengs byed //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-22: 'degs mi nus grang tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-23: gzhan gyi yin snyam sems shing lci //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-24: mi bzad par ni 'gro ba nyams //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-25: sems khong chud cing yan lag na //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-27: rkang pa sgyid zhan 'degs par dka' //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-28: bem bem por 'dug ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-29: de ni brla rengs nad ces bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-30: gzhan dag phyug po'i rlung zhes zer //
T13TD4312.2E:181b-32: kha zas kyi bag dro grang la sogs par 'dren mar bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-33: zhu ba dang bcas pa'i ma zhu ba ni zhu ba dang ma zhu ba ste /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-34: la la ni zhu zhing smin pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-35: la la ni ma zhu zhing ma smin pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-37: ma tshos pa dag gis mi bde bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-38: de bzhin du mi bde zhing sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa la brten pas bskyod cing 'khrugs par byas pas ma zhu ba shin tu shas cher sogs par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-39: de bzhin du nyin par gnyid log cing nyal ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:181b-40: gnyid ma log pa dag yun ring du bsten kyang ma zhu ba shin tu shas cher sogs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-0: ma zhu ba de gal te brla dang @182a * //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-1: byin pa'i nang du zhugs par gyur na /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-2: ma zhu ba de bad kan dang tshil dang rlung dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-3: ma zhu ba de ni rlung dang bad kan gyi nad gzhan la ltos pa zil gyis mnan cing mthu chung bar byed la /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-4: de'i phyir ma zhu ba des bad kan gyi g-yo ba med par byas shing brla'i rus pa'i nang du gang bar byed pa na de'i tshe brla rengs shing bskyod mi shes par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-5: de bas de'i nad des brla rengs par byed cing 'gyur mi shes par 'degs shing bskyod mi shes mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-6: grang zhing tshor ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-7: gzhan gyi yin par snyam du sems shing rang gi lus las byung ba snyam du mi sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-8: de bzhin du mi bzad par na zhing brnag par dka' ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-9: sems khong du chud pa la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-10: nad de ni brla rengs kyi nad ces bya'o zhes tshe'i rig byed shes pa'i slob dpon dag gis bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-11: drang srong gzhan dag gis phyug po'i rlung nad ces bya'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-12: rlung dang khrag las skyes pa'i skrang //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-13: pus mo'i steng byung nad tshabs che //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-14: ce sbyang mgo ltar sbom gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-15: ce spyang mgo 'dra yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-17: rlung dang khrag las skyes pa'i skrang pa pus mo'i steng du byung ba de ni nad tshabs shin tu che ba yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-18: de ni ce spyang gi mgo 'dra par sbom zhing che bar skrang pa yin pas ce spyang gi mgo 'dra ba'i rlung nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-19: rkang pa na zhing mi mnyam 'dor //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-20: ngal ba las ni gang tshe rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-21: long mor gnas te nad skyed pa //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-22: de ni rlung nad tsher mar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-24: rkang pa sa la mi mnyam zhing mi mnyam par 'dor ba'am /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-25: yang na ngal zhing dub pa las dus gang gi tshe rlung byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:182a-26: rkang pa la brten nas long mor gnas pa'i nad skyed par gyur pa'i rlung nad de ni tsher ma lta bu zhes bshad do ;
T13TD4312.2E:182a-27: / rting pa sor mor 'brel pa yi //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-28: chu bar rlung gis gnod gyur gang //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-29: brla nas 'jug par byed pa de //
T13TD4312.2E:182a-30: gzugs 'khums zhes ni bya bar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-0: rting par gnas nas sor mo dang 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i chu ba'i tshogs gang yin par rlung des gnod @182b pa skyed par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:182b-1: brla'i bar du gyen du 'jug par byed cing bsdus shing 'khums par byed pa gang yin pa de ni drang srong dag gis gzugs 'khums pa'i rlung nad ces bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-2: bi sha tsi dang gzugs 'khums bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-3: mi bzad na ba kha li ra bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-5: sngar lag ngar du zhugs pa'i rlung nad kyi bi sha tsi dang /
T13TD4312.2E:182b-6: 'das ma thag pa'i gzugs 'khums pa'i rlung nad gnyis po mi bzad pa dang ldan par snang ba ni rlung nad kha li zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-7: gang gi rkang pa brtse gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-8: bem bem por ni gyur pa dag / bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur pa //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-9: rkang pa brtse bar de bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-11: mi gang gi rkang pa gnyis brtse zhing tsha ba tsag tsag por byed pa'i sgo nas tshor ba med cing bem bem por gyur pa dag ni bad kan dang 'dres pa las gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.2E:182b-12: nad de ni rkang pa brtse ba zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-13: mkhris pa khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-14: rkang pa gnyis su tsha byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-15: khyad par du ni 'gro tshe tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-16: de ni rkang tsha zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-18: rlung gi nad mkhris pa dang khrag dang bcas par gyur pa las rkang pa gnyis su tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gyur pa gang yin pa dang ;
T13TD4312.2E:182b-19: khyad par du yang 'gro zhing 'chag pa'i tshe lhag par tsha bar gyur pa'i nad de ni rkang pa tsha ba zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-20: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.2E:182b-21: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.2E:182b-22: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.2E:182b-24: // / de nas dreg nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-26: rlung las gyur pa yin par chos mthun pa yin pas na /
T13TD4312.2E:182b-27: rlung nad kyi 'og tu le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-28: de yang rlung dang khrag las skyes pa'i skrang zhes smos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-29: khrag ni 'khrugs par byed pa'i zas //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-30: tsha ba dang ni mi 'phrod pa //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-31: bsten dang sbyor ba log pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-32: nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log dang //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-33: nyal po drags dang skyid par gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-34: 'chag pa'i spyod pa ma pa sten dang //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-35: snad dang sbyang ba ma byas pas //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-36: mi yi khrag ni 'khrugs gyur cing //
T13TD4312.2E:182b-37: rlung skyed zos pas rlung nad ni //
T13TD4312.2E:183a-1: de bzhin khrag kyang lam 'gags la //
T13TD4312.2E:183a-2: dang por gnod par 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:183a-4: khrag 'khrugs shing skyed par byed pa'i zas 'bru dang srog chags chu na spyod pa'i sha dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-10: zho skyur po la sogs bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-11: mi 'phrod pa'i zas gsher ba'i sha dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-12: mon sran gre'u lhan cig bza' ba dang sbrang rtsi dang mar cha mnyam par za ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-13: 'dir ma smos su zin kyang khrag skyed par byed pa'i spyod lam dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-14: kha zas la sogs pa de dag bsten cing goms par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-15: de bzhin du sbyor ba log pa ste sman dpyad kyi gtsug lag las byung ba bzhin du bsten par ma byas pa'i sbyor ba log pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-16: de bzhin du nyin par shas cher gnyid log pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-17: mtshan mo'i dus su gnyid ma log pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-18: nyal po drags shing bud med bsten pa drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-19: phal cher skyid de bar gnas shing rtag tu bde ba dang ldan la lus 'jam sha can du gyur pas 'chag cing 'gro ba'i spyod lam ma bsten gyi /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-20: rtag tu dal bar 'dug la bskyod cing rtsol ba mi byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-21: snad pa ste mtshon cha'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang yang rung bas snad cing rma byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-22: sbyang ba ma byas te dri ma'i tshogs ma bsal cing ma bton pas mi'i khrag 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur zhing rlung skyed cing 'khrugs pa'i zas kha ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-24: bska ba la sogs pa zos pa la goms shing mang du bsten pas rlung nad 'phel zhing dang po sogs par gyur la /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-25: de'i 'og tu 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-26: lam log pa gzhan du zhugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-27: khrag kyang de dang 'dra bar sogs shing 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183a-28: 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas lam 'gag par bya ba de nyid kyis dang por gnod cing skyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:183a-29: de ni phyug po'i rlung nad dang //
T13TD4312.2E:183a-31: ming du de ni rnam par bshad //
T13TD4312.2E:183a-33: dreg nad de ni phyug po'i rlung nad dang 'theng po'i nad dang stobs 'jig pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-0: @183b rlung khrag 'dres pa'i nad ces bya bar ming gi rnam grangs su slob dpon gyis bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-1: de yang dang por rkang par rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-2: mchog tu bzhon sogs 'phyang las byung //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-4: dreg nad de yang dang por rkang pa gnyis su rgyug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-5: mchog tu'am khyad par du ni rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon te /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-6: rkang pa 'phyang bar byas pa las de 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-9: de bzhin lus nyams yan lag lhod //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-10: pus mo byin pa brla rked pa //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-11: lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs rnams su //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-12: g-ya' zhing 'gul dang na ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-13: chag snyam sems shing tshor med lci //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-14: yang dang yang du ldang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-15: slar yang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-17: dreg nad de phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid sngar byung ba'i tshul ni mdze 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma dang mtshungs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-18: shin tu 'dar ba'am reg na rtsub //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-19: tshul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug / ces bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-20: de bzhin du mtshan ma gzhan yang lus nyams shing shig shig por 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-21: yan lag rnams lhod ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-22: pus mo la sogs par g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad yang dang yang du ldang zhing yang yang du slar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-23: de nas slar ldang du ba byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-24: rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-25: lan 'ga' lag pa dag du gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-26: byi ba'i dug ni ldang ba ltar //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-27: lus kun la ni khyab par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-29: dreg nad de rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar gnas shing rten byas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-30: lan 'ga' ni lag pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar yang gnas par byed de /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-31: byi ba'i dug ldang bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-32: dang por lus kyi phyogs gcig tu gnas nas /
T13TD4312.2E:183b-33: de'i 'og tu lus ma lus par khyab cing mched par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-34: thogs mar pags pa khrag la gnas //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-35: byung ba rtogs par sla zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-37: dreg nad de thog mar te dang por pags pa dang khrag la gnas shing brten nas byung ba de ni dreg nad rtogs par sla ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-38: de nas rim gyis lus zungs kun //
T13TD4312.2E:183b-39: khyab ste rtogs par dka' zhes bya //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-1: de nas de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa las gzhan pa'i lus zungs tshil la sogs pa kun khyab cing zhu bar gyur nas 'byung ba de ni gting na gnas te rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-2: rtogs sla pags g-ya' la sogs ldan //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-3: zangs ltar dmar dang sngo ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-4: bya rmyang bcas shing rab dro tsha //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-6: dreg nad rtogs par sla ba ni pags pa g-ya' ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-8: gzugs la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-9: de bzhin du zangs ltar dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-10: sngo ba'i mdog tu snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-11: bya rmyang byed 'dod pa dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-12: mi bzad par rab tu tsha ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-13: rtogs dka' sngar bas lhag par na //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-14: skrang zhing mkhrang la tshos par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-15: gzhang dang tshigs dang rus pa rkang //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-16: bcad snyam sems shing nang du rgyu //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-17: shugs dang ldan tshe sgur po dang //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-19: lus ni kun tu rgyu ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-21: dreg nad rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-22: dreg nad snga ma rtogs par bla ba bas lhag par na zhing gting zab par skrang ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-24: tshos shing smin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-25: gzhang la sogs pa bcad pa snyam du sems shing nad nang du rgyu ba dang de shugs dang ldan zhing shas cher bde ba'i tshe na sgur po'am 'jas pa'am 'theng por byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-26: rlung de mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lus thams cad du rgyu zhing 'byam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-27: de la rlung shas che gyur na //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-28: gzer 'gul zug pa'i shas che zhing //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-29: skrang pa rtsub cing gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-31: rtsa chen sor mo'i tshigs rnams ni //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-32: 'khums shing lus bcum shin tu na //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-33: grang la mi dga' reg na bde //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-34: rengs shing 'dar la tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-36: de la dreg nad rlung gi shas che ba ni gzer ba la sogs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.2E:184a-37: gzer ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par na ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-38: zug pa ni bar bar du chad cing sdod de na ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-39: lus bcum pa ni yan lag dam du bcangs pa snyam sems pa'o //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-40: grang ba la mi dga' ba ni grang ba la sdang zhing mi dga' ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:184a-41: reg na bde ba ni grang bde nyid kyis reg na bde bar 'gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-0: khrag shas che skrang rab tu zug / dmar @184b zhing tsha ba tseg tseg byed //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-1: snum dang rtsub pas zhi mi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-2: g-ya' dang 'drul bar ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-4: khrag gi shas che zhing rgyas pa las byung ba'i dreg nad kyi mdog dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-5: yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus bskus ba ltar tsha ba tseg tseg byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-6: zas dang spyod lam snum pa dang rtsub pas zhi zhing bde bar mi 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-7: gzhan yang g-ya' ba la sogs pa dang ldan no //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-8: mkhris gyur tsha zhing rmongs bag dang //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-9: rdul zhing brgya la myos skom dad che //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-10: reg mi bzod cing na la dmar //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-11: skrang zhing smin la shin tu dro //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-13: mkhris pa shas che zhing bdo ba las gyur pa'i dreg nad ni tsha zhing gdung pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-14: rmongs bag la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-15: bad kan gyis 'gul mi shes lci //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-16: tshor med snum zhing grang ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-17: g-ya' zhing cung zad na ba yin //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-19: bad kan shas che bar gyur pa'i dreg nad ni 'gul mi shes pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-22: nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa las byung ba ni /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-23: dreg nad kyi mtshan nyid 'dren ma dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-24: nad gcig las gyur gsar gso sla //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-26: dreg nad de nad gzhi gcig las byung bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-27: gsar du byung zhing ring bor ma lon pa ni gso sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-30: dreg nad nad gzhi gnyis las byung ba ni mi la ba tsam du 'tsho bar nus pa tsam yin no //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-31: 'dus pa las gyur chu ser 'dzag / rengs dang thor bu 'phyang ba spang //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-33: dreg nad de nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-34: chu ser 'dzag par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-35: rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.2E:184b-36: thor bu 'phyang bar byed pa de ni spang zhing dor bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-37: rlung ni yan lag tshigs gnas pa //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-38: khrag gi lam la myur gnod byed //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-39: de gnyis phan tshun 'dres gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.2E:184b-40: nad kyis srog ni 'phrog par byed //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-0: rlung ni yan lag gi tshigs rnams kyi nang du zhugs te gnas nas khrag rgyu ba'i lam la myur du gnod cing 'joms par @185a * //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-2: rlung khrag de gnyis 'dres shing 'khrugs par gyur na rlung gi nad kyis mi'i srog 'phrog cing 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-3: lnga yi bdag nyid can rlung las //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-4: srog rtsub drag shul smyung ba dang //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-5: 'grangs drags snad dang lam gyis du ba //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-6: shugs bkag nan gyis btsir ba yis //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-7: 'khrugs nas mig la sogs pa la //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-8: nye bar gnod pa skyed byed cing //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-9: cham pa nyam thag skam lud pa //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-10: dbugs mi bde sogs nad mar skyed //
T13TD4312.2E:185a-12: srog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i rlung lnga yod pa las kyang /
T13TD4312.2E:185a-13: srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni rtsub pa la sogs pas 'khrugs par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.2E:185a-14: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po la gnod par byed de /
